column2: A wo li nwer nyi etꞌtohngo ji Jisos Kraist lohng no, ji jolo mmon a Devid,
Ebraham jele Aisik. Aisik jel Jekob. Jekob jel Juda, a abon bako.
Juda jele Peres, go Sera. Nnyehn ebo, bo jo lung-e re Tamar. Peres jel Hesron. Hesron jel Ram.
Ram jel Aminadab, Aminadab jel Nason. Nason jel Salmon.
Salmon jel Boas. Nnyehn Boas, bo jo lung-e re Rehab. Boas jel Obed. Nnyehn Obed, bo jo lung-e re Rut. Obed jel Jesi.
Jesi jel Devid ji jolo ntul. Devid ji jolo ntul jel Solomon. Nnyehn Solomon tohko jol nkal Uraya.
Solomon jel Rehoboam. Rehoboam jel Abija. Abija jel Asa.
Asa jel Jehosafat. Jehosafat jel Joram. Joram jel Usia.
Usia jel Jotam. Jotam jel Ehas. Ehas jel Hesekaya.
Hesekaya jel Manase. Manase jel Amon. Amon jel Josia.
Josia jel Jekonia, a abon bako, ngare nyi anebe Bebilon ba bob abone Israel, tahm a bo go Bebilon.
Ngare nyi bo ma bob abone Israel, tahm a bo go Bebilon, owo Jekonia kehm jele Sealtiel. Sealtiel jel Serubabel.
Serubabel jel Abiud. Abiud jel Eliakim. Eliakim jel Asor.
Asor jel Sadohk. Sadohk jel Akim. Akim jel Eliud.
Eliud jel Eleasar. Eleasar jel Matan. Matan jel Jekob.
Jekob jel Josef ji jolo nlum a Meri. Meri ji jolo nnyehn Jisos, Jisos ji bo kpo lung-e re Kraist.

Bomo goji Ebraham, nde nne lꞌjel mmon, mmon tahm jel ntem mmon ano ano tete ba rehng go ngare nyi Devid, babnde nne jolo ewubu ane ani. Bomo goji Devid, nde nne lꞌjel mmon, mmon tahm jel ntem mmon ano ano tete ba rehng ngare nyi bo bobo abone Israel, tahm a bo go Bebilon, babnde nne jolo ewubu ane ani. Bomo ngare nyi bo bobo abone Israel, tahm abo go Bebilon, nde nne lꞌjel mmon, mmon tahm jel ntem mmon ano ano tete ba rehng ngare nyi Kraist, babnde nne jolo ewubu ane ani.
Ana wo bo jele Jisos Kraist. Nnyehn Jisos, bo jo lung-e re Meri. Ngare nyi bo ma lam elbal abola Josef, Josef tikem noongo a Meri, Meri sa ela go nsahm Etingi Etohko.
Josef nlum ewe jolo nnobeljina nne. Á sebem re á sono Meri. Á sebe mbang ana nyi á bahk-e tene, ane kꞌwuk.

Eji Josef jo tir nsol nyio kpee, enjel nyi Esowo kehm bake, ba kpir-e go nlem, kehm-e tongo re, “Josef ji mmon no Devid, ka kpe fahl elkoko Meri go elbal! Tibre ela bi á ma sa o, á sa go nsahm Etingi Etohko.
Á bahke jele mmon, no a bahk-e gungu mbing re Jisos (ji lohngo re ntꞌtahre). Tibre á bahke tahre ane ebe yehke go bo abiafem.”
Nsol nyia kpee limi, eji alum nya Ntul Esowo bungu sehng goji nnyehnamahr lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi, nya á bungu re,
“Mmongungu a nnenkal, (Ngbahme nyi bo kala nꞌnoongo a ne) bahke sake ela, jel mmon no nlum, no bo bahke jo lung-e re Emanuel.” (Ji lohngo re, “Esowo li a nahre”).
Josef nyahme kan go ellu, á kehm limi ana enjel nyi Ntul Esowo tong-e no, á feere song ko Meri go elbal.
Á tikem noongo a ne tete á jel ngbokambang a mmon ewe no nlum. Josef kehm-e gungu mbing re Jisos.
Jisos, bo jel-e go Betlehem ji Judea ngare nyi Herod jolo ntul. Owo akahnkahn ane kehm lohngo go ero nfam ba go Jerusalem,
ba kehme elbahbe re, “Mmon no na, no bo m-e jel, no li ntul no Jus? Tibre wahr ebnyehn elonlo eje go ero nfam. Owo wahnge e ba no re wahr ba kak-e.”
Eji ntul a Herod wuku ano, eltim kehm-e jokko, a aneb Jerusalem kpee.
Owo á kehm lungu atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm, bo ba kono edi ajehng. Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Kraist jio, bo bahk-e jele gan?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Go Betlehem ji Judea.
“ ‘Wahn Betlehem ji Juda,
wahn erennge ejahbe sang go mbang anyehng anyehng
go ellong atubesi ajahbe nya li go Juda.
Tibre go egahne ellong wo,
ntubesi bahke lohngo,
no bahke ba fili Israel, ane ebame.’ ”
Herod kehm lungu akahnkahn ane bao, tahm a bo go nkpohko, song bahb bo ekahmekahme ngare nyi elonlo jio lohngo no.
Owo á kehm tumu bo tv go Betlehem, a elle ni á tubu bo re, “Songen, wahn song seb mmon noo nob nob! Ń lꞌsong seb-e nyehn, lim-m wahn, me n kahn, eji me n lꞌtob je song kak-e fvfo.”
Eji bo ma wuk ana ntul bungu no, bo kehm tahme. Elonlo ji bo jo nyehn go ero nfam kehm gboko bo mbang tete song yiimi edi ji mmon noo jolo no.
Eji bo kpe nyehn elonlo jio yim no, bo bele eyebatahng sehng, fere jo gꞌgeere.
Bo kehm yele ekpꞌkpa, song nyehn mmon, a Meri nnyehn, gbo jamme alahng, kak mmon. Bo kehm soro lennge abam ebo, yehke agul, frankinsens, a mmir, yare mmon.
Esowo kehm rehke bo go nlem re, bo kꞌkpe feere goji Herod. Owo bo kehm sehnge mbang nyindiki kehnge.

Ngare nyi akahnkahn ane bao ma tahm fi, owo enjel nyi Esowo kehm ba kpiri Josef go nlem, kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm, wo rod mmon, a nnyehn, be, song go Ijipt, kang ona tete me n kpe ba tong-a. Tibre Herod yahke ba mmon noa seb re á wul.”
Josef kehm tahme, rod mmon, a nnyehn, bo tahm atv atv song rehng go Ijipt.
Owo á jolo no tete Herod kpo, eji lꞌlohko jol ana Ntul Esowo bungu sehng goji nnyehnamahr re, “N lungu mmon ewame go Ijipt, á lohng ba.”

Herod sebe kan kahn re, akahnkahn ane m-e nehm, atahng kehm-e rake tete. Á kehm tumu ane, bo song wul abon ba nlum kpee go Betlehem, a abon ajahbe ba li sennge o kak, ba ma kang bomo nnya ebal feere ndi, tib ana á wuku goji akahnkahn ane bao bada ngare nyi elonlo lohngo no.
Ngare nyio nyi lohko lim ana nnyehnamahr Jeremaya bungu no re,
“Bobwuk ewahl ane go Rama,
ewahl ji ane ma biingi aling,
fere kpꞌlingi ndon ndon.
Resel kpꞌlingi abon ebe.
Bo kak-e eltim,
jol eltim we tikem naange,
tibre bo kpeem li elikiliki.”
Ngare nyi Herod ma kpo, owo enjel nyi Ntul Esowo kehm kpe song kpiri Josef go nlem, eji á jolo go Ijipt, kehm-e tongo re,
“Tahm, rod mmon, a nnyehn, wo feere a bo go ndi nyi Israel. Tibre ane ba jo seb re bo ba wul mmon bobkpo.”
Josef kehm tahme, rod mmon, a nnyehn, feere a bo go ndi nyi Israel.
Eji Josef wuku re, Arkelaus ebko nji nyi nde Herod, kpꞌfili Judea, á kehm kehme elfahle eljeke o. Owo Esowo kehm-e kpe rehke go nlem, Josef kehm tahme go ejang bi Galili,
song lene go ejahbe ji bo kpo lung re Nasaret, eji lꞌlohko jol ana abanyehnamahr Esowo bungu no re, “Bo bahke jo lung-e re nne a Nasaret.”
Ngare nyio Jon ji nwohngalahb kehm lohngo ba, ba kehme elbungu go elka emahng nio ni Judea re,
“Yaangen elkpin enahne, tibre etul bi Esowo ebkabbe.”
Jon wo jolo nne no nnyehnamahr Aisaya jo bung bada ne, eji á jo bung re,
“Nne noa,
kpꞌrabe go elka emahng re,
‘Tuungen mbang nyi Ntul bum-e.
Limen mbang tꞌtor,
nyi á bahke sehnge.’ ”
Nsol nyi Jon jo kak, bo limi go anyar nyam nyi bo kpo lung re ekamel. Á jo gbaange egbaange ji bo limi go ngunyam. Á jo li agohrobi, fere jo yab akehng ekon.
Ane jo lohngo go Jerusalem je go ege, a ane ba jolo go Judea kpee, go ane kpee ba lene ajahbe nya jolo egbuk ebbal ebbal bi aya ma bo kpo lung re Jodan.
Bo jo fvvrv abiafem ebo, á jo wohngo bo alahb go Jodan.
Eji Jon nyehne aneb Farisi, a anebe Sadusi gbalee kpꞌbake re á wohngo bo alahb, á kehm tongo bo re, “Wahn ane ba li ana akumbad ba! Nne awo tong-n re, ḿ bahke foro go erakatahng ji Esowo ji kpꞌbake?
Limen nsol nyi bahke tibi re, wahn eblohko yaange elkpin enahne.
Kana kpe laange, fere jo bung go egahna ntim re, ‘Ebraham wo li nso ejahre.’
“Bobtoobo elfuk bum, ni bo bahke kiimi alohk nti, melle nti nyio. Eti ajehng ajehng ji tohko kab akab nya nno, bo bahke mehle tub, fere rod kak agun.
“N kp-n wohngo alahb mao ma egbokondon. Nne no kpꞌbake toon-m wo ga gbal sehnge me. Jol me n fuumem re me n sol akpaketa enye. Á bahk-n wohngo alahb go Etingi Etohko, a agun.
A fili edꞌda go ebo, kpꞌfebe arasi enye. Á bahke kpuku arasi enye, song kak go ege ekpꞌkpa, fere jahm awal go agun nya lꞌkꞌtiki lahme elahmelahme.”
Ngare nyio Jisos kehm tahme go Galili, song rehng go Jodan goji Jon re Jon wohng-e alahb.
Jon jo gare re á sahd-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Kehn wo wo nobo re wo wohngo na me alahb, wo ma fere ba na ga egame.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nong jol ano! Tibre fuumu re wahr lim nsol kpee nyi Esowo sebe re wahr lim.”
Tvtv o eji Jisos ma bel ewohngalahb, á kehm lohngo go alahb. Ngare nyio ejahbetul Esowo eblennge ka-e. Owo á kehm nyehne etohko ji Esowo go elfoongo ni ebbehl kpꞌbadde abake, kehm ba jol a ne.
Owo bo kehm wuku ellum go ejahbetul Esowo ni bungu re, “A wo li akor-m mmon ewame, no kpo kor-m sꞌsehng.”
Etingi Etohko kehm yehke Jisos, song kak go elka emahng re nnehm gar-e.
Eji Jisos ma bade elne njal nfung atahl abal, owo njal kehm-e yame.
Nnehm kehm bake, ba tong-e re, “A lꞌjol Mmon Esowo, tong atal nyaa siingi abred.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, ‘Abred nya nya sang wahnge nne kpo kpin, á kpo bel elkpin go ellum anehng anehng ni lohng go nnyo mi Esowo.’ ”
Nnehm kehm rodo Jisos, tahm a ne go mbarebare ejahbe, song kun-e go elkong etahk Esowo,
kehm-e tongo re, “A lꞌjol Mmon Esowo, yehb, wo ba gbo go ndi! Tibre bo nyono go nwer Esowo re,
“ ‘Esowo bahke tongo enjel enye bada na.
Bo bahk-a gbiiri go bo abo,
eji a lꞌkꞌba jahre akpade enya go eltal.’ ”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Bo tꞌtob nyon go nwer Esowo re, ‘Ka gare Esowo, Ntul ewa!’ ”
Nnehm kehm kpe rod Jisos, tahm a ne go ewong ji sahb wꞌwahre, fere tib-e ajahbe kpee nya li go njini, a ellub ni bo kpi no,
kehm-e tongo re, “M bahk-a kake nyaa kpee, a lꞌjamme alahng kak-m.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nnehm, tahm-m go esamahr! Tibre bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, ‘Esowo, Ntul ewa wo wo, a bahk-e jo kak. Ye ntahngtahng wo, a bahke fere jo lok-e.’ ”
Nnehm kehm-e soro yake. Babenjel soro ba kak-e ebo.
Eji Jisos wuku re, Jon, bo m-e kak ngbekobo, á kehm tahme eje, song rehng go Galili.
A kehm tahme go Nasaret, fere song lene go Kapenium ji jolo kohlo eto ji Galili, go ndi nyi abone Sebulon, a ba Naftali,
eji lꞌlohko jol jang jang ana nnyehnamahr Aisaya bungu no re,
“Ndi nyi abon Sebulon,
a ba Naftali,
ba lene ejang bio bi eto ji Galili li no,
egbuk Jodan
jehko go Galili jio ji ane ba ki nyi Esowo,
ane bao ba jehk go ejannge
ebnyehn egburu ellennge.
Ane bao ba nong go emel elkv,
edi ebkehme bo lennge.”
Bomo ngare nyio asongo Jisos kehm kehme etib ebe tiingi re, “Senngen njahm go egahne abiafem! Tibre etul bi Esowo ebkabbe.”
Eji Jisos jo jen go nkpe eto nyi Galili, á kehm nyehne abasahre nsahre, ane na abal, noko jolo Saimon ji bo jo lung-e re Pita, noko, bo jo lung-e re Andru ji mmonannyehn Pita.
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Tahmen toon-m, m bahk-n limi ń fere jo bim ane.”
Bo kehm soro tahm arim ebo sa, tahm toon-e.

Jisos kehm kpe sehng asongo, kpe song nyehn ane abal bako. Noko, bo jo lung-e re Jems. Noko, bo jo lung-e re Jon, mmonannyehn Jems. Bo jolo abon Sibidi. Bo woomo go egbang, jo baade arim ebo, a Sibidi nde ebo. Owo Jisos kehm lungu bo.
Bo kehm soro tahm egbang sa, tahm nde ebo sa, tahm toono Jisos.
Jisos kehm tahme, jo yannge go Galili kpee, jo tib ane go bo ntahk ero, fere jo tiingi nnoobo etib bio bi etul bi Esowo, fere jo lim ane, bo nob elkohn eyam abehng abehng.

Ane kpee ba jolo go Siria wuku kan elgahm ene, owo bo kehm koko aneb ayam kpee ba go ege, ba jo yam ajoobo ayam tvv, fere jo nyehn ajoobo arem, a ane ba bele abi atohko go bo a ntim, a aneb eyam atatehk, a ane ba ma banne. Jisos limi bo kpee, bo nob.
Ellong ane gbalee ba jo toon-e, egom jindiki lohng go Galili, egom jindiki lohng go Dekapolis, egom jindiki lohng go Jerusalem, egom jindiki lohng go Judea, egom jindiki lohng go egbuk Jodan jehko.
Eji Jisos nyehne ellong ane bao, á kehm tahme go ewong. Á ji kan a me, abatꞌtoono ebe kehm bake go ege.
Á kehm kehme bo tib re,
“Elfuulu li ka ane ba ma gbo ekpak bio bi etohko. Tibre etul bi Esowo li ka bo.
“Elfuulu li ka ane ba jehk ndon ndon. Tibre bo bahke kake bo eltim.
“Elfuulu li ka ane ba kpi nnaange eljini. Tibre bo bahke bele njini ana ejum elehke elkv ebo.
“Elfuulu li ka ane ba kpꞌsahb sꞌseb re bo li eno go esamahr bi Esowo. Tibre bo bahke lehke eno.
“Elfuulu li ka ane ba, ane kpo fili bo ndon. Tibre bo bahke tob fili Esowo ndon.
“Elfuulu li ka ane ba ntim ebo li saang. Tibre bo bahke nyehne Esowo.
“Elfuulu li ka ane ba kpo seb elkoono.
“Elfuulu li ka ane ba, bo kpꞌnohko bo tib eji bo kpꞌlimi nsol nyi li go etingitingi. Tibre etul bi Esowo li ka bo.
“Elfuulu li ka-n, ane lꞌjo su-n, fere jo nohk-n, fere jo kiimi elkohn efahnge anehng anehng lak-n tib go egame esi.
“Belen eyebatahng, wahn jo geere. Tibre eltuuru enahne ni li go ejahbetul Esowo kpꞌgbale. Ano wo bo jo tob nohk abanyehnamahr Esowo ba tohko jol, wahn kehm jini.
“Wahn ba li akang ma njini.
“Wahn ba li ellennge ni njini.
Nnene limm, no kpo nyaale etꞌrekahng, rod ejeere konngo. Á bahke rodo na kunu go ejum ji bo kpo kunu atꞌrekahng. Owo bahke yake ka ane kpee ba wob ekpꞌkpa jio.
Nong, ellennge enahne ni ń kpi no jo ya go esamahr ane, eji bo lꞌnyehn nnoobo enyahne nyi ń kpo lim, fere jo tehk nso ejahne no li go ejahbetul.
“Kana tir re m ba re me m ba range atahm nya Moses, a eltibi ni abanyehnamahr tibi no.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Eji elbung abola ndi kpeke li, mmonrꞌrohka mmojum awohng awohng no atahm nehm range tete rehng esꞌkohro ji nsol kpee bahke male.
“Owo fvfo, nne awohng awohng no lꞌyuudu nrꞌrohka mmontahm awohng awohng,
“N kp-n tongo re, ń nehm ma yel go ejahbetul Esowo, sehngem re, eno ejahne ji ḿ bahke lehke go esamahr Esowo sehnge ji atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi.
“Wahn ebwuk ana bo tongo ane ba jolo mahne mahne re, ‘Kana jo wul nne! Nne awohng awohng no lꞌwul nne, bo bahk-e koko, tahm ane go elam.’

Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no eltim lꞌrak-e tob mmonannyehn, bo bahk-e koko, tahm a ne go elam. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌsu mmonannyehn, bo bahk-e koko, tahm a ne go esub. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtong mmonannyehn re, ‘Egboolo ji!’ yeblim ebi ji bo bahk-e koko, song kak go ellulagun.
“A lꞌko ayare ba a nya go edi njom alimi, a lꞌfere buumu ona re, ń li go ntong awahn a mmonanne,
yake ayare enya bum kohlo edi njom alimi jio, wo feere, tohko song bung ntong nyio mal, fere koono a mmonanne, wo kehm feere ba ka ayare enya.
Jo koono a nnekv ewa elwaare, eji ngare kpeke li,
Etingitingi, n kp-a tongo re, Owo a bahke woomo tete a gohro gal mbong nyi a bele no, jol ederi ajehng ajehng nehm sa.
“Wahn ebwuk ana bo bungu re, ‘Ka jo lim erehbe!’
Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no lꞌyehke amahr enye kunu nnenkal re á noongo a ne, yeblim abiafem nya erehbe go ege eltim.
Elmahr eboblum ena lꞌwahng re wo lim abiafem, luudu ro go! Ga nob re ejum ngubjing enya demme, sehnge re bo rod ngubjing enya kpee, song kak go ellulagun.
Eboblum eba lꞌwahng re wo lim abiafem, kim tub go!
“Bo kpe bung re, ‘Nne awohng awohng no lꞌyehke nkal ewe elbal, nong á nyon nwer ka-e, nyi á me yehke elbal.’

Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no lꞌyehke nkal ewe elbal, eji nnenlum nondiki ki noongo a ne, á kp-e limi re á lim erehbe. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌko nnenkal no bo m-e yehke elbal, á kpꞌlimi erehbe.
“Wahn ebtob wuk ana bo tongo ane ba jolo mahne mahne re, ‘Ka jo tir go edaange! Ka kane enyam bi a nyame no go esamahr bi Ntul Esowo!’
Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, wahn kꞌjo tir nkpel anyehng anyehng. Kana jo tir elbung! Tibre elbung, eti etul ji Esowo ji.
Kana jo tir ndi! Tibre ndi, etikunakpade eje ji. Kana jo tir Jerusalem! Tibre Jerusalem, ejahbe ji egburu ntul ji.
Ka jo tir esi eja! Tibre a nehm ma lim ellv esi anehng re, jol mbarebare, jol a nehm ma lim re, jol nnyakenyake.
“Nong, wahn jo faange re, ‘Ee,’ tohko jol ano, ‘Eꞌee.’ Ellum anehng anehng ni lꞌjol sehnge ano, lohng goji Ebinne jio.
“Wahn ebwuk ana bo bungu re, ‘Nne no lꞌwa ntem elmahr, bo tob wa-e elmahr. Nne no lꞌbahk ntem elmahn, bo tob bahk-e elmahn.’
Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, Kana jo sahde ebi nne go eko!
Nne no lꞌgbaame ewobo eja re á kpꞌkoko, kpe yake nkud enya ka-e.
Nne no lꞌbob-a re, wo jen mmal anyehng a ne, jen mmal ebal a ne.
Nne no lꞌlem-a ejum, ka-e! Nne no lꞌba re á ba yaame ejum go ega, ka-e!
“Wahn ebwuk ana bo tongo re, ‘Nne ebjing ewa bahke jo kor-a, nnekv ewa jo sab-a.’
Wo, me n kp-n tongo re, Nong, anebekv ebahne jo kor-n. Jo biren nnoobo tv ane ba kp-n suku! Jo limen nnoobo ka ane ba kpo ko-n ekv!
eji ń lꞌjol abon ba Nso ejahne no li go ejahbetul.
“Anv, ane ba ń kpo kor bo, bo lꞌkor-n, eltuuru anii Esowo bahk-n tuuru? Anv, abakokatak kpehme lim anoa?
Ń lꞌjo kak abonane ejahne nnyo ba ba, anv, nkpokosi ejum anyi nyi ḿ ma lim? Anv, ane ba ki nyi Esowo kpehme lim anoa?
Jolen saang, wahn kꞌbel elem ajehng ajehng, ana Nso ejahne no li go ero li saang.
“Kunen ekpu, eji ń lꞌkꞌjo lim nnoobo enyahne go esamahr ane, tohko jol ano, Nso ejahne no li go ero wahn nehm tuuru.
Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi a lꞌlim nnoobo, ka jo tooro yannge, ana ane ba kpo tib elbo go ekpꞌkpa ero, fere jo jen alab nfam, eji ane lꞌjo tehk bo. N kp-n tongo re, Eltuuru ebo ebsehng mbang.
A lꞌlim nnoobo, nong, ebobkal eba kꞌkahn ji eboblum eba kpꞌlimi,
eji nnoobo enya nyi a kpꞌlimi lꞌkꞌjo jol gbul gbul gbuul. Nso no kpo nyehn nsol nyi ki li gbul gbul gbuul bahk-a tuuru.

“A lꞌkehme ero kak, ka jo lim ana ane ba kpo tib elfuumu elfuumu. Kpo kor bo re bo jo mehl yiimi go ekpꞌkpa ero, fere yiimi elatahkgur, jo kak ero, eji ane lꞌnyehn bo. Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Eltuuru ebo ebsehng mbang.
A lꞌkehm kake ero, yel go ega nkimi. Eji a ma bam mbu tv elna, wo kehm kake ero ka Nso no ane lꞌki-e ma nyehn. Nsoo no kpo nyehn nsol nyi ki li gbul gbul gbuul bahk-a tuuru.
“A lꞌkehm kake ero, ka jo lim ewok mbol mbol, ana ane ba ki nyi Esowo kpo lim. Ane bao ba kpo tir re, Esowo bahke wuku bo, tib eji bo kpꞌkake alaabe aro.
Kana jol ana bo! Tibre Nso ejahne kpꞌkahne nsol nyi ń kpꞌsebe, jol ń kehm-e bahbe.
Ana wo nobo re wahn jo kak ero re,
“Nso ejahre no li go ero, nong, mbing enya jol saang.
Yake etul eba ba.
Nong, mbang enya lim,
afi jolo go ndi, afi jolo go ero.
Ka-r ejum alehke ji lꞌbiingi a nahre lela.
Jo tahm ka-r go egahre abiafem, ana wahr kpo tahm ka ane ba lim-r abiafem.
Ka lim, e yel go elgaare.
“Ń lꞌtahm ka ane go bo abꞌbi nya bo lim-n no, Nso ejahne no li go ero bahke tob tahm ka-n go egahne abꞌbi.
Ń tohko tahm ka ane go bo abꞌbi nya bo lim-n no, bahke limi renan, Nso ejahne kehm tob tahm ka-n?

“Ń lꞌkehme elnahne njal bade, kana jo gehn asamahr, ana ane ba kpo tib elfuumu elfuumu kpo lim. Bo kpo gbod asamahr ebo, eji ane lꞌkahn re, bo kpi elbo njal bade. Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Eltuuru ebo ebsehng mbang.
A lꞌkehme elna njal bade, jo ru esamahr, wo fere jak esi,
eji ane lꞌkꞌkahn re, a kpi elna njal bade, sehngem Nso no ane kil-e elnyehne wo bahke kahne. Nso no kpo nyehn nsol nyi ki li gbul gbul gbuul bahk-a tuuru.
“Kana jo kpu nsol afang bum elnahne go njini nyia, edi ji bahke biili amahn, etan fere wo, awajv fere wa yel ba v.
Ga nob re wahn kpu nsol afang bum elnahne go ejahbetul Esowo, edi ji lꞌkꞌtiki biili amahn, etan lꞌkꞌma wo, awajv lꞌkꞌma wa yel song v.
Tibre eltim ena bahke tiki jol edi ji afang enya li no.
“Elmahr ni li ana etꞌrekahng ka ngubjing. Elmahr ena lꞌjol sange sange, ngubjing enya bahke bele ellennge.
Elmahr ena lꞌjol abꞌbi abꞌbi, ngubjing enya bahke jolo ejannge ejannge. Ellennge ni wob-a go atahng lꞌfere kpiidi, jol ejannge, nkom ejannge nyi bahke jolo tete, jol nyi nse sang.
“Nnene limm, no bahke ma loko nde na ebal. Á bahke koko noko ekv, noko jo kor-e. Tohko jol ano, á bahke lake na awohng, fere jo daange noko. Ń nehm ma loko Esowo, fere jo loko akpohko.
“Ana wo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, Kana jo tiiri bada nsol nyi ḿ bahke jo li, fere jo wꞌwo, a nsol nyi ḿ bahke jo kak go ngubjing.
Nyehnen nruk ana bo kpꞌfonngo go elbung yannge. Bo kpehme bahm nsol. Bo kpehme kpa. Bo kpehme sol, song lake go abuungu. Nso ejahne no li go ero wo kpo le bo. Anv, wahn sang ga gbal sehnge nruka?
Nne awo ewahne no bahke kpe ma budu abon nnya go ege elkpin, eji á kpꞌtiiri ana?
“Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌtiiri bada nsol ngubjing? Nyehnen ana atꞌtul nkpad kpo gbal go emahng. Bo kpehme nyennge lim eltum. Bo kpehme jamme nsol kak elbo.
N kp-n tongo re, Jol Solomon go ege ellub á liibem ana atꞌtul nyao.
Ana Esowo kpo liibi ajele nya li go emahng, nya kpo kpin lela lela, behna bo jahm fi, jen ji wahnge á lꞌki-n tob liibi, wahn ji kpꞌkahn taame ntiil?
“Owo fvfo nobo re wahn kꞌjo tiiri, fere jo bung re, ‘Ejum aji e bahke jo li, fere jo wo, fere jo kak go ngubjing?’
Nsol nyia nyi ane ba ki nyi Esowo kpo tiiri. Wo, wahn, Nso ejahne no li go ero kpꞌkahne re, nsol nyia kpee nobo re wahn bel.
Ga nob re wahn gbo mbang tiiri bade etul bi Esowo, ana ḿ bahke lehke eno go ege esamahr. Á bahk-n budu nsol nyehko kpee.
“Kana jo tiiri bade nya behna! Nong behna tiiri bade elne. Efung abehng abehng kpo bel afemfem nyanye. Wahn, kana jo budu atꞌtiiri nya nyahne!
“Kana jo lam ane bako, eji Esowo lꞌki-n tob lam.
Tibre go mbang nyꞌnehm nyi ń kpo lam ane bako, nyi nyi Esowo bahke tob ko lam-n. Ana ń gare no ka, ano wo Esowo bahke tob gare ka-n.
“Jen ji wahnge a kpꞌseenge mmolsahk no wob mmonanne go elmahr, a kil eltiiri bada nkporti nyi wob go ega elmahr?
A bahke sahbe renan, tong mmonanne re, ‘Nong, me n yehk-a mmolsahk no wob-a go elmahr,’ eji nkporti wob-a go elmahr?
Wobnob tane! Tohko gbo mbang yehke nkporti go ega elmahr, eji a lꞌmal nyehn, yehke mmolsahk no wob go elmahr mmonanne.
“Kana jo ka ebv nsol Esowo nyi li eje eje, eji bo lꞌkꞌtahm kehm-n eljaake.
“Bahben, ḿ bahke bele. Seben, ḿ bahke nyehne. Kahden, bo bahke lennge mbu ka-n.
Tibre nne awohng awong no lꞌbahb, á bahke bele. Nne no lꞌseb, á bahke nyehne. Nne no lꞌkahd, bo bahke lennge mbu ka-e.
“Nne awo ewahne no bahke kake mmon ewe eltal, á lꞌbahb-e re á ka-e nsol alehke?
Afi á bahke rodo nnyo ka-e, á lꞌbahb-e re á ka-e nsahre?
Wahn ji li na abi ane, ń kpꞌkahne ana ń kpo ka abon ebahne nsol nyi nno, lꞌlim renan, Nso ejahne no li go ero lꞌki-n tob ka nsol nyi nno, ń lꞌbahb-e?
“Nsol kpee nyi ń kpꞌsebe re ane bako jo lim ka-n, nyi nyi ḿ bahke tob jo lim ka bo. Ń lꞌlim ano, wahn ebbum atahm nya Esowo, a alum nya abanyehnamahr bungu no.
“Sehngen go nfiidifiidi eti mbu jio! Tibre mbang nyi li rehng go ellulagun, mbang elfohk elkul nyi, eti mbu eje kpꞌkpange. Ane gbalee ba kpꞌsehnge ona.
Wo, mbang nyi li rehng go elkpin, mbang asodaroongo nyi. Eti mbu eje li fii.
“Jo gberen akimfahnge abanyehnamahr. Bo kpo ba go egahne, jo ba lim, are ejoro bi. Wo, go bo atahng bo li, are abibbib enyam bi.
Go bo akab wo, ḿ bahke bo liingi. Anv, asokonso, nne kpo jꞌje song bong akab avaina? Agasame, nne kpo je song bong akab afiga?
“Eti ji nno ajehng ajehng kpo kab anoobo akab. Esabsab eti kpo kab abi akab.
Eti ji nno nehm ma kab abi akab. Esabsab eti nehm ma kab anoobo akab.
Eti ajehng ajehng ji tohko kab anoobo akab, bo bahke gbahke kak agun.
Go bo akab wo fvfo, ḿ bahke bo liingi.
“Nne awohng awohng sang no kpo lung-m re, ‘Ntul, Ntul!’ bahke yele go ejahbetul Esowo, sehngem ye ji kpꞌlimi ji Nsoo no li go ero tong-e no re á lim bahke yele.
Efung bio ane gbalee bahk-m bahbe re, ‘Ntul, wahr sang jo nyehn amahr go ega mbinga, fere jo kam abi atohko yehke go ega mbinga, jo lim akpokosi gbalee go ega mbinga?’
Owo m bahke kehm tongo bo re, ‘Me, wahn n nehme kahn.
“Fvfo, nne awohng awohng no lꞌwuk alum enyame, fere jo lim, á li ana ekahnkahn nne ji si etahk eje kunu go ekpartal.
Elahb kehm ba na, nnyel kehm yele, kuumu agbunggbung, rehng etahk jio, nfeb kehm kehme ellimi, jo gbul etahk jio. Tikem gbo. Tibre á si kunu go ekpartal.
“Nne awohng awohng no lꞌwuk alum enyame, kꞌlim, á li ana egboolo nne ji si etahk eje kunu go erikehndi.
Elahb kehm ba na, nnyel kehm yele, kuumu agbunggbung, rehng etahk jio, nfeb kehm kehme ellimi, jo gbul etahk jio.
Eji Jisos ma bung nsol nyia mal, eltibi ene kehm kpoko ellong ane bao esi.
Á jo tibi bo ana nne no kpi nsahm. Á joom tib ana atꞌtibi ebo ba atahm.
Jisos kehm badde go ewong jio, ellong ane gbalee tahm toon-e.
Nne abili kehm lohngo ba go ege, kehm ba jamm-e alahng, kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, lꞌkor-a, a li-m ma lim, n nob.”
Jisos kehm tanne ebo ebe, koor-e, kehm bungu re, “Kor-m kor, wobnob!” Tvtv ona á kehm soro nob abili enye.
Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ka tiki tong nne awohng awohng, wobwuka? Song goji nlimajom, wo song tib-e elna, fere lim njom nyi Moses tibi no, eji lꞌjol ejum ntianse ka ane.”
Eji Jisos rehnge go Kapenium, ntubesi a nsoja no Rom kehm bake, ba kpir-e, kehm-e gboongo
re, “Nsoo, nlokeltum ewame noa go etahk, kpꞌyame gꞌga, jol á nehme ma jen.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “M bahke bake ba lim-e, á nob.”
Owo ntubesi a nsoja noo kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, me n fuumem re wo ba yel go egame ekpꞌkpa. Lub bung na bung ellum, nlokeltum ewame bahke nobo.
Tibre me n li nne no wob nne go elwo. N tob kpi nsoja nyi wob-m go elwo. N lꞌtong noo re, ‘Song!’ á tahm. N lꞌtong noka re, ‘Ba!’ á ba. N lꞌtong nlokeltum ewame re, ‘Lim jia!’ á lim na lim.”
Eji Jisos wuku ano, kehm-e kpoko esi. Á kehm tongo ane ba jo toon-e re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, elkohn eltaame ana nia n ka nyehn a nyehn go Israel.
N kp-n tongo re, Ane gbalee bahke lohngo go ero nfam, a erede nfam ba ji a Ebraham, a Aisik, go Jekob go ejahbetul Esowo, jo li nsol a bo.
Wo, abon ntul ba jol lehke etul, bo bahke rodo bo, ro kak edi ji nkom ejannge li no. Owo ane bahke jo ling, fere jo kono amahn.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo ntubesi a nsoja noo re, “Song kehnge! Ana a ma taame, ano wo bahke jolo ka-a.”
Jisos song rehnge kan etahk Pita, á kehm song nyehn nnyehn nkal a Pita nong kpꞌyame arumbum.
Á kehm-e kooro go ebo, á kehm soro nob arumbum nyao, kehm soro tahm, kehm-e kehme elloko.
Eji elgung ba no, ane kehm koko ane gbalee ba bele abi atohko, ba go ege. Á kehm kame bo abi atohko nyao kpee yehke go ege ellum, fere lim aneb ayam kpee, bo nob,
eji lꞌlohko jol ana Esowo bungu sehng goji nnyehnamahr Aisaya re,
“Á rodo elleenge enahre,
fere sol ayam enyahre.”
Eji Jisos nyehne ellong ane gbalee ba ma ba yiimi senng-e kak, á kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Wahr tahmen egbuk jehko!”
Owo ntꞌtibi atahm awohng kehm bake go ege, ba tong-e re, “Ntꞌtibi, m bahk-a toono rehng edi ajehng ajehng ji a fi no.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Akpangang kpi abing nya bo kpo woomo. Nruk kpi ntahk nyi bo kpo kang. Wo, Mmon no nne, edi ellohko esi ajehng ajehng á kpimm.”
Nne noko no jolo ntꞌtoono Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, nong, me n tohko song kpa nsoo kak.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Tahm toon-m, nong, akvne kpa atem akvne kak!”
Jisos kehm yele go egbang, abatꞌtoono ebe tahm toon-e.
Owo egburu nfeb nyi nnen a nnen kehm ba kehme ellimi go eto jio, ebuku jo lim, bulu egbang. Ngare nyio Jisos jo lꞌlal.
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm jeke go ege, song nyahm-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, tahr-r, e kpꞌtane na a!”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌfahle ana, wahn ji kpꞌkahn taame ntiil?”
Owo kehm kpoko ane bao esi. Bo kehm bungu re, “Elkohn nne awo anae, no kpo bung tong nfeb, a ebuku, bo wuk-e?”

Jisos kehm bake go Gadara ji jolo go egbuk eto jehko. Owo ane abal kehm lohngo edi ji alahm akvne jolo no, ba wan-e. Bo bele abi atohko go bo atahng. Bo jo mennge sehng. Jol nne awohng awohng joom sahb, sehng mbang nyio.
Owo bo kehm biingi tiim re, “Anv, Mmon no Esowo, jen ji e kpi no me atemtem? Anv, a ba na re wo ba kak-r erema, eji ngare kala biinga?”
Ellong akuk jolo ona kpidi kpidi, jo li nsol.
Abi atohko kehm gboongo Jisos re, “A lꞌkehm-r kame yake, nong, wahr song yel akuk nyao go atahng.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Songen!” Bo kehm soro lohng, song yel akuk nyao go atahng. Ellong akuk nio kehm soro rehm abahl, song fooro agbunggbung eto jio, yel go alahb tan.
Ane ba jo baabe akuk nyao, kehm soro be ebo tahm, song rehng go nla ejahbe, song tooro kpee, fere tooro ejum ji ma lim ane ba bele abi atohko.
Ejahbe jio kpee kehm tahme, song kpiri Jisos. Eji bo song nyehn-e, bo kehm-e gboongo re, á lub tahm ejahbe jio song.
Jisos kehm yele go egbang, siiri eto jio, song rehng go ege ejahbe.
Ane bandiki kehm koko mbanne nyi noongo go edilnong ba a ne go ege. Eji Jisos nyehne eltaame ebo, á kehm tongo mbanne nyio re, “Mmon ewame, bob eltim! Abiafem enya, me n tahm ka-a.”
Owo atꞌtibi ba atahm bandiki kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Nne noa kpꞌsuku Esowo, eji á ma rod elne bum ana Esowo.”
Jisos kꞌkahn ntir atahng ebo, owo á kehm bungu re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌtiri elkohn abi nsol ana nyao go egahna ntim?
Anv, jen ji ga riidi, n lꞌtong-e re, ‘Abiafem enya me n tahm ka-a,’ afi n lꞌtong-e re, ‘Tahm, wo jen!’?
M bahk-n tibi re, Mmon no nne kpi nsahm go njini nyia nyi á bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem.”
Owo á kehm tongo mbanne nyio re, “Mehl, wo rod edilnong eja, song kehnge!”
Nne noo kehm mehle yiimi, tahm eje kehnge.
Eji ane bao nyehne ano, bo kehm kehme elfahle, fere jo tehk Esowo bi ma ka ane elkohn nsahm ana nyio.
Jisos kehm tahme edi jio. Eji á jo sehng asongo, á kehm nyehne nne no jehk go ege a nji etak, no bo jo lung-e re Matiu. Owo á kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm toon-m!”
Matiu kehm soro tahm toon-e.
Efung abehng eji Jisos jolo go etahk Matiu, jo li nsol, abakokatak gbalee, a aneb abꞌbi jolo a ne o, go abatꞌtoono ebe fvfo, tob jo li nsol.
Egom Farisi jindiki nyehne kan ano, bo kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Jen ji wahnge ntꞌtibi ewahne kpo li nsol edi ajehng a abakokatak, go aneb abꞌbi?”
Jisos kehm wuku ana bo jo bung, kehm faange re, “Ane ba li nob nob kpehme seb nlimakahm, sehngem ane ba kpꞌyame ba ba kpo seb nlimakahm.
Songen, wahn song kpili bade ana edi nwer Esowo jia lohngo no, ji bungu re, ‘Njom sang n kpꞌsebe, ndon nyi.’ M baam re me m ba lung anoobo ane, m ba re me m ba lung aneb abꞌbi re bo ba gbo ndon.”
Abatꞌtoono Jon ji nwohngalahb kehm bake goji Jisos, ba bahb-e re, “Jen ji wahnge wahr, a Bab Farisi, e kpo kono elnahre njal bade, abatꞌtoono eba kil jo bade?”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Anv, atem nlumanne li ma ji ndon ndon go elkak elbala, eji nlumanne kpeke li a boa?
“Nnene limm, no bahke koko mmojang mbomo no nfenfe, song baade nkꞌkula mbomo. Á lꞌlim ano, mmojang mbomo no nfenfe nehm yiimi. Nkꞌkula mbomo mio bahke kpe kv edi jio budu sehnge ana wuku wuku.
Nnene limm, no bahke yaange amahm ma kpꞌfahle kak go nkꞌkohko eyahbe. Á lꞌlim ano, eyahbe jio bahke bahnge na, amahm sale. Nobo re nne ko amahm ma kpꞌfahle, song yaange kak go eyahbe nfenfe.
Eji Jisos jo bung nsol nyia tong bo, owo ntubesi a Jus awohng kehm lohngo ba, ba jamm-e alahng, kehm bungu re, “Mmon ewame kpꞌna kpoko. Ba wahr tahm, wo ba koor-e ebo, eji á lꞌfere bel elkpin.”
Jisos kehm tahme toon-e, a abatꞌtoono ebe fvfo.
Mmonankal awohng no alung sa-e go nnahb ewubu a nnya ebal, kehm kehme Jisos toono go njahm, kehm kooro esꞌsili nsubu enye.
Tibre á bungu go ege eltim re, “N lꞌlub kooro nsubu enye nyi nyi, m bahke nobo.”
Jisos kehm keebe, nyehn-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Mmon ewame, bob eltim! Eltaame ena ni ma-a lim, a ma nob.” Ngare nyꞌnehm ona nyi nnenkal noo kehm soro nob.
Owo Jisos kehm ba rehng go etahk ntubesi noo, ba nyehn aneb ase, a ane ba ba elkv, bo kpꞌkubu ase, jo lim ewok.
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Tahmen, tibre mmon noa ka kpo, á kpꞌlale na.”
Owo bo kehm-e elwolo.
Bo kame kan ane bao yehke me, Jisos kehm yele ekpꞌkpa song jabbe mmonse nkal noo go ebo, á kehm mehle ji.
Eka jio kehm yeere na yeere ejahbe jio kpee.
Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, jo jen asongo. Awakamahr ane abal kehm-e kehme eltoono, fere jo rabe re, “Mmon no Devid, nong, wahr lub fil-a ndon!”
Eji Jisos yele go ekpꞌkpa, awakamahr ane bao kehm ba kpir-e. Owo Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, ń kpꞌtaame re m bahke ma lim ejum ana jiaa?”
Owo bo kehm taame re, “Ee nsoo.”
Jisos kehm kooro bo go amahr, kehm bungu re, “Nong, jol ana ḿ ma taame.”
Amahr ebo kehm soro lennge.
Jisos kehm bungu a bo tꞌtahne re, “Kana tiki tong nnene!”
Bo kehm tahme, song tooro tong ejahbe jio kpee ji Jisos ma lim.
Eji ane bao kpꞌtahme asongo, ane bako kehm koko nkamme ba ane go ege, nyi bele ebi etohko go ege atahng.
Jisos kehm kame nne noo ebi etohko jio yehke, nne noo soro kehme elbungu.
Ane bao kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm kehme elbungu re, “Elkohn ejum ana jia, e ka nyehn a nyehn go Israel.”
Bab Farisi kehm bungu re, “Ntul a nnehm wo ka-e nsahm re á jo kam ane abi atohko yehke.”
Jisos kehm tahme, jo yannge ajahbe nya nnen, a nya nse kpee. Á jo tibi ane go bo ntahk ero, fere jo tiingi bo nnoobo etib bi etul bi Esowo, fere jo lim ane, bo jo nob elkohn eyam abehng abehng.
Eji á nyehne ellong ane, bo kehm-e fili ndon. Tibre eko ebtan bo, nkakebo bo kpimm, bo jolo ana ejoro bi ki kpi mbꞌbaabe.
Owo á kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Egburu egbe jia, ji elkpake, wo, abalimeltum li ntiil.
Gboongen nfono egbe, eji á lꞌtum abalimeltum tv re bo ba kpa egbe eje.”
Jisos kehm lungu abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal tv elne, kehm kake bo nsahm re bo kam ane abi atohko yehke, fere lim ane, bo nob elkohn eyam abehng abehng.
Abing abatiingetib ewubu ane abal nya a. Ngbokambang, Saimon ji bo jo lung-e re Pita, go Andru mmonannyehn, go Jems ji mmon a Sibidi, a Jon ji mmonannyehn Jems,
go Filip, Batolomi, Tomos, go Matiu nkokatak, Jems ji mmon Alfeus, a Lebeus ji bo jo lung-e re Tadeus,
a Saimon ji jo seb re ejahbe eje lohng go elwo ni aneb Rom, go Judas Iskariot ji gungu Jisos.
Re Jisos kehm tumu ewubu ane abal bao, á tubu bo elle re, “Kana je ajahbe nya ane ba ki li Jus, a ajahbe Samaria.
Songen goji ejoro bi Israel bi ma tan.
Song bungen alum Esowo re, ‘Etul bi Esowo ebkabbe.’
Limen aneb ayam, bo nob, wahn lim aneb abili, bo nob, fere nyahme akvne go elkv, fere kam ane abi atohko yehke.
“Ana n ka-n mbol mbol, tob kaan go mbol mbol.
Kana fili agul, a asilva, jol kana kak apene go egahne abam fili.
Kana fili abam efilibo, fere fili mbomo ebal ebal, a akpaketa, a nti efilibo. Tibre nlimeltum fꞌfuumu re á bel nsol alehke.
“Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌsong rehng, afi jolo egburu ejahbe, afi jolo mmojahbe no nse, seben nne no bahke kahne re, eltum enahne ni nno ni. Kangen a ne o tete wahn tahm ejahbe jio.
Ń lꞌyange go etahk nne, kaken bo nnyo.
Ane bao lꞌvvr-n, nong, elkoono ni ń kpi no jol a bo. Bo tohko fere vvr-n, elkoono ni ń kpi no bahke feere, ba tob-n.
Nne awohng awohng no tohk-n vvrv, kꞌwuungu atung go egahne alum, afi fere jolo ejahbe, tahmen edi jio, wahn kum ebtohko go egahne akpade.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Go efung elam, elam ji ejahbe jio bahke bibi sehnge ji Sodom, a Gomorra.
“Anv, n kp-n tumu ana ejoro tv go ellong abi enyam. Jo bangen ana enyo, wahn fere jol ana mbehl nyi kil jo lim ebi ejum ajehng ajehng.
Jo gberen! Tibre ane bahk-n jo kak go esub, fere jo dv-n go bo a ntahk ero.
“Bo bahke jo ko-n, song yiimi go esamahr atubesi, a atul tib go egame esi. Nsol nyia nyi bahk-n jo lim, eji ń lꞌjo yiim-m ntianse go bo esamahr, a esamahr ane bako ba ki nyi Esowo.
Bo lꞌkak-n go esub, kana jo tiiri bada nsol nyi ḿ bahke bungu, jol ana ḿ bahke bꞌbung. Tibre ngare nyio bo bahk-n kake alum nya ḿ bahke bungu.
Tibre alum nya ḿ bahke bungu, nyanyahne sang, bahke lohngo goji Etohko ji Nso ejahne ji kpꞌbungu go egahne atahng.
“Abonanyehn nne bahke jo yake abonanyehn ka re bo wul. Babnde nne bahke tob jo yake abon ebo ka re bo wul. Abon bahke jo kpiidi kuumu babnde, jo jabbe bo ka, bo wul.
Nne awohng awohng bahke jo ko-n ekv tib go egama mbing. Nne no lꞌkpuumu tete rehng go esꞌkohro, ye wo bahke bele eltahre.
“Bo lꞌnohk-n go ejahbe jehko, been, song ejahbe jehko. Tibre etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ń nehm ma tiki lim eltum go ajahbe Israel kpee mal, tete Mmon no nne feere ba.
“Nne no kpꞌkpili kpehme gbal sehnge ntꞌtibi ewe. Nlokeltum kpehme gbal sehnge nde.
Nobo re nne no kpꞌkpili tob taame go eyebatahng jol ana ntꞌtibi ewe. Nobo re nlokeltum taame, jol ana nde. Nfontahk, bo lꞌlung-e re ntul a nnehm, bahke limi renan, bo kꞌtob lung ane ebe ano?
“Kana jo fahl ane! Ejum ajehng ajehng limm, ji bo bulu no, ji Esowo lꞌkꞌlennge. Ejum ajehng ajehng limm, ji bo behre no, ji ane lꞌkꞌkahn.
Ejum ji n kp-n tongo a mbehr mbehr, ḿ bahke bungu gbul gbul gbuul. Ji m bungu go awꞌwa tong-n, ḿ bahke bungu go elkab ane.
“Kana jo fahl ane ba kpo wul ngubjing, ba lꞌkꞌma wul etohko. Fahlen ye jio ji bahke ma rannge etohko, a ngubjing go ellulagun.
Nne li ma gunu nruk ebal go are, ka mpene. Abehng abehng limm, bi bahke gboko go ndi, sehngem re no, Nso ejahne taame na.
Wahn, alv enyahne kpee nya li go egahne asi, bobfange.
Kana kpe fahl! Wahn ba ga lub sehnge nruk gbalee.
“Fvfo, nne awohng awohng no lꞌyiimi ntianse ka-m go esamahr ane, ye wo fvfo, m bahke tob yiimi ntianse ka-e go esamahr bi Nsoo no li go ejahbetul.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌten-m go esamahr ane, ye wo fvfo, m bahk-e tob ten go esamahr bi Nsoo no li go ejahbetul.
“Kana tir re, n ko elkoono ba a ni go njini nyia.
M ba re ‘mmon fere kpiidi kuumu nde, mmon no nkal kpiidi kuumu nnyehn, nkal a nne kpiidi kuumu nnyehn nlum.
Nne, ane ebe ba bahke fere jol anebekv ebe.’
Nne no nde, afi jolo nnyehn, bo lꞌkor-e sehnge me, á fuumem a name. Nne no abon ebe lꞌkor-e sehnge me, á fuumem a name.
Nne awohng awohng no tohko rod ekros eje, tahm toon-m, á fuumem a name.
Nne no lꞌgare re á tahre elkpin ene, á bahke tane na elkpin ene. Nne no lꞌtane elkpin ene tib go egame esi, á bahke tahre na elkpin ene.
“Nne no lꞌvvr-n, á vvrv me. Nne no lꞌvvr-m, á tob vvrv nne no tum-m no.

Nne no lꞌvvrv nnyehnamahr, tib eji á kahne re nnyehnamahr Esowo wo, á bahke bele eltuuru ana ni nnyehnamahr kpo bel. Nne no lꞌvvrv etingitingi nne tib á li go etingitingi, á bahke bele eltuuru ana ni etingitingi nne kpo bel.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌka nne awohng go ellong abonse baa abon alahb re á wo, tib eji á kpꞌkahne re, ntꞌtoono ewame wo, á bahke bele eltuuru go etingitingi.”
Eji Jisos tubu abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal, elle mal, á kehm tahme edi jio, song rehng go ajahbe Jus, jo bung alum Esowo, fere jo tib ane.
Eji Jon ji nwohngalahb ji woomo go ngbekobo wuku bada nsol nyi Kraist kpꞌlimi, á kehm yehke abatꞌtoono ebe tum tv-e.
Bo kehm song bahb-e re, “Wo wo li nne no Jon tongo re á kpꞌbaka, afi wahr ji sik nne nondiki?”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Feeren song goji Jon, wahn song tong-e bada nsol nyi ń kpꞌnyehne a, fere kpꞌwuku,
ana awakamahr kpꞌnyehne, abanne kpꞌtahme jen, aneb abili kpꞌnobo, alakatung kpꞌwuku, akvne kpꞌnyahme go elkv, akpak, bo kpꞌtiingi bo nnoobo etib.
Eyebatahng li ka nne no lꞌki-m sel gbo.”
Eji abatꞌtoono Jon ma feere fi, Jisos kehm bahbe ellong ane bao bada Jon re, “Elka emahng, eji ń jo je goji Jon, ń jo je re wahn song nyehn jen? Eljele ni nfeb kpꞌlimi kpꞌneenga?
Anv, ejum aji ń jo jꞌje re wahn song nyehn abee? Nne no ma liibi nsol nyi nno a nnoa? Ane ba kpo liibi ano kpo jol go ntahk nyi atul.
Anv, ejum aji ń jo jꞌje o, jo song nyehn? Nnyehnamahr woa? N kp-n tongo re, Wahn ebnyehn nne no gbale sehnge nnyehnamahr.
Tibre Jon wo li nne no bo nyono go nwer Esowo bada ne re, ‘M bahke tumu ntiingetib ewame, á gbo-a mbang, song tuungu mbang bum-a.’
“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, nnene limm, no ma jꞌjol go njini nyia no gbale sehnge Jon ji nwohngalahb. Nne no ga rede go ellong ane ba bahke lehke etul bi Esowo, á gbale sehnge Jon.
Bomo ngare nyi Jon ji nwohngalahb tete rehng anv, etul bi Esowo li go elkake nsahm kehm kuumu, aneb nsahm bahke kuumu go eko akake.
Atahm nya Moses, a abanyehnamahr Esowo kpee tete ba rehng ngare nyi Jon bungu bade etul bia.
Lꞌkor-n taamen tv alum nyaa, nya li re, Jon wo li Elaija, ji bo bungu re á kpꞌbake.
Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk.
“Anv, m bahke koko ane ba li anv gara jen? Bo li ana abonse ba ma lohng elatahkgur kpi mbene lim. Egom jindiki tong egom jehko re,
“ ‘Wahr ebwor afiri ka-n,
ḿ bahnem.
Wahr ebling aling,
wahn tobem ling fvfo.’
“Eji Jon ba no, á jo kono elne njal bade, amahm á joom wo. Ane re, á kpi ebi etohko go ege atahng.

Eji Mmon no nne ba no, á jo li nsol, fere jo wꞌwo, ane jo bungu re, ‘Nyehnen nlehke ebno noa, no kpo wo amahm, á li ntem no abakokatak, a aneb abꞌbi!’ Nne lꞌkpur nsol nyi aneb elkahne kpo lim, owo á bahke tob kahn ana elkahne li no.”
Jisos kehm kehme ajahbe nya á ma ga lim akpokosi gbalee ebi ka, tibre bo ka gbo ndon.

“Eyuu a nahne, aneb Korasin! Eyuu a nahne, aneb Betsaida! Li re Taya, a Saidon nyehne agburu akpokosi ana nya wahn ma nyehn a, kehn bo jol gboko ndon wuku wuku, fere kak ajakensol, kpu atong, kak esi.
Wo, n kp-n tongo re, Efung elam bio, elam nehm ga bib a bo ana bahke bibi a nahne.
“Wahn aneb Kapenium, bo ma-n mehl wahre rehng go ejahbetul Esowo.
Owo n kp-n tongo re, Efung elam bio, elam nehm ga bib a Sodom ana bahke bibi a nahne.”
Ngare nyio Jisos kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, wo wo li Ntul go ero, a ndi. N kp-a tehke, tib eji a ma lennge abonbili nsol nyia nyi a behre re akahnkahn ane, a anebkul kꞌnyehn.
Tibre kor-a na re wo lim ano, Nsoo.
“Nsoo ebyake ejum ajehng ajehng kak go egame abo.
“Baan go egame, wahn ane kpee ba ma lahng go elsolo nsol nyi kpꞌlubu. M bahk-n kake erekekv.
Taamen, wahn woom-m go elwo, fere jo kpili go egame. Tibre me n li soom, fere jol reed. Owo atohko enyahne bahke bele erekekv.
Tibre eltum ename riidem. Elsol ename ni m bahk-n sehke kpꞌyaare.”
Ngare nyio eji Jisos jo jen go mbang egbe efung Esabat, abatꞌtoono ebe njal yꞌyam bo. Bo kehm kehme amohk nkohl monngo tv go arahn, jo li.
Eji Bab Farisi nyehne ano, bo kehm tongo Jisos re, “Nyehn ana abatꞌtoono eba kpꞌlimi ejum ji ki fuumu re nne lim efung Esabat!”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ń ka lung a lung bade ana Devid njal yam-e no, a ane ebea?
Á song yele ekpꞌkpa Esowo, song li abred nya bo limi no bum go ekpꞌkpa Esowo jio, nya ki tohko fꞌfuumu re á li, a ane ebe, sehngem abalimajom ba ba fuumu re bo jo li.
Ń ka lung a lung go atahm nya Moses re, efung Esabat abehng abehng abalimajom ba kpo lim eltum go etahk Esowo kpo sꞌsoodo ntahm nyi Esabat, jol ntahm nyio bo joom gbo.
“N kp-n tongo re, Ejum jia, ji gbale sehnge etahk Esowo.
Li re ń kpꞌkahne ana edi nwer Esowo jia lohngo no, ji bungu re, ‘Njom sang n kpꞌsebe, ndon nyi’, kehn ń kpehme ka ane ba ki gbo ntahm ebi.
Tibre Mmon no nne tob li nfono Esabat.”
Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, song rehng go etahk ero ajehng.
Nne jolo o, no ebo ebe lohngo no. Bo kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Anv, nꞌnob re nne lim ane, bo nob ayam ebo efung Esabata?” Tibre bo jo sebe ejum ji bo bahke koko ka Jisos ebi.
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Anv, nne awohng ewahne lꞌbel njoro, njoro nyio lꞌfere gbo yel go elbing efung Esabat, á nehm song yehk-ea?
Anv, nne sang ga gbal sehnge njora? Ano wo wahng ka atahm enyahre bungu re, nne jo lim nnoobo efung Esabat.”
Owo á kehm tongo nne noo re, “Tanne ebo eba!” Á kehm tanne ebo, ebo fere feere ana wuku wuku, nob kpee ana ebo behko.
Bab Farisi kehm soro tahm, song lam kak-e, ana bo bahk-e wulu.
Eji Jisos sebe ano kahn, á kehm tahme eje. Ane gbalee kehm tahme toon-e. Á limi bo kpee, bo nob ayam ebo.
Á tongo bo re, bo kꞌtooro tong ane bako bada ne,
eji lꞌlohko jol ana Esowo bungu sehng go nnyo mi nnyehnamahr Aisaya re,
“Nyehnee, a wo li nlokeltum ewame no m ma yehke.
Akor-m ejame ji kpo kor-m sꞌsehng.
M bahk-e kake etohko ejame.
Á bahke jo tiingi ane baka baka elam ejame.
Á nehm jo taange ntaange, fere jo rabe.
Bo nehm jo wuk ewok eje go nla ejahbe.
Eljele ni ma bahne, á nehm wob.
Etꞌrekahng ji kpꞌrede ellulu,
á nehm lahme,
tete etingitingi ba ko nji.
Go ege a mbing wo ane baka baka bahke jo kunu ekpu.”
Ane bandiki kehm koko nwakamahr nyi ki jo ma bung, ba a ne, nyi bele ebi etohko go ege atahng. Jisos kehm limi nne noo, á nyehn, fere bung.
Ellong ane bao kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm bungu re, “Anv, mmon a Devid wo aa?”
Bab Farisi wuku kan a me, bo kehm bungu re, “Á kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke tib go nsahm nyi Belsebul, ntul a nnehm ka-e no.”
Jisos kꞌkahn ntir atahng ebo, kehm tongo bo re, “Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji lꞌyab, jol ebo ebo, bahke tane na. Nfam anyehng anyehng nyi lꞌyab, jol ebo ebo, afi fere jol nlaaga, nehm yiimi.
Nnehm lꞌkam nnehm yake go, lohngo re eblehm ebyab. Ejahbetul eje bahke yiimi renan?
“Lꞌfere jol re, n kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke go nsahm nyi ntul a nnehm, anv abon ebahne kpo kam bo yehke go nsahm anyii?
N kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke go nsahm nyi etohko ji Esowo, eblohng re, Esowo ebbadde ba go egahne, a etul etul ebe.
Nnene limm, no bahke ma wa etahk etahntahn nne yel, song kpu nsol enye tahm a nyi, sehngem re no, á tohko gbo mbang gba etahntahn nne jio alehke, á kehm ma yel, song kpu nsol enye.
“Nne no ki li ka me, á li nnekv ewame. Nne no tohk-m tob elkpiimi, no lun á kpꞌfare na faade.

Owo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, ane bahke ma bel eltahmeka go bo abiafem anyehng anyehng nya bo limi no, a ebꞌbi ajehng ajehng ji bo bungu no, sehngem abꞌbi nya bo kpo bung bade Etingi Etohko, nya nya bo lꞌkꞌtiki bel eltahmeka.

Nne awohng awohng no lꞌbung ebꞌbi bada Mmon no nne, á bahke bele eltahmeka. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌbung ebꞌbi bade Etingi Etohko, á nehm bel eltahmeka, jol eying jia ji anv, afi fere jol eying ji kpꞌbake.
“Re wahn kehm jo bong anoobo akab nti, lohngo re ḿ bahke bahme na nnoobo eti. Ń lꞌbahm ebi eti, ḿ bahke bongo abi akab. Tibre go akab nya kabe no nya, bo bahke liingi eti jio.
Wahn ane ba li ana akumbad ba! Ḿ bahke ma bung anoobo nsol renan, eji ń li abꞌbi abꞌbi? Tibre nsol nyi ma rur nne go ege eltim, nyi nyi nne kpo bung go ege a nnyo.
Nnooba nne kpo yehke anoobo nsol nya wob-e go ege atahng. Ebi nne kpo yehke abi nsol nya wob-e go ege atahng.
N kp-n tongo re, Efung elam bio, nne awohng awohng, Esowo bahk-e bahbe bade ellum anehng anehng ni á bungu no, ni ki lohng ejumjum.
Tibre Esowo bahke koko alum enya nya a bungu no, lam-a.
Egom Farisi, a atꞌtibi ba atahm bandiki kehm tongo Jisos re, “Ntꞌtibi, e kpꞌsebe re wo lim nkpokosi, wahr nyehn.”

Á kehm faange bo re, “Abi ane ba li anv, ba ma sennge Esowo njahm kpꞌsebe re bo nyehn nkpokosi. Jol nkpokosi anyehng anyehng bo nehm nyehn, sehngem nkpokosi ana nyi nnyehnamahr a Jona nyi nyi bo bahke nyehne.
Tibre, ana Jona kange ala nnyam alahb nfung era, ano wo fvfo Mmon no nne bahke tob kang atahng ndi nfung era.
“Go efung elam bio, aneb Ninive bahke mehle yiimi, ka ane ba li anv ebi. Tibre bo gbꞌgbo ndon go bo abiafem, eji bo wuku alum Esowo nya Jona bungu no.

Go efung elam bio, ntul a nnenkal no Seba bahke mehle yiimi, ka ane ba li anv ebi. Tibre á lohngo nlaabambang ejahbe ba goji Solomon re á ba wuk elkahne ene. Nyehnen ga, a wo li ejum ji ga gbal sehnge Solomon.
“Ebi etohko lꞌlohng nne, á kpo yannge go adi nya kpꞌwaange, jo seb edi ji á bahke reke ekv, á nehm tiki ting.
Owo ebi etohko jio bahke kehm bungu re, ‘M bahke feere go etahk ji n lohng no abake.’ Á lꞌfeere song nyehn etahk jio, li nehme nehme, bo ma feenge kpee, tuungu kpee bum,

owo á bahke tahme, song ko atohko nyako na asehma ba a nya, nya sahb bꞌbib sehnge ye. Bo feere ba lene etahk jio. Nne noo bahke kpe sab na sehnge ana wuku wuku. Ano wo fvfo bahke tob jol ka abi ane ba li anv.”
Ngare nyi Jisos kpi mbungu mbungu a ane bao, nnyehn kehm lohngo ba, a abonanyehn.
Owo nne awohng kehm tongo Jisos re, “Nyehnee, nne, a abonane yim go elatahk kpꞌsebe re bo bung a na.”
Jisos kehm faange nne no tong-e no re, “Nne awo li nnee? Ane aba li abonanee?”
Á kehm tono ebo tv abatꞌtoono ebe, kehm bungu re, “A wo li nnee. A wo li abonanee.
Tibre nne awohng awohng no lꞌlim ji Nsoo no li go ero kpꞌsebe re á lim, ye wo li mmonannee, a nnee.”
Efung bꞌnehm ona, Jisos kehm mehle go etahk, song ji go nkpe eto.
Eji ellong ane gbalee ba go ege, owo á kehm yele go egbang, song ji. Ane bao kpee yiimi go nkpe egbuk.
Á ko ngaane, jo tong bo nsol gbalee re, “Nne jolo gona, no tahme no, song wohngo amohk nti enye go ege egbe.
Eji á jo wohngo, nyandiki gbo noongo go mbang. Nruk ba suudu kpee mele.
“Nyandiki gbo noongo go ndi nyi li atal atal. Abon ndi jolo ntiil. Amohk nti nyao gulu elmahnge. Tibre edi jio ndi gbalem.
Njul nyaare kan a me, akohdo nti nyao wuudu, fere kpo. Tibre alohk jolem.
“Nyandiki gbo kuumu go elkob akpiri. Akpiri nyao gbale, bulu akohdo nti nyao.
“Amohk nti nyako gbo noongo go nnooba ndi, kab akab. Atasok nyandiki jo jolo nkab atahl alon alon, atasok nyandiki nkab atahl ara ara, atasok nyandiki eltahl a nkab ewubu eltahl a nkab ewubu.
“Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk!”
Owo abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm bake go ege, ba bahb-e re, “Jen ji wahnge a kpo ko ngaane, jo bung a bo?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Bo ma-n ka elkahne nio ni etul bi Esowo, bi Esowo behre no. Ane bao, bo kaam bo.
Nne no kpi no, bo bahk-e budu na, á bel gbalee. Nne no ki kpi, bo bahk-e taare na ji á kpi no.
Owo wahng ka n kpo bung a bo go ngaane. Tibre bo kpo seenge, jol bo kpehme nyehn. Bo kpo wuungu atung, jol bo kpehme wuk, fere kahn.
Bo ba li ane ba nnyehnamahr Aisaya bungu no bada bo re,
“ ‘Ḿ bahke wuungu na wuungu wuungu atung,
ń nehm tiki kahn.
Ḿ bahke seenge na seenge seenge,
ń nehm tiki nyehn.
Tibre asi ane bao ebfere tahne.
Bobsahde atung ebo.
Bobbulu amahr ebo.
Ki li ano, kehn, bo kpꞌnyehne, fere wuk,
fere kꞌkahn go bo a ntim, fere sennge,
feere go egame, eji n lꞌlim bo, bo nob.’
Elfuulu li ka amahr enyahne, eji kpꞌnyehne. Elfuulu li ka atung enyahne, eji kpꞌwuku.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Abanyehnamahr gbalee, a aneb Esowo gbalee jo sebe re bo nyehn ji ń kpꞌnyehne a. Jol bo tikem nyehn. Bo jo sebe re bo wuk ji ń kpꞌwuku a. Jol bo tikem wuk.
“Wuungen atung anv, wahn kahn ana elgan ni li bada mbahmgbe lohngo no.
“Ane ba lꞌwuk alum nya etul bi Esowo, kꞌkahn ana lohngo no, Ebinne bahke bake, ba yehke nsol nyi bo ma bahm go bo a ntim tahm a nyi. Nyao nya li amohk nti nya gbo noongo go mbang.
“Ane bandiki li ana amohk nti nya gbo noongo go ndi nyi li atal atal. Bo lꞌwuk alum Esowo nyao o, bo ko tvtv a eyebatahng.
Eji bo ki kpi alohk, bo kpehme kang. Erem lꞌba, a ntong tib go alum Esowo nya bo wuku no, bo soro gbo tvtv.
“Ane bandiki li ana amohk nti nya fooro gbo go elkob akpiri. Bo kpꞌwuku alum Esowo, wo, nsol nyi njini nyia kpo gbiingi bo go bo a ntim. Ekor akpohko kpo nehm bo.
“Ane bako li ana amohk nti nya bo wohngo go nnooba ndi.
Jisos kehm kpe tub bo elgan nehko re, “Etul bi Esowo li ana nne no tahme song kak nkohl go ege egbe.
Eji ane ma lal, nnekv ewe kehm tahme song wohngo afem agasame semme go nkohl nyio, tahm eje.
Eji nkohl ma mahng, gbal, fere lake abon, agasame kehm tob mahng.
Owo alokeltum ba nfono egbe noo kehm ba bahb-e re, ‘Nsoo, nkohl sang a kake go ega egbea? Anv, agasame nyao lohngo gan ba?’
Owo á kehm tongo bo re, ‘Nnekv wo ma lim ejum jio.’ Alokeltum bao kehm-e bahbe re, ‘Anv, a kpꞌsebe re wahr song wooba?’
Á kehm tene re, ‘Eꞌee, ń lꞌsong woobo agasame, ḿ bahke woobo nkohl semme.

Nong, nsol ebal ebal gbal ano tete rehng go efung elbanne. Owo m bahke tongo ababꞌbanne re, Gboon mbang, wahn tohko woobo agasame, gba agan agan, eji bo lꞌjahm fi, wahn kehm banne nkohl kanne, kpu song kpake go egame etahk.’ ”
Jisos kehm kpe tub bo elgan nehko re, “Etul bi Esowo li ana mmohk asia nyi nne ko no, song bahm go ege etahngga.
Se sehnge mmohk eti anyehng anyehng.
Jisos kehm kpe tub bo elgan nehko re, “Etul bi Esowo li ana ayist,
Nsol nyia kpee, Jisos jo bungu go ngaane, tong ellong ane. Á joom tiki bung na bung, kꞌbung go elgan,
eji lꞌlohko jol ana nnyehnamahr bungu no re,
“M bahke jo bung a bo go ngaane.
M bahke tongo bo nsol nyi Esowo behre no ngare nyi njini bomo no.”
Jisos kehm tahme ellong ane bao sa, song yel ekpꞌkpa. Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm bake go ege, ba bahb-e re, “Tong-r ana elgan ni li bade agasame lohngo no.”
Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Nne no kake nkohl, Mmon no nne wo.
Edi egbe jio, njini nyi. Nkohl nyio, abon Ntul ba. Agasame nyao, abon ba Ebinne jio ba.
Nnekv no wohngo afem agasame, nnehm nyi. Ngare elbanne nyio, esꞌkohro eying jia ji. Ababꞌbanne bao, babenjel ba.
“Ana bo bahke kpuku agasame nyao, jamme fi, ano wo bahke jolo esꞌkohro eying jia.
Owo Mmon no nne bahke tumu enjel enye,
ro bo, kak go agun. Owo bo bahke woomo, jo ling, fere jo kono amahn.
Aneb Esowo bahke jo ya ana njul go ejahbetul ji Nde ebo.
“Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk.
“Etul bi Esowo tob li ana elkohl akpohko ni bo behre go egbe.
“Etul bi Esowo tob li ana njenare no jo seb anoobo amohkesol.
Eji á nyehne anyehng nyi sahb kꞌkim ekun, fere nꞌnob, owo á kehm soro tahm, song gungu nsol enye kpee, nyi á bele no, fere ba gunu mmohkesol nyio.
“Etul bi Esowo tob li ana erim bi bo ma kak go aya, fere bob nsahre go nkohn a nkohn.
Eji nsahre ma rur, bo kehm tohngo, bum egbuk.
Ano wo bahke jolo go esꞌkohro eying jia. Babenjel bahke bake, ba jak abi ane go ellong anoobo ane,
fere ro bo kak agun. Owo bo bahke woomo, jo ling, fere jo kono amahn.”
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, nsol nyia lenng-n lennga?” Owo bo kehm-e faange re, “Ee nsoo.”

Á kehm tongo bo re, “Owo wahnge ntꞌtibi no atahm awohng awohng no ma jol ntꞌtoono Esowo, no ma kpili bade etul bi Esowo, á li ana nfontahk no kpo yehke nsol afang enye go elkohl, nyindiki nsol nfenfe,
Eji Jisos tuubu ngaane nyio kpee mal, owo á kehm tahme edi jio,
song rehng go ege ejahbe, song kehme bo tib go bo etahk ero.
Ane ba wuk-e no, jo kpo bo esi sehng, bo kehm bahbe re, “Gan wo á bele elkohn elkahne ana nia, a nsahm nyi á kpo ko lim agburu akpokosi nyaa?
Ye sang li mmon a kapentaa? Nnyehn sang bo kpo lung-e re Meria? Abonanyehn sang bo kpo lung bo re Jems, Joses, Saimon a Judasa?
Abonanyehn ba nkal sang li a nahre a kpeea? Anv, gan wo á bele bel nsol nyio kpee?”
Owo bo kehm-e tene.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Nnyehnamahr, bo kpo kak-e edi ajehng ajehng, sehngem ane ebe, a ejahbe eje ji kil jo kak-e.”
Á limem akpokosi gbalee ejahbe jio tib go bo ekꞌtaame.
Ngare nyio Herod ji jolo ntul a Galili kehm wuku bada Jisos.
Owo á kehm tongo alokeltum ebe re, “Jon ji nwohngalahb wo ona ma nyahme go elkv. Ano wo wahnge á kpi egburu nsahm ana nyio nyi kpo mehl-e.”
Tibre Herod bobo Jon, gba-e, kak go ngbekobo tib esi ji Herodias ji jolo nkal a Filip mmonannyehn.
Tibre Jon jo tong-e re, “Fuumem re a ko-e.”
Herod jo sebe re á wul-e. Á jo fahle Jus, tibre bo jo bumu Jon ana nnyehnamahr.
Efung bi bo ji, buumu efung bi bo jele Herod, mmon no nkal no Herodias kehm kehme ase bahn go elkab ane nio. Herod, atahng yeb-e sehng,
á kehm nyame, fere tꞌtir re, “M bahk-a kake ejum ajehng ajehng ji a lꞌbahb-m.”
Nnyehn kehm toobo a ne. Mmon noo kehm song tong Herod re, “Ka-m esi Jon ji nwohngalahb anv anv go ekpingi.”
Ntul kpeem bang, wo, tib go esi ji á tiri no go esamahr ane ba á tiingi bo elkak, owo á kehm tongo re bo lim ka-e ana á bahbe no.
Á kehm tumu ane, bo song kim Jon esi go ngbekobo,
ko esi jio go ekpingi ba a ji, ba ka mmon noo. Mmon noo kehm soro ko, song ka nnyehn.
Abatꞌtoono Jon kehm bake, ba rod ekv eje, song kpa kak, kehm feere song tong Jisos.
Eji Jisos wuku eka jio bada Jon, owo á kehm tahme edi jio, song yel egbang antahng, song rehng edi ji li soom. Ellong ane ba wuku no, kehm tahme ajahbe ebo, jo jen egbuk egbuk, jo toon-e.
Jisos lohngo kan egbang me, á kehm nyehne ellong ane gbalee. Bo kehm-e fili ndon. Á kehm limi aneb ayam ebo, bo nob.

Eji elgung ma ba, abatꞌtoono ebe kehm song kpir-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm edi jia ana rehng go ajahbe, ekidi kpꞌlabe. Wo gana, ngare ebsehng. Nong, ane baa song gunu nsol alehke go abon ajahbe li me.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Bo sang bahke tahme song gunu nsol alehke li, wahn kaan bo nsol alehke, bo li.”
Owo bo kehm-e faange re, “Nsol nyi e kpi a kpee li abon abred na alon, kumu abon nsahre abal.”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Koon nsol nyio ba ka-m wahn!”

Owo á kehm tongo ane bao re, bo ji go ajele. Á kehm rodo abon abred bao na alon, a abon nsahre na abal, kehm kpiidi amahr enye go elbung, kak Esowo saam, fere bakke abon abred bao, ka abatꞌtoono ebe. Abatꞌtoono ebe ko, song bak ellong ane bao.
Bo li ane kpee wohngo. Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm song taare bo erik ji sa no, ruru ewubu ejeere na ebbal.
Aneblum ba li nsol nyio jolo ejum ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal ane atahl awubu (5,000). Jol anebkal, a abonse, bo fangem bo.
Jisos kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re bo yel egbang, gbo-e mbang, song go egbuk jehko, ye samme ji, yaame ane bao.
Eji á ma yaame ane bao, owo á kehm tahme go ewong antahng re á song kak ero. Eji elgung ba no, Jisos noa, kpeke li go ntahngtahng.
Ngare nyio egbang ebrehng go nlum alahb. Ebuku jo gbulu egbang bio tv edi ajehng ajehng. Tibre nfeb jo lohngo go bo a mbuksong.
Nkpese efungfu wo, Jisos jene ero alahb, song kpiri bo.
Eji abatꞌtoono ebe nyehn-e no á kpꞌjene go ero alahb, kehm mennge bo. Bo kehm bungu re, “Etohko ji,” fere rabe elfahle elfahle.
Jisos kehm soro bung a bo tvtv re, “Boben eltim, me wo, kana kpe fahl!”
Owo Pita kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, lꞌlohko jol re wo wo, tong-m, me n lohng, jen go alahb, ba kpir-a!”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ba!” Pita kehm lohngo go egbang, kehm kehme eljene go ero alahb asongo goji Jisos.
Eji á nyehne re, nfeb nyio kpꞌlimi area, á kehm kehme elfahle, soro kehme eltere, kehm rabe re, “Nsoo, tahr-m!”
Owo Jisos kehm soro tanne ebo ebe, jabb-e kehm-e tongo re, “Wo ji kpꞌkahn taame ntiil, jen ji wahnge a kehm fꞌfaabe me?”
Eji bo feere song yel go egbang, nfeb nyio kehm soro naange.
Ane ba woomo go egbang kehm ba jamm-e alahng, kehm bungu re, “Etingitingi, wo Mmon Esowo wo.”
Bo kehm gohro siiri, song rehng go egbuk jehko ji Genesaret.
Ane bao liingi kan Jisos, bo kehm tiingi etib tv ajahbe kpee nya jolo o. Bo kehm koko aneb ayam kpee, ba a bo go ege.
Bo fere gboong-e re, á nong, aneb ayam lub koor-e go ege asꞌsili nsubu. Ane kpee ba koor-e no, bo nobo ayam ebo.
Atꞌtibi ba atahm, a egom Farisi jindiki kehm lohngo go Jerusalem ba goji Jisos, ba bahbe re,
“Jen ji wahnge abatꞌtoono eba kpꞌdaange atahm nya babnsoo, tib eji bo kil jo ru abo, kehm jo li nsol?”
Owo á kehm faange bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpo daange atahm Esowo, fere kpꞌtoono eljini nꞌnahne?
Tibre Esowo jehke ntahm re, ‘Jo kak nso, a nne!’ Nyehko kpe li re, ‘Nne no lꞌsu nde, afi jolo nnyehn, bo bahk-e wulu.’
Wahn kpo tib re, ‘Nne no lꞌbel ejum ji á jol kake nde ebo, afi jolo nnyehn, á lꞌfere bung re, Ejum jia li ka Esowo, kpeem li ka-e re, á kpe kak nde, a nnyehn.’
Eji ń kpo tib ana wo wahnge ḿ ma range ntahm nyi Esowo, fere kpꞌtoono eljini nꞌnahne.
Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Aisaya lohko nyehn enyehnamahr ji nno bada nahne, eji á bungu re,
“ ‘Ane baa kpo kak-m go nnyo a nnyo.
Ntim ebo n wobem.
Bo kp-m kake mbol mbol,
eji bo kpꞌtibi atahm nya ane baka baka jehke no,
nya ki li nya Esowo.’ ”
Jisos kehm lungu ellong ane tv elne, kehm tongo bo re, “Wuungen atung, wahn kahn!
Ejum ji kpo yel nne go nnyo sang kpo lim eltim nne kꞌkpe jol saang.
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm bake go ege, ba tong-e re, “Anv, a kpꞌkahne re, alum nya wuku a bungu no sꞌsab Bab Farisia?”
Owo á kehm faange re, “Eti ajehng ajehng ji Nsoo no li go ero ki bahm, bo bahke mehle na tub go.
Yaken na yake bo go! Bo li awakamahr atubesi! Nwakamahr lꞌseb re á tib ntem nwakamahr mbang, bo ane abal abal bahke gboko na, yel go elbing.”
Owo Pita kehm-e tongo re, “Tong-r ana elgan nia lohngo no!”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahn fvfo, ń nehme tob kahna?
Ń nehme kahn re, ejum ajehng ajehng ji lꞌyel nne go nnyo kpo sehng go ala, lohng go ngubjinga?
Nsol nyi kpo lohng nne go nnyo kpo lohng-e go eltim. Nsol nyio nyi kpo lim nne, kꞌkpe jol saang.
Tibre go eltim nne wo ebi ntir kpo lohng, a ewulane, erehbe alimi, anebkal akono, ejv avohko, ntianse efahnge, a afahnge akiimi lake ane.
Nsol nyia ana nyi kpo lim nne, kꞌkpe jol saang. Re nne li nsol kꞌru abo, we nehm ma lim á kꞌkpe jol saang.”
Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, song rehng go ejang bi Taya, a Saidon.
Nnenkal a Kenan awohng no lohng ejahbe jio kehm bake go ege, ba rabe gboong-e re, “Nsoo, mmon no Devid, nong, me n fil-a ndon! Mmon ewame, ebi etohko wob-e go atahng, kp-e gbiingi sehng.”
Jisos we tikem faange.
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm bake go ege, ba gboong-e re, “Tong-e á song. Tibre á kpꞌrabe tob-r sehng.”
Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Bo tum-m tv go ejoro bio bi Israel bi ma tan bi bi.”
Owo nnenkal noo kehm ba gbo go ege alata, kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, kak-m ebo!”
Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Nobem re nne rod nsol alehke nyi abon, ka ebv.”
Nnenkal noo kehm taame re, “Ee nsoo, jol ebv kpo kpiimi akahb elang nya kpo fooro ekpꞌkuru nde ebo gbo.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nnenkal, eltaame ena kpꞌgbale gbalee.
Ngare nyꞌnehm ona nyi mmon ewe noo no nkal nobo eyam bio.
Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, song rehng go eto jio ji Galili, kehm wahre go ewong, song ji.

Ellong ane gbalee kehm koko aneb ayam ba a bo goji Jisos. Bandiki jolo abanne, bandiki agboodo, bandiki awakamahr, bandiki akamme. Ane bako gbalee ba jo yame ayam nyandikandiki. Bo jo ba bumu aneb ayam bao go alata nya Jisos. Á jo lim bo, bo nob.
Jo kpo ane esi sehng, eji bo nyehne akamme kpꞌbungu, fere nyehn agboodo ma nob, fere nyehn abanne kpꞌjene, awakamahr fere jo nyehn. Bo kehm kehme Esowo bio bi Israel ellub ka.

Jisos kehm lungu abatꞌtoono ebe tv elne, kehm tongo bo re, “Ane baa ma-m fili ndon. Tibre nfung era nyi a, nyi bo ma kang a name. Anv, bo kpeem kpi ejum alehke ajehng ajehng. N nehme seb re me n yake bo, bo song njal njal. Fundiki bo bahke gboko awo go mbang.”
Owo abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Gan wo e bahke tingi nsol alehke elka emahng nia, kehm leke ellong ane ana nia?”
Owo Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Abon abred abik ń kpi no?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “E kpi abon abred na asehma, kunu abon nsahre abik abik.”
Jisos kehm tongo ellong ane bao re, bo ji go ndi.
Á kehm rodo abon abred bao na asehma, a nsahre nyio, kehm kake Esowo saam, bakke, ka abatꞌtoono ebe, abatꞌtoono ebe kehm koko, song bak ane.
Bo li ane kpee wohngo. Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm taare bo erik ji sa no, ruru ejeere na ebsehma.
Aneblum ba li nsol nyio jolo ane atahltahl nkpel ewubu (4,000). Jol anebkal, a abonse, bo fangem.
Jisos kehm yaame ane bao re bo song kehnge, kehm yele egbang, song rehng go egbuk jehko ji Magadan.
Egom Farisi jindiki, a Bab Sadusi kehm bake goji Jisos re bo ba gar-e. Owo bo kehm-e tongo re, á lim nkpokosi nyi lohng go ejahbetul Esowo tib bo.
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ana wo ń kpo kono elbungu. Elgung lꞌba, eji elbung ma biili, ń re, ‘Elahb nehm na.’
Efungfu atv atv eji elbung ma biili, fere nyꞌnyak, ń re, ‘Elahb bahke nake.’ Ń kpo kahn ana elbung li no, joare elahb bahke nake, afi nehm na. Anv, nliingi nyi kpꞌtibi bada ngare ń nehme ma liinga?
Abi ane ba li anv, ba ma sennge Esowo njahm kpꞌsebe re bo nyehn nkpokosi. Jol nkpokosi anyehng anyehng bo nehm nyehn, sehngem nkpokosi ana nyio nyi nnyehnamahr Jona nyi nyi bo bahke nyehne.”
Owo á kehm soro tahm bo sa o, tahm eje.
Eji abatꞌtoono Jisos siiri eto jio, song rehng egbuk jehko, ebred ajehng ajehng bo belem. Tibre bo yꞌyini, bo rodem.
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Jo gberen, wahn jo kunu ekpu go ayist nyao nya Farisis, a nya Sadusis.”
Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Á bungu ellum nia a, tib eji e ki rod abred ba a nya.”
Eji Jisos sebe kahn ana bo jo bung, á kehm bahbe bo re, “Wahn ane ba kpꞌkahn taame ntiil ba! Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌbungu atemtem bade ana ń ki rod abred ba a nya?
Anv, ń ka tiki kahn naa? Anv, ń nehme kpe buumu ana m bakke abon abred bao na alon, ka ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal atahl awuba? Anv, erik ji sa no, ji ń taare no, ruru ejeere ebbik?
Abon abred bao na asehma ba m bakke, ka ane atahltahl nkpel ewubu, erik ji sa no, ji ń taare no, ruru ejeere ebbik?
Jen ji wahnge ń kil tiki kahn re, n joom bung a nahne bade abred? Jo gberen elnahne tib ayist nya Farisis, a nya Sadusis.”
Owo abatꞌtoono ebe kehm kahne re, Jisos jo tongo bo re, bo gbere eltibi nio ni Farisis, a ni Sadusis, bo kꞌgbere ayist nya bo kpo kak go abred.
Eji Jisos rehnge go ejang bi Sisaria Filipi, owo á kehm bahbe abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Anv, ane kpo bung renan bada Mmon no nne? Nne awo li Mmon no nne?”
Owo bo kehm faange re, “Ane bandiki kpo bung re, wo Jon ji nwohngalahb wo. Ane bandiki bung re, wo Elaija wo. Ane bandiki re, wo Jeremaya wo, tohko jol ano nnyehnamahr nondiki wo.”
Owo Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, wahn kpo tir re, me n li elkohn nne awo?”
Saimon Pita kehm faange re, “Wo wo li Mesaya ji Mmon no Esowo bi li go elkpin.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Eyebatahng li a na, Saimon, mmon a Jona. Ji a bungu a, nne sang tib-a na. Nsoo no li go ero wo ma lennge ka-a.
N kp-a kpeke tong re, Wo wo li Pita (ji lohngo re eltal).
M bahk-a kake agbokoro nya ejahbetul Esowo.
Owo Jisos kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, bo kꞌtiki tong nne awohng awohng re, ye wo li Mesaya.

Bomo ngare nyio asongo, Jisos kehm bomo abatꞌtoono ebe eltongo gbul gbul gbuul re, “M bahke jeke go Jerusalem, song nyehn erem gbalee, bi anebkul nfam, a atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm bahk-m kake. Bo bahk-m wulu. Lꞌkang nfung era, n nyahme go elkv.”
Pita kehm koko Jisos, tahm a ne go nkpohko, kehm-e rehke re, “Nsoo, Esowo kꞌtaame re ejum ana jia lim-a.”
Owo Jisos kehm sennge, tong Pita re, “Nnehm, fak-m go esamahr! Wo kp-m kpane. Tibre a kpo tir ntir nyehka nyehka nyi ane. A kpehme tir ntir nyi Esowo.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Nne awohng awohng no lꞌseb re á toon-m, nong á ten elne tv-m, fere rod ekros eje tahm toon-m.
Tibre nne awohng awohng no lꞌseb re á tahre elkpin ene, á bahke tane na elkpin ene. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtane elkpin ene tib go egame esi, á bahke bele etingitingi elkpin.
Nsehng anyi nne bahke lehke, afi á gbo afang nya njini nyia kpee, fere tane etohko eje? Ejum aji nne bahke kake, kehm fake etohko eje?
“Tibre Mmon no nne yahke ba elbake go ellub ni nde, a enjel enye. Owo á bahke tuuru nne awohng awohng jang jang ana á limi no.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Egom ejahne jindiki jia ana, ji lꞌkꞌkpo tete bo nyehn Mmon no nne kpꞌbake ana ntul.”
Eji ma kang nfung erakera, Jisos kehm yehke Pita, Jems, a Jon ji mmonannyehn a Jems. Bo kehm tahme bo bo, song wahr nwahrewahre ewong.
Eji bo jo seenge Jisos, á kehm yaange. Esamahr ebe fere jo ya ana njul. Nsol nyi á kake go ngubjing kehm bare kparaang.
Owo bo kehm soro nyehn Moses abola Elaija ma lohng ba, ba kehme elbungu a Jisos.
Pita kehm tongo Jisos re, “Nsoo, a wo li nnoobo edi ji fuumu re wahr jol. Lꞌkor-a, nong, wahr si nkpatahk era a, behko jol bꞌba, behko jol bi Moses, behko jol bi Elaija.”
Eji Pita kpi mbungu mbungu, ekparesemsem ji jo ya, kehm tahle ba bulu bo. Owo bo kehm wuku ellum go ekparesemsem jio re,
“A wo li akor-m mmon ewame no kpo kor-m sꞌsehng. Wuken ye!”
Abatꞌtoono bao wuku kan ano, bo kehm gboko, kohk asamahr ebo go ndi, kehm kehme elfahle gbalee.
Jisos kehm bake, ba kpiri bo, kooro bo, kehm bungu re, “Mehlen yiimi, kana kpe fahl!”
Eji bo tabe asamahr ebo wahre, bo kpeem nyehn nnene, sehngem Jisos ntahngtahng wo bo nyehn-e no.
Eji bo jo badde go ewong abake, Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Kana tiki tong nne awohng awohng bada nkpokosi nyi ḿ ma nyehn a, tete Mmon no nne nyahme go elkv.”
Abatꞌtoono bao kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge atꞌtibi ba atahm kpo bung re, Elaija bahke tohko gbo mbang ba?”
Á kehm faange re, “Elaija bahke gboko mbang ba, ba tuungu ejum ajehng ajehng.
N kp-n tongo re, Elaija ebsi bꞌba. Bo we liingem. Bo lim-e ejum ajehng ajehng ji koro bo.
Owo kehm lennge abatꞌtoono bao re, á jo bungu abo bada Jon ji nwohngalahb.
Eji bo feere no, ba rehng edi ji ellong ane jolo no, nne awohng kehm lohngo ba, ba jamme Jisos alahng,
kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, nong, mmon ewame fil-a ndon. Á kpo gbo ngboko, kpo gbiing-e sehng. Nkpel tvv á kpo kono elgboko yel agun, fere jo gbo yel alahb.
N ko-e ba a ne goji abatꞌtoono eba. Bo we maam lim, á nob.”
Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahn ane ba kpo soodo, fere kꞌtaame ba! M bahke kange renan a nahne? Anv, bahke kange renan, ji m bahke koko tib-n, ń kehm kahne? Ko mmon noo, ba a ne!”
Jisos kehm nyame ebi etohko jio, ebi etohko jio kehm soro lohng mmon noo. Mmon noo lohko nob tvtv.
Owo abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm bake, ba kpiri Jisos, eji á li ntahngtahng, kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge wahr ki ma kam ebi etohko jio yehke?”

Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ekꞌtaame ejahne ji wahnge. Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ń lꞌtaame, jol afi eltaame enahne se ana mmohk asia, ń li ma tong ewong jia re, ‘Mehl, song rehng o!’ Ewong jio bahke lohko mehl tahm. Ejumjum limm, ji bahk-n riidi.
Elkohn ebi etohko ana jio ń nehm ma kam yehke, tohko jol re ń kake ero, fere bade elnahne njal.”
Ngare nyi bo jolo go Galili, Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Mmon no nne, bo yahk-e ba elyake, kak ane go ebo.
Bo bahk-e wulu. Lꞌkang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe, ndon kehm gbale bo go eltim.
Eji Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe ba rehng go Kapenium, ane ba kpo ko etak ji etahk Esowo kehm ba bahb Pita re, “Anv, ntꞌtibi ewahne kpehme tahb etak ji etahk Esowoa?”
Pita kehm faange re, “Ee.”
Eji Pita yele ekpꞌkpa, owo Jisos kehm gboko mbang bahb-e re, “Saimon, anv, a kpo tir renan bade ejum jia? Atul ba njini nyia kpo ko atak goji abon ebo, afi bo kpo ko goji ane baka baka?”
Owo Pita kehm faange re, “Goji ane baka baka.”
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Lꞌfere jol ano, lohngo re, abon, ntahm bo wobem.

Nong, wahr lim, eji lꞌkꞌsab bo. Song, wo song tub eblo go eto! Yehke ngbokambang a nnyam alahb nyi gbo eblo, wo lennge nnyo eme. Owo a bahke nyehne akpohko nya bahke biingi etak ejame, a jꞌja. Nyao nya a bahke koko, song ka bo.”
Ngare nyio nyi abatꞌtoono Jisos ba rehng go ege, owo bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nne awo ga gbal go ellong ane ba wob go elwo ni Esowo?”
Jisos kehm lungu mmonse, ba yiimi go bo a mbuksong,
kehm bungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ń tohko tiki yaange jol ana abonse, ń nehm tiki li etul bi Esowo.
Fvfo, nne no lꞌrede elne, jol ana mmonse noa, ye wo ga gbal go ellong ane ba wob go elwo ni Esowo.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌvvrv elkohn mmonse ana noa tib go egama mbing, á vvrv me.
“Ga nob re bo kahn nne egburu eltal go emel, tub-e kak alahb, sehnge re á lim mmonse awohng no ma taame tv-m, á gbo yel abiafem.
“Eyuu a ane ba njini nyia tib nsol nyi kpo wahng re ane jo lim abiafem! Nsol nyio bahke tiki ba. Eyuu a ane ba kpꞌkoko ba a nyi!

“Ebo eba, afi jolo ekpade eja lꞌkehm-a limi re wo gbo yel abiafem, kim tub go! Ga nob re wo yel go edi elkpin ebo abehng, tohko jol ano ekpade ajehng, sehnge re wo bel abo abal abal, a akpade abal abal, bo ro-a kak go agun nya li go njinanjini.
“Elmahr ena lꞌkehm-a limi re wo lim abiafem, luudu ro go! Ga nob re wo bel elmahr anehng, yel edi elkpin, sehnge re wo bel amahr abal abal, bo ro-a kak ellulagun.

“Jo kunen ekpu, eji ń lꞌkꞌdaange mmonse awohng awohng no wob go ellong abonse baa. Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Enjel ebo nya li go ejahbetul Esowo kpo nyehn esamahr Nsoo no li go ero ngare anyehng anyehng.
Tibre Mmon no nne ba re, á ba tahre jio ji ma tan.
“Anv, ń kpꞌtiri renan bade ejum jia? Nne lꞌbel ejoro atahl alon, anyehng kehm ba tan, nfono ejoro nehm tahm ejoro behko sa go awong, song seb nyio nyi ma tana?
Á lꞌseb-e nyehn, etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, á bahke ga bel eyebatahng go njoro nyio, sehnge ejoro behko bi ki tan.
Ano wo fvfo Nso ejahne no li go ero kil sebe re mmonse awohng awohng go ellong abonse baa tan.
“Mmonanne lꞌlim abiafem bada na, song lennge ebi ji á lim-a no ka-e wahn wahn. Á lꞌwuk-a, a m-e ko, feere a ne.
Á tohk-a fere wuk, ko ntianse anyehng, tohko jol ano ebal, je a bo, ‘eji ellum anehng anehng lꞌjo yiimi, ni ntianse ebal, tohko jol ano ni ntianse era bungu no, bum nnyo amehng.’
Á tohko fere wuk bo, tooro tong aneb ero. Á tohko fere wuk aneb ero, ko-e na ko ana nne no ki nyi Esowo, tohko jol ano ana nkokatak.
“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌgba go njini nyia, bobtob gba go ejahbetul Esowo. Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌfannge go njini nyia, bobtob fannge go ejahbetul Esowo.
“N kp-n kpeke tong re, Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ane abal ebahne lꞌkod abo kak ero go njini nyia, Nsoo no li go ero bahke limi ka bo.
Tibre edi jio ji ane abal, ane ara lꞌkono go egama mbing, me n li go bo ellong.”
Pita kehm bake goji Jisos, kehm ba bahb-e re, “Nsoo, nkpel ebik nyi mmonannee lꞌsood-m, m bahke jo tahm ka-e?”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “N kp-a tongo re, Nkpel esehma sang, li nkpel atahltahl atahl ani nkpel ewubu.
“Etul bi Esowo li ana ntul awohng no lungu alokeltum ebe re bo ba toobo akpohko enye ka-e.
Á bomo kan eltoobo a alokeltum ebe, owo bo kehm koko nne awohng ba go ege, no bel-e mbong ekpa akpohko atahltahl nkpel atahltahl.
Eji nlokeltum noo ki bel ejumjum ji á bahke kake, owo nde kehm tongo re, bo gung-e, fere gungu nkal ewe, gungu abon ebe, a nsol kpee nyi á kpi no, ko akpohko nyao gal mbong.
“Owo nlokeltum noo kehm jamme nde alahng, kehm-e gboongo re, ‘Nsoo titi, tohko kpe nong, m bahk-a gale mbong enya kpee.’
“Nde nlokeltum noo, ndon kehm-e fili, á kehm-e yake, á song, fere yake mbong nyi á bel-e no tv-e.
“Nlokeltum nonehm o kehm tahme song kpiri nte ewe, no jo tob loko nde nonehm o. Nte ewe noo bel-e mbong a mpon esehma. Á kehm-e tubu ejahm go nkahng, fere tong-e re, ‘Gal-m mbong enyame!’
“Nte ewe noo kehm-e jamme alahng, fere jo gboong-e re, ‘Titi, tohko kpe nong, m bahk-a gale mbong enya.’
“Jol atung we á joom wuungu. Á tahm a ne, song kak-e ngbekobo re á woomo o tete gal-e mbong enye.
“Eji alokeltum bako nyehne ano, bo kpeem jo bang. Bo kehm tahme, song tooro nsol kpee nyi ma lim, tong nde ebo.
“Owo nde kehm-e lungu, kehm-e tongo re, ‘Wo ebi nlokeltum wo. Mbong nyio nyi a bel-m no kpee, me n yake tv-a, tib eji a gboong-m no.
Anv, limm nyi kehn nte ewa jol-a tob fili ndon, ana a fil-m ndona?’
“Nde noo, atahng rak-e sehng, owo á kehm tumu nlokeltum noo ngbekobo re bo kak-e erem tete á gal-e mbong enye kpee.
“Ano wo Nsoo no li go ero bahke limi nne awohng awohng ewahne no tohko jo tahm ka mmonannyehn go abiafem nya á lim-e no kpee eltim eltim ene.”
Eji Jisos ma bung ano mal, á kehm tahme o Galili, feere go Judea, egbuk Jodan jehko.
Ellong ane gbalee kehm tahme toon-e. Á kehm limi bo, bo nob ayam ebo.
Egom Farisi jindiki kehm bake re bo ba gar-e. Bo bahb-e re, “Anv, ntahm enyahre bꞌbung re, nfem anyehng anyehng lꞌgbo nne abola nkal ewe, á yehk-e na yehke elbala?”
Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Anv ń ka tiki lung bade ana Esowo limi ane go mbomannahb re, á limi ‘nnenlum, a nnenkala?’
fere bung re, ‘Ano wo wahnge nne bahke tahme nde, a nnyehn sa, bo song jol ebo ebo abola nkal ewe. Ane bao na abal bahke fere jol ajehng.’
Bo nehm kpe jol ane abal, bo bahke fere jol ana ngubjing anyehng. Ejum ji Esowo ma kono edi ajehng, nne kꞌyaame.”
Owo Bab Farisi kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge Moses kehm jehke ntahm re, nne jo nyon nwer, ka nkal ewe, kehm-e kame, á song?”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Moses jehke ntahm re wahn jo yehke akal ebahne ano tib go egahne etahnsi. Go mbomannahb jolem ano.

Wo, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no lꞌkam nkal ewe, eji nnenlum nondiki ki noongo a ne, fere ko nkal nondiki, yeblim abiafem nyao nya erehbe. Nne no lꞌko nnenkal no bo m-e yehke elbal, yebtob lim abiafem nya erehbe.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm-e tongo re, “Joare ano wo li no bada nnenlum, a nnenkal, ga nob re nne kꞌko nkal.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Ellum ni n fi elbungu a, ane kpee sang bahke lennge bo, sehngem ane bao ba Esowo ma lennge ka bo, bo ba bahke lennge bo.
Ane baa, ba bo ma fang bo. Ane baa, ba bo jele na bo ano. Ane baa, ba fange elbo antahng tib esi jio ona ji etul bi Esowo.
Ane bandiki kehm koko abon ba nse, ba goji Jisos re á kunu bo abo, kak ero. Abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm nyame ane bao.
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Yaken abon ba nse, bo jo ba ga egame. Kana jo sahde bo! Tibre etul bi Esowo li ka ane ba li ana bo.”
Á kehm kunu bo abo, kehm tahme eje o.
Nne awohng kehm bake goji Jisos, ba bahb-e re, “Ntꞌtibi, nnoobo anyi m bahke limi, eji n lꞌbel elkpin ni li go njinanjini?”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Jen ji wahnge a kehm-m bahbe bade ji kpꞌnobo? Esowo ntahngtahng bi kpꞌnobo. Lꞌjol re a kpꞌsebe re wo bel elkpin, jo bum atahm!”
Owo á kehm-e bahbe re, “Atahm anya?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ka jo wul nne! Ka jo lim erehbe! Ka jo v ejv! Ka jo yiimi ntianse efahnge!
Kak nso, a nne! Nne ebjing ewa jo kor-a ana ebjing eba!”
Owo njangkun nyio kehm-e faange re, “Nyaa kpee n kpo bꞌbum. Anv, ejum aji kpe li, ji m bahke kpe lim!”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “A lꞌseb re wo jol go nseenge, song, wo song gungu nsol kpee nyi a kpi no, ko akpohko nyao song ka akpak, a bahke bele afang go ejahbetul Esowo, wo feere ba toon-m.”
Eji njangkun nyio wuku ano, á kehm tahme eje ndon ndon. Tibre á fange sehng.
Jisos kehm bungu tong abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Bahke riidi sehng re, efange nne kehm lehke etul bi Esowo.
N kp-n kpeke tong re, Re efange nne kehm yele go ejahbetul Esowo, ekamel bahke sehnge go mbang a nga.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe wuku ano, kehm sahb kpꞌkpo bo esi, bo kehm bahbe re, “Wo anv, nne awo bahke kehm bele eltahre me?”
Jisos kehm seenge bo too, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Jia, nne nehm ma lim. Wo, goji Esowo ejum ajehng ajehng riidem.”
Owo Pita kehm bungu re, “Nyehn ana e ma yake nsol kpee kp-a toono. Ejum aji e bahke bele?”

Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ngare nyi Mmon no nne bahke jehke go eti etul ji ellub ene, ngare nyio nyi nsol kpee ma yaange, jol nyi nfenfe, owo wahn jia ji jo toon-m ḿ bahke tob ji go ewubu a nti etul ebal, fere lam ewubu etꞌtohngo ebbal bi Israel.

Nne awohng awohng no lꞌyake etahk eje, yake abonanyehn, yake nde, yake nnyehn, yake abon ebe, fere yake egbe eje tib go esi mbing enyame, á bahke bele budu nkpel atahl alon, fere bel elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
Ane gbalee ba li agbokombang bahke fere jol akahlenjahm. Akahlenjahm bahke fere jol agbokombang.
“Etul bi Esowo li ana nfono egbe no tahme no efungfu atv atv, song lak ane egbe eje.
Eji á ma lam are ane bao re á bahke kake bo nne awohng awohng nsiring elon elon efung, owo á kehm tubu bo tv go ege egbe re bo song lim eltum.
“Eji ma rehng nkaranka esehmwubu, á kehm jeke are, song nyehn ane bamongo yim no mbol mbol, kil ejumjum lim.
Owo á kehm tongo bo re, ‘Wahn tob songen go egame egbe, wahn song lim eltum. M bahk-n kpiki nob nob ana bo kpo kono elkpiki.’
“Owo bo kehm tahme.
“Nfono egbe noo kehm kpe je ngare efin, fere kpe je go nkaranka era nyi elgung, tob lim ano jang jang.

Eji ma rehng nkaranka elon nyi elgung, á kehm kpe je, song nyehn ane bako yim no mbol mbol, kil ejumjum lim. Owo á kehm tongo bo re, ‘Jen ji wahnge ń yim na yim ana efung kohro kohro, ń kil ejumjum lim?’
“Owo bo kehm-e faange re, ‘Nnene limm, no ma-r lak eltum.’
“Á kehm tongo bo re, ‘Tob songen fvfo go egame egbe, wahn song lim eltum. M bahk-n kpiki nob nob ana bo kpo kono elkpiki.’

“Eji elgung ba no, nfono egbe noo kehm tongo ntubesi a nlokeltum ewe re, ‘Lung aneb eltum ebame, bo ba, wo kpi bo. Gbo mbang bom goji ane ba n gohro ko bo ba, wo kehm gohro kpi ane ba n gbo mbang ko bo.’
“Ane ba bomo eltum nkaranka elon nyi elgung kehm bake, ba ko nsiring elon elon.
Owo ane ba, á gbo mbang lak bo kehm bake. Bo jo tiri re, bo bahke koko akpohko sehnge ane bao. Bo fvfo tob ko nsiring elon elon.
Eji bo ma ko ano, owo bo kehm kehme elmemme tob nfono egbe noo re,
‘Ane baa ba a gohro ko bo ba, bo limi eltum awa anyehng nya nya, wobkpi bo jang jang ana a kpi-r no, wahr ji ma nyehn erem go nfuba njul nyia efung kohro kohro.’
“Owo nfono egbe kehm faange nne awohng re, ‘Mbi, wa n nehmem na. Nsiring elon sang wuku e lame area?
Ko akpohko enya, wo song a nya! Anv, lꞌkor-m re me n ka ane ba gohro ba ekahlenjahm ana n ka-a no,
anv, akpohko enyame sang n kpꞌkoko lim ana kor-m noa? Anv, a kpꞌmemme tib eji m ma wehr aboa?’ ”
Jisos kehm gohro bung re, “Akahlenjahm bahke gboko mbang, agbokombang fere kahle njahm.
Eji Jisos jo tahm go Jerusalem, ngare nyi bo li go mbang, á kehm koko abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal, tahm a bo go nkpohko anyehng, song tong bo re,
“Nyehnen, anv, e kpꞌtahme go Jerusalem. Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e yake, kak atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm go ebo. Bo bahke lame elam ji bo bahk-e wulu,
fere yak-e, kak ane baka baka go ebo, ba bahk-e nyoko, fere dv-e, kum-e go ekros. Lꞌkang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv.”
Nkal a Sibidi kehm koko abon ebe Jon, a Jems, ba a bo goji Jisos, kehm ba gong go ege alata, kehm-e gboongo re, á lub lim ejum ka-e.
Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji a kpꞌsebe me?”
Á kehm-e faange re, “Ka abon ebame baa na abal nsahm, eji noko lꞌji go ega ejang eboblum, noko go ega ejang ebobkal ngare nyi a ma jol ntul.”
Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Ń nehme kahn ji ń kpꞌbꞌbahb. Anv, ḿ bahke ma wo go nkob nyi n yahke ba elwoka?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Ee, e bahke ma wo.”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, ḿ bahke lohko wo go egama nkob.
Abatꞌtoono bako na ewubu wuku kan ano, atahng kehm rake bo tob Jon, a Jems.
Owo Jisos kehm lungu bo tv elne, kehm bungu re, “Ń kpꞌkahne re, atubesi ba njini nyia kpi nsahm nyi bo kpo fili ane. Ajꞌjok ane kpo tob fili ane.
Wahn, kana jo lim ano go egahne ellong. Nne awohng awohng ewahne no lꞌseb re á jol njꞌjoka nne, á bahke jolo na nlokeltum ewahne.
Nne awohng awohng ewahne no lꞌseb re á jol ntubesi, á bahke fere jol na nlokeltum ewahne,
ana Mmon no nne ki ba re bo lok-e, á ba re á ba loko, fere ka elkpin ene, fak ane gbalee yake.”
Eji bo jo tahm go Jeriko asongo, ellong ane gbalee kehm tahme toono Jisos.
Awakamahr na abal ji o nkpe a mbang. Eji bo wuku re, Jisos kpꞌbake elsehnge, bo kehm kehme elrabe re, “Mmon no Devid, nong, wahr fil-a ndon!”
Ellong ane bao kehm sahde bo re bo rahke ewok. Bo jo kpe nyennge na rabe re, “Mmon no Devid, nong, wahr fil-a ndon, nsoo!”
Jisos kehm yiimi, lung bo re bo ba. Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Ń kpꞌsebe re me n lim jen ka-n?”
Owo bo kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, lub lenng-r amahr enyahre!”
Owo Jisos ndon kehm-e fili. Á kehm song kooro bo abo go amahr, bo kehm soro nyehn tvtv, soro tahm toon-e.
