Eji bo ma kabbe Jerusalem, bo kehm ba rehng go Betfage ji jolo go nnahb ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv. Owo Jisos kehm yehke abatꞌtoono ebe, ane na abal,
kehm tongo bo re, “Songen ejahbe ji li-n o mbuksong. Owo ḿ bahke nyehne mbvankang nyi bo kahn-e go eti, a mmon ewe. Fanngen bo, wahn ko bo ba ka-m.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌbahb-n ejum bade ebvnkang bio, tongen ye re, ‘Nsoo kpꞌsebe bo,’ nfono ebvnkang bio bahke yake bo elwaare ka.”
Nsol nyia limi, eji lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi ana nnyehnamahr Esowo bungu no re,
“Tong Sayon re,
Nyehnen,
ntul ewahne kpꞌbake go egahne.
Á li soom,
á kun go mbvankang.
Á kun go mmon a nnyam no kpo sol nsol.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm tahme, song lim ana Jisos tongo bo.
Bo kehm koko mbvankang nyio, a mmon ba a bo, yehke awobo ebo, kunu go bo a njahm, Jisos kehm wahre, kuumu mmon a mbvankang noo.
Ellong ane gbalee kehm yehke awobo ebo, yal go mbang. Ane bandiki song ja amang, jo ba yal go mbang.
Ellong ane ba gbo Jisos mbang, a ellong ane ba jo toon-e njahm kehm kehme elrabe re,
“Tehken mmon no Devid!
Elfuulu li ka nne no kpꞌbake go mbing nyi Ntul Esowo.
Tehken Esowo bi li go ero!”
Eji Jisos yele go nla Jerusalem, edi kehm kehme elvvrv na vvrv. Ane kehm kehme elbahbe re, “Nne awo ona?”
Owo ellong ane bao kehm jo bung re, “Jisos wo ana, ji li nnyehnamahr. Á lohng go Nasaret nyi Galili.”
Jisos kehm yange go etahk Esowo, song kam ane ba jo gungu, a ane ba jo gunu, fere gbul akpꞌkuru nya abayaangakpohko tuubu go, a nti nyi abagungumbehl.
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, ‘Etahk ejame, bo bahke jo lung re, etahk ero akake.’ Wahn ebfere rod, bum ana ebehre awajv.”
Awakamahr ane, a abanne kehm bake, ba kpir-e go etahk Esowo jio. Á lim bo, bo nob.
Eji atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm nyehn akpokosi nya á limi no, fere wuk abonse kpꞌrabe go etahk Esowo jio re, “Tehken mmon no Devid!”
Owo bo kehm tongo Jisos re, “Wobwuk ana bo kpꞌraba?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ee, n kpꞌwuku. Wo, ń ka tiki lung edi nwer Esowo ji bungu re,
“ ‘Esowo ebko anyo abonse,
a nya abonbili, lim,
eji lꞌjol ejum eltehke ka yefono antahnga?’ ”
Jisos kehm tahme bo sa, song rehng go Betani, fere kang o.
Efungfu atv atv eji Jisos feere asongo go Jerusalem, njal kehm-e yame.
Á kehm nyehne eti ji bo kpo lung re efig go nkpe a mbang. Á jeere kan kohlo o me, á nyehnem nkab anyehng anyehng, sehngem anyane nya nya á nyehne no.
Eji abatꞌtoono ebe nyehne ano, kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm bungu re, “Jen ji wahnge eti jia ma tahr kpꞌkpo elwaare elwaare anae?”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ń lꞌtaame, kꞌjo faabe, ḿ bahke jo lim ana m ma lim eti jia, jol sꞌsehnge na ana.
Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌbahb go egahne ero bi ń kpꞌkake, ń lꞌtaame, ḿ bahke bele.”
Jisos kehm feere go etahk Esowo.
Eji á jo tib, atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam kehm bake, ba kpir-e, kehm-e bahbe re, “Nsahm anyi a kpi no, nyi wahnge a kpo lim nsol ana nyia? Nne awo ka-a nsahm ana nyio?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “M bahk-n tob bahb mbahbe fvfo. Ń lꞌfaang-m, n kehm-n tongo bada nsahm nyi n kpi no, nyi wahnge n kpo lim nsol ana nyia.
Anv, nsahm nyi Jon jo wohngo ane alahb lohng go ejahbetul Esowo baa, afi lohng goji ane?”
Bo kehm kehme eltoobo atemtem re, “E lꞌbung re, ‘Nsahm nyi Jon lohng go ejahbetul Esowo’, á bahk-r bahbe re, ‘Jen ji wahnge ń ki taame tv Jon?’
E lꞌfere bung re, ‘Nsahm enye lohng goji ane’, ma ane bahk-r limi ejum nji. Tibre e kpꞌfahle bo, tib eji bo kpee jo bum Jon ana nnyehnamahr.”
Owo bo kehm faange Jisos re, “Wahr nehme kahn.”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Fvfo, wahn n nehm tong bada nsahm nyi n kpi no, nyi n kpo ko, lim nsol nyia.
“Anv ń kpꞌtiri renan bade elgan nia? Nne jolo go, no bele abon na abal. Owo á kehm jeke goji ngbokambang a mmon, kehm song tong-e re, ‘Mmon ewame, song lela go egame egbe, wo song lim eltum.’
“Mmon noo kehm faange re, ‘N nehm je.’ Ji kan mmokidi, á kehm yaange ntir atahng enye, fere tahm egbe nde.
“Owo nde kehm kpe je, song kpiri mmon noko, kehm-e tob tong ano fvfo. Á kehm taame re, ‘Ee nsoo.’ Jol egbe á tikem je.
“Nne awo go abon abal bao limi ji nde tong-e re á lim?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “Ngbokambang a mmon wo.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Abakokatak, a abajenasꞌsa ba bahke song yel go ejahbetul Esowo,
Tibre Jon ji nwohngalahb ba, ba tib-n mbang nyi nno, nyi elsehnge, ń tikem taame tv-e. Abakokatak, a abajenasꞌsa ba taame no tv-e.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Wuken elgan nehko! Nne jolo go, no bahme avain, fere kak ega sennge.
“Eji ngare nyi bo kpo bong akab nti nyao ma kabbe, owo á kehm tumu alokeltum ebe tv ane ba á yaame bo etahngga eje, eji bo lꞌsong ko akab nti enye, ba ka-e.
Abayaame etahngga kehm bobo alokeltum ebe. Noko, bo dv-e, noko, bo wul-e, fere tuubu noko atal, á kpo.
“Owo nfono etahngga kehm kpe tum alokeltum bako gbalee, sehnge ba á gbo mbang tum. Abayaame etahngga tob limi bo jang jang ana bo limi ane bako.
“Esꞌkohro, á gohro tum mmon ewe tv bo. Á bungu re, ‘Bo bahke kake mmon ewame.’
“Eji abayaame etahngga bao nyehne mmon ewe noo kpꞌbake, bo kehm bungu atemtem re, ‘Ye wo li nlehkelkv, nong, wahr song wulen ye, eji etahngga jia lꞌfere jol jꞌjahre.’
Bo kehm-e bobo, ro njahm etahngga nyehko, fere song wul-e.
Anv, nfono etahngga lꞌba, á bahke limi abayaame etahngga bao renan?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Á bahke wulu abi ane bao, bo kpo esabsab elkv, fere yaame ane bako etahngga jio, ba bahke jo ka-e akab nti nyao go ngare nyi nno.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Ń ka tiki lung a lung edi nwer Esowo jia re,
“ ‘Eltal ni asehketahk tene no,
ni ni ma fere jol nnahb ekahma?
Ntul Esowo limi jia ji li nkpokosi go egahra ntim.’
“Owo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, Esowo bahk-n taare etul ebe, faake a bi, ka ane ba bahk-e kake akab nti go ngare nyi nno.
“Nne no lꞌfooro gbo eltal nio, á bahke banne.
Wo, nne no eltal nio lꞌgbo nyed-e á bahke rere na rere kpee.”
Atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi wuku kan ngaane enye, bo kehm soro kahn tvtv re, á jo bungu bada bo.
Bo kehm gare ana bo bahk-e bobo. Bo jo fahle ellong ane ba jo bum Jisos ana nnyehnamahr.
Jisos kehm kpe tub bo elgan nehko re,
“Etul bi Esowo li ana ntul no toobo ebjing bi elkak elbal, ni mmon ewe yahke ko nkal.
Á kehm tumu alokeltum ebe re, bo song tong ane ba á tiingi bo elkak re bo ba.

Á kehm kpe yehke alokeltum bako, kehm tongo bo re, ‘Songen, wahn song tong ane ba n tiingi bo elkak re, Me n toobo ejum ajehng ajehng kpee bum. Bobwul efong ebame, a atohkondi nya m ma le bo, bo ma jok. Baan go elkak elbal!’
“Ane ba bo tiingi bo elkak, elkak nio lubem bo. Bo tahme na go bo alimi nsol. Noko tahme go ege egbe, noko tahm go ege a nju are.
Egom ane bako bobo alokeltum ntul noo, nohk bo, fere wul bo.
“Ntul, atahng rak-e sehng. Á kehm tumu nsoja enye, bo song wul awulane bao, fere jahm ejahbe ebo fi.
Owo á kehm tongo alokeltum ebe re, ‘Nsol elkak kpee, me n toobo bum. Ane ba n tiingi bo, bo kpeem fuumu.
Songen go ayaame mbang! Nne awohng awohng no ń lꞌnyehn-e, tongen ye, á ba go elkak elbal.’
“Alokeltum bao kehm tahme, jo yannge. Nne awohng awohng no bo nyehn-e no, lꞌkor-e, bo ko-e tahm a ne go elkak. Ane bandiki jolo abi ane,
“Owo ntul kehm tahme re á song nyehn ane ba jo li nsol. Á kehm nyehne nne no kake ewobo ji ki fuumu elkak elbal nio.
Ntul kehm-e bahbe re, ‘Mbi, a limi renan, kehm yele a, kꞌkak ewobo ji fuumu elkak nia?’
“Nne noo belle na belle eje.
“Owo ntul kehm tongo alokeltum ebe re, ‘Boben ye, wahn gba-e alehke go abo, a akpade akpade, fere ro-e tv go elatahk, edi ejannge jio ji ane kpo woomo, jo ling, fere jo kono amahn go esi.’
“Tibre ane gbalee ba bo tiingi no. Abon amohk ane abik abik ba bo ma jak.”
Bab Farisi kehm tahme, song toobo ana bo bahk-e bobo go ege alum nnyo.

Bo kehm tumu abatꞌtoono ebo, a aneb ntul a Herod tv goji Jisos. Bo kehm song bahb-e re, “Ntꞌtibi, e kpꞌkahne re, wo etingi nne ji. A kpo tib mbang nyi Esowo go etingitingi. A kpehme rang nnene. Jol esamahr ane, a kpehme be.
Tong-r ana a kpꞌtiri bade ejum jia. Nꞌnob re wahr jo tahb etak ka ntul a Roma, afi nobem?”
Jisos kꞌkahn ebi ntir atahng ebo, owo á kehm faange re, “Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Jen ji wahnge ń kp-m gare?
Tib-m wahn akpohko nya ḿ bahke koko tahb etak.” Bo kehm koko ba a nya.
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Esi jia ji nyehne ji? Mbing nyia nyi nyehne nyi?”
Bo kehm faange re, “Esi jia ji ntul ji. Mbing nyia nyi ntul nyi.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Kaan ntul ji li ka ntul,
Eji bo wuku ano, kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm-e yaame sa, tahm ebo.
Efung bꞌnehm ona, egom Sadusi jindiki kehm bake ba kpiri Jisos. Bo ba kpo tib re, elnyahme go elkv limm.
“Ntꞌtibi, Moses bungu re, ‘Nne lꞌkpo, eji á ki jel abon, mmonannyehn nkvne ko nnenkal noo, eji á lꞌjel abon ka mmonannyehn no ma kpo.’
“Abonanyehn na asehma ba jolo a nahre. Ngbokambang ko nkal, mmon awohng awohng á jelem, á kehm kpoko, nkal ewe sa.
Ano wo tob lim etoono mmonannyehn, a mmonannyehn noko no toono noo, a erik abonanyehn bako kpee.
Esꞌkohro, nnenkal noo tob kpo.
Anv, efung bi ane lꞌnyahme go elkv, nne awo á bahke jolo nkal ewe? Tibre bo ane kpee ko-e ana nkal abo.”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ń kpo soodo, tibre ń nehme kahn nwer Esowo, a nsahm nyi Esowo.
Ngare nyi ane ma nyahme go elkv, bo bahke jolo ana babenjel. Aneblum nehm kpe jo ko akal. Anebkal nehm kpe jo bal alum.
Bade elnyahme ngubjing go elkv, ń ka lung alung ana Esowo tong-n no re,
‘Me wo li Esowo bi Ebraham,
Eji ellong ane bao wuku ana á jo tib, kpo bo esi sehng.
Eji Bab Farisi wuku re, Jisos ebga aneb Sadusi, bobbelle, bo kehm song kono edi ajehng.
Nne awohng go bo ellong no jolo ntꞌtibi no atahm kehm bake ba bahb Jisos mbahbe, jo gar-e. Á bahb-e re,
“Ntꞌtibi, ntahm anyi ga gbal kpee go egahre atahm?”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “ ‘Esowo, ntul ewa bahke jo kor-a eltim eltim ena, etohko etohko eja, a ntir a ntir enya.’
A wo li ngbokambang a ntahm nyi ga gbal.
Etoono ntahm tob li na li ana nyio o, nyi li re, ‘Nne ebjing ewa jo kor-a ana ebjing eba.’
Atahm nya Moses kpee, a eltibi ni abanyehnamahr tohk ntahm ebal nyia.”
Ngare nyi Bab Farisi ba kono edi ajehng, Jisos kehm bahbe bo mbahbe re,
“Anv, ń kpo tir renan bada Mesaya? Ye mmon a nyehne wo?”
Owo bo kehm-e faange re, “Mmon a Devid wo.”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Jen ji wahnge Devid lungu Mesaya re, ‘Ntul ewame’, eji Etingi Etohko mehl-e no, á bungu re,
“ ‘Ntul Esowo tongo ntul ewame re,
Ji go egame ejang eboblum
tete me n lim anebekv eba etikunakpade eja.’
“Yefono Devid jo lung-e re, ‘Ntul ewame’, bahke limi renan, ntul noo kehm fere jol mmon ewe?”
Nnene jolem, no male elfaange Jisos ellum anehng anehng. Bomo efung bio asongo nnene kpeem jo sahb, bahb-e mbahbe.
Jisos kehm tongo ellong ane bao, a abatꞌtoono ebe re,
“Atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi ebko nji nyi Moses.
Jo bumen ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo lꞌtong-n, wahn fere jo lim. Kana jo toono eljini ni bo! Tibre bo kpehme lim ji bo kpo bung.
“Bo kpo tuuru alublub nsol, nya kpo riidi go elsolo, rod si ane. Jol bofono antahng bo kpehme gare elmehle.

Bo kpo lim ejum ajehng ajehng, eji ane lꞌjo nyehn bo. Nyehnen ana awer nya bo kpo kahn go bo abuk, a abo abo kpꞌkpange, nya bo nyono adi nwer Esowo! Nyehnen ana asohk nya bo tohko go asꞌsili akpawobo ebo kpꞌlabe!
Go elkak, kpo kor bo re, bo ji adi nya fuumu re ajꞌjok ane ji.
Go are, kpo kor bo re, ane jo gong kak bo nnyo, fere jo lung bo re atꞌtibi.
“Nong, ane ki-n jo lung re atꞌtibi. Tibre nne awohng wo wo li ntꞌtibi ewahne. Wahn kpee abonanyehn ba.
Kana jo lung nne awohng awohng go njini nyia re Nso ejahne. Tibre nne awohng wo wo li Nso ejahne, ye jio ji li go ejahbetul.
Nong, ane ki-n jo lung re atubesi. Tibre nne awohng wo wo li ntubesi ewahne, ye ji li Mesaya.
“Nne no lꞌga gbal go egahne ellong, ye wo bahke jolo nlokeltum ewahne.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌmehl elne wahre, bo bahk-e rede na. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌrede elne, bo bahk-e mehle wahre.
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Ń kpo bam ejahbetul Esowo tv ane.

“Eyuu a nahne, wahn atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Ń kpo nehm akalebun, taare ntahk ebo. Eyaame jehko, ń kpo kak alaabe aro, jo tib elnahne. Tib esi jio ji bahke wahnge elam ejahne sahb gbꞌgbal!

“Eyuu a nahne, wahn atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Ń kpo yannge go njini kpee, jo siiri agburu aya, eji ń lꞌlub were nne awohng, á fere yel-n. Ń lꞌting nne, ń rod-e, lim mmon ellulagun no sahb sꞌsab sehnge wahnfono antahng.

“Eyuu a nahne, wahn awakamahr ane ba kpo tib ane mbang! Ń kpo tib re, ‘Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtir etahk Esowo, ejumjum limm. Wo, nne no lꞌfere tir agul nya li go etahk Esowo, á bahke tiki lim, nehm tiki kane.’
Wahn agboolo awakamahr ba! Anv, ejum aji ga gbal, agul, afi etahk Esowo ji wahnge agul nyao li saang?
Ń kpo kpe tib re, ‘Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtir edi njom alimi, ejumjum limm. Wo, nne no lꞌfere tir ejum njom ji kun edi njom alimi jio, á bahke tiki lim, nehm kane.’
“Wahn agboolo awakamahr ba! Anv, ejum aji ga gbal, ejum njom, afi edi njom alimi ji wahnge ejum njom li saang?
Fvfo, nne lꞌtir edi njom alimi, yebtir edi njom alimi jio, a nsol njom kpee nyi kun o.
Nne no lꞌtir etahk Esowo, yebtir etahk Esowo, a Esowo bi lene o.
Nne no lꞌtir ejahbetul Esowo, yebtir eti etul ji Esowo, a nne no jehk o.
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Ń kpo ka eltahme go abon asahkesahke nsol ana nkambe, nfehne, a abehne, fere gbake alahmlahm nsol ana elam,
“Wahn awakamahr ane ba kpo tib ane mbang ba! Ń kpo yehke nnyamnyame go egahne alahb elwoko, fere mele ekamel!
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Tibre ń kpo ru njahm a nkob, a njahm ekpingi. Go atahng, nsol ejv ebrur, a nsol nyi ń kpo lahm ane bako etong.
Wo nwakamahr a nne a Farisi wo! Gbo mbang ru atahng nkob, a atahng ekpingi, eji njahm lꞌtob bar.
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn li ana alahm nya bo ma taame efem go njahm elatahk, ma nob. Go atahng, akahb akvne nya ma rur, a nsol eltehb.
Ana wo fvfo ń tob li. Go njahm elatahk ń kpo jol nne awohng awohng, are ń li nob nob. Go atahng, abꞌbi nya ma rur, a afahnge afahnge.
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Farisis! Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Wahn ba kake alahm nya abanyehnamahr Esowo, fere liibi alahm nya atingitingi ane,
fere jo bung re, ‘Li re e jolo ngare nyi babnso ejahre, kehn, e jolem limi ana bo limi no, fere wul abanyehnamahr Esowo.’
Wahnfono antahng ebyiimi ntianse re wahn ba li abon ba ane ba wulu abanyehnamahr.
Wahn ebba soro asi, kpꞌgohro lim ji babnso ejahne limi no sa.
“Wahn enyo bia, wahn abon akumbad baa, ḿ bahke ma for renan go elam ji bo bahk-n lame, kim ebi ka-n, fere kak-n go ellulagun?

Owo wahng ka m bahke tumu abanyehnamahr tv-n, fere tum akahnkahn ane, fere tum atꞌtibi. Egom jindiki, ḿ bahke wulu bo, jindiki, ń kum bo lake go akros, jindiki, ḿ bahke jo dv bo go egahna ntahk ero, fere jo kam bo yannge ajahbe ajahbe ajahbe,

eji ń lꞌli ebi tib go atingitingi ane ba bo wulu bo go njini kpee, bomo goji Ebel ji jolo etingi nne tete ba rehng goji Sekaraya ji jolo mmon a Barakaya, ye ji ń wul-e no go elka elka ni etahk Esowo, a edi njom alimi.
“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane ba li anv bahke lehke ebi tib go nsol nyio kpee.

“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Wahn ba kpꞌwulu abanyehnamahr Esowo, fere tuubu ane ba Esowo tumu bo tv-n atal. Nkpel tvv n jo gare re me n lung-n tv elname, ana nkok kpo lung abon ebe tv elne, fere walle bo go ege akpungkpung. Wahn joom kor elbake.
“Etahk ejahne bahke sake nehme nehme.
“N kp-n tongo re, Bomo anv asongo, me n nehm kpe nyehn, tete ngare nyi ḿ bahke bungu re, ‘Elfuulu li ka nne no kpꞌbake go mbing nyi Ntul!’ ”
Jisos kehm lohngo go etahk Esowo jio tahm. Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm bake, ba tib-e ntahk nyi bo si go nlaaga nyi etahk Esowo jolo no.
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Nyehnen ntahk nyia a kpee! Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Jol eltal anehng anehng limm, ni bahke kpe kuumu a ntem.

Eji Jisos song ji go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv, owo abatꞌtoono ebe kehm song kpir-e bo bo, kehm-e bahbe re, “Tong-r ngare nyi ejum jio bahke limi, wo fere tib-r elliingi ni bahke tibi elbake ena ni a bahke bake, a ni esꞌkohro eying jia.”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Kunen ekpu, eji nne awohng awohng lꞌki-n nehm.
Tibre ane gbalee bahke bake go egama mbing, jo ba bung re, ‘Me wo li Mesaya.’ Toono o, bo nehm ane gbalee.
Ḿ bahke kehme elwuku bada nta, fere jo wuk aka nta. Kana jo fahl! Tibre nsol nyia kpee bahke tiki lim, jol o esꞌkohro sang ma rehng na.
Ajahbe nyandiki bahke jo nok atemtem. Ajahbe nyandiki bahke kehme elnoko a atem ajahbe nyako! Njal, a ayam nya kpo sehnge ane, go ndi agbehke bahke jo jol adi adi.
Nsol nyia kpee nyi li mbomannahb erem.
“Ngare nyio nyi bo bahke jo bob-n, song ka re bo kak-n erem, fere wul-n. Ane kpee bahk-n jo ko ekv tib go egama mbing.
Ane gbalee bahke kehme elseele gbo, tibre bo bahke jo jabbe atemtem ka go, fere jo ko atemtem ekv.
“Akimfahnge abanyehnamahr gbalee bahke longo ba, ba nehm ane gbalee.
Owo eji abꞌbi ma tv ano, elkoro ni ane gbalee bahke kehme elmale.
Nne no lꞌyiimi tꞌtahne go mbang nyi Esowo tete rehng go esꞌkohro, ye wo bahke bele eltahre.
Ngare nyi bo ma tiingi nnoobo etib bade etul bi Esowo tong njini kpee ana ejum ntianse, owo esꞌkohro bahke kehm rehnge.
“Ḿ bahke nyehne ‘ejum ji kpꞌsahb sꞌsab, ji bahke rannge edi’, ji nnyehnamahr a Daniel bungu no bade, yim go mbarebare edi.
“Ngare nyio nyi ane ba li go Judea bahke beke, tahm go awong.
Nne no lꞌkuumu go ege ero etahk, á kꞌtohko seb elyele go ekpꞌkpa, song rod ejum fili.
Nne no lꞌjol go ege egbe, á kꞌtohko be, ba etahk, ba rod nsol ebjing enye.
“Eyuu a anebkal ba bahke jolo ela ngare nyio, a anebkal ba kpi abon go ebo.
Kaken ero, eji elbeke enahne ni ḿ bahke beke lꞌkꞌjol ngara nnale, kꞌfere jol efung Esabat.
Tibre erem bio bahke gbale sehng. Jol erem ana bio ka jol a jol ejolojolo bomo eji njini bomo no tete rehng anv. Jol nehm kpe tiki jol ano ejolojolo.
“Tohko jol re Esowo tele afung nyao kahbe, nnene nehm jol no bahke bele eltahre. Tib go esi ji ane ba Esowo ma yehke, owo wahnge Esowo bahke tele afung nyao kahbe.
“Ngare nyio, nne lꞌtong-n re, ‘Nyehnen, Kraist ga!’ afi á tong-n re, ‘Nyehnen Kraist go!’ kana taame tv-e.

Akimfahnge ane bahke lohngo ba, jo ba bung re, Bo ba li Mesaya. Egom jindiki bahke jo bung re, Bo ba li abanyehnamahr Esowo. Bo bahke kehme nliingi tib, fere jo lim akpokosi, eji limi limi kan, bo lꞌnehm aneb Esowo, ba Esowo ma jak.
Kunen ekpu, m ma-n tong jia ana, re ngare kehm rehnge.
“Ane lꞌkehm-n tongo re, ‘Nyehnen, ye go elka emahng!’ kana je go! Bo lꞌfere tong-n re, ‘Nyehnen, ye ga nkimi nyia!’ kana taame tv bo.
Ana emangedu kpo lim, lennge duu, bomo go ero nfam tete rehng go erede nfam, ano wo elbake ni Mmon no nne bahke jolo.
Tibre edi ajehng ajehng ji ekpakv ejum lꞌnoongo, owo ntere bahke jeke song rur.
“Ngare nyi erem bio ma mal,
“njul bahke dvvrv,
ebareka nehm kpe jo ya na eyakeyake.
Alonlo bahke kehme elfooro go elbung gbo.
Atahm nya elbung bahke range.
“Owo ane bahke kehm nyehne elliingi ni Mmon no nne go elbung. Ane kpee ba li go njini bahke kehme ellingi, fere nyehn Mmon no nne kpꞌbake go akparesemsem, a nsahm a nsahm, a egburu ellub.
Owo enjel bahke woro ntang wahre wahre.
“Kpilen ejum go elgan ni li bade eti ji bo kpo lung re efig.
Tob li ka-n fvfo re, ń lꞌnyehn nsol nyio kpꞌlimi, owo ḿ bahke kehm kahne re, ngare ebkabbe kpidi kpidi.
“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane bao ba bahke jolo go elkpin ngare nyio, bo nehm kpo, tete nsol nyio lim kpee.
Elbung abola ndi bahke tane, alum enyame nehm tiki tan.”
“Nnene nehme kahn efung bio, a ngare nyio, jol babenjel ba li go ejahbetul Esowo nehme kahn, jol Mmon nehme kahn, sehngem Nsoo ntahngtahng wo kpꞌkahne.
“Ana jolo go ngare nyi Noa, ano wo fvfo bahke tob jol ngare nyi Mmon no nne bahke bake.
Ana wo jolo no ngare nyi nnyel nyi bulu njini kala yel. Ane bao jo li nsol, fere jo wꞌwo. Aneblum jo ko akal, anebkal jo bal alum tete rehng efung bi Noa yele go egbang.
Tvtv o bo joom kahn ji kpꞌlꞌlim, tete nnyel yel, ba feenge bo kpee, tahm abo.
“Ano wo fvfo bahke tob jol ngare nyi Mmon no nne bahke bake.
Ngare nyio ane abal bahke jolo go egbe, noko, bo bahk-e koko, noko sa.
Anebkal abal bahke jo gok nsol, noko, bo bahk-e koko, noko sa.
“Jo baaben, tibre ń nehme kahn efung bi Ntul ewahne bahke bake.
Ji fuumu re wahn kahn, li re, nfontahk kꞌkahn ngare nyi nwajv bahke bake atv, kehn á jol baabe, á jolem taame re, bo ba lahm etahk eje ye.
Owo fvfo nobo re wahn toobo ebjing kpee. Tibre Mmon no nne bahke gbede na ba ngare nyi ń ki bum re á kpꞌbake.
“Nne awo li ekahnkahn nlokeltum no kpi ekakesehk? Ye wo li nne no nde ma yake alokeltum bako kak go ege ebo re á jo le bo go ngare.
Eyebatahng bahke jolo a nlokeltum noo no nde lꞌba, á bahke ba kpir-e, á kpꞌlimi ano.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nde bahke faake a nsol enye kpee, kak-e go ebo.
“Á lꞌfere jol ebi nlokeltum, á bahke bungu go ege eltim re, ‘Nsoo nehme waka ba.’
Á bahke kehme alokeltum bako dv, fere jo jen a abawokamahm, jo li nsol a bo, fere jo wꞌwo.
Owo nde nlokeltum noo bahke kehnge efung bi á ki ekpu kunu, a ngare nyi á kil kahne.
Nde bahk-e bomo, kiimi akv akv akv, fere rod-e, kak edi ji ane ba kpi alum abal abal wob no. Owo ane bahke woomo, jo ling, fere jo kono amahn go esi.
“Etul bi Esowo bahke jolo ana ngbahme na ewubu nyi rodo atꞌrekahng ebo, tahm re bo song wane nlumanne.
Ngbahme na elon jolo akahnkahn. Ngbahme nyehko na elon jolo agboolo.
Agboolo agbahme nyao rodo atꞌrekahng ebo, akehng bo filem.
Akahnkahn agbahme nyao rodo atꞌrekahng, fere fili akpuma akehng budu.
“Eji nlumanne laange elbake, agbahme nyao kpee kehm kehme amahke lal, soro sa lal.
Nlum atv, nne jo rꞌrabe re, ‘Nyehnen, nlumanne kpꞌbake! Songen, wahn song wan-e!’
“Agbahme nyao kpee kehm mehle, toobo atꞌrekahng ebo bum.
Owo agboolo nyao kehm tongo akahnkahn re, ‘Nyahken akehng emahne ka-r, tibre atꞌrekahng enyahre yahke lahme.’
“Owo akahnkahn kehm faange bo re, ‘Akehng maa nehm biingi rehng egahne. Songen goji abajenare, wahn song gunu antahng.’
“Eji bo tahme no re bo song gunu akehng, nlumanne kehm bake. Ane bao ba toobo ebjing kehm tahme toon-e, song rehng go elkak elbal. Bo kehm bame mbu.
“Ji kan a, agbahme nyako kehm tob ba, ba kehme elbungu re, ‘Nsoo, nsoo, lenng-r mbu!’
“Owo á kehm faange bo re, ‘Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Wahn n nehme kahn!’ ”
Jisos kehm gohro bung re, “Jo kunen ekpu, tibre n nehme kahn efung, a ngare nyi Mmon no nne bahke bake.
“Etul bi Esowo bahke jolo ana nne no yahke ba eltahme eljen. Á kehm lungu alokeltum ebe, yake nsol enye, kak go bo abo.
Á ka nne awohng awohng ana á bahke ma lim. Noko, á ka-e ekpa akpohko eblon, noko, ekpa akpohko ebbal, noko ajehng, kehm soro tahm eje.
Nne no ko ekpa akpohko eblon kehm soro tahm, song jen are, li nsehng go ekpa akpohko eblon.
Ano wo nne no ko ekpa ebbal tob li nsehng ekpa ebbal fvfo.
Nne no ko ekpa ajehng kehm song rahm elbing, rod akpohko nde, kak o behr.
“Eji ma sahb kꞌkang, nde alokeltum bao kehm kehnge, kehm ba tong alokeltum ebe re, bo ba toobo akpohko enye ka-e.
“Nlokeltum no ko ekpa akpohko eblon kehm koko ekpa akpohko eblon behko budu, ba a bi, kehm bungu re, ‘Nsoo, a ka-m ekpa akpohko eblon, nyehn ekpa akpohko eblon behka gana bi m ma li nsehng.’
“Owo nde kehm-e tongo re, ‘Woblim sehng, nkakesehk a nlokeltum no nno. Eji a bele ekakesehk go abonsꞌsohko abon nsol, m bahke yake agburu nsol, kak-a go ebo.
“Nne no ko ekpa akpohko ebbal kehm tob ba, ba bung re, ‘Nsoo, a ka-m ekpa akpohko ebbal, nyehn ekpa ebbal behka bi m ma li nsehng.’

“Owo nde kehm-e tongo re, ‘Woblim sehng, nkakesehk a nlokeltum no nno. Eji a bele ekakesehk go abonsꞌsohko abon nsol, m bahke yake agburu nsol, kak-a go ebo. Ba yel ga, wo bel eyebatahng ana n kpi no.’
“Nne no ko ekpa akpohko ajehng kehm tob ba, ba bung re, ‘Nsoo, n kpꞌkahne re, wo ebibbib nne ji. Á kpo kpa ji a ki bahm, fere fv nya a ki kak.
N jo fꞌfahl, owo n kehm tahme song behr akpohko enya go ndi. Nyehn nyanya ana.’
“Owo nde kehm-e faange re, ‘Wo ebi nlokeltum wo, no ma gbo ewon. Á kꞌkahn re, n kpo kpa ji n ki bahm, fere fv nya n ki kak.
Kehn nde, a jol kake abajenare akpohko enyame, n lꞌba, m ba ko, fere ko nsehng budu.
Taaren ye ekpa akpohko jio, wahn ka nne no kpi ekpa ebwubu.
“ ‘Tibre nne awohng awohng no kpi no, bo bahk-e kake na budu, á bel gbalee. Nne no ki kpi, jol ntiil ana á kpi no, bo bahk-e taare na.
Roden edemme nlokeltum noa, ro tv elatahk edi ejannge. Owo nne bahke woomo, jo ling, fere jo kono amahn go esi.’
“Ngare nyi Mmon no nne bahke bake go ege ellub, a enjel kpee, á bahke jehke go eti etul jio ji ellub ene.
Ane ba li go njini kpee, bo bahke koko bo, ba yiimi go ege esamahr. Owo á bahke kehm yabe bo ana mbaabebul kpo yab ejoro, bum eje eje, ebulbaange jol eje eje.
Á bahke rodo ejoro, bum ege ejang eboblum, fere rod ebulbaange, bum ege ejang ebobkal.
Owo ntul bahke kehm tongo ane ba yiim-e go ege ejang eboblum re, ‘Baan, wahn jia ji Nsoo ma-n fuulu! Baan, wahn ba li etul bi Esowo ma toobo bum-n, bi lohng eji njini bomo na bom.
Tibre njal jo yam-m yam, ń jo ka-m, n li. Alahb kor-m kor, ń ka-m, n wo. N yel-n ejen, ń vvr-m.
N jolo ebun ebun, ń ka-m, m bobo. N jo yꞌyam, ḿ ba, ba nyehn-m. N woomo go ngbekobo, ḿ ba, ba nyehn-m.’
“Owo atingitingi ane bao bahk-e kehm faange re, ‘Ntul, ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, njal ma-a yam, e ka-a, a li? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, alahb ma-a kor, e ka-a, a wo?
Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no ana njenne, e kehm-a vvrv?
Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, a kpꞌyame, jol go ngbekobo, e kehm ba nyehn-a?’
“Owo ntul noo bahke kehm faange bo re, ‘Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi ń jo lim ano ka nne awohng no sahb rꞌrede go ellong abonanee ba li a, ń jo limi ka me.’
“Owo á bahke kehm tongo ane ba yiim-e go ege ejang ebobkal re, ‘Fak-m wahn go esamahr, wahn ji Esowo ma-n su. Songen go ellulagun ni li go njinanjini, ni bo ma toobo bum nnehm, a enjel enye.
Tibre njal yam-m yam, me ń kaam, n li. Alahb kor-m kor, me ń kaam, n wo.
N yel-n ejen, me ń vvrem. N jolo ebun ebun, me ń kaam, m bobo. N jo yꞌyam, fere woomo go ngbekobo, ḿ baam, ba nyehn-m.’

“Owo bofono bahke tob faange re, ‘Ntul, ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, njal kp-a yame, alahb jo kor-a? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no ana njenne? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no ebun ebun? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, a kpꞌyame? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a no, a wob go ngbekobo? Ntahn wo e nyehn-a ano, ki-a kak ebo?’
“Owo á bahke kehm faange bo re, ‘Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi ń ki jo lim ano ka nne awohng no sahb rꞌrede go ellong abonanee ba li a, ń limem ka me.’
“Ane baa bahke song yel go edi erem, jo nyehn erem o go njinanjini. Atingitingi ane bahke bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini.”
Eji Jisos ma bung alum nyaa kpee mal, á kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re,
“Ń kpꞌkahne re, lela ebsa nfung ebal, elkak Pasova rehng. Efung bio bi bo bahke jabbe Mmon no nne ka re bo kum-e go ekros.”
Owo atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam kehm song kono go nlaaga ntubesi abalimajom no bo jo lung-e re Kayafas.
Owo bo toobo no ana bo bahke bobo Jisos mbehr mbehr, song wul.
Bo jo bungu re, “Nong, wahr kꞌlim ngare elkak, eji lꞌkꞌgbo ntong.”
Eji Jisos jolo go Betani go etahk Saimon ji nne abili,
nnenkal awohng kehm bake go ege, no fili elom akehng ji nno a nno, ji sahb kꞌkim ekun. Á kehm yaange akehng mao, kak-e go esi ngare nyi á jehk go ekpꞌkuru kpi nsol li.
Eji abatꞌtoono ebe nyehne ano, atahng kehm rake bo. Bo kehm bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge á kpꞌfade akehng ana maa?
Kehn akehng maa bo jol gungu, ko akpohko gbalee, fere ko, ka akpak.”
Jisos sebe kan kahn ana bo jo bung, á kehm tongo bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌgbiingi mmonankal noa? Yeblim nnoobo ka-m.
Akpak li a nahne ngare anyehng anyehng, wo, me n limm a nahne ngare anyehng anyehng.
Tibre eji mmonankal noa wohng-m akehng go egama ngubjing, á toobo ebjing ebame bum, bi m bahke kpoko.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Edi ajehng ajehng go njini kpee, ji bo bahke tiingi nnoobo etib bia, bo bahke tob jo bung jia ji nnenkal noa ma lim, fere jo buum-e.”
Nne awohng go ellong abatꞌtoono Jisos, ewubu ane abal, no bo jo lung-e re Judas Iskariot kehm tahme, song kpiri atubesi abalimajom,
kehm bahbe bo re, “Ejum aji ḿ bahk-m kake, n lꞌjabbe Jisos, kak-n go ebo?”
Bo kehm-e kake mpon esehma.
Bomo ngare nyio asongo, Judas kehm kehme mbang seb ana nyi á bahke jabbe Jisos ka bo.
Ngbokambang efung elkak ni Jus kpo li abred nya bo kil jo kak ayist, abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm ba kpir-e, fere bahb-e re, “Gan wo a kpꞌsebe re wahr song toobo nsol alehke nyi elkak Pasova bum-a?”
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Songen go nla ejahbe goji nne awohng, wahn song tong-e re, ‘Ntꞌtibi re, Ngare enyame ebkabbe. M bahke lehke elkak Pasova, a abatꞌtoono ebame go ega etahk.’ ”
Abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm song toobo nsol elkak Pasova nio bum, ana Jisos tongo bo.
Eji elgung ma ba, Jisos kehm song ji go ekpꞌkuru, jo li nsol, a abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal.
Eji bo jo li nsol o, á kehm bungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng ewahne bahk-m jabbe ka go.”
Ndon kehm fili bo. Bo kehm-e kehme elbahbe. No nne re, “Nsoo, me wo afi?”
Owo á kehm faange bo re, “Nne no kpꞌna tohko ebred eje ekpingi ajehng a name, ye wo li nne no bahk-m jabbe ka.
Mmon no nne bahke kpoko jang jang ana bo nyono bada ne. Eyuu a nne no bahke jabbe Mmon no nne ka.
Judas ji gung-e no kehm bahbe re, “Ntꞌtibi, anv, me woa?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ee, wo wo.”
Eji bo kpi nlehke nlehke nsol, Jisos kehm rodo ebred, kak Esowo saam, fere bakke, ka abatꞌtoono ebe, kehm bungu re, “Koon, wahn li! A wo li ngubjing enyame.”
Owo á kehm rodo nkob, kak Esowo saam, kehm kake bo, kehm bungu re, “Woon, wahn ane kpee!
Tibre a wo li alung emame ma egbanngalung ji nfenfe, ma kpꞌfabe ka ane gbalee, eji bo lꞌbel eltahmeka go bo abiafem.
N kp-n tongo re, N nehm kpe wo alahb avain maa tete efung bio rehng bi m bahke kpe wo a nahne go ejahbetul ji Nsoo.”
Owo bo kehm yimi ese, kehm lohngo tahm go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv.
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Atv maa ḿ bahke dulu tib esi ejame. Tibre bo nyono go nwer Esowo re,
“ ‘M bahke wulu mbaabebul,
ejoro bahke yaame ebo.’
Ngare nyi m ma nyahme, m bahk-n gboko mbang, song rehng go Galili.”
Owo Pita kehm-e faange re, “Afi ane baka kpee dulu na, me, wa n nehm be sa.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-a tongo re, Atv maa, re nkok kehm kuku, a bahke gbaame nkpel era re, me a nehme kahn.”
Pita kehm-e faange re, “Afi elkv ni m bahke kpoko a na, wa n nehm tiki ten.”
Abatꞌtoono bako kpee tob bung ano fvfo.
Owo Jisos kehm koko abatꞌtoono ebe, tahm a bo song rehng go edi ji bo jo lung re Gesemani, kehm tongo bo re, “Jiin ana, tete me n song kak ero o feere.”
Á kehm rodo Pita, a abon abal ba Sibidi, tahm a bo. Ndon kehm-e kehme elfili, ala fere jo teel-e.
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Eltim ename ebjol ndon ndon sehng, rehng go elkv. Jiin a, wahn jo tob-m elbaabe.”
Á kehm reenge je go esꞌsong, song gbo, kohk esamahr ndi, kehm kehme ero kak re, “Nsoo, tohko ga tahne, fak-m nkob erem nyia. Ana koro me sang, ana koro wo wo.”
Á kehm feere ba kpiri abatꞌtoono ebe kpꞌlale, kehm tongo Pita re, “Ḿ maam ji awa anyehng nya nya tob-m elbaaba?
Jo baaben, wahn jo kak ero, eji ń lꞌkꞌyel go elgaare. Etohko, mbang nyi Esowo kp-e koro, wo ga, ngubjing kpꞌleenge.”
Á kehm kpe feere, song kak ero re, “Nsoo, lꞌfere jol nyi m bahke woko go nkob nyia, a tohko fere fak-m nkob nyia go elbohngo, nong, mbang enya lim!”
Eji á kpe feere ba, á kehm kpe ba nyehn bo kpꞌlale. Tibre akpakamahr lubu bo ellu ellu.
Jisos kehm kpe tahm bo sa, kpe song kak ero bꞌnehm.
Á kehm kpe feere ba kpiri abatꞌtoono ebe, kehm tongo bo re, “Ń kpi nlale nlala, fere jo re ekva? Ngare ebkabbe na a, nyi bo bahke jabbe Mmon no nne, kak aneb abiafem go ebo.
Mehlen, wahr tahmen! Nyehnen, nne no bahk-m jabbe ka, ma kabbe a.”

Eji Jisos kpi mbungu mbungu, Judas ji woomo go ellong abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal, kehm ba lohng, a ellong ane gbalee ba fili akahngkahng, a atahmtahm. Atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam ba tumu bo.
Nne no gung-e no tongo ane bao wuku wuku ana bo bahke liingi Jisos. Á tongo bo re, “Nne no n lꞌsod-e nnyo, ye wo, ḿ bahk-e bobo.”
Owo á kehm soro sehng na sehng, song rehng goji Jisos, kehm bungu re, “Ntꞌtibi, n kp-a kake nnyo,” kehm soro sod-e nnyo.
Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Mbi, a ba jen?”
Owo bo kehm bake, ba bob Jisos.
Nne awohng go ellong ane ba jolo a Jisos o kehm wobo ekahngkahng ebe go mbak, kpale nlokeltum a ntubesi abalimajom etung.
Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Feere a ekahngkahng eba, wo kak go mbak! Tibre ane ba kpo nok abohng akahngkahng, bo bahke kpoko elkv akahngkahng.
Anv, a nehme kahn re, n jol ma gboongo Nsoo, á tum sehnge nlong enjel ewubbal re bo ba kak-m eboa?
Wo, lꞌfere jol ano, adi nwer Esowo nya bungu bade elkv ename bahke kehm jolo go etingitingi renan?”
Owo Jisos kehm bungu tong ellong ane bao re, “Anv, ń lohngo ba a akahngkahng, a atahmtahm re wahn ba bob-m ana n li nwajva? Efung abehng abehng n jo ji go etahk Esowo, jo tib-n, me ń tikem bob.
Nyaa kpee limi, eji alum nya abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono no lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kpee kehm-e yaame sa, be ebo tahm.
Ane ba bobo Jisos kehm-e koko, tahm a ne go etahk Kayafas ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom. Owo atꞌtibi ba atahm, a anebkul nfam kono asi.
Jisos jo jene ekv. Pita jen ekv, á kehm ba rehng go nlaaga ntubesi abalimajom, kehm song ji a alokeltum nfontahk, eji á lꞌnyehn ji bahke jolo.
Atubesi abalimajom, anebkul nfam, a atul esub jo sebe mbang ana nyi bo bahke kiimi afahnge lake Jisos, toono o, bo wul-e.
Bo tikem kahn mbang anyehng anyehng, jol eji akimfahnge atianse gbalee lohngo lohng ba yiimi.
Esꞌkohro, akimfahnge atianse na abal kehm gohro lohng ba yiimi,
fere bung re, “Nne noa tongo re, á bahke ma wa etahk Esowo, fere tuungu si go nfung era.”
Owo ntubesi abalimajom kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bahbe Jisos re, “A nehm faanga? Ejum aji ane baa kpꞌbungu tob-a?”
Jisos belle na eje.
Ntubesi abalimajom kehm-e kpe tong re, “N kpa rehke go esamahr Esowo bi li go elkpin re wo tong-r joare wo Mesaya wo, ji li Mmon no Esowo.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Me wo. N kp-a tongo re, Bomo anv asongo ḿ bahke nyehne Mmon no nne jehk go ejang eboblum bi Esowo bi gbale sehng, ń fere nyehn-e á kpꞌbake go akparesemsem.”
Owo ntubesi abalimajom noo kehm yare ewobo eje, kehm bungu re, “Yebsu Esowo! Ntianse anyehng anyehng e nehme kpe seb. Wahnfono antahng ebwuk abꞌbi alum nya á ma bung.
“Ń tiri renan?” Bo kehm faange re, “Yebli ebi ji fuumu re bo wul-e.”
Bo kehm soko atel wohng-e go ege esamahr, fere dv-e. Egom jindiki jo ruum-e nkpal,
fere jo bung re, “Mesaya, nyehn-r amahr, wo fere tong-r nne no rum-a no.”
Pita ji eje ga elatahk. Nlokeltum awohng no jolo nnenkal kehm lohngo ba rehng go ege, kehm-e tongo re, “Wo fvfo, a tob jolo a Jisos ji Galili.”
Á kehm gbaame go esamahr ane bao kpee re, “N nehme kahn ejum ji a kpꞌbꞌbung.”
Eji Pita ma tahm, song rehng go mbuga, nnenkal noko kehm-e kpe nyehn, kehm tongo ane ba jolo ona re, “Ye jia tob jolo a Jisos ji Nasaret.”
Á kehm kpe gbaame, fere tir re, “Nne noo, we n nehme kahn.”
Eji ma ji mmokidi, ane ba yiimi kohlo o kehm bake ba kpiri Pita, kehm-e tongo re, “Etingitingi, a tob wob go bo ellong. Tibre alum nya a kpꞌbungu, nya nya kpꞌtibi ejahbe ji a lohng no.”
Pita kehm tiri re, “Esowo demm-m na demme. N nehme kahn nne noo.”
Tvtv ona nkok kehm soro kuk.
Pita kehm soro buumu alum nya Jisos tong-e re, “Re nkok kehm kuku, a bahk-m tene nkpel era.” Pita kehm lohngo ona, song kehme ellingi ndon ndon.
Eji efungfu se no, atubesi abalimajom kpee, a anebkul nfam kehm toobo ana bo bahke wulu Jisos.
Eji bo m-e kak agbekobo, bo kehm-e koko, tahm a ne, song yak-e kak Pailet go ebo, ye ji jolo ntubesi ejahbe.
Eji Judas ji gung-e no nyehne re, Jisos ebli ebi, á kehm gboko ndon, fere rod mpon esehma nyio, feere a nyi re á song ka atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam,
kehm bungu tong bo re, “Me n lim abiafem, eji n gungu nne no ki lim ebi ajehng ajehng.”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “O elam ejahre sang, nfem enya nyi go.”
Á kehm saade akpohko nyao, kak go etahk Esowo, kehm tahme eje, song kahn elne ekehd.
Atubesi abalimajom kehm rodo akpohko nyao, fere bung re, “Abi akpohko nyaa, akpohko alung nya. Fuumem re, akpohko nyaa woomo semme a akpohko ayare.”
Bo kehm toobo, rod akpohko nyao, song gunu edi egbe ji jolo ji ntokatu, eji bo lꞌjo kpa ajahmjahm kak edi ndi jio.
Owo wahnge bo kpo lung edi ndi jio re, “Egbe alung”, tete sik anv.
Owo kehm lohko jol go etingitingi ana nnyehnamahr Jeremaya bungu no re, “Bo rodo mpon esehma nyio nyi jolo ekun bi aneb Israel taame re bo ka go ege esi,
song gunu edi egbe ji ntokatu, ana Ntul Esowo tong-m no.”
Jisos kehm song yiimi go esamahr ntubesi ejahbe no bahb-e re, “Wo wo li ntul no Jusa?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ee, me wo.”
Eji atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam jo ka-e ebi, ejumjum á faangem.
Owo Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, a nehme wuk nsol gbalee nyi bo kpꞌbungu tob-aa?”
Jol Jisos we tikem faange.
Ntubesi ejahbe noo kehm-e kpoko esi tete.
Elkak anehng anehng ntubesi ejahbe jo kono elyehke nne a ngbekobo awohng, ka ellong ane, no bo lꞌseb.
Ngare nyio nne awohng woomo ngbekobo, no bo jo lung-e re Barabas. Nnene jolem no ki-e kahn.
Eji bo ba kono edi ajehng, Pailet kehm bahbe bo re, “Nne awo ń kpꞌsebe re me n yehke yake, Barabas, afi Jisos ji bo kpo lung-e re Kraist?”
Tibre á jo kahne kpee re, bo ko-e ba ka-e, tib eji á jo teele bo ala.
Eji Pailet jehk go ege eti elam, nkal ewe kehm tiingi tv-e re, “Ka lak etingi nne jio abo, tibre ye wo wahng ka n nyehne erem gbalee go egama nlem nyi n leeme no lela.”
Atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam kehm kehme ellong ane bao eltim sennge re, bo gboongo Pailet, á yehke Barabas yake, fere wul Jisos.
Ntubesi ejahbe noo kehm bahbe bo re, “Ane abal baa, nne awo ń kpꞌsebe re me n yehke yake?”
Bo kehm faange re, “Barabas wo.”
Pailet kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, me n lim Jisos jen, ye ji bo kpo lung-e re Kraist?”
Bo ane kpee kehm faange re, “Kum-e go ekros!”
Ntubesi ejahbe noo kehm bahbe re, “Anv, ebi aji á ma lim?”
Bo kehm kpe rabe wahre wahre wahre re, “Kum-e go ekros!”

Eji Pailet sebe kahn re, ejumjum kpeem li ji á bahke kpe ma lim, gana ntong yahke gbo, owo á kehm koko alahb, ba ru abo go esamahr ane bao, kehm bungu re, “Elkv ni nne noa bahke kpoko, ebo ebame o wobem, nfem enyahne nyi go.”
Owo ellong ane bao kpee kehm-e faange re, “Nong, alung eme tuun-r, a abon abon ebahre.”
Pailet kehm yehke Barabas ka bo, á for, tong bo dv Jisos, fere yak-e ka re bo song kum-e go ekros.
Owo nsoja nyi ntubesi ejahbe noo kehm rodo Jisos, tahm a ne go nlaaga ntubesi noo, kehm song lung ellong nsoja nehko re bo ba.
Bo kehm-e yehke nsol go ngubjing, fere kak-e mbilibili ekpawobo ana ji atul kpo kono elkake.
Bo kehm tahnge ekpasi akpiri, ba konng-e go esi, fere ka-e ebti, á fili go ege eboblum, kehm jo gbo, jamm-e alahng go ege alata, fere jo nyok-e re, “E kp-a kake nnyo, ntul no Jus.”
Bo kehm jo so atel wohng-e, fere taare ebti bi á fili go ebo, jo rum-e go esi.
Eji bo m-e nyok ano kpee, owo bo kehm-e yehke ekpawobo jio, feere a nsol enye kak-e, ko-e tahm a ne re bo song kum-e go ekros.
Eji bo ma lohng fi, bo kehm song nyehn nne no bo jo lung-e re Saimon ji jolo nne a Sirin. Bo kehm-e bobo re á sol ekros ji Jisos.
Eji bo song rehng go edi ji bo jo lung re Golgota ji lohngo re “edi nkpakesi”,
owo bo kehm-e kake amahm ma bo semme alullul anyane. Eji Jisos wuungu no, á kpeem wo.
Bo kum-e kan a lake go ekros, bo kehm soro kehme elfaange tub, eji bo lꞌmal baange nsol ebjing enye.
Eji bo ma baange nsol nyio, bo kehm jehke o, jo baab-e.
Bo kehm lake ekpakenwer go ero kohlo go ege esi, ji bo nyono ebi ji bo ka-e re, “A WO LI JISOS, NTUL NO JUS.”
Owo bo kehm tob kum awajv abal lake go akros, noko go ege ejang eboblum, noko go ege ejang ebobkal.
Ane ba jo sehng go mbang kehm kehme aromo tuubu, fere jo su-e re,
“Wo sang jo bung re, a bahke wake etahk Esowo, fere tuungu si go nfung eraa? Tahre elna anv me! Lꞌjol re, wo Mmon no Esowo wo, badde go ekros me!”
Atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm, go anebkul nfam tob jo nyok-e ano fvfo re,
“Á kpo tahre ane bako, yefono nehm ma tahre elne! Lꞌjol re ye ntul no Israel wo, nong, á tohko badde go ekros ba, wahr kehm taame tv-e.
Á kpo bum Esowo go etingitingi, nong, Esowo tahr-e me, á lꞌkor-e. Tibre á kpo bung re, ye Mmon Esowo wo.”
Awajv nya bo tob kumu bo ana ye, jo tob su-e ano.
Eji efin ma yiimi, ejannge kehm gboko go ejahbe jio kpee, ji tete biingi awa ara.
Eji ma rehng nkaranka era nyi elgung, Jisos kehm rabe wahre wahre wahre re, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” ji lohngo re, “Nsoo, Nsoo, jen ji wahng ka a ma-m yake ana?”
Ane bandiki ba yiimi o wuk, kehm bungu re, “Á kpi Elaija lung.”
Owo nne awohng kehm soro be eje, song rod ndꞌdahng, suku go evinegar, tung go esi ebti, rod ton-e re á yab.
Egom ane bako kehm bungu re, “Tohken nong, wahr nyehnen, joare Elaija bahke bake, ba tahr-e.”
Jisos kehm kpe rabe wahre wahre wahre, kehm yake etohko eje ka go.
Owo ekpiki ji bo tohko go etahk Esowo kehm soro yang ejang ebbal, bomo go ero tete ba jahm ndi.
Alahm kehm lennge. Aneb Esowo gbalee ba kpo no, kehm nyahme.
Ngare nyi Jisos nyahme go elkv, bo kehm lohngo go alahm, tahm song rehng go Jerusalem. Owo ane gbalee nyehne bo.

Eji ntubesi a nsoja, a nsoja nyehko nyi jo tob baabe Jisos a ne nyehne ana ndi ma gbehke, fere nyehn nsol nyehko nyi kpe lim budu, bo kehm kehme elfahle, fere kehme elbungu re, “Etingitingi, nne noa lohko jol Mmon no Esowo!”
Anebkal gbalee ba lohngo go Galili, ba jo toono Jisos, fere jo kak-e ebo, yiimi ebo go fee, jo nyehn.
Meri ji lohng go Magdala woomo go bo ellong, a Meri nnyehn Jems a Josef, go nnyehn abon Sibidi.
Eji elgung ma ba, efange nne ajehng ji bo jo lung-e re Josef, ji lohng go Arimatia kehm bake. Ye fvfo tob jolo ntꞌtoono no Jisos.
Á kehm tahme song kpiri Pailet, fere gboong-e re á yake ekv ji Jisos ka-e. Pailet kehm tongo re, bo yake ekv eje ka-e.
Josef kehm rodo ekv ji Jisos, kpennge abarebare abomo nya nfenfe,
fere rod, song kak go ege elahm bi bo kpꞌna rahme go ekpartal. Á kehm bannge egburu eltal, bulu go nnyo elahm, kehm tahme eje.
Meri ji lohng go Magdala, a Meri jehko, bo kehm song ji, wane elahm bio.
Etoono efung behko, eji efung ebjing atoobo ma sehng, atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi kehm song kono asi go etahk Pailet,
kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, wahr ebbuumu ana nnehm a nne noo bungu ngare nyi á kpeke li go elkpin re, ‘Nfung era m bahke nyahme go elkv.’

Tum ane, bo song baabe elahm bio tete nfung era nyio biingi, eji abatꞌtoono ebe lꞌkꞌsong v ekv eje, fere jo bung tong ane re, ‘Yebnyahme go elkv’. Tohko jol ano, esꞌkohro enehm bia bahke sabe sehnge bi ngbokambang.”
Owo Pailet kehm bungu re, “Koon abꞌbaabe, wahn song baabe elahm ana ń kahne no.”
Bo kehm tahme, song bum abꞌbaabe o re bo baabe elahm, fere rod elak lake, kak elliingi,
Eji Esabat ma sehng, ngbokambang efung go erahde, efungfu behre behre Meri ji lohng go Magdala, a Meri jehko, bo kehm tahme re, bo song nyehn elahm.
Owo ndi kehm soro kehme elgbehke tete, tibre enjel nyi Ntul Esowo lohngo go ejahbetul Esowo ba, ba bannge eltal nio bum go nkpe, fere ji.
Á jolo are emangedu ji. Nsol nyi á kake go ngubjing jo bare kparaang.
Abꞌbaabe bao fahl-e sehng, fere jo kꞌkahm, bo fere jolo are akvne nya.
Enjel nyio kehm tongo anebkal bao re, “Kana kpe fahl! Tibre n kpꞌkahne re, n kpi Jisos seb, ji bo kum-e go ekros.
Ana á limm, yebnyahme fi, ana á bungu no. Baan, wahn ba nyehn edi ji á noongo no.
Songen anv elwaare, wahn song tong abatꞌtoono ebe re, yebnyahme go elkv. Á bahk-n gboko mbang song rehng go Galili.
Owo bo kehm lohngo go elahm elwaare, elfahle elfahle, a egburu eyebatahng, be re bo song tong abatꞌtoono ebe.
Eji bo fi no re bo song tong abatꞌtoono ebe, owo Jisos kehm ba wane bo, kehm bungu re, “N kp-n kake nnyo.”
Bo kehm jeere kohl-e, jamm-e alahng, jabb-e akpade, fere kak-e.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Kana kpe fahl! Songen, wahn song tong abonanee re,
Eji anebkal bao ma tahm fi, abꞌbaabe elahm bandiki kehm tahme, song rehng go nla ejahbe, song tooro ejum ajehng ajehng ji ma lim, tong atubesi abalimajom.
Atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam kehm song kono edi ajehng, kehm toobo, ka abꞌbaabe elahm bao akpohko gbalee,
kehm bungu re,
“Ana wo ḿ bahke jo bung re, ‘Abatꞌtoono ebe ba atv, ba v nkvne, tahm a ne ngare nyi e jo lal.’
Ntubesi ejahbe lꞌwuk, e bahke song bung a ne, wahn, kana tiiri!”
Abꞌbaabe elahm bao kehm rodo akpohko nyao, song lim ana bo tongo bo. Eka jia, Jus kpi ntubu ntubu, tong atem tete sik anv.
Abatꞌtoono Jisos, ewubu a nne awohng, bo kehm tahme go ewong ajehng ji li go Galili, edi ji Jisos tongo bo re bo je.
Eji bo nyehn-e no, bo kehm gboko, jamm-e alahng, fere kak-e. Egom jindiki jo fꞌfaabe.
Jisos kehm jeere kohlo bo, kehm tongo bo re, “Bo ma-m ka nsahm kpee nyi m bahke jo fili ejahbetul Esowo, fere jo fili njini.
Songen fvfo go njini kpee, wahn song lim ane, bo jol abatꞌtoono ebame go ejahbe ajehng ajehng. Wohngen bo alahb go mbing nyi Nsoo, a Mmon, a Etingi Etohko,
wahn fere tib bo, bo jo bum ejum ajehng ajehng ji m ma-n tong. Buumen re, m bahke jolo a nahne ngare anyehng anyehng tete eying jia mal.”
Mbomannahb a nnoobo etib bi Jisos Kraist Mmon Esowo bi a.
Mahne mahne nnyehnamahr Aisaya nyono go ege a nwer ana Esowo tongo Mmon ewe re,
“M bahke tumu ntiingetib ewame tv re á gbo-a mbang,
ba lennge mbang ka-a.”
“Nne noa, kpꞌrabe go elka emahng re,
‘Tuungen mbang nyi Ntul bahke sehnge,
wahn lim tꞌtor.’ ”
Ane noo bo jo lung-e re Jon, á je go elka emahng, song kehme ane tiingi re, “Gboon ndon go egahne abiafem, wahn bel ewohngalahb, eji Esowo lꞌtahm ka-n go egahne abiafem.”
Ane kpee ba lene o nfam nyio nyi Judea, a ane kpee ba lene go Jerusalem jo lohngo je goji Jon, song fvvrv abiafem ebo, fere bel ewohngalahb go Jodan.
Jon jo kake nsol nyi bo limi go anyar nnyam nyi bo kpo lung re ekamel, fere jo gbaange egbaange ngunyam go ebun. Á jo li agohrobi, fere jo yab akehng ekon.
Á kehm kehme ane tiingi re, “Nne no kpꞌbake go, á li njꞌjoka nne sehnge me. Jol me, n tohkem fꞌfuumu re, me n kehme go ndi fannge alehke akpaketa enye.
Eltum ename li re, me n jo wohng-n alahb maka maka. Ye ji kpꞌbake, bahk-n wohngo alahb go Etingi Etohko.”
Ngare nyio Jisos lohngo go Nasaret ji Galili, ba go Jodan. Jon kehm-e wohngo alahb.
Jisos lohngo kan go alahb me, á kehm nyehne ejahbetul Esowo kpꞌlennge. Etohko ji Esowo kehm lohngo go elfoongo ni ebbehl, badde ba jol a ne.
Á kehm wuku ellum go ejahbetul Esowo ni bungu re, “Wo wo li akor-m mmon ewame no kpo kor-m sꞌsehng.”
Tvtv ona etohko ji Esowo kehm soro rod-e tahm a ne go elka emahng.
Á kange elka emahng nio nfung atahl abal. Owo nnehm gar-e no, re á yel go abiafem. Enyam bi kpo jol emahng jolo ona fvfo. Owo enjel nyi Esowo kehm lohngo ba kak-e ebo.
Ngare nyio, Jon, bo m-e kak go ngbekobo. Jisos kehm tahme song rehng go Galili, song tiingi nnoobo etib bi Esowo.
Á jo bungu re, “Etingitingi, ngare ebrehng.
Eji Jisos jo jen egbuk eto ji Galili, á nyehne abasahre nsahre, ane na abal, Saimon, a Andru ji mmonannyehn Saimon, bo jo kake erim go eto.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Tahmen toon-m wahn! M bahk-n limi, ń nehm kpe bim nsahre, ḿ bahke fere jo bim ane.”
Bo kehm soro yake arim ebo, tahm toono Jisos.
Á kehm jene mmokidi, song kpiri Jems, a Jon ba jolo abon Sibidi. Bo woomo egbang, jo baade arim ebo.
Jisos kehm mahke bo. Bo kehm soro tahm nde ebo, a alokeltum ebe sa go egbang, tahm toono Jisos.
Bo kehm song rehng go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Kapenium. Efung Esabat Jisos kehm ba yel ekpꞌkpa ero kehm kehme eltibi.
Ane ba wuk-e no, kpo bo esi sehng tib go mbang nyi á jo tib. Á jolem ana atꞌtibi baka gana ba atahm. Á jo tibi area, ana nne no kpi nsahm.
Nne no bele ebi etohko go ege atahng kehm soro lohng, ba yel ekpꞌkpa ero jio.

Á kehm rabe tong Jisos re, “Jisos ji Nasaret, a ba jen ko go egahre? A ba re wo ba ranng-ra? N kpꞌkahne elkohn nne no a li no. A li mbarebara nne no Esowo. Ebi ajehng ajehng wa wobem go ega eltim. A lohng goji Esowo ba.”
Jisos kehm rabe tong ebi etohko jio re, “Rahke ewok, wo lohng nne noa!”
Ebi etohko jio limi nne noo, á soro gbo ngbabohngo, fere rabe tiim, kehm soro lohng nne noo.
Ane kpee ba jolo o, kpo bo esi area. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Jen ji jo jol ana? Nkpokosi anyi a? A eltibi ni nfenfe ni! Nne noa kpi nsahm nyi abi atohko kpo wuk-e, á lꞌbung a bo.”
Elgahm ni Jisos kehm yeere na yeere go nfam nyio nyi Galili kpee.
Jisos, Jems, a Jon, bo kehm lohngo go ekpꞌkpa ero jio asongo go etahk ji Pita a Andru lene no.
Saimon, nnyehn nkal ewe noongo edilnong, jo yam arumbum. Jisos rehnge kan a me, bo kehm-e tongo bada nnenkal noo.
Á kehm jeere kohl-e, song jabb-e go ebo, tab-e yiimi. Á soro nob arumbum nyao. Nnenkal noo kehm tahme fvfo, kehme bo loko.
Elgung ba kan a me, ngare nyi njul ma lahm, ane kehm koko aneb ayam kpee, a aneb abi atohko ba goji Jisos.
Ane kpee ba jolo ejahbe jio kehm ba nyo na nyo go mbutahk.
Jisos limi aneb ayam gbalee, bo nob elkohn eyam abehng abehng, fere kam ane gbalee abi atohko. Á taamem re, abi atohko nyao bung ejumjum.
Etoono efung behko Jisos kehm fungu atv atv tahm song rehng go edi ji li soom, song kak ero.
Saimon, a atem bako go kehm tahme, kehm-e elsebe.
Eji bo nyehn-e no, bo kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, ane kpee kp-a sebe.”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahr tahmen go abon ajahbe bako. M bahke tob bung alum Esowo tong bo. Tibre nya nya wahng ka m ba no.”
Á kehm mehle, kehme elyannge go Galili, jo bung alum Esowo go ntahk ero, fere kam ane abi atohko yehke go bo a ntim.
Efung abehng nne abili kehm bake goji Jisos, ba gbo jamm-e alahng, kehm-e gboongo re, “Lꞌfere kor-a, lim-m, me n nob.”
Jisos, ndon kehm-e fili. Á kehm tanne ebo, koor-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Kor-m kor, wobnob.”
Tvtv o nnenlum noo kehm soro nob abili nyao.
Jisos kehm-e rehke tꞌtahne, fere tong-e re á song.
Á kehm-e tongo re, “Wuungu atung, n kp-a tongo re, wo kꞌtiki tong nne awohng awohng jia ana! Song goji nlimajom, á feed-a, wo song lim njom nyi Moses tibi no, eji ane lꞌkahn re wobnob.”

Nne noo kehm tahme, kehm kehme eltiingi nkpokosi nyi m-e lim, tong ane edi ajehng ajehng. Á tooro area, kehn jol Jisos kꞌkpe ma lohng go nfam gbul gbul gbuul. Á jo fere jen eje adi nya li soom. Ane jo kpe lohng edi ajehng ajehng, song kpir-e.
Kange kan abon afung ntiil, Jisos kehm feere ba ga Kapenium. Eka kehm yeere na yeere re, Jisos noa etahk.
Ane kehm bake ba nyo, jol eyake ajehng ajehng kpeem jol go mbutahk ji nne bahke sehnge yel ekpꞌkpa. Jisos kehm kehme bo nnoobo etib bio tiingi.
Ellong ane bako kehm kpe ba. Ane ani woomo go bo ellong o, ba solo mbanne, jo ba a ne goji Jisos.

Bo kahnem mbang nyi bo bahke sehnge a ne rehng goji Jisos, tibre ane ruru sehng. Bo kehm lahme elbultahk, kanne alehke go edilnong, kehm kehme eltahre, tete nne eyam noo song rehng edi ji Jisos jehk no.
Eji Jisos nyehne ana bo taame no tv-e, á kehm bungu tong mbanne nyio re, “Abiafem enya, me n tahm ka-a.”
Atꞌtibi ba atahm bandiki ba ji o, kehm kehme eltiri go bo a ntim re,
“Jen ji wahnge á ma daange Esowo, fere bung elkohn ellum ana nia? Nne awo bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem? Esowo ntahngtahng bi bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem.”
Tvtv o Jisos kehm soro kahn ntir atahng abo, kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń tiri ntir ana nyia?
Jen ji ga riidi, n lꞌtong mbanne nyio re, ‘Abiafem enya, me n tahm ka-a,’ afi n lꞌtong-e re, ‘Mehl, wo rod edilnong eja, tahm jen?’
M bahke lennge fvfo tib-n re, Mmon no nne kpi nsahm go njini nyia, nyi á bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem.”
Owo wahnge Jisos kehm tongo mbanne nyio re, “Mehl, wo rod edilnong eja, song kehnge!”
Bo kehm kehme elseenge. Nne eyam noo soro mehl tvtv, rod edilnong eje tahm.
Kehm kpoko bo esi, bo ane kpee. Bo kehme Esowo tehk re, “Elkohn ana nia, e ka nyehn a nyehn!”
Jisos kehm kpe lohng tahm go eto ji Galili. Ane kpee kehm bake go ege. Á kehm kehme bo tib.
Eji á kpꞌsehnge egbuk eto jio, á kehm nyehne Livai, mmon no Alfeus, jehk go ege edi eltum, kpi akpohko etak ko. Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Tahm toon-m me!”
Livai kehm mehle fvfo toon-e.
Eji Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe jo li nsol go etahk Livai, abakokatak, a aneb abiafem gbalee tob jolo o fvfo, jo li nsol. Tibre ane gbalee ba jo toon-e.

Eji ellong atꞌtibi ba atahm, ba bo jo lung bo re Farisis nyehne Jisos kpꞌlehke nsol a abakokatak, a aneb abiafem, bo kehm bahbe abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Jen ji wahnge á kpo li nsol a abakokatak, a aneb abiafem?”
Jisos wuku kan bo, á kehm faange re, “Ane ba li nob nob kpehme seb nlimakahm, sehngem bao ba kpꞌyame ba kpo seb nlimakahm. M baam re me m ba lung anobonobo ane, m ba re me m ba lung aneb abiafem.”

Efung abehng abatꞌtoono Jon, a ba Farisi jo bade elbo njal. Bo kehm bake goji Jisos, ba bahb-e re, “Jen ji wahnge abatꞌtoono Jon, a abatꞌtoono Farisis kpo bade elbo njal, abatꞌtoono eba kil jo tob bade elbo ano?”
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Nꞌnob re ane ba bo ma tiingi bo elkak elbal, bo ji njala? Eji nfono elkak kpeke li na, bo nehm ma bade elbo njal.
Ngare kpꞌbake nyi bo bahke koko nfono elkak tahm a ne. Ngare nyio lꞌrehng, owo bo bahke kehme elbo njal bade.
“Nnene limm, no bahke koko mmojang mbomo no nfenfe song baade nkꞌkula mbomo. Á lꞌlim ano, mmojang mbomo no nfenfe nehm yiimi. Nkꞌkula mbomo mio bahke kpe kv na edi jio budu sehnge ana wuku wuku.
Nnene limm, no bahke yaange amahm ma kpꞌfahle, kak go nkꞌkohko eyahbe. Á lꞌlim ano, eyahbe jio bahke bahnge na, amahm sale. Nobo re nne ko amahm ma kpꞌfahle, yaange kak go eyahbe nfenfe.”
Efung Esabat Jisos jo jene go emahng ji bo ma bahm nkohl. Eji abatꞌtoono ebe jo toon-e, bo kehm kehme amohk nkohl monngo tv go arahn.
Bab Farisi kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Jen ji wahnge abatꞌtoono eba kpꞌlimi ejum ji ki fuumu re nne lim efung Esabat?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Wahn ka tiki lung bade ana Devid limi noa, eji nfem gbo tub-ea, á song seb nsol alehke lia, ye, a ane ebea?

Á yele ekpꞌkpa Esowo, song li abred nya bo limi bum go esamahr Esowo. Jia ana limi ngare nyi Abiatar jolo ntubesi abalimajom. Ntahm enyahre li re, abalimajom ba ba fuumu re bo jo li abred nyao. Devid li abred nyao, fere faake erik ka ane ebe, bo tob li.”
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Esowo limi efung Esabat ka nne. Á limem nne ka efung Esabat.
Mmon no nne tob li nfono Esabat.”
Jisos kehm kpe feere go etahk ero. Nne jolo o, no ebo ebe lohngo no.
Ane ba jolo o jo kpuru Jisos, joare á bahke limi nne noo, á nob efung Esabat. Tibre bo jo sebe ejum ji bo bahke kake Jisos ebi.
Jisos kehm bungu tong nne no ebo ebe ma lohng re, “Mehl, wo jeere ba!”
Jisos kehm bahbe ane bako re, “Ejum aji atahm enyahre bungu re nne jo lim efung Esabat? Á jo kak nne eboa, afi á jo rannge na? Á tahre elkpin nnea, afi á rannge elkpin nne?”
Jol ejumjum bo we faangem.
Jisos, atahng kehm-e rake, eji á mehle no jang. Ndon kehm-e fere fili bada bo. Tibre bo bele etahnsi. Á kehm tongo nne noo re, “Tanne ebo eba!”
Á kehm tanne ebo ebe, lohko nob tvtv.
Bab Farisi kehm lohngo ekpꞌkpa ero jio o, kehm song kpiri alokeltum ntul a Herod. Bo kehm toobo ana bo bahke limi, kehm wulu Jisos.
Jisos kehm tahme eje, a abatꞌtoono ebe go eto ji Galili. Ellong ane tvv tꞌtoono bo.

Ane bao lohngo go Galili, Judea, Jerusalem, a Idume, go egbuk jehko ji Jodan, fere lohng go abon ajahbe ba li sennge Taya abola Saidon kak. Ellong ane gbalee ba goji Jisos, tibre bobwuk ana á kpꞌlimi.
Jisos kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re bo toobo egbang bum-e, eji ane lꞌki-e fahd kak.
Tibre á limi ane gbalee, bo nob ayam ebo. Owo wahnge aneb ayam bao kpee jo temme atemtem re bo song koor-e ebo.
Abi atohko lꞌnyehn Jisos, bo jo gbꞌgbo jamm-e alahng, fere jo rabe tiim re, “Wo wo li Mmon no Esowo!”
Jisos kehm rehke abi atohko nyao tꞌtahne re, bo kꞌtooro tong ane elkohn nne no ye li no.
Jisos kehm tahme go ewong ajehng, song lung ane bao ba á kpꞌsebe. Bo kehm bake.
Á kehm yehke ewubu ane abal, fere tong bo re, “M ma-n yehke re wahn jol a name. M bahk-n tumu re wahn song bung alum Esowo.
Fvfo ḿ bahke bele nsahm nyi ḿ bahke jo kam abi atohko.”
A wo li ewubu ane abal ba á yehke no, Saimon ji Jisos ka-e mbing nyehko re Pita,
Jems, a Jon, bo jolo abon ba Sibidi. Jisos ka bo abing nyako re Boanerges ji lohngo re, “abon ba li ana ndan”,
Andru, Filip, Batolomi, Matiu, Tomos, Jems ji mmon no Alfeus, Tadeus, Saimon ji jo seb re ejahbe eje lohng go elwo ni aneb Rom,
go Judas Iskariot ji gungu Jisos.
Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe, bo kehm feere kehnge go etahk. Ellong ane kehm kame na kam song rur. Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe belem eyake ji bo bahke lehke nsol.
Ane ebe wuku kan a me, bo kehm bake re bo ba ko-e tahm a ne. Tibre bo jo bungu re, “Yebgbo esahl!”
Atꞌtibi ba atahm bandiki ba lohngo go Jerusalem ba, kehm bungu re, “Á kpi etohko ji nnehm go ege eltim. Ntul a nnehm wo ka-e nsahm nyio re á jo kam ane abi atohko yehke.”
Jisos kehm lungu ane bao tv elne, kehm tuubu ngaane tong bo re, “Nnehm bahke ma kam elne renan?
Ejahbe lꞌyab, jol ebo ebo, ejahbe jio bahke tane.
Nnahb lꞌyab, jol ebo ebo, nnahb nyio bahke tane.
Eblehm lꞌkehme elnoko atemtem, ejahbe ebo lꞌyab, bahke tane.

Nnene limm, no bahke ma wa mbutahk yel go etahk etahntahn nne, song kpu nsol enye kpee, sehngem re no, á tohko gbo mbang gba etahntahn nne noo alehke, kehm ma yel ege ekpꞌkpa, song seb ajehng ajehng ji kor-e no rod.
“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane bahke ma bel eltahmeka kpee go bo abiafem, a elsuku ni bo kpo su Esowo,
wo, nne awohng awohng no lꞌfere lim abiafem, su Etingi Etohko, á nehm tiki bel eltahmeka go njinanjini. Abiafem nyao we nehm tiki laade go njinanjini.”
Jisos bungu jia, tibre ane tvv jo tongo re, “Á kpi ebi etohko.”
Nnyehn Jisos, a abonanyehn Jisos kehm bake. Bo yiimi go elatahk, tum re bo lung-e.
Ellong ane tvv ji sennge Jisos kak. Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Nyehnee, nne, a abonane ebba yiimi go elatahk kp-a sebe.”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Nne awo li li nnee? Ane aba li li abonanee?”
Á kehm tabe esamahr wahre, jang ane kpee ba ji senng-e kak, kehm bungu re, “Nyehnen, a wo li babnnee, a abonanee.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌlim ji Esowo kpꞌsebe re á lim, ye wo li mmonannee, a nnee.”
Jisos kehm kpe tahm go eto ji Galili song tib ane. Ellong ane ni ba yiimi senng-e kak, gbale sehng. Owo á kehm song yel go egbang bi woomo go alahb, ellong ane jol ga nkpe egbuk.
Á jo ko ngaane, tib bo nsol tvv. A wo li eltibi ene ni á tibi bo re,
“Wuungen atung! Nne jolo gona, no tahme re á song wohngo amohk nti enye.
Eji á tahme no re á song wohngo amohk nti go ege egbe, nyandiki gbo noongo go mbang. Nruk ba suudu kpee mele.
“Nyandiki gbo noongo go ndi nyi li atal atal. Abon ndi jolo ntiil. Amohk nti nyao gulu elmahnge. Tibre edi jio, ndi gbalem.
Njul nyaare kan a me, akohdo nti nyao wuudu, fere kpo. Tibre alohk jolem.
“Nyandiki gbo kuumu elkob akpiri. Akpiri nyao gbale na, bulu akohdo nti nyao, kabem.

“Amohk nti nyako gbo noongo go nnooba ndi, kehm mahnge, fere gbal arahn, kab. Atasok nyandiki jo jolo eltahl a nkab ewubu eltahl a nkab ewubu, atasok nyandiki nkab atahl ara ara, atasok nyandiki nkab atahl alon alon.”
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Wuungen atung! Nne no kpi atung, nong á wuk!”
Eji Jisos jolo ntahngtahng, egom jindiki, a abatꞌtoono ebe kehm song ji senng-e kak, kehm-e bahbe bada ngaane enye.
Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahn, boblennge nsol nyi li bade etul bi Esowo ka-n, nyi Esowo behre no. Ngare anyehng anyehng egom jehko jo wuku ngaane nyi nyi.
“ ‘Re bo seenge na seenge seenge, jol bo nehm tiki nyehn.
Re bo wuk na wuk wuk kak atung,
jol bo nehm tiki kahn,
eji bo lꞌkꞌgbo ndon,
feere goji Esowo,
fere bel eltahmeka.’ ”
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Elgan nia wahn lenngema? Bahke limi renan, ń kehm kahne ngaane nyehko nyi m bahke kpe tuubu?
“Mbahmgbe noo tahme song wohngo alum Esowo.
“Ane bandiki li ana amohk nti nya gbo noongo go mbang. Bo lꞌwuk alum Esowo, nnehm soro ba tvtv, ba yehke etib bio go bo a ntim.
“Ane bandiki li ana amohk nti nya gbo noongo go ndi nyi li atal atal. Bo lꞌwuk alum Esowo, bo ko tvtv a eyebatahng.
Nehm yel rahbe go bo a ntim, lim alohk. Jol nehm tohko kꞌkang, erem lꞌba, a ntong go alum Esowo nya bo wuku no, bo soro gbo tvtv.
“Ane bandiki li ana amohk nti nya fooro gbo go elkob akpiri. Bao ba li ane ba kpo wuk etib bio o.

Gana, nsol nyi njini nyia kpi bo gbiingi go bo a ntim. Ekor akpohko kpꞌnehme bo. Bo fere jo nok, eji bo lꞌbel ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo ki kpi. Nsol nyia kpee bahke rake yel go bo a ntim, bulu alum Esowo tv. Akab nehm kab.

“Ane bako li ana amohk nti nya bo wohngo go nnooba ndi. Bo lꞌwuk alum Esowo ko, bo fere kab akab, egom jindiki eltahl a nkab ewubu eltahl a nkab ewubu, egom jindiki nkab atahl ara ara, egom jindiki nkab atahl alon alon.”
Jisos kehm kpe soro asi re, “Nne ebkꞌko etꞌrekahng ba a jia, ba nyaala, fere rod ejeere konnga, afi á bum go nla ekpꞌkuru? Á kpo rod kunu go edi ji li gbuul.
Ajehng ajehng ji bo behre no, bo bahke koko ba edi ji li gbuul. Ajehng ajehng ji bo bulu no, bo bahke tiki lennge.
Wuungen atung! Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk!”
Fvfo, á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Kunen ekpu go ajehng ajehng ji ń kpo wuk. Mbang nyꞌnehm nyi ń kpo lam ane bako, nyꞌnehm nyi Esowo bahke tob lam-n. Elam ji Esowo bahke gbale sehng, fere sꞌsab.
Nne no kpi no, Esowo bahk-e kpe budu na. Nne no kpi ntiil, Esowo bahk-e gohro taare na, no á kpi no.”
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Etul bi Esowo li ana nne no song wohngo amohk nti go ege egbe.
Á jo kono elnoongo lal ngare atv, fere nyahme efungfu. Amohk nti nyao mahng, fere gbal. Á kahnem ana limi lim.
Ndi nyi kpo lim antahng re nsol mahng, fere gbal, kab akab.
Ngare nyi nti nyio ma kab, nne noo bahke koko ebgbagodo, song bong. Tibre ngare elbongo ebrehng.”
Jisos kehm bahbe re, “E bahke bungu renan bade ana etul bi Esowo li no? Elgan ani e bahke koko lennge?
Li ana mmohk asia nyi sahb sꞌse go njini nyia sehnge mmohk eti anyehng anyehng.
Nne kehm rodo bahm go ndi. Kange kan a me, kehm gbale sehnge elrahnti anehng anehng, jamme agburu abꞌbo, nruk ba si ntahk.”
Jisos jo bungu alum enye gbalee go ngaane ana elgan nia. Á jo bungu, eji bo lꞌmal elwuku.
Á jo tiki bung a bo go ngaane. Á lꞌjol ntahngtahng, a abatꞌtoono ebe, á jo lennge ajehng ajehng tong bo.
Efung bꞌnehm ona, ngare elgung, Jisos kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Wahr siiren eto jia, rehng go egbuk jehko.”
Bo kehm yake ellong ane bao. Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm tahme yel egbang. Ngare nyio Jisos ebyel. Agbang nyako tob jolo o fvfo.
Nfeb nyi kpꞌtahne kehm bake. Ebuku kehm kehme ellimi. Alahb kehm jo kim, yel egbang, ba elruru.
Jisos noongo go nnahb egbang jo lal. Á kunu esi go etisi. Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm-e nyahme re, “Ntꞌtibi, wa nehme luba, wahr ga yahke tano?!”
Jisos kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu tꞌtahne, tong nfeb re, “Rahke!” Á kehm fere tong ebuku re, “Goomo!” Nfeb nyio kehm rahke. Edi kehm naange soom.
Jisos kehm fere bung tong abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Jen ji ń kpꞌfahle ana? Jen ji wahng ka ń kil-m elbumu go etingitingi?”
Tibre bo fahle sehng. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, elkohn nne awo anae, no kpo bung tong nfeb, a ebuku, wuk-e?”
Bo kehm rehnge go egbuk eto jehko go ejang bi Gerasa.
Jisos lohngo kan go egbuk, á kehm soro wane nne no lohng go edi ji alam akvne jolo no. Nne noo ona bele ebi etohko go ege atahng.
Á lene go alahm akvne. Nnene we kpeem ma kak agbekobo.
Nkpel tvv bo jo kak-e agbekobo. Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi bo gba-e no, á tohng nya abo kiimi, fere ruumu nya akpade kiimi. Nne ne jolem, no jo mal gon-e.
Atv a njul á jo yannge go alahm akvne, a awong, jo rabe tiim, fere jo rod atal, jo kadde elne, yehke alok.
Á jolo fee, eji á nyehne Jisos. Á kehm beke ba gbo jamme Jisos alahng,
kehm rabe tiim re, “Jisos ji Mmon no Esowo bi li go ero, a ba jen go egame? Tib go esi ji Esowo m ma-a gboongo re, wo ki-m kak erem!”
Á bungu jia, tib eji Jisos m-e tohko tong re, “Ebi etohko lohng-e!”
Jisos kehm bahbe ebi etohko jio re, “Mbing enya mee?”
Á kehm faange re, “Mbing enyame li re ‘Egomegom’. Tibre e li go egom.”
Á kehm soro gboongo Jisos re, á kꞌkam bo yehke go ejahbe jio.
Ellong akuk jolo o kpidi kpidi, jo li nsol go ewong.
Abi atohko nyao kehm kehme Jisos gboongo re, á lub tum bo, bo song yel akuk nyao go atahng.

Jisos kehm taame. Abi atohko nyao kehm soro yake nne noo abo, tahm song yel akuk nyao go atahng. Bo kehm beke song fooro agbunggbung gbo yel go alahb tan. Kpee ellong akuk nio o jolo akuk atahltahl nkpel elon (2,000).
Ane ba jo baabe akuk nyao, be ebo tahm, song tiingi go etahk, a abon ajahbe bako fvfo. Ane bao kehm lohngo re bo song nyehn ji ma lim.
Bo kehm bake goji Jisos, ba nyehn nne no bele ellong abi atohko go ege atahng. Á jehk eje sange sange, fere kak nsol go ngubjing. Bo kehm kehme elfahle.
Ane ba nyehne no, kehm song tong ane bako ji ma lim nne no bele abi atohko, a ji ma lim akuk.
Bo kehm tongo Jisos re, á tahm ejahbe jio.
Eji Jisos yele egbang, nne no bele abi atohko kehm jo gboong-e re, “Nong, me n toon-a, wahr tahm!”
Jisos taamem, á tong-e re, “Feere song goji ane eba, wo song tong bo ana ji Ntul ma lim ka-a, ana a ma fili Esowo ndon.”
Nne noo kehm tahme jo yannge go ejahbe na ebwubu bi bo jo lung re Dekapolis, jo tooro ji Jisos ma lim ka-e.
Ane bao kpee ba wuku no, kpo bo esi area.
Jisos kehm yele egbang, feere egbuk eto jehko. Owo ane kame no ba rur senng-e kak. Á jolo kpidi kpidi go nkpe eto.
Ntubesi awohng go ellong atubesi ba etahk ero, no bo jo lung-e re Jairus kehm bake. Á nyehne kan Jisos, á kehm gboko jamm-e alahng go alata,
kehm-e gboongo gbalee re, “Mmon ewame yahke kpo, titi, ba wo ba kun-e ebo go esi, eji á lꞌnob, fere bel elkpin.”
Jisos kehm soro tahm toono Jairus. Ellong ane tvv jo tob toono bo go njahm. Bo jo gbulu na gbul atemtem mbang mbang.
Nnenkal awohng jolo o, no alung sa-e nnahb ewubu a nnya ebal.
Á jo nyehne erem sehng, eji abalimakahm tvv jo lim-e akahm. Á rannge akpohko enye kpee re á nob eyam bio, eyam jo kpe-e nyede na.
Á wuku bada Jisos. Owo á kehm jene a ellong ane ba jo toono Jisos go njahm, ba kooro nsubu enye.
Tibre nnenkal noo bungu go ege eltim re, “N lꞌlub koor-e na kooro go ege a nsubu, m bahke nobo.”
Á kehm soro kooro nsubu enye. Alung eme soro mal. Á kehm soro kahn tvtv re, yeblohko nob eyam ebe.
Tvtv o Jisos kehm soro kahn re, nsahm m-e tele lohng. Á kehm keebe seenge ellong ane bao, kehm bahbe re, “Nne awo ma-m kooro go egama nsubu?”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm faange re, “A kpꞌnyehne re, ane ebrur sehng, gana a kpꞌbahbe re, nne awo ma-m kooro!”
Tvtv o Jisos kpi njange njange re á nyehn nne no koor-e no.
Nnenkal noo kehm soro kahn ji ma lim go ege a ngubjing, kehm bake goji Jisos a elfahle, a ekahme akahb, ba gbo jamm-e alahng, kehm-e soro tong etingitingi kpee.
Jisos kehm tongo re, “Nnenkal, eltaame ena ebwahng ka wobnob. Song go eyebatahng! Woblohko nob eyam eba.”
Eji Jisos jo bung jia, ane bandiki kehm soro lohng go etahk ntubesi etahk ero noo, kehm ba tong-e re, “Mmon ewa ebkpo. Jen ji wahng ka a kpꞌkpeke gbiingi nsoo?”
Jisos wuungem atung a jio ji bo bungu no. Á kehm tongo ntubesi no re, “Ka fahl, taame na taame!”
Jisos taamem re, nnene toon-e, sehngem Pita, Jems a Jon ji mmonannyehn Jems, bo ba, á taame re bo toon-e.
Bo kehm soro rehng etahk ntubesi noo. Jisos kehm nyehne egom jehko ji kpꞌlingi, fere nyehn bako ba kpꞌkake agohrobi, fere jo jokko na jokko edi.
Á kehm maade yel go ekpꞌkpa, song tong bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌlimi ana? Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌlꞌling? Mmon noa ka kpo. Á kpꞌlale na.”
Bo kehm-e kehme elwolo. Á kehm nyame bo re, bo lohng elatahk. Owo á kehm lungu nde mmon, fere lung nnyehn mmon, a abatꞌtoono ebe, ane ara ba toon-e no.
Bo kehm yele ekpꞌkpa jio ji mmon noo noongo no.
Jisos song jabbe mmon noo go ebo, kehm bungu tong-e re, “Talita kumi,” ji lohngo re, “Mmon ewame, n tong-a re, wo mehl yiimi.”
Á kehm soro mehl tvtv, soro kehme eljene yannge. Ngare nyi nkpokosi nyio limi no, yebkang ewubu a nnya ebal. Kpo bo esi area.
Jisos kehm bungu tꞌtahne re, bo kꞌtong nnene. Á kehm soro bung re, “Kaan ye nsol alehke, á li!”
Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, song rehng go ege ejahbe, a abatꞌtoono ebe.
Efung Esabat á kehm song tib go ekpꞌkpa ero. Ane gbalee jolo o. Eji bo wuk-e no, kpo bo esi area. Bo kehm bahbe re, “Gan wo á bele nyaa? Á limi renan, kehm bele elkahne ana nia?
Ye sang li ekapentaa, ji li mmon a Meria? Ye sang li mmonannyehn a Jems, Joses, Jud a Saimona? Abonanyehn ba nkal sang lene aa?” Ano wo wahnge bo kehm-e tene.
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Nnyehnamahr Esowo, bo kpo kak-e edi ajehng ajehng, sehngem re nnahb enye, ejahbe eje, a etahk eje ji kil jo kak-e.”
Á maam lim nkpokosi anyehng anyehng o, sehngem re abon amohk ane ntiil ba jo yam ba á kunu bo ebo, bo nob.
Jisos, kpo-e esi area, eji ejahbe eje ki taame.
Á kehm kehme elyannge go abon ajahbe ba jolo sennge ona, kehme bo tib.
Jisos kehm lungu abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal tv edi ajehng, kehm tumu bo ane abal abal. Á ka bo nsahm re bo kam ane abi atohko yehke.
Á bungu tong bo re, “Kana fili ejum ajehng ajehng, sehngem ntifilibo nyi nyi ḿ bahke fili. Kana fili nsol alehke! Kana fili abam! Kana kak akpohko go egahne abam!
Kaken akpaketa! Kana fili mbomo ebal ebal!”
Á kpe tong bo re, “Ń lꞌje, jolen a ane bao ba tong-n no re wahn kang go bo a ntahk. Kana yaange etahk jimongo tete ń tahm ejahbe jio.
Ń lꞌfere je ejahbe ji ane lꞌki-n vvrv, kꞌfere wuung-n atung, lohngen ejahbe jio o, wahn kum akpade. Jia bahke jolo ana elliingi ka bo.”
Bo kehm lohngo song bung alum Esowo re, ane gbo ndon go bo abiafem.
Bo kame ane abi atohko yehke gbalee, fere jo taame aneb ayam akehng, bo jo nob.

Ntul a Herod kehm wuku bada nsol nyia kpee. Tibre elgahm ni Jisos ebyeere gbalee. Ane bandiki jo bungu re, “Jon ji nwohngalahb ebnyahme go elkv, fere jol go elkpin. Owo wahng ka nne noo kpi elkohn nsahm ana nyio, fere kpꞌlimi akpokosi.”
Ane bandiki jo fere bung re, “Elaija wo a.” Ane bandiki jo bungu re, “Nnyehnamahr wo, ana ajꞌjok anyehnamahr Esowo ba jolo go nkꞌkula ngare.”
Herod wuku kan a me, á kehm bungu re, “Jon ji nwohngalahb wo, ye ji n kim-e esi. Yebkpe fere nyahme.”
Tibre nyanjehle Herod tꞌtum re bo bob Jon ba a ne, ba gba-e kak go ngbekobo. Herod limi jia tib go esi ji Herodias ji á taare Filip mmonannyehn.
Jon ji nwohngalahb jo tongo Herod re, “Nobem re wo baange nkal a mmonanne.”
Herodias kehm kehme elmarre a Jon. Á bele erakatahng re á bahk-e wulu. Á malem.

Tibre Herod jo fahle Jon, tib eji á jo kahn re, Jon jolo etingitingi nne Esowo. Herod jo sebe re á tahre elkpin ene. Jo kor-e re á jo wuungu atung go alum nya Jon, jol eji alum nyao jo gbiing-e gbiingi, fere ka-e atꞌtiiri go eltim.
Efung elbuumu bi bo jele Herod, Herodias kehm bele eyake. Tibre Herod tiingi atul elkak, fere tiingi atubesi nsoja, a anebkul nfam ba Galili.

Mmon a Herodias no nkal kehm lohngo ba yel, kehm kehme ese bahn. Kehm yebe ntul a Herod atahng, a ane ebe. Á kehm bahbe mmonse noo re, “Jen ji a kpꞌsebe re me n ka-a! M bahk-a kake ajehng ajehng ji a sebe no.”
Herod kehm nyame, fere tꞌtir re, “Ajehng ajehng ji a lꞌbahb-m, m bahk-a kake, jol afi ejang afang ejame ji, m bahk-a kak.”
Mmon noo kehm soro lohng tahm, song bahb nnyehn re, “Jen ji m bahk-e bahbe?” Nnyehn kehm faange re, “Esi ji Jon ji nwohngalahb.”
Mmon noo kehm feere elwaare elwaare, ba goji ntul, ba tong-e re, “N kpꞌsebe re, wo ka-m esi ji Jon go ekpingi.”
Jia limi ntul, á kehme elguunu. Á kpeem ma ten, tib eji á ma tohko nyam ano, fere tir go esamahr ane kpee.
Á kehm soro tum nlokeltum ewe na awohng re á song kim Jon esi ba a ji.
Nlokeltum noo kehm soro tahm, song rehng go ekpꞌkpa ngbekobo, song kim Jon esi, kak go ekpingi, ba ka mmon noo. Mmon noo kehm soro rod fvfo, song ka nnyehn.
Abatꞌtoono Jon wuku kan a me, bo kehm song rod ekv eje, song kpa kak go ndi.
Abatiingetib Jisos kehm feere ba kpir-e, ba kehm-e nsol tong nyi bo ma lim kpee, fere tꞌtib.

Etahk ji Jisos jolo no, ane bako jo yele na, egom jehko jo lohng. Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe belem ngare nyi nsol alehke. Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahr tahmen go edi ji li soom. Go wo ḿ bahke ma re ekv.”
Bo kehm yele go egbang tahm go edi ji li soom.
Ane gbalee nyehne bo eji bo tahme no, fere liingi bo. Owo ane kehm lohngo ajahbe nyao kpee, jo jen egbuk egbuk, gbo mbang song rehng edi jio, Bab Jisos kehm rehnge.
Jisos lohngo kan egbang, á kehm nyehne ellong ane gbalee. Ndon kehm-e fili. Tibre bo jolo ana ejoro bi ki kpi mbꞌbaabe. Á kehm kehme bo nsol tib gbalee.
Eji atv yahke behde, abatꞌtoono ebe kehm bake, ba bung tong-e re, “Tahm edi jia ana rehng go ajahbe, ekidi kpꞌlabe, gana, atv yahke behde.
Tum bo, bo song go abon ajahbe ba li a kpidi kpidi, song gunu nsol alehke.”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahn kaan bo nsol alehke, bo li!” Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “A kpꞌsebe re, wahr song gunu nsol go mpon atahl alon, ba le boa?”
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Ebred ebbik ń kpi no? Song kpuren!” Eji bo ma song kpur, bo kehm bake, ba tong-e re, “Ebred eblon, kunu abon nsahre abal.”
Jisos kehm tongo ane bao re, bo ji agꞌgabe agꞌgabe go ajele nya kpꞌna kohdo.
Bo kehm jehke. Nlong nyindiki jo jolo ane atahl alon alon. Nlong nyindiki jo jolo ane atahl abal ane awubu, ane atahl abal ane awubu.

Jisos kehm rodo ebred eblon bio, a abon nsahre abal, seenge go elbung, kak Esowo saam, kehm bakke abred nyao, ka abatꞌtoono ebe re bo ko song bak bo. Fvfo, á kehm kpe bakke abon nsahre bao na abal, bo tob song bak bo kpee.
Bo kpee li wohngo.
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm taare erik abred nyao, a nsahre, kak ajeere, ruru ewubu ejeere ebbal.
Aneblum ba li abred nyao jolo ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal ane atahl awubu (5,000). Anebkal, a abonse, bo fangem bo.
Tvtv o Jisos kehm soro tong abatꞌtoono ebe re, bo yel egbang, gbo-e mbang, song egbuk jehko ji Betsaida, yefono ji, jo yaame ane.
Eji á ma tong ellong ane bao re bo song kehnge, á kehm tahme go ewong re á song kak ero.
Eji elgung ma ba, egbang bio jolo go nlum alahb. Jisos sa ntahngtahng go ewong.

Jisos kehm nyehne re, abatꞌtoono ebe ebbel nfem go egbang, nyi jo lim bo re, bo kꞌma kpe fing egbang. Tibre nfeb jo gbulu bo, feere njahm njahm. Eji ma rehng ejum nkaranka eni nyi efungfu, Jisos kehm kehme eljene go ero alahb asongo goji bo. Á jo jene, are á yahke sehng bo.
Bo kehm-e nyehne, á kpꞌjene go ero alahb. Bo tiri re, etohko ji. Bo kehm kehme elrabe.
Eji bo kpee nyehn-e no, bo kehm kehme elfahle. Jisos kehm soro tong bo re, “Me wo, kana kpe fahl! Boben eltim!”
Á kehm ba yel egbang. Nfeb kehm soro rahke. Abatꞌtoono ebe kpo bo esi sehng.
Bo kahnem ana abred nyao lohngo no. Tibre jolo bo ekpehlekpehle.
Bo rehnge kan egbuk eto jehko, edi ndi ji bo jo lung re Genesaret, song kahn egbang ebo.
Bo lohngo kan a egbang me, ane kehm soro liingi Jisos.
Bo kehm tahme, yel nkpohko ejahbe anyehng anyehng, jo sol aneb ayam go ebkpa, ba edi ajehng ajehng ji bo lꞌwuk re Jisos ebrehng o.

Ajahbe nya nnen, a ajahbe nyi ki ga gbal, a abon ajahbe ba nse, ane gbalee jo ko aneb ayam ebo, je go are, fere gboongo Jisos re á lub taame, bo koor-e go ege asꞌsili nsubu. Ane kpee ba jo koor-e, jo lꞌlohko nob.
Bab Farisi, a atꞌtibi ba atahm bandiki kehm lohngo go Jerusalem ba goji Jisos.
Bo nyehne re, abatꞌtoono Jisos bandiki joom kpe ru abo go mbang nyi atꞌtibi ba atahm jo kono eltibi, kehm lehke nsol.
Farisis, a Jus kpee joom tiki li na li nsol, kꞌru abo. Tibre bo jo toono eljini ni babnde ebo jo tib bo.
Bo lꞌje are feere, bo nehm tiki li nsol, bo tohko tiki bum elbo saang. Bo jo toono eljini nehko go fvfo, nio ni babnde jo tib bo, ana eljini ntuku aruku, a ni atu aruku, a ni nkpingi aruku.
Bab Farisi, a atꞌtibi ba atahm bao kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Jen ji wahnge abatꞌtoono eba kil jo toono eljini ni babnso ejahre tib-r no? Bo kpehme ru abo kehm lehke nsol!”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Aisaya lohko nyehn amahr bada nahne! Lohko li ana á nyono no re,
“ ‘Esowo re, Ane ebame kp-m kake go nnyo a nnyo,
ntim ebo n wobem.
Bo kp-m kake mbol mbol,
eji bo kpꞌtibi atahm nya ane baka baka jehke no,
nya ki li nya Esowo.’ ”
“Wahn ebyake atahm nya Esowo, fere kpꞌtoono eljini ni ane baka baka tibi no.”
Jisos kehm kpe bung tong bo re, “Ebnob ka wahn, eji ḿ ma ten atahm nya Esowo, fere kpꞌlimi eljini ni babnso ejahne.
Moses bungu re, ‘Kak nso, a nne! Nne awohng awohng no lꞌfere su nde, a nnyehn, bo bahk-e wulu.’
“Ń kpo tib re, ‘Nne lꞌbel ejum ji kehn á jol kake nde ebo, a nnyehn, á lꞌfere bung re, Ejum jia li re Korban (ji lohngo re, li ka Esowo),
á nehm kpe kak nde ebo, a nnyehn.’
Jia lohngo re, wahn ebten ellum ni Esowo, fere kpꞌtibi atahm nya babnso ejahne. Elkohn nsol ana nyia li gbalee, nyi ń kpo tob lim fvfo.”
Jisos kehm kpe lung ellong ane, kehm tongo bo re, “Wuungen atung, wahn ane kpee, wahn kahn!
Ejumjum limm, ji kpo yel nne go nnyo, kehm limi eltim ene sab. Ji kpo lohng nne go eltim, ji ji kpo lim eltim nne sab.
Wuungen atung! Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk!”
Jisos lohngo kan go ellong ane bao o rehng go etahk, abatꞌtoono ebe kehm-e bahbe bade elgan nio ni á tubu no.
Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahn ebgboolo ana ane bako goa? Wahn lenngema? Ji kpo yel nne go nnyo sang kpo lim nne sab.
Tibre kpehme yel go ege eltim. Kpo yel go ala, fere lohng go ngubjing.” Jisos bungu jia re, nsol alehke anyehng anyehng nyi ane kpo li, nꞌnob re wahr li.
Á kehm kpe soro asi elbungu re, “Ji kpo lohng nne go ege atahng, ji ji kpo wahng ka nne kꞌjol saang.
Tibre go atahng ma nne, a eltim ene, owo abꞌbi kpo lohng, ana ebi ntir atahng, asꞌsa, ejv avohko, ewulane, anebkal akono,
etong alahme, nkahng abare, abꞌbi, enehm, atahm agboko, amahr abaare ejum nne, afahnge akiimi lake ane, elgeere, a elgboolo.
Abꞌbi nyaa kpo lohng eltim nne. Nya nya kpo lim eltim nne sab.”
Jisos kehm tahme go ejahbe ajehng ji li kohlo Taya, song yel ekpꞌkpa ajehng. Tibre á joom seb re, nne awohng awohng kahn re, á li o. Á maam tiki biiri.
Nnenkal awohng no mmon ewe no nkal bele ebi etohko go ege atahng kehm wuku bada Jisos. Á kehm ba kpir-e, soro gbo tvtv, jamm-e alahng.
Mmonankal noo jolo nfono ejahbe no jo bung Grik. Á kehm gboongo Jisos re, á lub kam ebi etohko jio, yehke mmon ewe go eltim.
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nong, me n tohko gbo mbang le abon.
Nnenkal noo kehm taame re, “Ee nsoo, fvfo, n kpꞌkahne re, akahb elang nya abon lꞌfooro gbo ndi, ebv bi kpo fohko li.”
Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Tib go ellum ni a faange no, a li ma song kehnge, tibre mmon ewa, ebi etohko m-e lohng go ege eltim.”
Nnyehn kehm feere je, lohko song nyehn mmon ewe nong go edilnong sange sange. Ebi etohko jio m-e lohko lohng.
Jisos kehm sehnge go Taya asongo, song rehng go Saidon, fere song rehng go Dekapolis,
Ane kehm koko nlakatung nyi ki jo ma bung nob nob, ba a ne goji Jisos, fere gboongo Jisos re, á lub kun-e ebo.
Jisos kehm-e koko, lohng a ne go ellong ane bao, kehm-e lohko anyohkebo go atung, fere so atel wohngo go ebnyohkobo abehng, ko song behd-e go ebliki.
Jisos kehm kpiidi amahr enye go elbung, tub eromo, kehm bungu tong nne noo re, “Efata,” ji lohngo re, “Lennge!”
Tvtv o atung nne noo soro lennge, ebliki soro tahm. Á kehme elbungu nob nob.
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, bo kꞌtooro tong ane. Jol eji á rehke rehke bo o, ano wo fvfo bo tob tooro kpee.
Nne awohng awohng no wuku no, jo kpo-e esi area. Bo re, “Yeblim ejum ajehng ajehng ebnob go nseenga nseenge, ye jio ji kpo lim alakatung, bo wuk, fere lim akamme, bo bung.”
Gaam kang fvfo, ellong ane bako kehm kpe ba. Eji bo ki kpe bel ejum ellehke ajehng ajehng, Jisos kehm lungu abatꞌtoono ebe tv elne, kehm bungu tong bo re,
“Ndon ma-m fili sehng. Tibre ane baa ebkang nfung era a name. Ejumjum bo kpeem kpi ji ellehke.
Re me n tum bo ana, bo song kehnge, egom jindiki bahke kehme awo gbo mbang mbang, tib ane bandiki lohng nlaabambang ba.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm-e faange re, “Elka emahng nia, gan wo nne bahke tingi nsol alehke, kehm leke elkohn ane ana baa kpee?”
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Ebred ebbik ń kpi no?” Bo kehm-e faange re, “E kpi ebred ebsehma.”
Á kehm tongo ellong ane bao re, bo ji ndi. Á kehm rodo ebred ebsehma bio, kehm kake Esowo saam, kehm bakke ka abatꞌtoono ebe re bo song bak. Abatꞌtoono ebe lohko lim ano.
Bo bele abon nsahre abik abik o fvfo. Jisos kehm kake Esowo saam go nsol nyia, fere tong abatꞌtoono ebe re bo tob song bak.
Nne awohng awohng lꞌli wohngo. Owo abatꞌtoono ebe kehm taare erik ji sa no, ruru ejeere na ebsehma.
Bo jolo ejum ane atahltahl nkpel ewubu (4,000). Jisos kehm tongo ane bao re bo song kehnge.
Á kehm yele go egbang, a abatꞌtoono ebe. Bo kehm tahme go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Dalmanuta.
Bab Farisi kehm ba kehme Jisos abahbe bahb go nfaabe re, bo nyehn nkpokosi nyi ejahbetul Esowo, eji bo lꞌgar-e.
Jisos kehm tubu eromo, kehm bungu re, “Jen ji wahng ka ane ba li anv kpꞌsebe re bo nyehn nkpokosi?
Á kehm tahme bo sa, song yel go egbang, tahm egbuk eto jehko.
Abatꞌtoono ebe yꞌyini abred go elkoko ba a nya. Sa mmobred awohng wo wo go egbang.
Jisos kehm kake bo erehke re, “Gberen elnahne go ayist nyao nya Farisis, a nya Herod.”
