Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm kehme elbungu atemtem. Bo bumu re, Jisos bungu alum nyaa, tib eji bo ki bel abred.
Jisos kꞌkahn re, lenngem bo re á bungu bade eltibi ni ane bao. Owo á kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji ń kpꞌbungu bade abred nya ń ki kpi? Ń nehme nyehna? Ń nehme wuka? Anv, li-n ekpehlekpehla?
Ń kpi amahr, ń nehme nyehna? Ń kpi atung, ń nehme wuka? Ń nehme kpe buuma,
ana m bakke ebred eblon, ka ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal atahl awuba (5,000)? Ejeere ebbik ń ko arꞌrohko kak tahm a nya?”
Bo kehm faange re, “Ewubu ejeere ebbal.”
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Nyanjehle, eji m bakke ebred na ebsehma, ka ane atahltahl nkpel ewubu (4,000), ejeere ebbik ń ko arꞌrohko kak tahm a nya?”
Bo faange re, “Ejeere ebsehma.”
Jisos kehm kpe bahb bo re, “Wahn ka tiki lennga?”
Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe je go Betsaida. Ane bako kehm koko nwakamahr je goji Jisos, song gboong-e re, á lub koor-e.
Jisos kehm jabbe nwakamahr nyio go ebo, lohng a ne tahm go esi mbang. Á so atel, kak nne noo go amahr, kehm-e kooro abo go amahr, kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, a bahke ma nyehn ejuma?”
Nne noo kehm lennge amahr enye, kehm bungu re, “N kpꞌnyehne ane. Bo li na li, are nti nyi kpꞌjene yannge.”
Jisos kehm-e kpe kooro abo go amahr. Ngare nyio nne noo kehm gohro lennge amahr enye, amahr enye kehm feere ana wuku wuku. Á kehm nyehne ejum ajehng ajehng saang.
Jisos kehm-e tumu re, á song kehnge, fere tong-e re, á kꞌsehng mbang ejahbe jio ji bo kpꞌna lohngo abake.

Jisos kehm tahme, a abatꞌtoono ebe song rehng go abon ajahbe ba bo jo lung re Sisaria Filipi. Eji bo kpꞌjene go mbang, á kehm bahbe bo re, “Tong-m wahn, ane kpo bung renan bada name? Me n li elkohn nne awo?”
Bo kehm faange re, “Egom jindiki kpo bung re, Wo Jon ji nwohngalahb wo. Egom jindiki re, Wo Elaija wo. Egom jindiki re, Wo nnyehnamahr Esowo wo.”
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Wahn fvfo mee? Wahn kpo bung renan bada name? Me n li elkohn nne awo?”
Pita kehm-e faange re, “Wo Kraist wo!”
Jisos kehm rehke bo re, bo kꞌtong nnene ejum ajehng ajehng bada ne.

Jisos kehm kehme abatꞌtoono ebe tib re, “Mmon no nne bahke nyehne erem gbalee. Anebkul nfam, a atubesi abalimajom, go atꞌtibi ba atahm bahk-e tene, fere wul-e. Lꞌkang nfung era á nyahme, fere jol go elkpin.”
Jisos jo bungu alum nyao gbul gbul gbuul.
Pita kehm-e koko, tahm a ne go nkpohko, kehm-e kehme elrehke.
Jisos kehm keebe, seenge abatꞌtoono ebe, kehm nyame Pita re, “Nnehm, fak-m go esamahr! Ntir enya nyi nne nyi, nyi Esowo sang.”
Jisos kehm lungu ellong ane tv elne, fere tob lung abatꞌtoono ebe, kehm tongo bo re, “Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtong re, á kp-m toono, nong á ten elne tv-m, fere rod ekros eje, tahm toon-m.

Nne no lꞌtong re, á bahke tahre elkpin ene go njini nyia, á bahke fere tane na elkpin ene. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌfere tane elkpin ene tib go egame esi, a esi ji alum Esowo, á bahke bele na etingitingi elkpin.
“Li re nne bahke bele afang nya njini nyia kpee, fere tane etohko eje, nsehng anyi á bahke lehke?
Ejumjum limm, ji nne bahke kake, kehm fake etohko eje.
Nne no lꞌdaang-m tib go egame alum go ebꞌbi njini nyia nyi ma ten Esowo, Mmon no nne bahke tob daang-e, á lꞌba go ellub ni nde, a abarebare enjel.”
Jisos kehm soro asi elbungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Egom jindiki ji yim a, nehm tiki kpo, tete bo nyehn etul bi Esowo ma badde ba go njini nyia a nsahm a nsahm.”
Kange kan nfung erakera, Jisos kehm yehke Pita, Jems, a Jon tahm a bo go ewong ji wahre wahre. Jisos kehm yaange ngubjing enye o.
Nsol nyi á kake no kehm bare kparaang, fere jo yꞌya. Nnene limm go njini nyia, no bahke ma baare elkohn ana nio.
Elaija abola Moses kehm lohngo ba bung a Jisos.
Pita kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Nsoo, nꞌnob re wahr jol a. E bahke sehke nkpatahk na era, ebkpatahk behko bꞌba, behko bi Elaija, behko bi Moses.”
Pita kahnem ana ji á bahke bungu, tibre bo jo fꞌfahl.
Ekparesemsem kehm soro tahl ba bulu bo. Bo kehm wuku ellum go ekparesemsem re, “A wo li akor-m mmon ewame no kpo kor-m sꞌsehng. Wuken ye!”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm soro kehme eljange. Bo kpeem nyehn nnene, sehngem Jisos ntahngtahng wo bo nyehn-e no.
Eji bo jo badde abake go nnahb ewong, Jisos kehm rehke bo re, “Kana tiki tong nnene ji ń nyehne no, tete Mmon no nne nyahme go elkv.”
Bo lohko bum erehke jio ji á kake bo. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Elnyahme ngubjing go elkv nia lohngo renan?”
Bo kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Jen ji wahng ka atꞌtibi ba atahm kpo bung re, Elaija bahke tohko gbo mbang ba?”
Á kehm faange bo re, “Elaija bahke tohko gbo mbang ba, ba tuungu nsol kpee bum. Nwer Esowo bungu renan bada Mmon no nne? Bungu re, Mmon no nne bahke nyehne erem, bo bahk-e tene.
N kp-n tongo re, Elaija eblohko ba. Bo lim-e ana ji koro bo, jang jang ana nwer Esowo bungu no.”
Bo feere kan ana, bo kehm ba kpiri abatꞌtoono baka gana, fere nyehn ellong ane tvv ma sennge bo kak. Atꞌtibi ba atahm bandiki jo limi nfaabe a abatꞌtoono Jisos.
Ane bao nyehne kan Jisos ana, kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm soro be tvtv song wan-e, kak-e nnyo.
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌlꞌlim nfaabe?”
Nne awohng go ellong ane bao kehm faange re, “Nsoo, n ko mmon ewame ba a ne. Tibre á kpi ebi etohko go ege atahng. Á nehme ma bung.

Edi ajehng ajehng ji ebi etohko jio lꞌsi mehl-e mehl, kpo rod-e tub ndi, nfahl jo tub-e na tub go nnyo. Á kpo kono amahn go esi, fere tahne na tahne. Me n gboongo abatꞌtoono eba re, bo kam-e ebi etohko jio jehke. Bo maam lim.”
Jisos kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpi ekꞌtaame go egahna ntim? M bahke kange renan a nahne? Ko mmon noo, ba a ne!”
Bo ko-e kan a, ba a ne, ebi etohko jio nyehne kan Jisos a, á kehm limi mmon noo, á gbo ngboko, fere gbo ndi, kehm kehme elgbehde. Nfahl jo tub-e go nnyo.
Jisos kehm bahbe nde re, “Ebkang renan eji eyam bia bom-e no?”
Á kehm-e faange re, “Bomo ngare nyi á jolo mmonse ntiil, tete rehng anv.
Nkpel tvv ebi etohko jio kpo gare re á wul-e. Nkpel nyindiki tub-e kak agun. Nkpel nyindiki tub-e kak alahb. Nong, wahr fil-a ndon, wo kak-r ebo, tohk-a jahk!”
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Wobbung re, ‘Tohk-m jahk.’ Nne no lꞌtaame, ejumjum limm, ji bahk-e riidi.”
Nde kehm soro rabe tvtv re, “Me n taame, kak-m ebo go egame ekꞌtaame.”
Eji Jisos nyehne re, ellong ane bao kpꞌkame ba rur, á kehm nyame ebi etohko jio, fere tong-e re, “Etohko ji kpo lim nne gbo ekamme, fere lak atung, ka kpe tiki yel mmon noa!”

Tvtv o ebi etohko jio kehm biingi tiim, kehm soro yehke mmon noo, á gbo ngboko ekidi lꞌlab. Ebi etohko jio kehm soro lohng-e. Mmon noo kehm sake noongo, are nkvne nyi. Owo ane bandiki kehm kehme elbungu re, “Yebkpo.”
Jisos kehm jabbe mmon noo go ebo, tab-e yiimi, mmon noo lohko yiimi.
Jisos yele kan ekpꞌkpa me, abatꞌtoono ebe kehm bake, ba bahb-e eji bo jolo ebo ebo re, “Jen ji wahnge wahr ki ma kam mmon noo ebi etohko jio yehke?”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Elkohn etohko ana jio, ń nehm ma tiki kam yehke, tohko tiki jol re, ero akake bi.”
Bo kehm tahme ejahbe jio asongo go Galili. Jisos joom seb re nne awohng awohng kahn edi ji á li no.
Tibre á jo tibi abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e rodo, kak abi ane go ebo, bo bahk-e wulu. Lꞌkang nfung era, á nyahme, jol go elkpin.”
Bo kahnem ji á jo bꞌbung. Bo jo fꞌfahl a ye bahb.
Eji bo song rehng go Kapenium, bo kehm yele go ekpꞌkpa. Jisos kehm bahbe abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Jen ji wahnge ń jo lim nfaabe mbang mbang?”
Jol bo we faangem. Tibre bo jo limi nfaabe mbang mbang bada nne no li njꞌjoka nne go bo ellong.

Jisos kehm jehke, kehm lungu abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal tv elne, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Nne no lꞌtong re, ye wo li ntubesi, á bahke fere jol nkahlanjahm, fere jol nlokeltum no bahke jo loko ane kpee.”
Á kehm koko mmonse ba yiimi go bo a mbuksong, kehm-e kpaake ebo, kehm bungu tong bo re,
“Nne no lꞌko mmonse ana noa a go egama mbing, á ma-m tob ko. Nne no lꞌko-m, á tob ko Nsoo no tum-m no.”
Jon kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Wahr ebnyehn nne no kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke go ega a mbing. Go egahre ellong á wobem. E sahd-e sahde re á rahke, tibre á wobem go egahre ellong.”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Kana ye sahde re á rahke. Tibre nnene limm, no bahke limi nkpokosi go egama mbing, kehm fere jo bung abꞌbi bada name.
Etingitingi, nne no tohk-r ko ekv, ye nne ewahre wo.
Nne no lꞌka-n mmobtuku alahb tib eji ń li abatꞌtoono ba Kraist, á bahke bele eltuuru go etingitingi.”
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Ga nob re, bo kahn nne eltal go emel, tub-e kak alahb, sehnge re á lim mmonse no ma taame tv-m, á gbo yel abiafem.
“Ebo eba lꞌkehm-a limi re wo yel abiafem, kim ebo bio tub go. Ga nob re wo bel ebo abehng, kpo, yel ejahbetul Esowo, sehnge re wo bel abo abal abal, kpo, je ellulagun ni lꞌkꞌtiki lahme go njinanjini.
Go wo aroongo nya kpo li abi ane lꞌkꞌtiki kpo. Agun nehm tiki lahme.
“Ekpade eja lꞌkehm-a limi re wo yel abiafem, kim ekpade jio tub go. Ga nob re wo jen ekpade ajehng, kpo, yel ejahbetul Esowo, sehnge re wo jen akpade abal abal, kpo, je go ellulagun.
Go wo aroongo nya kpo li abi ane lꞌkꞌtiki kpo. Agun nehm tiki lahme.
“Elmahr ena lꞌkehm-a limi re wo yel abiafem, luudu elmahr nio tub go.
Go wo aroongo nya kpo li abi ane lꞌkꞌtiki kpo. Agun nehm tiki lahme.
“Nne awohng awohng, Esowo bahk-e doobo go agun.
“Akang kpꞌnobo. Elyebe akang lꞌlohng, a bahke limi renan, kehm kpe yebe?
Jisos kehm tahme edi jio, siiri aya ma bo kpo lung re Jodan, rehng go egbuk jehko ji Judea. Fvfo, ellong ane kehm kpe ba rur. Á kehm kpe tib bo ana á kpo kono eltibi.
Egom Farisi jindiki kehm bake re bo ba gar-e. Owo bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Tong-r, ntahm enyahre bꞌbung re, nne li ma ten nkal ewe no jehk-e go etahka?”
Jisos kehm faange a mbahbe re, “Atahm anya Moses tib-n no?”
Bo faange re, “Moses tib-r re, nne yeele nwer, ka nkal ewe, kehm-e yehke elbal.”
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Moses nyono nsol nyia tib go egahne etahnsi.
Go mbomannahb eji Esowo limi njini, ‘Á limi nnenlum, a nnenkal.
Jia ji bahke wahng ka nne bahke tahme nde, a nnyehn sa, bo song jol abola nkal ewe,
bo fere jol ana ngubjing anyehng.’ Bo nehm kpe jol ane abal. Bo bahke fere jol ana nne awohng.
Ji Esowo ma kono edi ajehng, nne kꞌyaame.”
Bo feere kan a song rehng go bo etahk, abatꞌtoono ebe kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Ellum ni a kpꞌna bungu lohngo renan?”
Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Nne awohng awohng no lꞌten nkal ewe, fere song baange nondiki, yeblim abiafem nyao nya erehbe go esamahr bi Esowo tob nkal no á gbo mbang baang-e.
Ano wo fvfo tob li ka nnenkal no lꞌbe nlum ewe sa, fere song bal nlum nondiki. Yebtob lim abiafem nya erehbe go esamahr bi Esowo.”
Ane bako ko abon ba nse, ba goji Jisos re á kooro bo abo. Abatꞌtoono ebe jo sebe re bo sahde ane bao.
Jisos wuku kan a me, atahng kehm-e rake. Á kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Yaken abonsꞌsohko abonse ba ga egame! Kana kpe sahde bo! Tibre elkohn ane ana abonse baa, bo ba etul bi Esowo li ka bo.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no tohko taame, woomo go elwo ni Esowo ana mmonse kpo woomo go elwo ni nde, etul bi Esowo á nehm li.”
Á kehm koko abonse bao, kpaake bo abo, kehm kunu bo abo, jo fuulu bo.
Eji Jisos ma tahm eljen ene, á kehm nyehne nne ma be, ba jamm-e alahng, kehm-e bahbe re, “Nnooba ntꞌtibi, m bahke limi renan, kehm bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini?”
Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji wahng ka, a kehm-m lungu re nnooba ntꞌtibi? Nnene limm, no li nnooba nne, sehngem Esowo ntahngtahng bi li nnooba nne.
A kpꞌkahne atahm nya bungu re, ‘Ka wul nne! Ka kak afem nya erehbe! Ka v ejv! Ka yiimi ntianse efahnge! Ka nehm nne! Kak nso, a nne!’ ”
Nne noo kehm bungu re, “Ntꞌtibi, jol bomo ngare nyi n jolo ntiil tete ba rehng anv, nyaa kpee n kpo bꞌbum.”

Go elkoro wo Jisos kpiidi amahr enye seeng-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Ejum ajehng ji ma-a sa. Song, wo song gungu nsol afang enya, ko ba ka akpak! Owo a bahke bele afang go ejahbetul Esowo, wo ba, ba toon-m.”
Nne noa wuku kan ano, esamahr kehm-e gbodo. Á kehm soro tahm eje ndon ndon. Tibre á fange sehng.
Jisos kehm keebe, tong abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Bahke riidi, afang ane kehm yele go ejahbetul Esowo.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe, alum nyao gbale bo go eltim sehng. Jisos kehm kpe bung tong bo re, “Ate ebame, bahke riidi area, nne kehm yele ejahbetul Esowo.
Re efange nne kehm yele go ejahbetul Esowo, ekamel bahke sehnge go mbang a nga.”
Kpo na kpo abatꞌtoono ebe esi tete ga. Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Wo, nne awo bahke bele eltahre me lꞌlun?”
Jisos kehm keebe, seenge bo, kehm bungu re, “Ji nne lꞌkꞌma lim, goji Esowo riidem. Ajehng ajehng limm, ji kpo riidi Esowo.”
Pita kehm bungu re, “Wahr jia, eji e li a, wahr ebyake ejum ajehng ajehng kpi wo toono.”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no lꞌyake etahk eje, fere yake abonanyehn, nnyehn, nde, abon ebe, egbe eje, tib go egame esi, a esi ji alum Esowo,
á bahke bele na budu. Á bahke bele na ntahk budu nkpel atahl alon, bel abonanyehn, babnnyehn, abon, a ebgbe. Fvfo, ebnohko bia. Go ngare esꞌsong, á bahke bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
Ane gbalee ba li agbokombang bahke fere jol akahlenjahm. Fvfo, ane gbalee ba li akahlenjahm bahke fere jol agbokombang.”
Eji bo jo tahm go Jerusalem, Jisos gbo abatꞌtoono ebe mbang. Ala jo teele bo sehng. Ane bako ba jo toono bo go njahm jo fꞌfahl.
Jisos kehm kpe yehke abatꞌtoono ebe, kehm kpe tong bo nsol nyi bahk-e limi.

Á bungu re, “Nyehnen, anv, e kpꞌtahme go Jerusalem. Owo Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e rodo, kak atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm go abo. Bo bahke kimi elam ji bo bahk-e wulu, fere rod-e, kak ane bako ba ki li Jus go abo.
Bo bahk-e nyoko, fere jo so atel wohng-e, dv-e tete bo wul-e. Lꞌkang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv, fere jol go elkpin.”
Abon Sibidi, Jems abola Jon kehm bake goji Jisos, ba tong-e re, “Ntꞌtibi, ejum jia, ji e kpꞌsebe re, wo lim ka-r.”
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji ń kpꞌsebe re me n lim ka-n?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Ngare nyi a ma ji go ega eti etul, e kpꞌsebe re wahr tob ji a na o, noko go ega ejang eboblum, noko go ega ejang ebobkal.”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Ń nehme kahn ji ń kpꞌbꞌbahb. Ḿ bahke ma nyehn erem bi me m bahke nyehna? Ḿ bahke ma bel ewohngalahb ji m bahke bela?”
Bo kehm faange re, “Ee, e bahke ma bel.”
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Etingitingi, ḿ bahke tob nyehn erem bi m bahke nyehne, fere bel ewohngalahb ji m bahke bele.
Nsahm me n kpimm, nyi m bahke yehke ane re, noko ji go egame ejang eboblum, noko ji egame ejang ebobkal. Esowo bi bi bahke kake ane bao adi nya á ma toobo re á ka bo.”
Erik abatꞌtoono baka gana, ane awubu, wuku kan a bade Jems, a Jon, eltim kehm kehme bo rak tob bo.
Jisos kehm lungu bo kpee, kehm tongo bo re, “Ń kpꞌkahne re, ane ba bo yehke bo re bo jol atul, bo kpi nsahm nyi bo kpo fili ane ebo tꞌtahne. Ajꞌjok ane, bo ba kpo fili bo tꞌtahne.
Wahn, kana jo lim ano! Nne awohng awohng ewahne no lꞌseb re á jol njꞌjoka nne, á bahke fere jol nlokeltum ka wahn ane kpee.
Nne awohng awohng ewahne no lꞌfere seb re á jol ntubesi, á bahke fere jol nju ka wahn ane kpee.
Tibre Mmon no nne baam re bo jo lok-e, á ba re á ba loko na, fere ka elkpin ene, tahre ane gbalee yake.”
Bo kehm bake go Jeriko. Eji Jisos lohngo no, a abatꞌtoono ebe, a ellong ane ba jo toon-e, nwakamahr a nne no bo jo lung-e re Batimos ji mmon a Timeus ji nkpe a mbang ona, jo gboongo ane nsol.
Á wuku kan a re Jisos ji Nasaret wo, á kehm kehme elrabe re, “Jisos ji mmon a Devid, me n lub fil-a ndon!”
Ane gbalee kehm-e kehme elnyame re, á rahke ewok.
Jol á jo kpe rabe na wahre wahre re, “Mmon a Devid, me n lub fil-a ndon!”
Jisos kehm yiimi, kehm bungu re, “Lungen ye tv-m!”
Bo kehm lungu nwakamahr nyio re á ba. Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Bob eltim, wo tahm ba, á kp-a lungu.”
Á kehm tahnge mbomo eme tub, mehl karab yiimi, kehm jeke goji Jisos.
Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “A kpꞌsebe re me n lim jen ka-a?” Nwakamahr nyio kehm bungu re, “Ntꞌtibi, n kpꞌsebe re me n lub nyehn!”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Song, eltaame ena ni ma wahng ka, a ma nyehn.”
Tvtv o á kehm soro nyehn, tahm toono Jisos mbang mbang asongo.
Eji bo ma jen kabbe go Jerusalem, a abon ajahbe ba li sennge o kak, ana Betfage abola Betani ba li kohlo ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv, Jisos kehm yehke abatꞌtoono ebe na abal, tum re bo song.
Á tongo bo re, “Songen ejahbe jio o ji li egahna mbuksong. Ń lꞌsi rꞌrehng o, ḿ bahke nyehne mmombvankang no bo kal-e kꞌkuumu. Fanngen ye, wahn ko-e ba!
Nne awohng awohng lꞌfere bahb-n re, ‘Ń kpi jen lim a ne?’ tongen ye re, ‘Ntul wo kp-e sebe.’ Nfona mbvankang bahk-e yake elwaare ka-n.”
Bo kehm jeke, lohko song nyehn mmombvankang nonehm o, bo m-e kahn kohlo go mbutahk. Eji bo jo fannge,
ane ba yiimi o kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji ń kpꞌlimi o? Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌfannge mmombvankang noo?”
Bo kehm faange bo ana Jisos tongo bo. Bo yake bo, bo tahm a ne.
Bo kehm koko mmombvankang noo ba a ne goji Jisos. Bo kehm rodo abomo ebo, yal mmombvankang noo go njahm. Jisos kehm kuumu.
Ane gbalee jo yale abomo ebo go mbang. Egom jindiki jo ja amang go emahng, jo ba yal go mbang.
Ane bandiki gbo-e mbang, bandiki kahle njahm. Bo kpee kehm kehme elrabe re,
“Tehken Esowo!”
“Elfuulu jol ka nne no ma ba go mbing nyi Ntul!”
“Elfuulu jol ka etul bi Devid nso ejahre bi kpꞌbake!”
“Ellub jol ka Esowo bi li go ero!”

Jisos kehm rehnge go Jerusalem, sehng song yange go etahk Esowo, kehm kehme elkpuru ejum ajehng ajehng ji jolo go etahk Esowo jio. Eji atv yahke behde, Jisos kehm tahme asongo go Betani, a abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal.
Etoono efung behko eji bo tahme go Betani, jo jen asongo, Jisos, njal kehm-e yame.

Á kehm nyehne eti ji bo kpo lung re efig go fee ma tahb na tahb, jolo anyane anyane. Á kehm jeere, song rehng go nnahb re, fundiki á bahke tingi nkab anyehng. Eji á jeere no kohlo re á kpur me, jol kabem. Tibre ngare ka rehng nyi kpo kab.
Jisos kehm tongo eti jio re, “Nnene limm, no bahke kpe li nkab anyehng anyehng enya go etingitingi.”

Eji bo rehnge go Jerusalem, Jisos kehm yange go etahk Esowo, kehm song kam ane bao ba jo gungu, fere gꞌgunu. Á kehm gbulu akpꞌkuru nya ane ba jo yaange akpohko tub, fere gbul nti nyi ane ba jo gungu mbehl tub.
Á kpeem tiki taame re, nne awohng awohng jo sol ejum ajehng ajehng, sehng a ji etahk Esowo jio.
Á kehm tibi ane bao re, “Bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, Esowo re, ‘Etahk ejame, bo bahke jo lung re etahk ero akake ji li ka ane kpee.’ Wahn ebfere rod, bum ana ebehre awajv.”
Atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm wuku kan jia, bo kehm kehme mbang seb nyi bo bahke Jisos wul. Bo jo fahl-e fahl, tibre ellong ane bao kpo bo esi area tib go ege eltibi.
Elgung ba kan a, Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe kehm tahme ejahbe jio asongo.
Etoono efung behko eji bo jo jen mbang mbang asongo, bo kehm nyehne eti jio ji ki kab akab ma kpo kpee tete rehng go alohk.
Pita kehm buumu ji ma lim, kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Ntꞌtibi, nyehn! Eti ji nyaane a bungu no re bahke kpoko, eblohko kpo.”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Taamen tv Esowo!

Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne lꞌtaame tv Esowo, á li ma tong re, ‘Ewong mehl, song yiimi go aya!’ Ewong jio lohko mehl. Á tohko bel nfaabe go ege eltim, á lꞌfere taame re, ji á bahbe no bahke lohko lim, ji ji Esowo bahke tiki lim ka-e.
Owo wahng ka n kp-n tongo re, Ń lꞌkak ero, bahb ejum ajehng ajehng, taamen re wahn eblohko bel, ji ji ḿ bahke bele.
“Ń lꞌkehme ero kak, jo tahmen ka ate ebahne go ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń kpi no bada bo, goji Nso ejahne no li go ero lꞌtob tahm ka-n go egahne abiafem.
Ń tohko jo tahm ka nne, Nso ejahne no li go ero nehm tob tahm ka-n go egahne abiafem.”
Bo kehm kpe feere go Jerusalem. Eji Jisos jolo go etahk Esowo, atubesi abalimajom, atꞌtibi ba atahm, a anebkul nfam kehm bake goji Jisos,
kehm ba bahb-e re, “Nsahm anyi a kpi no, nyi a kpo lim elkohn nsol ana nyia?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Me fvfo, m bahk-n tob bahb mbahbe anyehng. Ń lꞌfaang-m, m bahk-n tongo nsahm ana nyi n kpi no, nyi n kpo lim nsol nyia.
Tong-m wahn, ewohngalahb ji Jon lohng goji Esowoa, afi lohng goji ane?”
Bo kehm kehme nfaabe lim atemtem re, “E bahke bungu renan? E lꞌtong re ‘Ewohngalahb ji Jon lohng goji Esowo’, á bahk-r bahbe re, ‘Jen ji wahng ka ń ki taame tv alum nya Jon?’
E lꞌfere bung re, ‘Lohng goji nne’, ma ane bahk-r limi ejum nji?” Bo jo fahle ane, tibre nne awohng awohng jo sahb kꞌkahn re, Jon jolo etingitingi nnyehnamahr Esowo.
Owo wahnge bo kehm faange Jisos re, “E nehme kahn.”
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Lꞌlun, wahn n nehm tob tong nsahm nyi wahng ka n kpo lim nsol nyia.”

Jisos kehm kehme elbungu a bo go ngaane re, “Nne jolo go, no bahme avain, fere kak ega sennge. Á kehm rahme elbing ni bo jo kak akab nti, fere jo kaame akab nti nyao tv elbing nio, alahb jo lohng. Á si enyong, kak ane ba jo baabe edi jio, kehm yaame abahmgbe edi jio, toono eje tahm ejahbe jehko ji li fee.
Ngare rehnge kan a, nyi bo kpo bong akab nti nyao. Nfono etahngga kehm tumu nlokeltum ewe awohng tv re á song ko akab nti enye goji ane ba á yaame bo etahngga eje.
Bo kehm-e tubu ejahm, dv-e tꞌtahne, kam-e, á feere abo abo.
Á kehm kpe tum nlokeltum noko. Bo kehm-e kpe dv, bom-e elok go esi, fere son-e.
Á kehm kpe tum nne noko. Ye, bo wul-e na. Ano wo tob lim egom jindiki ji á kpe tum. Bandiki bo dv bo. Bandiki bo wul na.
“Awohng no gohr-e sa, ekorokoro mmon ewe wo. Esꞌkohro, á kehm-e gohro tum tv bo. Á tiri re, ‘Mmon ewame bahke lubu bo.’
“Abayaame etahngga bao kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, ‘A wo li nne no bahke lehke elkv ene. Baan, wahr wulen ye, eji etahngga jia lꞌfere jol jꞌjahre.’
Bo kehm-e jabbe, wul-e, fere rod-e tub go nkpe etahngga.
“Jen ji nfono etahngga noo bahke limi? Á bahke wulu abayaame etahngga bao, fere faake etahngga jio ka ane bandiki.
Wahn ka lung a lung edi nwer Esowo jiaa, ji bungu re,
“ ‘Eltal ni asehketahk tene no,
ni ni ma fere jol nnahb ekahma?
Ntul Esowo limi jia ji li nkpokosi go egahra ntim.’ ”
Atubesi Jus kehm jo seb re bo bob Jisos. Bo jo kahne re, elgan nio á tubu bada bo. Bo jo fꞌfahl ellong ane ba jolo o. Bo kehm-e tahme sa, tahm ebo.
Bo kehm tumu egom Farisi jindiki, fere tob tum egom ane ba Herod tv Jisos re bo song bob-e go ege alum nnyo.

Eji bo je no, bo kehm bungu tong-e re, “Ntꞌtibi, e kpꞌkahne re, wo etingi nne ji. E kpꞌkahne re, wo kpehme rang ane. Nne awohng awohng li jang jang go ega esamahr. Á kpo lohko tib mbang nyi Esowo go etingitingi. Nꞌnob re wahr jo tahb etak ka ntul a Roma, afi nobem? Wahr jo tahba, afi wahr kꞌjo tahb?”
Jisos kꞌkahn awak ebo, kehm fere tong bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kp-m gare? Ka-m wahn nsiring, me n tohko nyehn!”
Bo kehm koko nsiring ba ka-e. Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Esi jia ji nyehne ji? Mbing nyia nyi nyehne nyi?”
Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Esi jia ji ntul ji. Mbing nyia nyi ntul nyi.”
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Ka-n ntul ji li ka ntul, wahn ka Esowo ji li ka Esowo!”
Egom Sadusi jindiki kehm bake goji Jisos.

“Ntꞌtibi, ntahm nyi Moses nyono ka-r li re, ‘Nne lꞌkpo, nkal ewe sa, eji á ki jel mmon awohng awohng, mmonannyehn nne no ma kpo wo bahke baange nnenkal noo, eji á lꞌjel abon ka mmonannyehn no ma kpo.’
Jolo abonanyehn nne na asehma. Ngbokambang baange nkal. Mmon awohng awohng á jelem, kehm kpoko.
Etoono kpe baange nnenkal nonehm o. Mmon awohng awohng á jelem, á tob kpo. Ano wo tob jol a mmonannyehn noko no toon-e no.
Erik abonanyehn bako ba sa njahm tob baange nnenkal nonehm o. Mmon awohng awohng bo tikem jel. Bo kpo kpee. Esꞌkohro, nnenkal noo gohro kpo.
Go esꞌkohro efung, ane lꞌfere nyahme go elkv, nne awo bahke jolo nlum a nnenkal noo? Kpee abonanyehn bao na asehma ko nnenkal noo ana nkal abo.”
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahn ebsoodo. Ń kpꞌkahne ji wahng kaa? Tibre ń nehme kahn nwer Esowo, ń nehme kahn nsahm nyi Esowo.
Go efung elnyahme ngubjing go elkv, ane bahke fere jol ana babenjel go ejahbetul Esowo. Aneblum nehm kpe ko akal. Anebkal nehm kpe bal alum.
Bade elnyahme ngubjing go elkv, ń ka lung a lung go nwer nyi Moses bade eti ji jo lula? Owo bo nyono re, ‘Esowo bungu tong Moses re, Me wo li Esowo bi Ebraham, a bi Aisik, a bi Jekob.’
Jia lohngo re, Ye wo li Esowo bi ane ba li go elkpin, bi akvne sang. Wahn ebsoodo tete.”

Ntꞌtibi no atahm awohng jolo o, no jo wuk ana bo jo bung. Á nyehne re, Jisos ebfaange Bab Sadusi nnooba nfaange. Á kehm lohngo ba, ba bahb Jisos re, “Ntahm anyi li li ngbokambang a ntahm nyi gbale sehnge atahm kpee?”
Jisos kehm faange re, “A wo li ngbokambang a ntahm, ‘Wuken abon Israel! Esowo Ntul ewahre, ye wo li Esowo ntahngtahng.
Nobo re Esowo Ntul ewa jo kor-a eltim eltim ena, a etohko etohko eja, a ntir ntir enya, a eko eko eja.’
Etoono ntahm nyehka li re, ‘Nne ebjing ewa jo kor-a ana ebjing eba.’ Ntahm anyehng anyehng go kpeem li, nyi li etahntahn ntahm sehnge nyia na ebal.”
Ntꞌtibi no atahm noo kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Ntꞌtibi, woblohko bung go etingitingi. Etingitingi, lohko li Esowo na abehng. Esowo abehng abehng kpeem li, sehngem ye ntahngtahng wo li no.
Ano wo nobo re Esowo jo kor nne eltim eltim ene, a ntir ntir enye, a eko eko eje. Nne ebjing ewe jo kor-e ana ebjing ebe.
Eji Jisos kahne re, yebfaange nnooba nfaange, á kehm-e tongo re, “Ebsa ntiil, a li etul bi Esowo.”
Eji Jisos jo tib go etahk Esowo, á kehm bahbe mbahbe anyehng re, “Jen ji wahnge atꞌtibi ba atahm kpo bung re, Mesaya bahke lohngo go etꞌtohngo ji Devid?
Yefono Devid nyono ana Etingi Etohko tong-e no re,
“ ‘Esowo bungu tong ntul ewame re,
Ji go egame eboblum,
tete me n lim anebekv eba etikunakpade eja.’
Yefono Devid jo lung-e re,
‘Ntul ewame’.
Bahke jolo renan, ntul noo kehm fere jol mmon ewe?”
Ellong ane bao wuku alum nyao go eyebatahng.
Jisos kehm kpe tib ane re, “Gberen atꞌtibi ba atahm! Kpo kor bo re bo jo kak akpawobo, jo yannge. Go are, bo kpo seb re, ane jo gong, kak bo nnyo.
Go ero, bo kpo ji go mbuksong. Go elkak, bo kpo ji adi nji nya fuumu re ajꞌjok ane ji.
Bo kpo nehm akalebun, taare ntahk ebo. Bo kpo kak alaabe aro go nnyo a nnyo, go ntim kpehme rehng. Elam ji bo bahke bibi sehng.”
Eji Jisos ji ona ekpꞌkpa Esowo kohlo edi ji bo kpo ka ayare, á jo nyehne ana bo kpi ayare ka. Afang ane tvv jo ba yaange na yaange akpohko ka.
Nkpak a nkalebun kehm bake, ba tub ederi ebbal kak, bi limi mpene anyehng.
Jisos kehm lungu abatꞌtoono ebe tv elne, kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nkalebun noa ana, ye wo ga ka sehnge ane bao kpee.
Egom jehko jo ka gbalee, jo sa bo gbalee go. Ye ji li nkpak, á ka kpee ji á bele no, ji kehn á jol ma ko, gunu nsol alehke.”
Jisos lohngo kan a ekpꞌkpa Esowo me, ntꞌtoono ewe na awohng kehme tongo re, “Ntꞌtibi, nyehn elkohn anoobo ntahk nya li gae! Nyehn agburu atal nya bo ko sie!”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Wobnyehn ajꞌjok ntahk nyaa? Jol eltal anehng anehng limm, ni bahke kpe kuumu a ntem. Bo bahke wake kpee, wohng ndi.”
Eji Jisos ji go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv, etahk Esowo jolo go ege a mbuksong kpidi kpidi, Pita, Jems, Jon, a Andru, bo jo jolo a ne o kehm-e bahbe re,
“Tong-r ngare nyi afemfem nyaa bahke limi. Tib-r elliingi ni bahke jolo, nsol nyio kpee kehm limi.”
Jisos kehm kehme eltibi bo re, “Kunen ekpu, eji nne awohng awohng lꞌki-n nehm.
Ane tvv bahke bake go egama mbing re, bo ba li ntꞌtahre. Bo bahke nehme ane tvv.
“Ń lꞌwuk bade ebta bi li kpidi kpidi, fere wuk aka nta fee, kana jo fahl mbol mbol! Elkohn nsol nyia bahke tiki lim. Jol nyaa ana lohngem re, esꞌkohro efung bi ma rehng na.
Ajahbe nyandiki bahke jo nok atemtem. Ajahbe nyandiki bahke kehme elnoko a ajahbe nyako. Ndi bahke jo gbꞌgbehke adi nyandiki. Owo njal bahke bake. Nyaa a kpee nya li mbomannahb erem.
“Baaben elnahne! Ane bahk-n jo bob, kak esub. Bo bahke jo dv-n dv go ntahk ero. Ḿ bahke jo yiimi go esamahr atubesi, a esamahr atul tib go egame esi, eji ń lꞌjo yiimi ntianse nyi nnoobo etib tong bo.
“Alum enyame bahke tohko gbo mbang yeere rehng ejang njini abehng abehng.

Bo lꞌbob-n, kak go esub, kana jo tiiri nsol nyi ḿ bahke bungu. Ngare nyio ellum anehng anehng ni Esowo lꞌfere ka-n, bungen! Tibre alum nya ḿ bahke bungu, nyanyahne sang, bahke jo lohng goji Etingi Etohko.
“Ane bahke kehme abonanyehn jabbe ka re bo wul. Babnde nne bahke tob lim abon ebo ano. Abon bahke tob ten babnde ebo, fere jabbe bo ka re bo wul.
Nne awohng awohng bahke jo ko-n ekv tib go egama mbing. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌsoro asi ano go mbang nyi Esowo tete rehng go esꞌkohro, ye wo bahke bele eltahre.”
“Ḿ bahke nyehne ‘ejum ji kpꞌsahb sꞌsab’, ji bahke rannge edi, yim no edi ji ki fuumu re yiimi. Wuungen atung, wahn kahn nob nob ana lohngo no. Ngare nyio ane ba li go Judea bahke beke, tahm go awong.
Nne no lꞌkuumu go ege ero etahk, jo re ekv, á lꞌbadde, á kꞌtohko seb elyele go ekpꞌkpa song rod ejum fili.
Nne no lꞌjol go ege egbe, á kꞌkpe tohko be na tahm go etahk, song rod abomo enye.
Ngare nyio bahke sabe area ka anebkal ba li ela, a anebkal ba kpi abon go ebo.
“Kaken ero ka Esowo, eji nfem nyio lꞌkꞌlim ngara nnale.
Ngare nyio erem bahke gbale sehng, jol bi kala jꞌjol bomo eji Esowo limi njini tete rehng anv. Jol erem ana bio nehm kpe tiki jol ejolojolo.
“Tohko jol re Ntul Esowo tele afung nyao kahbe, nne awohng awohng nehm jol no bahke bele eltahre. Tib go esi ane ba Esowo ma yehke, ji ji bahke wahnge Esowo tele afung nyao kahbe.
“Ngare nyio nne lꞌtong-n re, ‘Nyehnen Kraist ga!’ afi á tong-n re, ‘Nyehnen Kraist go!’ kana taame tv-e!

Akimfahnge ane bahke lohngo ba, jo ba bung re, bo ba li Mesaya. Egom jindiki bahke jo bung re, bo ba li abanyehnamahr Esowo. Bo bahke kehme nliingi tib, fere jo lim akpokosi, eji limi limi kan, bo lꞌnehm aneb Esowo, ba Esowo ma jak.
Kunen ekpu, m ma-n tong jia ana ngare kehm rehnge.
“Ngare nyio,
“ ‘Njul bahke dvvrv.
Ebareka nehm kpe ya na eyakeyake.
Alonlo bahke kehm elfooro go elbung gbo.
Atahm nya elbung bahke range.’
“Owo bo bahke nyehne Mmon no nne kpꞌbake go akparesemsem, a egburu nsahm enye, a ellub.
Owo á bahke tumu enjel enye re bo song ko ane ba Esowo ma jak bo go nkpohka njini anyehng anyehng ba a bo.
“Kpilen ejum go eti ji bo kpo lung re efig.
Tob li ka-n fvfo. Ń lꞌnyehn nsol nyio kpꞌlimi, kahnen re, elbake ni Mmon no nne ebkabbe.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane bao ba bahke jolo go elkpin ngare nyio, bo nehm kpo tete nsol nyio lim kpee.
“Elbung abola ndi bahke tane, alum enyame nehm tiki tan.
“Efung bio, a ngare nyio, nnene nehme kahn, jol babenjel ba li go ejahbetul Esowo nehme kan, jol Mmon fvfo nehm tob kahn. Nsoo ntahngtahng wo kpꞌkahne.
“Jo kunen ekpu! Kana tiki lal! Tibre ń nehme kahn ngare nyi nsol nyio bahke limi.
“Bahke jolo ana nne kpꞌtahme edi.
Kunen ekpu, tibre ń nehme kahn ngare nyi nfontahk bahke kehnge. Á li ma ba elgung, á li ma ba nlum atv, á li ma ba ngare nyi ekok kpꞌkuku. Á li ma ba efungfu.
Kana jo lal, eji afi nfontahk gbede na ba, á lꞌki-n ba kpiri, ń kpꞌlale.
Ji m bungu a, tong-n li ka wahn ane kpee re wahn jo baabe.”
Ngare nyio ebsa nfung ebal elkak Pasova kehm rehnge, nio ni abred nya bo kil jo kak ayist. Atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm jo sebe mbang ana nyi bo bahke bobo Jisos mbehr mbehr song wul.
Bo kehm bungu re, “E nehm lim ngare elkak, eji ntong lꞌkꞌgbo.”

Jisos kehm feere je go Betani go etahk Saimon ji jolo nne abili wuku wuku. Eji bo jo li nsol, nnenkal awohng kehm bake, ba yel ekpꞌkpa. Á fili elom akehng ji nno a nno, ji sahb kꞌkim ekun. Á kehm lennge elom akehng jio, yaange akehng kak Jisos go esi.
Ane bandiki ba jolo ona kehm kehme atahng rak, fere jo bung atemtem re, “Jen ji wahng ka á kpꞌfade akehng ana maa!
Kehn bo jol gungu, ko mpon atahl asehma, ko akpohko nyao, le akpak.” Eltim kehm rake bo tob nnenkal noo.
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Yaken ye! Jen ji wahnge ń kp-e gbiingi? Yeblim nnobonobo ejum ka-m.
Wahn, ngare anyehng anyehng akpak li a nahne. Lꞌfere kor-n, ḿ bahke ma jo lim nnoobo ka bo. Me n nehm jol a nahne ngare kpe kpe.
Nnenkal noa eblim ji á male no. Á toobo ebjing ebame bum, bi m bahke kpoko.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Edi ajehng ajehng go njini ji bo bahke tiingi nnoobo etib, bo bahke jo tob bung bade jia ji nnenkal noa ma lim, eji bo lꞌjo buum-e.”
Judas Iskariot ji woomo go ellong ewubu ane abal ba jo toono Jisos kehm tahme goji atubesi abalimajom re á song gungu Jisos.
Eltim yebe bo sehng, eji bo wuku ji Judas jo bung. Bo kehm taame re bo bahk-e kake akpohko. Á kehm kehme elsebe mbang nyi nno nyi á bahke jabbe Jisos kak bo go abo.
Ngbokambang efung elkak ni abred nya bo kil jo kak ayist, ni ni jolo efung bi bo wulu abon ejoro. Abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Gan wo a kpꞌsebe re wahr song toobo nsol alehke elkak bum-a?”
Jisos kehm tumu ane abal, fere tong bo re, “Songen go nfam. Ḿ bahke wane nne no solo etulahb. Toonen ye,
wahn song go etahk ji á bahke yange. Tongen nfontahk noo re, ‘Ntꞌtibi ewahre re, Ekpꞌkpa jin ji á bahke jehke, a abatꞌtoono ebe, li elkak nia?’
Á bahk-n tibi ekpꞌkpa ji li go ero enyong, ji bo ma jehke nsol kpee. Owo ḿ bahke toobo nsol nyio bum-r.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm tahme song rehng go nfam, lohko song nyehn nsol kpee, nyi Jisos tongo bo. Bo kehm toobo nsol elkak nyio bum.
Elgung ba kan a me, Jisos kehm tahme, a abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal.
Eji bo jehk go ekpꞌkuru kpꞌlehke nsol, Jisos kehm bungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng ewahne no kpꞌlehke nsol a name bahk-m jabbe, kak abi ane go ebo.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe, ndon kehm kehme bo fili. No nne jo bahbe Jisos re, “Me woa, afi?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Bahke jolo nne awohng go egahne ellong no kpꞌtohko ebred ekpingi ajehng a name.
Mmon no nne bahke kpoko ana nwer Esowo bungu no. Erem bahke gbale sehng ka nne no ma gungu Mmon no nne. Jol ga nob, li re, nne noo bo we jelem.”
Eji bo jo li nsol o, Jisos kehm rodo ebred, kak Esowo saam, kehm bakke ka abatꞌtoono ebe, kehm bungu re, “Koon, wahn li! A wo li ngubjing enyame.”
Á kehm rodo nkob, kak Esowo saam, kehm kake bo. Bo kpee kehm woko ona.
Jisos kehm bungu re, “A wo li alung emame ma egbanngalung ji nfenfe, ma kpꞌfabe ka ane gbalee.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, N nehm kpe tiki wo alahb avain maa tete go efung bio bi m bahke kpe wo a nahne go ejahbetul Esowo.”
Owo bo kehm yimi ese ero, kehm soro tahm asongo go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv.
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahn kpee bahke dulu atv maa tib esi ejame. Tibre nwer Esowo bungu re,
“ ‘Esowo bahke wulu mbaabebul,
ebul ebe yaame.’
Ngare nyi m ma nyahme go elkv, m bahk-n gboko mbang song rehng go Galili.”
Pita kehm faange re, “Me, wa n nehm tiki yake, jol afi egom jehka kpee yaam-a na sa.”
Jisos kehm bungu tong Pita re, “Etingitingi, n kp-a tongo re, Re nkok kehm kuku nkpel ebal, a bahke gbaame nkpel era atv maa re, me a nyimm.”
Pita kehm faange tꞌtahne re, “Me, wa n nehm tiki ten, jol afi elkv ni, m bahke tob kpo a na.” Abatꞌtoono bako kehm tob bung ano fvfo.
Bo kehm song rehng go etahngga ji bo jo lung re Gesemani.
Á kehm rodo Pita, Jems, a Jon, bo tahm. Á kehm kehme elfahle, ala fere jo teel-e.
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Eltim ename ebgbal ndon ndon sehng, jol tete rehng go elkv. Jiin ana, wahn jo baabe!”
Á kehm jeere, je esꞌsong, song gbo noongo ndi. Á kehm kehme ero kak re, “Nsoo, nong, me n kꞌlub nyehn erem bia, eyake lꞌfere jol.
Nsoo, ejum ajehng ajehng riidem go ega. Fak-m erem bia! Ana koro me sang, ana koro wo wo.”
Á kehm feere, ba kpiri abatꞌtoono ebe, ane ara, á ba no, bo kpꞌlale. Á kehm bungu tong Pita re, “Saimon, a kpꞌlala? A nehm ma ji awa anyehng kꞌlala?”
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Jo baaben, wahn jo kak ero, eji ń lꞌkꞌyel go elgaare. Etohko, mbang nyi Esowo kp-e kor, wo ga, ngubjing kpꞌleenge.”
Á kehm kpe feere, kpe song kehme ero bꞌnehm kak ana wuku wuku,
kehm kpe feere ba goji abatꞌtoono ebe, kpe ba nyehn bo, bo kpꞌlale. Tibre akpakamahr lubu bo ellu ellu. Bo joom kahn ji bo bahk-e tꞌtong.
Á kpe feere kan a me, á kehm ba tong bo re, “Ń kpi nlale nlala? Songen, wahn song re ekv! Ebgbal. Ngare nyi ma biingi a, nyi bo bahke jabbe Mmon no nne, kak abi ane go abo.
Mehlen, wahr tahmen! Nyehnen, nne no bahk-m jabbe, kak abi ane go abo yeb rehng a kpidi kpidi.”

Eji Jisos kpi mbungu mbungu, Judas ji woomo go ellong ewubu ane abal, ba jo toono Jisos, kehm lohngo ba, a ellong ane ba fili akahngkahng, a atahmtahm. Atubesi abalimajom, atꞌtibi ba atahm, a atubesi nfam ba tumu bo.
Nne no gung-e gungu tongo ane bao re, “Nne no, n lꞌsod-e nnyo, ye wo ń kpe-e sebe. Boben ye, song a ne, wahn baab-e nob nob!”
Judas rehnge kan a me, á kehm jeere rehng goji Jisos, kehm-e lungu re, “Ntꞌtibi!” kehm soro sod-e nnyo.
Bo kehm tubu Jisos ejahm gꞌgingi.
Nne awohng no yiimi ona kehm wobo ekahngkahng go mbak, kpale nlokeltum a ntubesi abalimajom awohng etung.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Ń fili akahngkahng, a atahmtahm re wahn ba bob-m ana nwulanea?
Efung abehng abehng n jo jolo a nahne, jo tib-n go etahk Esowo, me ḿ bobem. Tibre alum nya Esowo bungu no bahke tiki lim.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kpee kehm soro yaam-e sa, be ebo tahm.
Njangkun anyehng jolo ona, nyi bobo mbarebara mbomo mi mi. Á jo tob toono Jisos fvfo. Bo gare re bo bob-e.
Á kehm yake mbomo tv bo, kehm beke ngubjing nehme nehme tahm.
Bo kehm koko Jisos tahm a ne go etahk ntubesi abalimajom. Owo atubesi abalimajom kpee, a anebkul nfam, a atꞌtibi ba atahm kono nkon.
Jisos jo jene ekv. Pita jen ekv. Bo ba rehng go nlaaga ntubesi abalimajom. Owo Pita ji no, a alokeltum nfontahk, jo wooro agun.
Atubesi abalimajom, a atul esub jo sebe mbang ana nyi bo bahke Jisos ebi ka, toono o, bo wul-e. Bo tikem nyehn ebi ajehng ajehng ji Jisos limi no.
Atianse gbalee jo kiimi afahnge lake Jisos. Alum nya bo jo bung joom yel.
Ane bako kehm kpe mehl, kiimi afahnge lak-e re,
“E wuk-e ana á bungu re, á bahke wake etahk Esowo jio ji ane si no, fere tuungu si ji nfenfe o nfung era, ji bo kala sꞌsi.”
Atianse nya bo jo yiimi, anyo joom yel jang jang.
Ntubesi abalimajom kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bahbe Jisos re, “A nehme faanga? A nehme wuk ebi ji atianse nyaa kp-a kaka?”
Jisos belle na belle, jol á faangem ellum anehng anehng.
Ntubesi abalimajom noo kehm-e kpe bahb re, “Wo wo li Mesaya, Mmon no Esowo bi gbale sehnga?”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Me wo. Ḿ bahke nyehne Mmon no nne jehk go eboblum Esowo bi kpi nsahm. Ḿ bahk-e nyehne ana á kpꞌbake go akparesemsem.”
Ntubesi abalimajom kehm yare ewobo eje, kehm bungu re, “E nehme kpe seb ntianse anyehng anyehng.
Wahn ebwuk abi alum enye, ana á ma su Esowo. Ń kpꞌtiri renan?” Bo kpee kehm bungu re, “Yebgbo ntahm. Nobo re bo wul-e.”
Egom jindiki kehme atel so wohngo Jisos. Bo gba-e mbomo go esamahr, kehm-e kehme eldohko. Bo kehm bungu re, “Nyehn-r amahr me!” Alokeltum bao soro kehm-e nkpal ruumu.
Ngare nyio Pita kpeke li go nlaaga nyio. Owo nlokeltum a ntubesi abalimajom no jolo nnenkal kehm bake.
Á nyehne kan Pita a me, eji á kpi agun wooro, á kehm-e seenge too, kehm-e tongo re, “Wo fvfo tob jolo a Jisos ji Nasaret.”
Á kehm gbaame re, “Me, we n nyimm. N nehme wuk ji a kpꞌbungu.” Á kehm lohngo, song yiimi go mbuga. Nkok kehm soro kuk.
Nlokeltum noo kehm-e kpe nyehn, kehm kpe bung tong ane ba yiimi o re, “Ye wob go bo ellong.”
Pita kehm kpe ten. Mmongare ntiil ane ba yiimi o kehm kpe bung tong Pita re, “Go etingitingi, wo wob go bo ellong. A lohng go Galili. Wahr ma-a liingi go ega alum.”
Pita kehm tiri re, “Esowo demm-m na demme. Nne no ń kpꞌbungu bada ne, me, we n nyimm.”
Nkok kehm soro kpe kuk. Owo Pita kehm soro buumu ellum ni Jisos bungu tong-e re, “Re nkok kehm kuku nkpel ebal, a bahk-m tene nkpel era.” Á kehm kehme ellingi ndon ndon.
Etoono efungfu behko atubesi abalimajom, atꞌtibi ba atahm, anebkul nfam, a atul bako ba esub kehm toobo ana bo bahke limi. Bo kehm kake Jisos agbekobo, kehm-e rodo, tahm a ne, song kak Pailet go ebo.
Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “Wo wo li ntul no Jusa?”
Jisos kehm taame re, “Ee, me wo.”
Atubesi abalimajom bao ona kehm kehme eltooro nsol gbalee, fere jo ka-e ebi.
Pailet kehm kpe bahb Jisos re, “A nehm faanga? A nehme wuk ebi ji bo kp-a kaka?”
Jisos kpeem faange ejumjum. Pailet kehm-e kpoko esi area.
Ngare elkak (Pasova) anyehng anyehng Pailet jo yehke nne a ngbekobo awohng yake, no bo lꞌseb.
Ngare nyio ona nne awohng woomo go ngbekobo, no bo jo lung-e re Barabas, budu ate ebe ba jo wul ane, eji bo jo jokko ejahbe.
Eji ellong ane kame no ba rur, bo kehm tongo Pailet re, á yehke nne awohng. Ano wo eljini ene jolo no, ni á jo kono ellimi.
Pailet kehm bahbe bo re, “Ń kpꞌsebe re me n yehke ntul no Jus ka-na?”
Á jo kahne re, atubesi abalimajom ebyake Jisos ka-e, tib eji á jo teele bo ala.
Atubesi abalimajom kehm nyare ellong ane bao, eji bo lꞌgbiingi Pailet, á yehke Barabas yake, fere wul Jisos.
Pailet kehm kpe bung tong ellong ane bao re, “Jen ji ń kpꞌsebe re me n lim nne noa no ń kp-e lungu re ntul no Jus?”
Bo kehm rabe re, “Kum-e go ekros!”
Pailet kehm bahbe re, “Anv, jen ji á ma lꞌlim?”
Bo kehm kpe rabe tiim re, “Kum-e go ekros!”
Pailet jo sebe re, ellong ane bao bel eyebatahng, owo á kehm yehke Barabas yake, yake Jisos ka, bo dv-e. Bo dv-e kan a me, Pailet rod-e, kak nsoja go abo re bo song kum-e go ekros.
Nsoja nyio kehm rodo Jisos, yange a ne go nlaaga ntubesi ejahbe. Bo kehm lungu ellong nsoja nehko re bo ba.
Bo kehm kake Jisos mbilibili ekpawobo ana ji atul jo kono elkake, kehm tahnge ekpasi akpiri, ba konng-e go esi.
Bo kehm-e kehme nnyo mia kak re, “Wo noaa, ntul ewahra?”
Bo kehm koko ebti, jo rum-e go esi, kehm kehme atel so wohng-e, jo gbo jamm-e alahng, are bo kp-e kake na.
Bo nohk-e kan a rahke, bo kehm-e yehke ekpawobo jio, kehm feere a nsol enye kak-e, tahm a ne re bo song kum-e go ekros.

Eji bo fi mbang mbang, bo kehm nyehne nne no bo jo lung-e re Saimon ji lohng mmojahbe noko kpꞌbake go Jerusalem. Bo kehm-e bobo re á sol ekros ji Jisos. Saimon jolo nne a Sirin, ye wo jele Aleksanda, a Rufus.
Bo kehm koko Jisos tahm a ne go edi ji bo jo lung re Golgota, ji lohngo re Edi Nkpakesi.
Owo bo gare re bo ka-e amahm semme anyane nya bo kpo lung re mmir. Jisos tikem wo.
Bo kehm-e kumu go ekros, rod abomo enye bum, fere tub elfaange re bo kahn ana nne awohng awohng bahke koko.
Jolo nkaranka esehmwubu nyi efungfu nyi bo kum-e go ekros.
Ejum ji wahng ka bo kum-e lake go ekros, ji ji bo nyono go ekros re, “A wo li ntul no Jus.”
Bo tob kumu awulane, ane abal lake ona, noko, bo kum-e go ege ejang eboblum, noko go ege ejang ebobkal.
Ana wo li ellum ni nnyehnamahr Esowo bungu no go nkꞌkula ngare re, “Bo bahk-e fange kak go ellong abi ane.” Ni ni a, ma lohko jol.
Ane ba jo sehng mbang jo tiib-e abo, fere jo su-e re, “A tongo re, a bahke wake etahk Esowo, fere tuungu si ji nfenfe go nfung era.
Tahre elna, wo badde go ekros me!”
Atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm jo tꞌtob nyok-e fvfo, fere jo bung atemtem re, “Á kpo tahre ane bako. Yefono nehm ma tahre elne.
Nong, wahr nyehn ana Kraist, ntul no Israel, bahke badde go ekros ba, eji e lꞌtaame tv-e.”
Ane ba, bo tob kum bo go akros fvfo jo tꞌtob su Jisos.
Eji efin ma yiimi, ejannge kehm gboko go ejahbe jio kpee, ji tete biingi awa na ara.
Nkaranka era nyi elgung Jisos kehm rabe wꞌwahre wꞌwahre re, “Eloi eloi lama sabaktani!” ji lohngo re, “Nsoo, nsoo, jen ji wahng ka a ma-m yake anae?”
Eji egom ane bandiki ba jolo ona wuku alum nya Jisos bungu no, bo kehm bungu re, “Wuken, á kpi Elaija lung.”

Nne awohng kehm beke song ko ndꞌdahng, suku go amahm, tung go esi ebti, kehm tabe ton Jisos go ege a nnyo re á yab. Á kehm bungu re, “Nong, wahr tohko nyꞌnyehn, joare Elaija bahke bake, ba fon-e go ekros.”
Jisos kehm soro rabe, soro kpo.
Ekpiki ji bo tohko go etahk Esowo kehm soro yang, bomo ero tete ba jahm ndi.
Eji ntubesi a nsoja no yiimi ona wane go ekros nyehne ana Jisos kpo no, á kehm bungu re, “Nne noa ana lohko jol Mmon Esowo!”
Anebkal bako jolo ona, ba yiimi go fee, jo nyehn, Salome a Meri ji lohng go Magdala, go Meri nnyehn a Joses abola Jems, ji jolo mmonse. Bo tob woomo go ellong nio.
Bo jo toono Jisos ngare nyi á jolo go Galili, fere jo kak-e ebo. Ellong anebkal bako ba tob toono Jisos ba go Jerusalem fvfo, tob jolo o.
Efung bi bo kpo toobo ebjing bi elkak Pasova, bi sene efung Esabat,

owo Josef ji lohng go Arimatia kehm bake. Á jolo nlamalam no jo sahb lꞌlub ane. Á jo siki elbake nio ni etul bi Esowo. Josef jo sahb tahm song kpiri ntul a Pailet, kehm-e bahbe re á lub taame, á song fono ekv ji Jisos.
Pailet kehm-e sahb kpꞌkpo esi, eji á wuku re, Jisos ebtahr kpꞌkpo. Á kehm lungu ntubesi a nsoja, kehm-e bahbe, joare yebtahr kpꞌkpo.
Eji Pailet wuku goji ntubesi a nsoja noo re, yeblohko kpo, á kehm tongo Josef re, á song fono ekv ji Jisos, song a ji.
Josef kehm gunu mbarebara mbomo, kehm song fono ekv ji Jisos, fere kpennge mbomo mio, rod tahm a ji, song kak go elahm bi bo rahme go ekpartal. Á kehm bannge eltal, bulu go nnyo elahm.
Meri ji lohng go Magdala, abola Meri nnyehn Joses, bo jo kpuru re bo nyehn edi ji bo kake Jisos.
Eji efung Esabat ma sehng, Meri ji lohng go Magdala, a Salome, go Meri nnyehn Jems, bo song gunu ajoobo akehng re bo song taame ekv ji Jisos.
Ngbokambang efung go erahde, efungfu atv atv, bo kehm tahme go elahm ngare nyi njul ma ta elbange.
Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, nne awo bahke bannge eltal nio go nnyo elahm ka-r me?”
Jolo egburu eltal ni nnen a nnen. Eji bo rehnge go elahm, bo kehm tabe asamahr ebo, soro nyehn eltal nio ma bannge, noongo go nkpe.
Bo kehm soro yel go elahm. Owo bo nyehne njangkun jehk go ejang eboblum, nyi kake mbarebare ekpawobo. Bo kehm kehme elfahle.
Njangkun nyio tongo bo re, “Kana kpe fahl! Ń kpi Jisos ji Nasaret seb, ye ji bo kum-e go ekros. Ana á limm. Yebnyahme fi. A wo bo bum-e no.
Songen anv, wahn song tong Pita, a abatꞌtoono Jisos bako fvfo re, Jisos bahk-n gboko mbang song rehng go Galili. Go wo ḿ bahk-e nyehne, ana á tong-n no.”
Owo bo kehm soro lohng go elahm, be asongo. Tibre ala jo tꞌteele bo, akahb fere jo kahm bo. Bo tikem bung ejumjum, tong nne awohng awohng. Tibre bo jo fꞌfahl.
Eji Jisos nyahme go elkv, á nyahme ngbokambang efung go erahde nkpese efungfu. Á gbo mbang kpiri Meri ji lohng go Magdala, ye ji á kam-e abi atohko na asehma yehke.
Meri kehm tahme song tong ane bao ba jo toono Jisos, ba ji ndon ndon, fere jo ling.
Eji bo wuku re, Jisos noa go elkpin, Meri m-e nyehn, bo tikem taame tv-e.
Fvfo, Jisos kehm tob kpiri abatꞌtoono ebe, ane abal, go elfoongo nne nondiki eji bo ma lohng go Jerusalem kpꞌtahme ejahbe jehko.
Bo kehm feere ba tong abatꞌtoono baka, jol bo tikem taame tv bo.

Esꞌkohro, Jisos kehm ba kpiri abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu a nne awohng, eji bo kpi nsol li. Á kehm nyame bo tib go bo ekꞌtaame, a etahnsi ebo. Tibre bo tikem taame tv ane bao ba nyehn-e no, fere ba tong bo re, yebnyahme go elkv, fere jol go elkpin.
Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Songen go njini kpee, wahn song bung alum Esowo tong nne awohng awohng.
Nne no lꞌtaame, fere bel ewohngalahb, á bahke bele eltahre. Nne no tohko fere taame, á bahke lehke ebi.
Ane ba lꞌtaame, bo bahke bele nsahm nyi bo bahke jo lim akpokosi. Bo bahke jo kam ane abi atohko yehke go egama mbing. Bo bahke jo bung go ajahbe nfenfe.
Bo lꞌrod enyo go abo, fere wo ebi ekahm, ejumjum nehm lim bo. Bo bahke jo kunu aneb ayam abo, bo nob.”
Eji Ntul a Jisos ma bung a bo mal, nsahm Esowo kehm-e soro rod, tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo. Jisos song ji go eboblum Esowo.
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm tahme, jo bung alum Esowo edi ajehng ajehng. Ntul Esowo jo kake bo ebo, fere jo yiimi ntianse ka alum enye nya bo jo bung, eji bo jo lim akpokosi nya á ka bo re bo lim.
Ane gbalee ebnyon nsol nyi ma lim go egahre ellong, nyi e kpo taame tv go etingitingi.
Bo nyono ana ane ba jolo go mbomannahb, ba nyehne nsol nyio go amahr tong-r, bo ji jolo alokeltum ba Alum Esowo.
Tib eji me n tob seb nsol nyio kpee kahn nob nob ana jolo go mbomannahb, owo wahng ka n tiri re, nꞌnob re, me n tob nyon nsol nyio go ntooranti ka-a,
eji a lꞌkahn re, nsol nyi bo tib-a no lohko li go etingitingi.

Ngare nyi Herod jolo ntul go Judea, nlimajom awohng jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Sekaraya. Á woomo go ellong abalimajom ba Abija jolo ntubesi abo mahne mahne. Nkal ewe, bo jo lung-e re Elisabet ji lohngo go etꞌtohngo ji Eron.
Bo ane abal abal jolo atingitingi ane go esamahr Esowo, ba jo bum atahm nya Ntul Esowo kpee nseenga nseenge.
Bo jelem mmon awohng awohng. Tibre Elisabet jolo ngum a nnenkal. Ngare nyio bobkul ane abal abal.
Efung abehng Sekaraya jo limi eltum njom alimi go etahk Esowo, tib jolo esennge ji ellong nꞌne.
Ana eljini ni abalimajom jolo no, owo bo kehm-e yehke re á kak agun go insens, jo teebe go ekpꞌkpa Esowo.
Ane baka kpee jolo ga elatahk, jo kak ero ngare nyi insens jo teebe.
Owo enjel nyi Esowo kehm lohngo ba kpir-e. Enjel nyio yiimi go ejang eboblum bi edi njom jio ji insens jo teebe.
Eji Sekaraya nyehn-e no, ala kehm-e teele, á kehme elfahle.
Owo enjel nyio kehm-e tongo re, “Sekaraya, ka kpe fahl! Esowo ebwuk ero eba. Elisabet nkal ewa bahke jele mmon no nlum ka-a. A bahk-e gungu mbing re Jon.
A bahke bele eyebatahng, fere jo geere. Ane gbalee, eltim bahke yebe bo, ń lꞌjel-e.
Tibre á bahke jolo njꞌjoka nne go esamahr bi Esowo.
Á bahke feere abon Israel gbalee ba ka Esowo, Ntul abo.
Á bahk-e gboko mbang a etohko ji Elaija, a nsahm a nsahm enye,
Owo Sekaraya kehm bahbe enjel nyio re, “M bahke limi renan, kehm kahne, joare lohko li go etingitingi? Tibre me n kul, nkal ewame fvfo ebtob kul.”
Enjel nyio kehm-e faange re, “Me wo li Gebriel ji kpo yiimi go esamahr bi Esowo. Esowo bi tum-m no re me m ba bung a na, fere tiing-a nnoobo etib bia.
A bahke gboko ekamme. A nehm ma kpe bung tete rehng efung bi ejum jia bahke jolo, tib eji a ki taame tv alum enyame nya bahke jolo go etingitingi, ngare nyio lꞌbiingi.”
Ane ba jo sik Sekaraya jo kpo bo esi sehng, eji á ma laange ano go ekpꞌkpa Esowo.
Eji á lohngo go elatahk, á kpeem jo ma bung a bo. Owo bo kehm soro kahn re, yebnyehn nkpokosi ejum go ekpꞌkpa Esowo. Eji á ki ma jo bung go nnyo, á fere jo bung a bo go abo abo.
Eji afung nya á jo lim eltum go etahk Esowo ma mal, á kehm tahme kehnge.
Eji ma jol ano, Elisabet nkal ewe kehm sake ela, sa woomo ekpꞌkpa tete nnyahng elon. Á jo bungu re,
“Anv, eji m ma fili Ntul Esowo ndon, owo á ma-m kak ebo mbang nyia, eji á lꞌlim-m, n jo lub ane.”
Eji ma kang nnyahng erakera mi Elisabet sa ela, owo Esowo kehm tumu enjel Gebriel tv go ejahbe ajehng ji jolo go Galili, ji bo kpo lung re Nasaret.
Á ko etib ba a bi re á ba tiingi ngbahme anyehng nyi bo jo lung-e re Meri ji bo kala nꞌnoongo a ne. Nne awohng no bo jo lung-e re Josef ji lohng go etꞌtohngo ji ntul a Devid wo lame elbal a ne.
Enjel nyio kehm ba kpiri Meri, kehm-e tongo re, “M ma-a kak nnyo, wo ji Esowo ma-a fuulu. Ntul Esowo li a na.”
Owo ala kehm sahb tꞌteele Meri, eji á wuku etib bi enjel nyio tiing-e no. Á kehm kehme eltiiri bade ana nnyo akake mio lohngo no.
Enjel nyio kehm-e tongo re, “Meri, ka kpe fahl! Esowo ma-a fuulu.
A bahke sake ela, jel nnenlum no a bahk-e gungu mbing re Jisos.
Á bahke jolo njꞌjoka nne. Bo bahke jo lung-e re Mmon no Esowo bi gbale sehng. Ntul Esowo bahk-e jehke go eti etul ji nde Devid.
Á bahke fili abon Jekob go njinanjini. Etul ebe, esꞌkohlo nehm bel.”
Owo Meri kehm bahbe enjel nyio re, “Jia kehm jolo renan, eji n ki kpi nlum!”
Enjel nyio kehm-e faange re, “Etingi Etohko bahke jolo a na. Nsahm nyi Esowo bahk-a bulu.
Nyehn Elisabet, nne a nnahb ewa, ji bo jo lung-e re ngum a nnenkal, yebsa ela bi á bahke jele nnenlum, nnyahng erakera mi a, jol eji á ma kꞌkul o.
Tibre Esowo, ejumjum limm, ji á kil jo ma lim.”
Owo Meri kehm bungu re, “Me n li nlokeltum no Esowo. Nong, jol ana a bungu no.”
Enjel nyio kehm soro tahm.
Jol gaam kang, Meri kehm toobo ebjing, foomo tahm song rehng go ejahbe ajehng ji jolo go ejang awong nya Judea.
Owo á kehm song yange go etahk Sekaraya, kehm song kak Elisabet nnyo.
Eji Elisabet wuku nnyo mi Meri kak-e no, mmon no woomo Elisabet go ala kehm nvvdv. Etingi Etohko kehm ruru Elisabet go atahng,
owo á kehm soro kehme elbungu wahre wahre re, “Wo wo, Esowo ma-a fuulu go ellong anebkal. Elfuulu li ka mmon no a bahke jele.
Jen ji wahnge elkohn nkpokosi ejum ana nyia ma lim re nnyehn ntul ewame ba nyehn-m?
Tibre n wuku kan nnyo mi a kak-m no, mmon no wob-m ga ala soro yuudu go eyebatahng.
Eyebatahng li a na, eji a ma taame tv etib bi Ntul Esowo tiing-a no. Tibre bahke lohko jol go etingitingi.”
Owo Meri kehm bungu re,
“Eltim ename kpꞌtehke Ntul Esowo.
Etohko ejame kpꞌgeere kak Esowo, ntꞌtahre ewame,
eji á ma-m buumu, me ji li nlokeltum ewe no li reed.
Bomo anv asongo ane kpee bahk-m jo lung re,
nne no Esowo m-e fuulu.
Tibre Esowo bi gbale sehng ma-m rod,
kpꞌlimi agburu nsol.
Mbing enye li saang.
Ndon enye li ka ane ba kp-e fahle,
jol afi bo jini ngare anyi.
Á tanne ebo ebe, fere tib nsahm enye, kam aneb elgeere raade,
a ntir a ntir ebo.
Á kpo radde ajꞌjok atul go bo a nti etul,
fere mehl ane ba li rede rede wahre.
Ane ba njal ma yam bo,
á kpo ka bo anoobo nsol,
bo li wohngo,
fere yake afang ane, bo song abo abo.
Esowo ebkak Israel, nlokeltum ewe, ebo,
eji á ma buumu ndon enye,
nyi li go njinanjini
ana á bungu tong babnso ejahre,
fere tong Ebraham,
a abon ebe.”
Meri kange ejum nnyahng era a Elisabet, kehm feere kehnge.
Ngare kehm rehnge nyi Elisabet yahke jel. Á kehm jele nnenlum.
Eji aneb nkontahk ebe, a ane ebe wuku ana Ntul Esowo m-e tib egburu ndon enye, bo kehm-e tobo elgeere.
Eji mmon ma kang nfung enehkeni, bo kehm tahme re bo song yehk-e nrur. Owo bo kehm-e gungu mbing nyi nde re Sekaraya.
Nnyehn kehm tene re, “Eꞌee, bo bahk-e jo lung re Jon.”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Nne ewa awohng awohng limm, no kpi mbing nyio!”
Bo kehm bahbe nde go abo abo re, “Elkohn mbing anyi a bahke gungu mmon ewa?”
Sekaraya kehm bahbe re, bo ka-e nwer.
Á kehm koko nyon re, “Mbing enye, bo bahke jo lung-e re Jon.” Ane kpee kehm kpoko bo esi.
Sekaraya kehm soro kpe kehme elbungu, fere jo tehk Esowo.
Kpee ane ba lene kohlo o kehm kehme elfahle. Eka jio kehm yeere go ejang bi ajahbe kpee nya jolo go awong nya Judea.
Ane kpee ba wuku no, kehm rodo kak go bo a ntim, fere jo bahb re, “Anv, mmon noa bahke jolo elkohn nne awo?” Tibre bo nyehne ana nsahm nyi Esowo jolo a ne.
Owo Etingi Etohko kehm ba rur Sekaraya, nde Jon, á kehme amahr nyehn re,
“Nong, wahr tehken Esowo bi Israel, bi li Ntul ewahre.
Yebba re á ba kak ane ebe ebo,
fere fak bo yake.
Á ma-r ka ntꞌtahre no kpi nsahm, no lohng go etꞌtohngo ji Devid, nlokeltum ewe.
Ano wo Esowo bungu sehng go nnyo mi abarabare anyehnamahr ba jolo mahne mahne.
Á tongo re, á bahk-r tahre yehke go abo nya anebekv ebahre, fere yehk-r go abo nya ane kpee ba ma-r ko ekv,
fere tib babnso ejahre ndon enye,
tob buumu mbarebare enyam ebe bi á nyame no,
eji á tiri no, fere tong Ebraham, nso ejahre re,
á bahk-r yehke go abo nya anebekv ebahre,
eji e lꞌjol ejahre ejahre ka ye ye, fere li eno go ege esamahr,
kꞌfahl afung kpee nya e li go elkpin.
Mmon ewame, bo bahk-a jo lung re, nnyehnamahr no Esowo bi gbale sehng.
Tibre a bahke gboko Ntul mbang, song tuungu mbang enye bum-e,
fere tong ane ebe re bo bahke bele eltahre,
tib eji Esowo bahke tahme ka bo go bo abiafem.
Tibre Esowo ebahre kpi egburu ndon nyi bahke lohngo go ero.
Ellohngo ni bahke lohngo bahke jolo ana njul kpꞌyake tub-r,
eji lꞌka ane ba jehk go ejannge ellennge, a ane ba nong go emel elkv,
fere jo tib-r mbang nyi elkoono.”
Mmon noo kehm gbale, fere tahne go etohko. Á jolo go elka emahng tete efung bi á lohngo gbuul, Israel kehm-e nyehne.
Ngare nyio nyi ntul Agostos kehm jehke ntahm re, bo fange njini kpee, kak abing ebo go nwer.
Eji bo gbo mbang fange ane, Sirinus wo jolo ntubesi go Siria.
Nne awohng awohng kehm tahme go ege ejahbe re bo kak-e mbing go nwer.
Josef ji lene go Nasaret nyi Galili kehm tob tahm, song rehng go Betlehem ji Judea, ejahbe jio ji bo jele ntul a Devid. Tibre Josef lohng go etꞌtohngo ji Devid.
Á je ona re bo kak mbing enye go nwer, a Meri ji á tongo re á bahk-e koko, ye ji jolo ela.
Eji bo jolo o Betlehem, ngare kehm biingi nyi Meri yahke ba eljele.
Owo á kehm jele ngbokambang a mmon ewe no nlum, kpenng-e abomo, fere rod-e, bum go ejum ji bo jo kak efong nsol alehke. Tibre eyake jolem go ekpꞌkpa elkang ka bo.
Abaabebul jolo ejang ejahbe jio, ba jo kang go emahng, jo baabe ebul ebo atv.
Enjel nyi Esowo kehm lohngo ba kpiri bo. Ellub ni Esowo kehm yake ana njul tub bo. Bo kehm kehme elfahle tete.
Owo enjel nyio kehm tongo bo re, “Kana kpe fahl! Tibre n ko nnoobo etib ba a bi, bi kpi egburu eyebatahng ka ane kpee.
Tibre lela bobjel ntꞌtahre ka-n go ejahbe ji Devid, no li Kraist ji Ntul.
A wo li elliingi ka-n. Ḿ bahke nyehne mmon elbili no bo m-e kpennge abomo, á nong go ejum ji bo kpo kak efong nsol alehke.”
Ellong enjel nyi ejahbetul Esowo gbalee kehm soro lohng ba kpiri enjel nyio, jo tehk Esowo re,
“Ellub jol a Esowo go ero. Elkoono jol a ane go njini, ba Esowo li a bo yebe yebe.”
Eji babenjel ma feere ebo fi go ejahbetul Esowo, abaabebul kehm bungu atemtem re, “Nong, wahr tahmen go Betlehem, song nyehnen ejum ji ma jol, ji Ntul Esowo ma-r tong.”
Owo bo kehm soro tahm elwaare, song nyehn Meri, a Josef, fere nyehn mmon nong go ejum ji bo kpo kak efong nsol alehke.
Bo nyehne kan ano me, bo kehm tahme, jo yannge, jo tooro tong ane ana enjel tongo bo bada mmon noo.
Ane kpee ba wuku ana abaabebul tongo bo, kehm kpoko bo esi.
Meri kehm kuuru nsol nyio kpee go ege eltim, fere jo tir bade.
Abaabebul bao kehm feere, jo ka Esowo ellub, fere jo tehk-e mbang mbang go nsol kpee nyi bo ma nyehn, fere wꞌwuk. Jolo na jol jang jang ana enjel tongo bo.
Eji ma kang nfung enehkeni, nyi bo bahke mmon noo nrur yehke, owo bo kehm-e gungu mbing re Jisos, nyꞌnehm o nyi enjel tibi Meri, á kehm sake ela ebe.

Eji ngare biingi no nyi Meri bahke limi kpee, eji á lꞌkpe jol saang ana ntahm nyi Moses bungu no, owo Josef abola Meri kehm rodo mmon noo, tahm a ne go Jerusalem re bo song rod-e kak Ntul Esowo go ebo.
Ana wo bo nyono go ntahm nyi Ntul Esowo re, “Ngbokambang a mmon no nlum awohng awohng no lꞌjini, á bahke jolo ka Ntul Esowo.”
Bo kehm limi njom ana ntahm Esowo bungu no re, “Ane bao bahke kake etomtom ebbal, tohko jol ano mbehl ebal.”
Nne jolo go Jerusalem, no bo jo lung-e re Simeon. Á jolo nnooba nne no jo fahl Esowo, fere jo sik nkakeltim no bahke ba kak Israel eltim.
Tibre Etingi Etohko lennge tong-e re, á nehm tiki waka kpo tete á nyehn Mesaya nyi Ntul Esowo bahke tumu.
Etohko ji Esowo kehm-e yehke re á je go etahk Esowo. Eji Josef, a Meri, bo ko Jisos, mmon abo, song yange a ne go etahk Esowo re bo song lim-e ana ntahm bungu no,
owo Simeon kehm taare mmon, fili go ebo, fere jo tehk Esowo re,
“Ntul, woblim enyam eba,
anv, nong, nlokeltum ewa kehm yake njini nyia abo, song go eyebatahng,
tibre amahr enyame ebnyehn eltahre ena,
ni a ma toobo bum go esamahr ane kpee.
Eltahre nia li ellennge ni bahke wahnge ane baka baka nyehn mbang enya,
ni bahke jolo ellub ni Israel, ane eba.”
Eji nde, a nnyehn wuku ana Simeon bungu bada mmon noo,
kehm kpoko bo esi.
Simeon kehm biri elfuulu ni Esowo tv bo, kehm tongo Meri nnyehn re, “Mmon noa, Esowo bi m-e yehke. Ye wo bahke limi ane gbalee go Israel gbo, fere lim ane gbalee mehl yiimi.
eji ntir atahng nyi ane gbalee lꞌjol gbuul.
Nnenkal awohng tob jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Ana. Á jolo nnyehnamahr. Nde, bo jo lung-e re Fanuel ji lohng go etꞌtohngo ji Aser. Ana sahb kꞌkul. Eji nlum ewe ko-e no, á ji elbal nnya esehma,
nlum ewe kehm-e kpoko sa, á fere jol nkalebun. Ngare nyia a, yebkang nnya atahl ani a nnya ani. Á joom tiki lohng go etahk Esowo, á jo kak Esowo, jo bade elne njal, fere jo kak ero atv a njul.
Á kehm soro ba ngare nyꞌnehm o, ba kehme Esowo tehk, fere jo bung tong ane bao bada mmon noo, bao ba ji, jo sik elforo ni Jerusalem bahke foro.
Eji bo ma lim ejum ajehng ajehng mal ana ntahm nyi Ntul Esowo bungu no, owo bo kehm feere kehnge go Nasaret, ejahbe ebo ji li go Galili.
Mmon noo kehm gbale, fere tahne. Á gbale go elkahne. Elfuulu ni Esowo jolo a ne.
Elya anehng anehng nde Jisos, a nnyehn jo je elkak Pasova go Jerusalem.
Eji Jisos ma kang ewubu a nnya ebal, bo kehm kpe je go Jerusalem ana bo jo kono eljeke elkak nio.
Eji afung elkak nio ma mal, owo bo kehm feere kehnge. Jisos sa go Jerusalem. Nde, a nnyehn kahnem.
Bo jo tiri re, Jisos wob go ellong ane ba kpꞌkehnge. Eji bo ma jen efung kohro kohro, owo bo kehm-e kehme elsebe go ellong abonanyehn ebo, a atem ebo.
Eji bo ki-e nyehn, bo kehm feere go Jerusalem, song seb-e gona.
Eji ma kang nfung era, owo bo kehm song nyehn-e go etahk Esowo, á jehk no a atꞌtibi kpꞌwuungu atung, fere jo bahb bo abahbe.
Ane kpee ba wuk-e no, kehm jo kpo bo esi tib go ege elkahne, a afaange nya á jo faange bo.
Nde, a nnyehn, kpo bo esi sehng, eji bo nyehn-e no. Owo nnyehn kehm-e tongo re, “Mmon ewame, jen ji wahnge a kehm limi ejum ana jia? Nso, a me, e ma-a seb na seb seb seb.”
Owo á kehm faange bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń jo seb-m? Ń nehme kahn re, m bahke tiki lim eltum ni Nsooa?”
Bo kahnem esꞌsi ejum ji á jo bꞌbung tong bo.
Owo Jisos kehm tahme toono bo, bo feere kehnge go Nasaret, á song woomo bo go elwo. Nnyehn kuuru nsol nyio kpee go ege eltim.
Jisos kehm gbale go elkahne, fere gbal agbal nya ngubjing. Elkoro ni á jo kor Esowo, fere jo kor ane jo kpe gbal na.

Eji ma kang nnya elku nyi Taibirius jolo ntul a Rom, ngare nyio nyi Pontus Pailet jolo ntubesi ejahbe go Judea, Herod jo fili Galili, Filip mmonannyehn jo fili Iturea, fere jo fili Trakonitis, Lisanias jo fili Abilene.
Annas abola Kayafas jolo atubesi abalimajom.
Ngare nyio nyi ellum Esowo song kpiri Jon ji jolo mmon a Sekaraya go elka emahng.
Jon kehm tahme, jo yannge go ajahbe nya li kohlo Jodan, jo bung alum Esowo re, “Yaangen mbang enyahne, wahn bel ewohngalahb, Esowo bahke tahme ka-n go egahne abiafem.”
Ana nnyehnamahr Aisaya nyono kak go nwer re,
“Nne noa, kpꞌrabe go elka emahng re,
‘Tuungen mbang nyi Ntul bum-e!
Limen mbang tꞌtor nyi á bahke sehnge.
Bo bahke kake ndi go edamme ajehng ajehng, fere jol bale bale,
fere rene ewong ajehng ajehng gooro, fere jol bale bale.
Ejum ji lꞌgalle, bo bahke limi, fere tor.
Abang nya li akpuku akpuku, bo bahke fere gooro, jol gele gele.
Nne awohng awohng bahke nyehne eltahre ni Esowo.’ ”
Ellong ane gbalee jo lꞌlohng, je goji Jon re á wohngo bo alahb. Jon kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahn enyo bia, nne awo tong-n re ḿ bahke foro go erakatahng ji Esowo ji kpꞌbake?
Jo limen eljini ni bahke jo tib re, wahn ebyaange mbang enyahne. Kana bom elbungu atemtem re, ‘Ebraham wo li nso ejahre.’ Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Esowo bahke ma ko atal nyaa, lim abon ka Ebraham.
“Bobtoobo elfuk bum, ni bo bahke kiimi alohk nti. Eti ajehng ajehng ji tohko kab akab nya nno, bo bahke gbahke tub, rod kak agun.”
Owo ane bao kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, ejum aji e bahke limi me?”
Á kehm faange bo re, “Nne no lꞌbel nsubu ebal, nong, á yehke anyehng, ka nne no ki kpi. Nne no lꞌbel nsol alehke, nong, á tob lim ano.”
Abakokatak kehm tob ba re bo ba bel ewohngalahb. Owo bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntꞌtibi, ejum aji e bahke limi?”
Jon kehm faange bo re, “Kana kpe jo ko akpohko etahk sehnge ana bo tong-n re wahn jo ko.”
Egom nsoja nyindiki kehm-e tob bahb re, “Wahr bahke limi renan?”
Á kehm faange bo re, “Kana jo lim nne awohng awohng ejum go eko! Kana jo ka nne ebi mbol mbol! Nong, ana bo kp-n kpiki jo gbal-n.”
Owo ane kehm kehme ekpu kunu, fere jo tir go bo a ntim bada Jon re, fundiki ye Mesaya wo.

Owo Jon kehm bungu tong bo ane kpee re, “N kp-n wohngo alahb maka maka. Nne no kpꞌbake gbale sehnge me. Jol me n tohkem fꞌfuumu re me n fannge alehke akpaketa enye. Ye wo bahk-n wohngo alahb go Etingi Etohko, a agun.
Á fili edꞌda go ebo, kpꞌfeebe arasi enye. Á bahke kpuku arasi enye, song kak go ege ekpꞌkpa, fere jahm awal go agun nya lꞌkꞌtiki lahme elahmelahme.”
Nsol nyehko kpe jol tvv, nyi Jon kpe jo rehke bo, eji á jo tiingi ane bao nnoobo etib.
Á tob ka ntul a Herod ebi, tib eji á taare Herodias, nkal a Filip mmonannyehn, kpe lim abi nsol nyako budu.
Herod kpe lim ebi jehko kpele, eji á bobo Jon kak ngbekobo.
Eji ane bao kpee ma bel ewohngalahb, Jisos kehm tob bel ewohngalahb. Eji á jo kak ero, ejahbetul kehm lennge.
Etingi Etohko kehm badde go elfoongo ni ebbehl, ba jol a ne. Bo kehm wuku ellum go ejahbetul Esowo re, “Wo wo li akor-m mmon ewame, no kpo kor-m sꞌsehng.”
Ngare nyio Jisos ebkang ejum eltahl a nnya ewubu. Ane jo tiri re, á jolo mmon a Josef,
Heli jolo mmon a Matat. Matat jol mmon a Livai. Livai jol mmon a Melki. Melki jol mmon a Jannai. Jannai jol mmon a Josef.
Josef jol mmon a Matatias. Matatias jol mmon Amos. Amos jol mmon a Nahum. Nahum jol mmon Esli. Esli jol mmon a Naggai.
Naggai jol mmon a Maat. Maat jol mmon a Matatias. Matatias jol mmon a Semein. Semein jol mmon a Josek. Josek jol mmon a Joda.
Joda jol mmon a Joanan. Joanan jol mmon a Resa. Resa jol mmon a Serubabel. Serubabel jol mmon a Sealtiel. Sealtiel jol mmon a Neri.
Neri jol mmon a Melki. Melki jol mmon Addi. Addi jol mmon a Kosam. Kosam jol mmon Elmadam. Elmadam jol mmon Er.
Er jol mmon a Josua. Josua jol mmon Eliesa. Eliesa jol mmon a Jorim. Jorim jol mmon a Matat. Matat jol mmon a Livai.
Livai jol mmon a Simeon. Simeon jol mmon a Juda. Juda jol mmon a Josef. Josef jol mmon a Jonam. Jonam jol mmon Eliakim.
Eliakim jol mmon a Melea. Melea jol mmon a Menna. Menna jol mmon a Matata. Matata jol mmon a Natan. Natan jol mmon a Devid.
Devid jol mmon a Jesi. Jesi jol mmon Obed. Obed jol mmon a Boas. Boas jol mmon a Sela. Sela jol mmon a Nason.
Nason jol mmon Aminadab. Aminadab jol mmon Admin. Admin jol mmon Arni. Arni jol mmon a Hesron. Hesron jol mmon a Peres. Peres jol mmon a Juda.
Juda jol mmon a Jekob. Jekob jol mmon no Aisik. Aisik jol mmon no Ebraham. Ebraham jol mmon a Tera. Tera jol mmon a Nahor.
Nahor jol mmon a Serug. Serug jol mmon a Reu. Reu jol mmon a Peleg. Peleg jol mmon no Eber. Eber jol mmon a Sela.
Sela jol mmon a Kainan. Kainan jol mmon Arfasad. Arfasad jol mmon a Sem. Sem jol mmon a Noa. Noa jol mmon a Lamek.
Lamek jol mmon a Metusala. Metusala jol mmon no Enohk. Enohk jol mmon a Jared. Jared jol mmon no Mahalalel. Mahalalel jol mmon a Kainan.
Kainan jol mmon no Enos. Enos jol mmon a Set. Set jol mmon no Adam. Adam jol mmon Esowo.
Eji Jisos lohngo go Jodan, jo kehnge, Etingi Etohko rur-e go ege atahng. Etingi Etohko kehm-e rodo tahm a ne go elka emahng.
Owo nnehm gar-e no nfung atahl abal. Afung nyao kpee á tikem li ejumjum. Eji afung nyao ma biingi, njal kehm-e yame.
Owo nnehm kehm-e tongo re, “A lꞌjol Mmon Esowo, tong eltal nia siingi ebred.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nwer Esowo bungu re, ‘Abred nya nya sang wahnge nne kpo kpin. Á kpo tob bel elkpin go ellum Esowo anehng anehng.’ ”
Nnehm kehm-e rodo tahm a ne go nwahrewahre ewong, ko mmongare ana no nne bahke jehbe akpakamahr, tib-e ajahbe nya li go njini kpee,
kehm-e tongo re, “M bahk-a kake nsahm kpee nyi a bahke jo fili ajahbe nyao, fere ka-a ellub ebo. Tibre bobyake kpee kak-m go ebo, m bahke fere faake ka nne no kor-m no.
A lꞌsoro jꞌjamme alahng kak-m, nsol nyia kpee bahke fere jol nyꞌnya.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nwer Esowo bungu re, ‘Kak Esowo Ntul ewa. Ye ntahngtahng wo a bahk-e loko.’ ”
Nnehm kehm-e koko tahm a ne go Jerusalem, song rod-e kunu go elkong etahk Esowo, kehm-e tongo re, “A lꞌfere jol Mmon Esowo, yehb gbo ndi.
Tibre nwer Esowo bungu re, ‘Esowo bahke tongo enjel enye, bo baab-a.’
Edi nwer Esowo jehko kpe bung re, ‘Bo bahk-a gbiiri go bo abo, eji a lꞌkꞌba jahre akpade go eltal.’ ”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nwer Esowo bungu re, ‘Ka gare Esowo Ntul ewa.’ ”
Eji nnehm m-e gare mal, á kehm-e tohko yake mmongare ntiil.
Jisos kehm feere a nsahm Etingi Etohko, ba rehng go Galili. Owo elgahm ene kehm yeere ejang ejahbe jio kpee.
Á jo tibi go bo a ntahk ero. Ane kpee jo tehk-e tehk.
Jisos kehm jeke go Nasaret, edi ji bo le-e no, á gbal. Efung Esabat á kehm jeke go etahk ero ana á jo kono ellimi. Á kehm mehle yiimi re á lung edi nwer Esowo.
Bo kehm-e kake nwer nyi nnyehnamahr Aisaya. Eji á ma lennge nwer nyio, á kehm song nyehn edi ji bo nyono re,
“Etohko ji Ntul Esowo jia, kun-m.
Á ma-m tum re me n song tiingi etib bi bahke wahnge aneb agbekobo for, awakamahr nyehn.
Á ma-m tum re me n song tahre ane ba kpꞌnyehne erem yehke bo go afemfem nya bo wob no,
fere tong ane re,
Elya eyebatahng ni Ntul Esowo ebrehng.”
Eji á ma bulu nwer nyio, á kehm feere a nyi ka nlokeltum, kehm jehke. Ane kpee ba woomo go ekpꞌkpa ero jio jo seeng-e na seenge too.
Owo á kehm kehme elbungu a bo re, “Edi nwer Esowo jia ebjol go etingitingi lela, eji ḿ ma wuk.”
Owo ane kpee kehm-e kehme eltehke. Anoobo alum nya lohng-e go nnyo jo kpo bo esi sehng. Bo kehm bahbe re, “Anv, mmon a Josef sang aa?”
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, ḿ bahk-m tubu elgan nia re, ‘Nlimakahm, lim elna, wo nob me!’ fere bung re, ‘Nsol nyi e ma wuk re, woblim go Kapenium, tob lim a fvfo go ega ejahbe!’ ”
Owo Jisos kehm kpe bung re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nnyehnamahr awohng awohng limm, no bo kpo ko-e go ege ejahbe.
“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Akalebun jolo gbalee go Israel ngare nyi Elaija, eji elahb ki kpe na go nnya era kunu ejang, owo egburu njal kehm bake go ndi nyio kpee.
Jol Esowo tumem Elaija tv nkalebun awohng awohng gona, sehngem nkalebun awohng no jolo go Sarefat ji Saidon wo, Esowo tumu Elaija tv-e.
“Aneb abili gbalee ba jolo go Israel ngare nyi nnyehnamahr Elisa. Bo, nne awohng awohng nobem abili enye, sehngem Neman ji jolo nne a Siria wo wo nobo.”
Eji ane ba woomo ekpꞌkpa ero jio wuku ano, atahng kehm rake bo tete.
Bo kehm-e tohngo yehke go ejahbe jio, song rehng a ne go nkpe ewong nyi bo si ejahbe jio kunu re bo gbul-e, á fooro go egbunggbung ewong ba gbo.
Á fere jene na, ba sehng go elka ane tahm eje.
Owo Jisos kehm tahme, song rehng go Kapenium ji li go Galili, song kehme ane tib efung Esabat.
Jo kpo bo esi tib go ege eltibi ni á jo tib bo. Tibre alum nya á jo bung, á jo bungu ana nne no kpi nsahm.
Nne jolo o ekpꞌkpa ero jio, no bele esabsab etohko go ege atahng. Á kehm rabe tiim re,
“Yak-m! E li go nfem anyi awahr a na, Jisos ji Nasaret? A ba re wo ba ranng-ra? N kpꞌkahne nne no a li no. A li mbarebara nne Esowo!”
Owo Jisos kehm-e nyame re, “Behl ewok, wo lohng-e song!” Ebi etohko jio kehm yehke nne noo tub ndi go elka ane bao, soro lohng-e. Ejumjum we á limem.
Kehm kehme nne awohng awohng esi kpo, bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, elkohn alum anya a, nya á kpo bung go nsahm, tong asabsab atohko, bo jo lohng?”
Owo elgahm ni Jisos kehm yeere, rehng ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji jolo ejang bio.
Jisos kehm lohngo ekpꞌkpa ero jio, song rehng go etahk Saimon. Nnyehn nkal a Saimon, arumbum nyed-e sehng. Bo kehm-e gboongo ka-e.
Á kehm tahme song yiimi go ege a nkpe edilnong, kehm nyame arumbum nyao, nnenkal noo soro nob, kehm mehle tvtv, soro kehme bo loko.
Eji njul yahke ba ellahme, ane kpee ba bele aneb ayam, ba jo yam ajoobo ayam tvv, kehm koko bo, ba goji Jisos. Á kehm kunu bo abo, go nne awohng awohng, bo nob ane kpee.
Abi atohko tob lohngo ane gbalee, jo biingi tiim, fere jo bung re, “Wo wo li Mmon no Esowo!”
Jisos jo nyame bo. Á joom taame re bo bung. Tibre bo jo kahne kpee re á li Mesaya.
Efungfu behre behre Jisos kehm tahme ejahbe jio, song rehng go edi ji li soom.
Ane kehm-e kehme elsebe. Eji bo nyehn-e no, bo kehm jo nok mbang anyehng anyehng, eji á lꞌkꞌtahm bo sa.
Owo á kehm tongo bo re, “M bahke tob tiingi nnoobo etib bi etul bi Esowo tong ajahbe nyako fvfo. Tibre ana wo wahnge Esowo tum-m no.”
Owo á kehm tahme, jo song bung alum Esowo go ntahk ero nyi jolo go Judea.
Efung abehng eji Jisos yiimi go nkpe eto nyi Genesaret, ane kehm ba rur, jo fahd-e tv re bo wuk alum Esowo.
Owo á kehm nyehne agbang na abal go elga. Abasahre nsahre eblohng go agbang nyao, song kehme arim ebo faare.
Á kehm song yel egbang abehng bi jolo bi Saimon, kehm-e tongo re, á reenge egbang feere go elka alahb. Owo á kehm jehke go egbang, jo tib ane bao.
Eji á ma bung mal, owo á kehm tongo Saimon re, “Reenge egbang, song rehng edi ji kpꞌrahbe, wahn yake arim enyahne kak o, bob nsahre.”
Owo Saimon kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, wahr eblim eltum atv atv maa ana tete, jol ejumjum e tikem bob. Wo, eji a ma bung ano, m bahke yake erim ebame kak.”
Eji bo ma lim ano, bo kehm bobo nsahre gbalee, erim kehm kehme elyare.
Owo bo kehm soro kehme atem ba woomo go egbang behko mahk re bo ba tob bo. Bo kehm bake, ba yehke nsahre nyio, ruru agbang abal abal, fere jol are agbang yahke ter.
Eji Saimon Pita nyehne ano, á kehm gboko jamme Jisos alahng, kehm bungu re, “Ntul, jeere song, tibre me nne abiafem wo.”
Tibre nkpokosi nyio jo kpo-e esi sehng, a ane bako kpee ba tob jolo a ne o, tib go elkohn nsahre nyi bo bobo no.
Ano wo fvfo, Jems a Jon ba jolo abon Sibidi, bo ji jo lim eltum ano a Pita, jo tob kpo bo esi.
Owo Jisos kehm tongo Saimon re, “Ka kpe fahl! Bomo anv asongo, a bahke fere jo bim ane.”
Eji bo ma tohng agbang ebo kunu egbuk, bo kehm tahme ejum ajehng ajehng sa, tahm toono Jisos.

Efung abehng eji Jisos jolo ejahbe ajehng, nne jolo ona, no abili saab-e na saabe go ngubjing. Á nyehne kan Jisos, á kehm gboko, kohk esamahr ebe go ndi, fere jo gboong-e re, “Ntul, lꞌfere kor-a, a li-m ma lim, n nob.”
Jisos kehm soro tanne ebo ebe, koor-e, kehm bungu re, “Kor-m kor.
Owo Jisos kehm-e rehke re, á kꞌtong nne ne, fere tong-e re, “Song, wo song kpiri nlimajom, fere tib-e elna, fere lim njom ana Moses tongo no, tib eji a ma nob, eji lꞌjol ejum ntianse ka bo.”
Tvtv o elgahm ni Jisos kpe yeere na budu. Nlong ane gbalee kehm jo kam, jo ba re bo jo wuk-e, fere jo nob ayam ebo.
Jisos jo tahme, song rehng edi nya li soom, song kak ero.

Efung abehng eji Jisos jo tib, Bab Farisi, a atꞌtibi ba atahm tob ji ona, ba lohngo go ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji li go Galili, a Judea, fere tob lohng go Jerusalem ba. Nsahm nyi Esowo jolo a Jisos ona re á ko lim ane, bo nob ayam ebo.
Ane kehm koko mbanne ba a ne, nyi bo sol-e go edilnong. Bo jo gare re bo yel a ne go ekpꞌkpa, song bum-e go alata Jisos.

Bo tingem mbang anyehng anyehng nyi bo bahke sehnge a ne tib ellong ane bao. Owo bo kehm wahre a ne go ero etahk, kehm song lahm elbulu, kehm tahre alehke nya bo kanne go edilnong jio tete ba rehng go elka ane bao, edi ji Jisos jolo no.
Eji Jisos nyehne ana bo ma taame tv-e, owo á kehm bungu re, “Mbi, abiafem enya, me n tahm ka-a.”

Atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, ye elkohn nne awo, no kpꞌbungu abꞌbi alum ana nyaa tob Esowo? Nne awo bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem? Esowo ntahngtahng bi bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem!”
Eji Jisos ma seb kahn ana bo jo tir, owo á kehm faange bo re, “Elkohn ntir anyi ń kpꞌtiri go egahna ntim?
Jen ji ga riidi, n lꞌtong nne noa re, ‘Abiafem enya me n tahm ka-a,’ afi n lꞌtong-e re, ‘Mehl yiimi, wo jen?’
M bahk-n tibi re, Mmon no nne kpi nsahm go njini nyia, nyi á bahke ma tahm ka nne go ege abiafem.” Owo á kehm tongo mbanne nyio re, “N kp-a tongo re, wo tahm, rod edilnong eja, song kehnge!”
Tvtv o nne noo kehm soro mehl yiimi go esamahr ane bao, rod edilnong ji á noongo no, tahm eje kehnge, jo tehk Esowo asongo.
Ane bao kpee kpo bo esi area. Bo kehm kehme Esowo tehk afahlafahle, fere jo bung re, “Wahr ebnyehn akpokosi nsol lela.”
Eji ma jol ano, Jisos kehm tahme, song nyehn nkokatak no bo jo lung-e re Livai jehk go ekpꞌkpa etak. Á kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm toon-m!”
Livai kehm tahme ejum ajehng ajehng sa, tahm toon-e.
Owo Livai kehm limi egburu elkak go ege etahk ka Jisos. Abakokatak gbalee tob jolo o, a ane bako fvfo, jo li nsol abo.
Bab Farisi, a atꞌtibi ba atahm ba woomo go ellong Farisis kehm kehme elmemme tob abatꞌtoono Jisos re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpo li nsol alehke a abakokatak, go aneb abꞌbi?”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ane ba li nob nob kpehme seb nlimakahm, sehngem ane ba kpꞌyame ba kpꞌsebe.
M baam re me m ba lung anoobo ane, bo gbo ndon. M ba re me m ba lung abi ane.”
Egom ane bandiki kehm ba bahb Jisos re, “Jen ji wahnge abatꞌtoono Jon, a ba Farisis kpo bade elbo njal nkpel a nkpele, fere jo kak ero, abatꞌtoono eba kpo li na nsol, fere jo wꞌwo?”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ḿ bahke limi renan, kehm tongo ane ba bo ma tiingi bo elkak elbal re bo ji njal ngare nyi nlumanne kpeke li a bo?
Ngare kpꞌbake nyi bo bahke yehke nlumanne go bo ellong tahm a ne. Ngare nyio nyi bo bahke kehme elbo njal bade.”

Jisos kehm kpe tub bo elgan re, “Nnene limm, no bahke koko mmojang mbomo no nfenfe, song baade nkꞌkula mbomo. Á lꞌlim ano, edi ji bo ko mmojang mbomo no nfenfe baade, bahke kpe kv na budu. Ejang mbomo nfenfe nehm fuumu a nkꞌkula mbomo.
“Nnene limm fvfo, no bahke yaange amahm ma kpꞌfahle kak go nkꞌkohko eyahbe. Á lꞌlim ano, amahm mao ma kpꞌfahle bahke limi eyahbe jio bahnge, amahm sale, eyahbe rannge kpee.
Amahm ma kpꞌfahle, bo bahke jo kak go eyahbe nfenfe.
Nnene limm, no kpo wo akꞌkulu amahm, amahm ma kpꞌfahle kehm-e kpe kor. Á bahke bungu re, ‘Akꞌkulu amahm ma ga nob.’ ”
Efung Esabat abehng eji Jisos jo jen go emahng ji bo bahme nkohl, owo abatꞌtoono ebe kehm jo laade nkohl, fere monngo amohk tv go arahn, jo li.
Owo egom Farisi jindiki kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌlimi ejum ji ntahm enyahre sahde re, nne kꞌjo lim efung Esabat?”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Ń ka tiki lung bade ana Devid limi no ngare nyi njal yam-e no, a ane ebea?
Á yele ekpꞌkpa Esowo, song rod abred nya bo limi bum go esamahr Esowo li, fere tob ka ane ebe ba jolo a ne, bo li, nya ki fuumu re nne awohng awohng li, sehngem abalimajom ba ba jo li.”
Owo Jisos kehm kpe tong bo re, “Mmon no nne tob li nfono Esabat.”
Efung Esabat bi Jisos kpe je go etahk ero song tib, nne awohng jolo o, no eboblum ebe lohngo no.
Atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi, bo jo baab-e,
Jisos kꞌkahn ntir atahng ebo, owo á kehm tongo nne no ebo ebe lohngo no re, “Ba, wo ba yiimi ana!”
Nne noo kehm mehle yiimi, jen song yiimi ona.

Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “N kp-n bahbe re, Anv, ntahm enyahre bungu re wahr jo lim jen efung Esabat, wahr jo kak na nne ebo, afi wahr jo rannge na? Wahr jo tahre elkpin nne, afi wahr jo rannge elkpin nne?”
Eji á ma seenge bo, song jahm, owo á kehm tongo nne noo re, “Tanne ebo eba!” Á kehm limi ano. Ebo ebe kehm feere jol ana behko jang jang.
Atahng kehm rake bo tete, bo kehm kehme eltoobo bo bo, ji bo bahke limi Jisos.
Ngare nyio Jisos kehm tahme go ewong re á song kak ero. Owo á kange no, jo kak ero ka Esowo.
Eji efungfu ma se, á kehm lungu abatꞌtoono ebe tv elne, kehm jake ewubu ane abal, ba á jo lung bo re abatiingetib.
A wo li ewubu ane abal ba á yehke no. Saimon ji Jisos ka-e mbing nyehko re Pita, a Andru mmonannyehn Pita, go Jems, Jon, Filip, Batolomi,
Matiu, Tomos, Jems ji mmon Alfeus, a Saimon ji jo seb re ejahbe eje lohng go elwo ni aneb Rom,
go Judas ji mmon a Jems, a Judas Iskariot ji gungu Jisos.

Eji Jisos jo badde a bo go ewong, á kehm ba yiimi edi ji li bale bale, a ellong abatꞌtoono ebe gbalee, a ellong ane tvv, ba lohngo go Judea kpee, fere lohng go Jerusalem, a ba lohng go nkpe agburu aya, ejang bi Taya, a Saidon. Bo ba re bo ba wuk-e, fere nob ayam ebo.
Ane ba asabsab atohko jo gbiingi bo, bo nobo ane kpee.
Ellong ane bao kpee jo sebe re, bo koor-e, tibre nsahm jo lohng-e lohng.
Owo Jisos kehm tabe esamahr ebe seenge abatꞌtoono ebe, kehm bungu re,
“Elfuulu li ka wahn akpak, tibre etul bi Esowo bꞌbahne bi.
“Elfuulu li ka wahn ji njal kp-n yame anv, tibre ḿ bahke wohngo.
“Elfuulu li ka wahn ji kpꞌlingi anv, tibre ḿ bahke wolo asol.
“Elfuulu li ka wahn, ane lꞌko-n ekv tib go esi ji Mmon no nne, fere yab a nahne, jo su-n, fere jo bung re, wahn abi ane ba.
“Jo belen eyebatahng, nsol ana nyio lꞌlim, wahn fere jo siiki. Tibre egburu eltuuru enahne nia, nong-n go ejahbetul Esowo.
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn afang ane, tibre wahn ebbel ejum ekakeltim ejahne.
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn ji kpꞌwohngo anv, tibre ḿ bahke jene njal njal.
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn ji kpꞌwolo anv, tibre ḿ bahke jehke ndon ndon, fere jo ling.
“Eyuu a nahne, ane kpee lꞌjo tehk-n.
“N kp-n tongo wahn ji kpꞌwuungu atung re, Anebekv ebahne jo kor-n. Jo limen nnoobo ka ane ba kpo ko-n ekv.
Jo biren nnoobo tv ane ba kpo su-n. Jo kaken ero ka ane ba kpo lim-n ebi.
Nne no lꞌrum-a elkpal, tob sennge ejang behko ka-e fvfo, á kpe-a rum. Nne no lꞌtaare nsubu enya, á lꞌkpe ba ewobo eja taare, tob yake ka-e.
Jo ka nne awohng awohng ejum, no bahb-a no. Nne no lꞌtaare ejum eja, k-e tong re á feere a ji.
“Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń kpꞌsebe re ane jo lim ka-n, wahn fvfo, tob jo limen ano ka bo.
Ane ba ń kpo kor bo, bo lꞌjo kor-n, eltuuru ani Esowo bahk-n tuuru? Tibre ane ba, aneb abiafem kpo kor bo, bo ba fvfo kpo tob kor aneb abiafem.
Ń lꞌjo lim nnoobo ka ane ba kpo lim nnoobo ka-n, eltuuru ani ḿ bahke bele? Tibre aneb abiafem kpo tob lim ano.
Ń lꞌjo bong ane akpohko, ba ń tiri re bo bahke tob bong-n, eltuuru ani ḿ bahke bele? Tibre aneb abiafem kpo bong aneb abiafem, eji bo lꞌtob lim jang jang ka bo.

“Nong, anebekv ebahne jo kor-n, wahn jo lim nnoobo. Jo bongen ane akpohko, wahn kꞌjo kunu ekpu re bo feere a nya ka-n. Ń lꞌlim ano, eltuuru enahne bahke gbale. Owo ḿ bahke kehm jolo abon ba Esowo bi gbale sehng. Tibre Esowo kpo lim nnoobo ka ane ba kil jo kak saam, fere tob lim nnoobo ka abi ane.
“Nong, ane jo fil-n ndon, ana Nso ejahne, ane kpo fil-e ndon.”
