“Kana jo lam ane bako, Esowo wahn nehm tob lam. Kana jo tong ane re, bobli ebi, Esowo wahn nehm tob tong re, wahn ebli ebi. Jo tahmen ka ane, Esowo bahke tob tahm ka-n.
Jo kaan, Esowo bahk-n tob ka. Á bahke gare go ebam ji nno a nno, gbehke, fere so, kak, rur wꞌwohng, fere yaange kak egahne abam. Ana ń gare no ka, ano wo fvfo Esowo bahke tob gare ka-n.”
Jisos kehm tob tub bo elgan re, “Anv, nwakamahr a nne bahke ma tib nwakamahr nyehko mbanga? Bo ane abal abal nehm song gbo yel go elbinga?
“Nne no kpꞌkpili kpehme gbal sehnge ntꞌtibi ewe. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌkpili mal, á bahke jolo ana ntꞌtibi ewe.
“Jen ji wahnge a kpꞌseenge mmolsahk no wob mmonanne go elmahr, a kil eltiri bada nkporti nyi wob go ega elmahr?

A bahke limi renan, kehm tongo mmonanne, re, ‘Nong, me n yehk-a mmolsahk no wob-a go elmahr,’ eji wofono antahng kil nyehne nkporti nyi wob-a go elmahr? Wobnob tane! Tohko gbo mbang yehke nkporti nyi wob go ega elmahr, eji a lꞌmal nyehn, yehke mmolsahk no wob mmonanne go elmahr.
“Tibre eti ji nno ajehng ajehng limm, ji kpo kab asabsab akab. Jol fvfo, esabsab eti ajehng ajehng limm, ji kpo kab anoobo akab.
Tibre eti ajehng ajehng, bo kpo liing-e go ege akab. Nnene limm, no kpo bong akab efig go asokonso, fere bong akab avain go egab.

“Nsol afang nyi wob nnooba nne go ege eltim, nyi nyi á kpo yehke, lohng a nyi. Abꞌbi nsol nya wob ebi nne go ege eltim, nya nya á kpo yehke, lohng a nya. Tibre ji ma rur nne go eltim, ji ji kpo lohng-e go nnyo.
“Jen ji wahnge ń kpo lung-m re, ‘Ntul, Ntul!’ ń kil jo lim nsol nyi n kpo tong-n re wahn lim?
“Nne awohng awohng no lꞌba go egame, ba wuk alum enyame, fere jo lim,
Á li ana nne no si etahk. Á kpa rꞌrahbe tete rehng go ekpartal,
“Nne no lꞌwuk alum enyame, fere ten go ellimi,
Eji Jisos ma bung nsol nyia kpee mal, tong ane bao, á kehm tahme go Kapenium.
Ntubesi a nsoja awohng jolo o, no bele nlokeltum no jo sahb kor-e kor. Nlokeltum ewe noo jo yame, are á bahke kpoko.
Eji ntubesi a nsoja noo wuku bada Jisos, á kehm tumu anebkul Jus bandiki re bo song gboong-e, á ba lim nlokeltum ewe nob.
Eji bo ba rehng goji Jisos, bo kehm sahb gboong-e gboongo re, “Ntubesi noo, fꞌfuumu re wo kak-e ebo.
Tibre ejahbe ejahre kpo kor-e sehng. Yebsi etahk ero ka-r.”
Owo Jisos kehm tahme toono bo. Eji á ma kabbe etahk jio, ntubesi a nsoja noo kehm tumu ate ebe tv-e.
Bo kehm-e song tong re, “Ntubesi re, wo kꞌkpe gbiingi elna mbol mbol, are ye fuumem re wo song yel ege ekpꞌkpa.
Jol á fuumem re á ba go ega.

Ntubesi re, á li nne no wob go elwo nne. Á tob kpi nsoja nyi tob wob-e go elwo. Á lꞌtong nne noko re, ‘Song!’ á tahm. Á lꞌtong nne noka re, ‘Ba!’ á ba. Á lꞌtong nlokeltum ewe re, ‘Lim ejum jia!’ á lim na lim.”
Jisos, esi kehm-e kpoko, eji á wuku ano. Á kehm keebe, kehm bungu tong ellong ane ba jo toon-e re, “N kp-n tongo re, Jol go Israel n ka tiki nyehn nne no kpi elkohn egburu eltaame ana nia.”
Eji ane ba ntubesi a nsoja noo tumu bo feere no, ba rehng ege etahk, bo ba nyehne nlokeltum noo ma lohko nob.
Etoono efung behko Jisos kehm tahme go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Nain. Abatꞌtoono ebe gbalee, a ellong ane tvv ba toon-e no je.

Eji á ma kabbe eti mbu ji jolo ejahbe jio, ane ba solo nkvne kehm lohngo ejahbe jio abake. Nne no kpo no jolo mmon mmon awohng no nnenkal no jolo nkalebun. Ellong ane gbalee jolo a nnenkal noo o, ba lohngo ejahbe jio.
Eji Ntul a Jisos nyehn-e no, ndon kehm-e gbale go ege eltim tib nnenkal noo. Owo á kehm-e tongo re, “Ka kpe ling!”
Á kehm jeere, song kooro ekpa ji bo gbade nkvne. Aneblum ba sol-e no kehm yiimi. Jisos kehm bungu re, “Njangkun, n kp-a tongo re wo mehl!”
Nne no kpo no kehm soro mehl ji, kehm kehme elbungu. Jisos kehm-e jabbe, kak nnyehn go ebo.
Owo nne awohng awohng kehm kehme elfahle, fere jo tehk Esowo re, “Egburu nnyehnamahr eblohng go egahre ellong.” Bo kpe bung re, “Esowo ebba re á ba tahre ane ebe.”
Eka jia bada Jisos kehm yeere go Judea kpee, a ajahbe nya jolo sennge Nain ka.
Abatꞌtoono Jon kehm song tong-e nsol nyio kpee.
Jon kehm lungu abatꞌtoono ebe na abal, tum bo tv Ntul a Jisos re bo song bahb-e re, “Wo wo li nne no kpꞌbake, afi wahr ji sik nne nondiki?”
Eji bo song kpiri Jisos, bo kehm-e tongo re, “Jon ji nwohngalahb wo ma-r tum tv-a re wahr ba bahb-a re, ‘Wo wo li nne no kpꞌbake, afi wahr ji sik nne nondiki?’ ”
Ngare nyio Jisos limi aneb ayam gbalee, bo nob go ajoobo ayam tvv, fere kam ane abi atohko yehke, tob lim awakamahr gbalee, bo nyehn.

Owo Jisos kehm faange ane ba Jon tumu no re, “Songen, wahn song tong Jon nsol nyi ḿ ma nyehn, fere wꞌwuk. Anv, awakamahr kpꞌnyehne, abanne ebtahm kpꞌjene, aneb abili kpꞌnobo, alakatung kpꞌwuku, akvne kpꞌnyahme go elkv. Akpak kpꞌwuku nnoobo etib.
“Elfuulu li ka nne no lꞌki-m sel gbo.”
Eji ane ba Jon tumu bo ma feere fi, owo Jisos kehm bomo elbungu bada Jon, tong ellong ane bao re, “Ń jo lohngo je elka emahng re wahn song nyehn jen? Eljele ni nfeb kpꞌlimi, kpꞌneenga?
Jen ji ń jo jꞌje re wahn song nyehn? Nne no liibi anoobo nsola? Etingitingi, elkohn ane ba kpo liibi ano, fere jo li ebno, bo kpo kono eljolo go ntahk atul.
Anv, ejum aji ń jo je re wahn song nyehn? Nnyehnamahra?
“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, wahn ebnyehn nne no gbale sehnge nnyehnamahr.
Tibre Jon wo li nne no nwer Esowo bungu no bada ne re,
“ ‘M bahke tumu ntiingetib ewame re
á gbo-a mbang, song tuungu mbang bum-a.’
“N kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng limm, no ma jꞌjol go njini nyia no gbale sehnge Jon.
“Ane kpee, a abakokatak ba wuk-e no, bo ba taame re, Esowo lohko li go etingitingi, tib eji bo ma bel ewohngalahb ji Jon.
“Bab Farisi, a atꞌtibi ba atahm tꞌten ji Esowo toobo re á lim ka bo, eji ki kor bo re bo bel ewohngalahb jio ji Jon.
“Anv, m bahke koko ane ba li anv gara jen? Bo li renan?
Bo li ana abonse ba ma lohng song ji go elatahkgur kpi mbene lim. Egom jindiki tong egom jehko re,
“ ‘Wahr ebwor afiri ka-n,
ḿ bahnem.
Wahr ebling aling,
wahn tobem ling fvfo.’
Eji Jon ji nwohngalahb ba no, á joom li abred, fere jo wo amahm, ń jo tongo re, ‘Á kpi ebi etohko go ege atahng.’
Wo anv, Mmon no nne ebba, kpꞌlehke, fere jo wꞌwo, ń fere jo bungu re, ‘Nyehnen nlehke ebno noa! Á li nwokamahm, a ntem no abakokatak, a ntem no aneb abꞌbi.’
“Nne lꞌkpur nsol nyi aneb elkahne kpo lim, owo á bahke tob kahn ana elkahne li no.”
Nne a Farisi awohng kehm tiingi Jisos re á song li nsol a ne. Jisos kehm jeke go etahk nne a Farisi noo, song ji go ekpꞌkuru nsol alehke.
Nnenkal awohng jolo ejahbe jio, no jolo nne abiafem. Eji á sebe kahn re Jisos noa, kpꞌlehke nsol go etahk nne a Farisi noo, owo á kehm koko elom akehng tahm a ji,

song yiimi go njahm a Jisos, edi ji Jisos bumu akpade. Á jo lꞌling, abonngo jo toongo wohngo Jisos go akpade. Owo á kehm koko alv esi enye dohk-e akpade, fere sod akpade enye, kehm yaange akehng mao, wohng-e go akpade.

Eji nne a Farisi no tiingi Jisos nyehne ano, á kehm bungu atahng atahng re, “Li re nne noa lohko li nnyehnamahr, kehn á jol kahne nne no nnenkal noo li no, no kp-e kooro abo, fere kahn elkohn elkpin ni á kpo lim, tibre á li nne abiafem.”
Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Saimon, n kpi ejum ji n kp-a tongo.”
Á kehm faange re, “Aa, ntꞌtibi, tong-m me!”
Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Ane abal jolo go, ba bele nne no kpo bong ane akpohko mbong. Nne noko bel-e mbong a mpon atahl awubu, noko bel-e mbong a mpon eltahl.
Eji bo ki bel ejumjum ji bo bahke koko gal mbong nyio, á kehm yake ka bo. Tong-m, go ellong ane abal baa, nne awo, nne noo bahk-e jo ga kor?”
Owo Saimon kehm faange re, “Me m bum re, nne no á ga yake ka-e wo.” Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Wobfaange go nseenge.”

Á kehm keebe seenge nnenkal noo, kehm bungu tong Saimon re, “Wobnyehn nnenkal noaa? Eji m ba yel go ega ekpꞌkpa, me a kaam alahb re men ru akpade. Wo, ye ma-m ru akpade go ege abonngo, fere ko alv enye dohk-m.
M-e a sodem nnyo. Jol ye ka tiki rahke akpade enyame go elsodo, eji n tiki yel a.
Akehng, m-e a kakem go esi, wo, ye ma-m wohngo akehng go akpade.
Owo wahnge n kp-a tongo re, Abiafem enye nya li gbalee, me n tahm ka-e, tibre á kpi egburu elkoro sehng.”
Á kehm tongo nnenkal noo re, “Abiafem enya me n tahm ka-a.”
Ane bako ba tob ji ekpꞌkuru nsol alehke jio kehm kehme elbungu atahng atahng re, “Ebga! Anv, ye nne awo no kpo tahm ka nne go ege abiafem?”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo nnenkal noo re, “Song go eyebatahng! Eltaame ena ni ma-a tahre.”
Eji ma jol ano, Jisos kehm jo jen yannge ajahbe ajahbe ajahbe, jo bung alum Esowo, fere jo tiingi nnoobo etib bi etul bi Esowo. Abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal, jolo a ne o,
a anebkal bandiki ba á kame bo abi atohko yehke, fere lim bo nob ayam ebo. Meri ji bo jo lung-e re Meri ji lohng go Magdala tob woomo go ellong ane bao, ye ji á kam-e abi atohko na asehma yehke,
go Joanna nkal a Kusa, Kusa ji jolo ntubesi no alokeltum ba jolo go nlaaga Herod, go Susanna, a anebkal gbalee bako ba jo kak Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe ebo go nsol nyi bo bele no.
Eji ellong ane gbalee kpi nlohngo nlohngo go ajahbe ajahbe ajahbe, ba kono edi ajehng goji Jisos, owo á kehm tubu bo elgan nia re,
“Nne jolo go, no tahme re á song wohngo amohk nti enye go ege egbe. Eji á jo wohngo, nyandiki fooro gbo go mbang. Ane ba kadde sehng. Nruk ba suudu mele.
“Nyandiki gbo noongo go ndi nyi jolo atal atal. Amohk nti nyao gulu elmahnge, fere kpo, waange, tibre ndi waange sehng.
“Nyandiki gbo kuumu go elkob akpiri, mahng. Akpiri kehm gbale, bulu akohdo nti nyao.
“Nyako gbo noongo go nnooba ndi, kehm mahnge, gbal, kab akab, etasok ajehng ajehng nkab atahl alon alon.”
Eji Jisos ma bung ano, á kehm rabe re, “Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk!”
Abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm-e bahbe ana elgan nia lohngo no.

Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Bo ma-n ka elkahne nio ni nsol nyi li ka etul bi Esowo, nyi Esowo behre no. Egom ane bako kpo wuk ngaane ngaane, eji ‘bo lꞌseenge na seenge, kꞌnyehn, fere wuk na wuk, kꞌkahn ana lohngo no.’
“Ana wo elgan nia lohngo no. Amohk nti nyao, alum Esowo nya.
“Amohk nti nya gbo noongo go mbang lohngo ana ane ba kpo wuk alum Esowo. Nnehm ba yehke alum nyao go bo a ntim, eji bo lꞌkꞌtaame, fere bel eltahre.
“Amohk nti nya gbo noongo go ndi nyi li atal atal lohngo ana ane ba lꞌwuk alum Esowo. Bo ko go eyebatahng. Alohk bo nehm bel. Bo kpo toono Esowo mmongare ntiil. Elgaare lꞌba, bo yak-e.

“Amohk nti nya gbo kuumu elkob akpiri lohngo ana ane ba ma wuk alum Esowo. Atꞌtiiri nya njini nyia, ekor afang, a ekor nsol nyi njini kpo lim, nsol nyi nyi kpo ra yel go bo a ntim, song bulu alum Esowo tv, akab nehm kul.
“Amohk nti nya gbo noongo go nnooba ndi lohngo ana ane ba ma wuk alum Esowo, fere ko, kuuru go bo anoobo ntim nya enehm abehng abehng ki wob, soro asi, jo kab akab.
“Nnene limm, no ma nyꞌnyaale etꞌrekahng, rod ejeere konngo, jol rod, kak go nla ekpꞌkuru. Á bahke rodo na, kunu go ejum ji bo kpo kunu etꞌrekahng, eji ane ba kpꞌyele ekpꞌkpa lꞌjo nyehn ellennge nio.
Tibre ejum ajehng ajehng limm, ji bo behre no, ji lꞌkꞌjol gbuul. Jol ejum ajehng ajehng limm, ji li go mbiiri, ji lꞌkꞌlohng gbuul, ane fere kahn.
“Jo kunen ekpu ana ń kpo wuk nsol.
Nnyehn Jisos, a abonanyehn Jisos kehm bake. Bo tikem ma rehng goji Jisos tib ellong ane.
Owo ane bao kehm-e tongo re, “Nne, a abonane, bo baa, yim go elatahk kpꞌsebe re bo nyehn-a.”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ane ba lꞌwuk alum Esowo, fere jo lim, bo ba li babnnee, a abonanee.”
Efung abehng Jisos kehm yele go egbang, a abatꞌtoono ebe, kehm tongo bo re, “Nong, wahr siiren rehng egbuk eto jehko.” Owo bo kehm soro tahm.
Eji bo jo fing asongo, Jisos kehm gboko ellu. Owo egburu nfeb kehm ba kehme ellimi go eto jio, alahb kehm kehme elkimi yel egbang, ba elruru. Bo jolo efin efin ngare nyio.
Owo abatꞌtoono ebe kehm ba kpir-e, kehm-e nyahme re, “Nsoo, nsoo, e kpꞌtane na ao!”
Jisos kehm mehle yiimi, kehm nyame nfeb, a ebuku ji jo lim nsahm nsahm. Kehm rahke, edi naange soom.
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Anv, eltaame enahne nꞌna me?”
Owo bo kehm kehme elfahle, fere jo kpo bo esi. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, ye elkohn nne awoe, no kpo bung tong nfeb, a ebuku, wuk-e?”
Bo kehm song rehng go Gerasa ji jolo egbuk eto jehko. Galili egbuk jehka.
Eji Jisos wahre go egbuk, nne awohng lohngo go nla ejahbe, kehm ba wan-e.
Nne noo bele abi atohko ekidi eblab. Á jo jene ebun ebun. Á joom kang etahk, á jo kange edi ji alahm akvne jolo no.
Á nyehne kan Jisos a, á kehm rabe, gbo-e go alata, fere jo bung wahre wahre re, “E li nfem anyi awahr a na, Jisos ji Mmon Esowo bi gbale sehng? N kp-a gboongo re, wo ki-m kak erem.”

Tibre Jisos tohko tong esabsab etohko jio re á lohng nne noo. Nkpel tvv etohko jio jo yehk-e. Jol eji ane jo kak-e kak agbekobo go abo, a akpade akpade, fere jo baab-e, á jo kiimi na agbekobo nyao, ebi etohko jio jo yehk-e kak go elka emahng.
Owo Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Mbing enya mee?”
Á kehm faange re, “Egom.” Tibre abi atohko gbalee woom-e go atahng.
Abi atohko nyao kehm gboongo Jisos re, á kꞌtong bo, bo je song yel go nrabbe elbing.
Ngare nyio ellong akuk gbalee jo li nsol ona go nkpe ewong. Abi atohko nyao kehm gboongo Jisos re á lub yake bo, bo song yel akuk nyao go atahng.
Jisos kehm yake bo.
Owo abi atohko nyao kehm lohngo nne noo, song yel akuk go atahng. Akuk nyao kpee kehm beke, song fooro egbunggbung aya, yel alahb tan.
Eji ane ba jo baabe akuk nyao nyehne ano, bo kehm beke, song tooro go etahk, a abon ajahbe ba jolo o.

Ane bao kehm lohngo ba re bo ba nyehn ejum ji ma lim. Eji bo ba kpiri Jisos, bo kehm tob ba nyehn nne no abi atohko lohng-e no, jehk go alata nya Jisos sange sange. Á ma kak nsol go ngubjing kpee. Owo bo kehm kehme elfahle.
Ane ba nyehne ana ngbokesahl nyio ma nob, bo kehm song tooro tong ane bako.
Ane kpee ba lene ejang bio bi Gerasa kehm gboongo Jisos re á tahm o song.
Nne no abi atohko lohng-e no kehm gboongo Jisos re, “Nong, me n jol a na!”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re á song,
“Feere song kehnge, wo song tong ane ana ji Esowo ma lim ka-a.” Owo nne noo kehm tahme, song tooro tong ejahbe jio kpee bade egburu ejum ji Jisos ma lim ka-e.
Eji Jisos feere no, ba rehng egbuk eto jehka, ane kehm-e jo gbaame. Tibre bo ji, jo sik-e.
Owo nne awohng kehm lohngo ba, no bo jo lung-e re Jairus ji jolo ntubesi etahk ero, ba gbo jamme Jisos alahng, fere gboong-e re, á lub je go ege etahk.
Tibre á bele mmon mmon awohng no nkal, no ma kang ewubu a nnya ebal. Á noongo go emel elkv.
Eji Jisos jo jen mbang mbang asongo, ellong ane jo fahd-e na fahd kak.
Nnenkal awohng jolo o, no alung jo lohng-e go nnahb go ewubu a nnya ebal. Á rannge akpohko nya á bele no kpee, ka abalimakahm. Jol nnene we tikem ma lim, á nob.
Owo á kehm jeere kohlo Jisos go njahm, fere koor-e go ege esꞌsili nsubu.
Jisos kehm bahbe re, “Nne awo ma-m kooro a?”
Eji ane kpee ma ten, Pita kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, ellong ane ni kpꞌjene a na, ni ni kp-a sehme.”
Owo Jisos kehm kpe bung re, “Nne ma-m kooro. Tibre me n kahn re, nsahm ma-m tele lohng.”
Eji nnenkal noo sebe kahn re, á nehm ma biiri, á kehm lohngo kpꞌkahme abake, ba gbo jamm-e alahng, kehm tooro go esamahr ane kpee, ana ji wahnge á koor-e no, fere tong ana á soro nob ngare nyꞌnehm o.
Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Mmon ewame, eltaame ena ni ma-a lim, a ma nob. Song go eyebatahng!”
Eji Jisos kpi mbungu mbungu, nne awohng kehm lohngo etahk ntubesi ero noo, ba tong-e re, “Mmon ewa ebkpo. Ka kpe gbiingi ntꞌtibi mbol mbol.”
Eji Jisos wuku ano, owo á kehm-e faange re, “Ka kpe fahl, taame na taame!
Eji á ba rehng etahk jio, á taamem re nnene kpe yel ekpꞌkpa, sehngem Pita, Jon, a Jems, go nde mmon, a nnyehn, bo ba, á taame no bo yel.
Nne awohng awohng jo ji ndon ndon, fere jo ling.
Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Kana kpe ling, mmon noa ka kpo, á kpꞌlale na.”
Bo kehm-e elwolo, tibre bo jo kahne kpee re, mmon noo ebkpo.
Jisos kame kan ane bao yehke, á kehm jabbe mmon noo go ebo, kehm rabe re, “Mmon, mehl!”
Etohko mmon noo kehm soro feere ba yel-e, á soro mehl tvtv. Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, bo ka mmon noo nsol alehke, á li.
Nde, a nnyehn, kpo bo esi sehng. Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, bo kꞌtong nne awohng awohng ji ma lim.
Jisos kehm lungu abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal, tv edi ajehng, fere ka bo nsahm nyi bo bahke jo kam ane abi atohko kpee yehke, fere jo lim ane, bo nob ayam ebo.
Owo á kehm tumu bo re, bo song tiingi ane etib bi etul bi Esowo, fere lim ane, bo nob ayam ebo.
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Eljen ni ḿ bahke tahme, kana rod ejum ajehng ajehng fili, ana ebti efilibo, a abam, a nsol alehke, a akpohko. Kana fili nsubu ebal ebal!
Etahk ajehng ajehng ji bo lꞌvvr-n, jolen o, tete wahn tahm ejahbe jio.
Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji tohk-n vvrv, tahmen ejahbe jio, wahn kum ebtohko go egahne akpade. Ebtohko bio bi bahke jolo ana ntianse nyi bahke jo bung tob bo.”
Abatꞌtoono bao kehm tahme, jo yannge ajahbe ajahbe ajahbe, jo tiingi nnoobo etib, fere jo lim ane edi ajehng ajehng, bo nob ayam ebo.
Eji Herod ji jolo ntul no Galili wuku nsol kpee nyi jo lim, owo ala kehm jo teel-e, tibre ane bandiki jo bungu re, “Jon ji nwohngalahb ebnyahme go elkv.”
Ane bandiki bungu re, “Elaija wo ma lohng ba.” Ane bandiki bungu re, “Nnyehnamahr awohng noko no jolo go nkꞌkula ngare wo ma feere ba jol go elkpin.”
Herod bungu re, “Jon, m m-e kim esi, wo anv, nne awo n kpꞌkpeke wuk elkohn nsol ana nyia bada ne?”
Owo á kehm jo gare ana á bahke nyehne Jisos.
Eji abatiingetib ma feere, bo kehm ba tong Jisos ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo ma lim. Á kehm koko bo bo, tahm a bo go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Betsaida.
Eji ane wuku ano, owo bo kehm-e toono. Á kehm gbaame bo, fere bung a bo bade etul bi Esowo. Ane ba jo yam, á lim bo, bo nob.

Ngare nyi njul yahke ba ellahme, owo abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal kehm bake ba tong-e re, “Tong ane baa, bo song go ajahbe nya li kpidi kpidi, a abon ajahbe bako, eji bo lꞌting nsol alehke li, fere ting adi nyao bo bahke kange. Tibre tahm edi jia rehng go ajahbe ekidi kpꞌlabe.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Wahnfono antahng kaan bo nsol alehke, bo li.”
Bo kehm faange re, “E kpi abon abred na alon, kunu abon nsahre na abal ba ba. Anv, a kpꞌsebe re wahr tahm song gunu nsol alehke, ba ka elkohn ellong ane ana niaa?”
Tibre aneblum ba jolo o, jolo ejum ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal atahl awubu (5,000).
Owo Jisos kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Nong, ane baa ji agꞌgabe agꞌgabe, ellong anehng anehng jo jol ane atahl abal ane awubu.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm limi ano, ane bao kpee ji ndi.
Owo Jisos kehm rodo abon abred bao na alon, kunu abon nsahre abal, kpiidi amahr enye go elbung, kak Esowo saam, bakke, ka abatꞌtoono ebe, eji bo lꞌsong bak ellong ane bao. Bo kehm song bak bo.
Ane bao li kpee wohngo. Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm taare erik ji ane bao li no sa, ruru ewubu ejeere ebbal.
Efung abehng bi Jisos jo kak ero antahng, abatꞌtoono ebe kehm ba kpir-e. Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, ane kpo bung renan bada name? Me n li elkohn nne awo?”
Bo kehm faange re, “Ane bandiki kpo bung re, wo Jon ji nwohngalahb wo. Ane bandiki re, wo Elaija wo. Ane bandiki re, nnyehnamahr awohng noko no jolo mahne mahne wo ma nyahme.”
Owo Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, wahn kpo bung renan bada name? Me n li elkohn nne awo?”
Pita kehm faange re, “Wo li Mesaya nyi Esowo tum-a no.”
Jisos kehm rehke bo, fere bung a bo tꞌtahne re, bo kꞌtong nnene.
Owo Jisos kehm bungu tong abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Mmon no nne bahke nyehne erem gbꞌgbal. Anebkul nfam, atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm bahk-e tene, fere wul-e. Lꞌkang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv.”
Owo á kehm bungu tong ane kpee re, “Nne no lꞌseb re á toon-m, nong á ten elne tv-m, fere rod ekros eje efung abehng abehng, jo toon-m.
Nne awohng awohng no kpꞌsebe re á tahre elkpin ene, á bahke tane na elkpin ene. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtane elkpin ene tib go egame esi, á bahke tahre na elkpin ene.
Nsehng anyi nne bahke lehke, jol afi á gbo afang nya njini nyia kpee, fere tane elkpin ene, afi á yake elne ka go?
Tibre nne awohng awohng no lꞌbe ndon, ten-m, afi jolo alum enyame, fvfo, Mmon no nne bahke tob be-e ndon, á lꞌba go ege ellub, a ellub ni Nde, a abarebare enjel.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Egom jindiki ji yim a, nehm kpo, tete bo nyehn etul bi Esowo go amahr.”
Bomo ngare nyi Jisos bungu alum nyao, eji ma kang nfung enehkeni, owo á kehm rodo Pita, Jon, a Jems, wahr a bo go ewong re á song kak ero.
Eji á jo kak ero, esamahr ebe kehm yaange. Nsol nyi á kake no kehm bare, fere jo nyꞌnyahne.
Owo ane abal kehm soro lohng ba kehme elbungu a ne, noko jolo Moses, noko jol Elaija.
Bo ba go ellub ba bung a Jisos bade elkv ni á yahke ba elkpoko go Jerusalem, eji á lꞌgohro lim ji Esowo toobo no bum-e.
Wo gana, Bab Pita ebgbo ellu kpꞌlale.
Eji ane bao yahke tahm, owo Pita kehm tongo Jisos re, “Nsoo, nꞌnob re wahr jol a. Nong, wahr si nkpatahk era, behko bꞌba, behko bi Moses, behko bi Elaija.” Jol á kahnem ji á jo bꞌbung.
Eji á kpi mbungu mbungu, ekparesemsem kehm tahle, ba bulu bo. Bo kehm kehme elfahle, eji bo woomo go ekparesemsem.
Bo kehm wuku ellum go atahng ekparesemsem re, “A wo li akor-m mmon ewame, jo wuken ye!”
Eji ellum nio ma mal, bo nyehne Jisos ntahngtahng. Bo belle na belle. Ngare nyio bo tikem tong nne awohng awohng ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo nyehne no.
Etoono efung behko eji bo ma badde go ewong, ellong ane tvv kehm ba kpiri Jisos.
Nne awohng go ellong ane bao kehm rabe re, “Ntꞌtibi, n kpa gboongo! Nyehn mmon ewame ana! Ye ntahngtahng wo n kpi-e no.
Ebi etohko kpo yehk-e. Ngare anyehng anyehng nyi á lꞌyehk-e, á soro biingi tvtv, fere sok-e, tete nfahl jo tub-e nnyo, fere jo jahr-e. Kpo riidi kehm-e yake abo.
Me n gboongo abatꞌtoono eba re bo kam-e yehke. Bo maam lim.”
Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Jen ji wahnge wahn ane ba li anv kil taame? Ń kpo fere soodo! Anv, m bahke kange renan a nahne, fere jo tib-n, ń kehm kahne? Ko mmon ewa ba a ne!”
Eji mmon noo jo jen abake, ebi etohko jio kehm-e soro yehke tub go ndi, á soro gbo ngboko.
Owo Jisos kehm nyame esabsab etohko jio, fere lim mmon noo, á nob, fere yak-e ka nde.
Ane kpee kehm kpoko bo esi, eji bo nyehne egburu nsahm nyi Esowo.
Eji kpi nkpoko nkpoko ane bao kpee esi bade ejum ajehng ajehng ji Jisos ma lim, owo á kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re,
“Wuken alum nyaa, wahn kak go egahna ntim! Tibre Mmon no nne, bo yahk-e ba elyake kak ane go abo.”
Bo kahnem ana alum nyao lohngo no. Tibre á lenngem bo, eji bo lꞌkꞌkahn ana lohngo no.
Abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm kehme nfaabe lim bada nne no ga gbal go bo ellong.
Eji Jisos sebe kahn ji bo jo tir go bo a ntim, owo á kehm koko mmonse, á ba yiimi kohl-e,
kehm tongo bo re, “Nne awohng awohng no lꞌko mmonse ana noa tib go egama mbing, á ko me. Nne no lꞌko me, á ko nne no tum-m no.
Jon kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, wahr ebnyehn nne no kpꞌkame ane abi atohko yehke go ega mbing. E m-e sahde, tibre wa á kpehme toono ana wahr.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Kana ye kpe sahde, tibre nne no tohk-n ko ekv, ye nne ewahne wo.”
Eji afung nya bo bahke rodo Jisos tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo ma kabbe, á kehm bobo eltim ene re á tahm go Jerusalem.
Á kehm tumu ane, bo gbo-e mbang, song rehng go ejahbe Samaria ajehng re bo song toobo nsol bum-e.
Ane ba jolo ona we koom, tibre bo kahne kpee re, á jo tahme go Jerusalem.
Eji abatꞌtoono ebe Jems, a Jon nyehne ano, owo bo kehm bahbe re, “Ntul, anv, a kpꞌsebe re wahr biri agun lohng go ejahbetul Esowo tv boa, ana Elaija limi noa?”
Owo Jisos kehm keebe, kehm nyame bo re, “Anv, ń nehme kahn elkohn etohko ji ń kpi noa?”
“Tibre Mmon no nne baam re á ba rannge elkpin ane, á ba na re ane bel eltahre.”
Eji bo jo jen go mbang asongo, nne awohng kehm tongo Jisos re, “M bahk-a toono, je edi ajehng ajehng ji a fi no.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Akpangang kpi abing, nruk kpi ntahk. Wo, Mmon no nne, edi ellohko esi ajehng ajehng á kpimm.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo nne noko re, “Tahm toon-m!” Á kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, nong me n tohko gbo mbang song kpa nsoo kak.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nong, akvne kpa akvne ebo kak.
Owo nne noko kehm kpe bung re, “Ntul, m bahk-a toono. Nong, me n tohko gbo mbang song tong ane ebame re me n fio.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nne awohng awohng no ma rod elu eje, bom egbe abahme, fere jo keebe go njahm, á kpeem fuumu re á kuumu etul bi Esowo.”
Eji ma jol ano, owo Jisos kehm yehke ane atahl ara ane awubu bako, tum bo ane abal abal re,
Tib á tongo bo re, “Egbe ji elkpake jia gbalee. Abalimeltum li ntiil. Owo fvfo nobo re wahn gboongo nfono egbe, á tum abalimeltum tv go ege egbe, bo song kpa.
Songen, n kp-n tumu ana abon ejoro re wahn song go ellong agabe.
Kana fili akpohko, a abam!
“Etahk ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌyange, jo kaken aneb etahk bao nnyo re, ‘Nong, elkoono jol etahk jia!’
Nne lꞌfere jol o, no kpꞌsebe elkoono, elkoono enahne bahke jolo a ne, tohko jol ano elkoono enahne bahke feere ba tob-n.
Jolen etahk jꞌnehm ona, wahn jo li, fere jo wo ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo lꞌka-n. Tibre nlokeltum fꞌfuumu re á bel eltuuru ene.
“Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌje, bo lꞌvvr-n, jo liin ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo ka-n no.
Limen aneb ayam, bo nob ejahbe jio, wahn fere tong ane bao re, ‘Etul bi Esowo ma-n kabbe.’
“Ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌje, bo tohk-n vvrv, tahmen song go afak nya li ejahbe jio, wahn jo bung re,
‘Ebtohko bi ejahbe ejahne bi ma-r laake go egahre akpade, e kpꞌkumu tv-n. Ejum jia ji nobo re wahn kahn ji li re, Etul bi Esowo ebkabbe.’
“N kp-n tongo re, Efung elam bio, elam nehm ga bib a aneb Sodom ana bahke bibi a ejahbe jio.
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn aneb Korasin! Eyuu a nahne, wahn aneb Betsaida! Li re Taya abola Saidon nyehne akpokosi ana nya ḿ ma nyehn, kehn bobgbo ndon wuku wuku, kak agbajake nsol, fere ji go atong.
Efung elam bio, elam nehm ga bib a aneb Taya, a Saidon ana bahke bibi a nahne!
“Wahn aneb Kapenium, bo ma-n mehl wahre rehng go ejahbetul Esowo.
“Nne no lꞌwuk-n, á wuku me. Nne no lꞌten-n, á tene me. Nne no lꞌten me, á tene nne no tum-m no.”
Ane atahl ara ane awubu bao feere kehnge go eyebatahng, fere jo bung re, “Ntul jol abi atohko wob-r na go elwo tib go ega mbing.”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Me n nyehn nnehm ma fooro go ejahbetul Esowo gbo ana emangedu.
M ma-n ka nsahm nyi ḿ bahke jo jade enyo, a enang go akpade, fere ka-n nsahm nyi gbale sehnge nsahm kpee nyi Nnekv kpi no. Ejumjum limm, ji bahk-n jo lim go mbang anyehng anyehng.
Kana jo geere tib abi atohko wob-n go elwo. Jo geeren, tibre abing enyahne, bobnyon go ejahbetul Esowo.”

Ngare nyio Jisos kehm bele eyebatahng go etohko, kehm bungu re, “N kp-a tehke Nsoo, wo ji li Ntul no ejahbetul Esowo, a ndi, tibre a behre nsol nyia re akahnkahn ane, a aneb ngbere kꞌnyehn, a ma fere lennge ka abonbili. O nsoo, ano wo kor-a no go ega eltim.
Nsoo ebyake ejum ajehng ajehng kak-m go ebo.
Jisos kehm keebe, kehm bungu tong abatꞌtoono ebe ngare nyi bo jolo bo bo re, “Elfuulu li ka ane ba kpꞌnyehne nsol nyi wahn kpꞌnyehne.
Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Abanyehnamahr gbalee, a atul jo sebe re bo nyehn ji ń kpꞌnyehne, jol bo nyehnem. Bo jo sebe re bo wuk ji ń kpꞌwuku, jol bo tikem wuk.”
Ntꞌtibi no atahm awohng kehm lohngo ba re á ba gare Jisos. Owo á kehm bungu re, “Ntꞌtibi, m bahke limi renan, kehm bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini?”
Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, jen ji bo nyono go atahm? Jen ji a kpo lꞌlung?”
Owo á kehm faange re, “Esowo Ntul ewa bahke jo kor-a eltim eltim ena, etohko etohko eja, eko eko eja, a ntir a ntir enya. Nne ebjing ewa jo kor-a ana ebjing eba.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Wobfaange go nseenge. Jo lim ano, a bahke bele elkpin.”
Ntꞌtibi noo sebe re á tib re, ye etingi nne ji. Owo á kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Nne awo li nne ebjing ewame?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nne awohng lohngo go Jerusalem, jo tahm go Jeriko. Eji á jo tahm, á kehm song kpiri awajv. Bo kehm-e yehke nsol nyi á kake no, fere dv-e, tab-e tub, á sa noongo o ana nkvne.
“Wo ana, ejum jo jol, nlimajom awohng jo sehnge mbang nyio. Eji á ba nyehn nne noo nong no, á kehm gbake eje, sehng nkpe a mbang nyehko tahm.
“Ano wo fvfo nne no kpo lim eltum go etahk Esowo kehm tob ba rehng edi jio, ba nyehn nne noo, tob gbake eje, sehng nkpe a mbang nyehko tahm eje.
“Nne a Samaria awohng no jo tahm eljen, kehm tob ba rehng eji nne noo.
Á kehm jeere, song kpir-e, fere kak-e akehng go alok, a alahb avain, gba-e, kehm-e rodo kunu go ege a nnyam, tahm a ne, song rehng go etahk ajehng. Owo á bohng-e no.
Etoono efung behko, á kehm yehke nsiring ewubu, ka nfontahk noo, kehm bungu re, ‘Jo kpur-e. Akpohko anyehng anyehng nya a lꞌkpe rannge budu, n lꞌba, m bahke feere a nya ka-a.’
“Anv, ane ara baa, nne awo a tiri re, á jolo nne ebjing a nne no awajv dv-e no?”
Owo ntꞌtibi no atahm noo kehm faange re, “Nne no á fil-e ndon wo.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Song, wo tob song lim ano!”
Eji Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe jo jen go mbang asongo, á kehm song rehng ejahbe ajehng.
Owo nnenkal awohng no bo jo lung-e re Mata kehm-e vvrv, kak go etahk.
Mata bele mmonannyehn no bo jo lung-e re Meri, ji jii kohlo Ntul a Jisos, jo wuungu atung go ege alum.

Mata jo dehke na dehke, eji á jo lam nsol ka bo, tib eltum gbale sehng. Owo á kehm bake, ba tong Jisos re, “Ntul, anv wa nehme lub, eji n kpꞌloko eltum nia antahng, Meri kil-m ebo kaka? Tong-e, á ba kak-m ebo!”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Mata, a kpꞌtiiri nsol gbalee nyi kp-a gbiingi go eltim.
Ejum ajehng ji li ji tahne tahne.
Efung abehng Jisos jolo edi ajehng, jo kak ero. Eji á ma kak mal, ntꞌtoono ewe awohng kehm bungu tong-e re, “Ntul, tib-r ana e bahke jo kak ero, ana Jon tibi abatꞌtoono ebe.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Ń lꞌkehme ero kak, jo bungen re,
“Nsoo, nong, mbing enya jol saang!
Yake etul eba ba!
Jo ka-r nsol alehke nyi lꞌbiingi a nahre go efung efung.
Jo tahm ka-r go egahre abiafem!
Tibre wahrfono antahng kpo tob tahm ka nne awohng awohng no lim-r abiafem.
Ka lim, e yel go elgaare!”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Li re nne awohng ewahne bahke jeke, song kpiri nte ewe nlum atv, kehm-e tongo re, ‘Mbi, bong-m abon abred na ara,
tibre nte ewame awohng eblohng ba ejen go egame etahk. Ejum alehke ajehng ajehng n kpimm, ji m bahk-e kake.’
“Fono, nne no wob ekpꞌkpa bahke faange re, ‘Ka ma kpe gbiinga, mbutahk li ta taa, abon ebame nong a name ga edilnonga, n nehm ma mehl ba ka-aa?’
“N kp-n tongo re, Jol afi á tahmem ba ka-e tib eji á li nte ewe, á bahke tahme ba ka-e ana á kpꞌsebe tib go elgbiingi ni á kp-e gbiingi.
“Owo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, wahn bahb, ḿ bahke bele. Seben, ḿ bahke nyehne. Kahden, bo bahke lennge mbu ka-n.
Tibre nne awohng awohng no lꞌbahb, á bahke bele. Nne no lꞌseb, á bahke nyehne. Nne no lꞌkahd, bo bahke lennge mbu ka-e.
“Li re nne awohng ewahne li nde nne, mmon ewe lꞌbahb-e re á ka-e ebred, anv, á bahk-e kake eltala? Afi á lꞌbahb-e re á ka-e nsahre, á bahke bobo nnyo ka-e?
Afi á lꞌbahb-e re á ka-e ejenkok, á bahk-e kake nnang?
Anv, wahn ji li na abi ane, ń lꞌmal ka abon ebahne nsol nyi nno, lꞌlim renan Nsoo no li go ejahbetul lꞌkꞌka ane ba bahb-e no Etingi Etohko?”
Jisos kehm kame nne no jolo nkamme ebi etohko yehke. Eji ebi etohko jio ma lohng nne noo, nne noo kehm kehme elbungu. Owo kehm kpoko ellong ane bao esi.
Egom jindiki kehm kehme elbungu re, “Á kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke tib go nsahm nyi Belsebul ntul a nnehm ka-e no.”
Egom jehko jo sebe re bo gar-e. Owo bo kehm-e tongo re á tib elliingi ni bahke lohngo go ejahbetul Esowo.
Jisos kꞌkahn ntir atahng abo,
Anv, ejahbetul ji nnehm lꞌyab, ejahbetul eje bahke limi renan kehm yiimi? Tibre wahn kpo bung re, n kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke go nsahm nyi ntul a nnehm.
Lꞌjol re n kpo kam ane abi atohko yehke go nsahm nyi ntul a nnehm, anv, nsahm anyi abon ebahne kpo ko, jo kam bo yehke? Owo wahnge bo bahke jolo ane ba bahk-n lame.
“Wo, lꞌfere jol re n kpꞌkame ane abi atohko yehke go nsahm nyi Esowo, lohngo re etul bi Esowo bi ma badde ba tob-n.
Etahntahn nne lꞌfili ntahme go ebo, jo baabe etahk eje, ejum ajehng ajehng eje nehm ran esi.
Etahntahn nne ji tahne sehng-e lꞌba, ba nok a ne, fere ga-e, á bahk-e taare ntahme enye nyi á kpo tir re, nyi nyi bahk-e kake ebo, fere kpu nsol enye tahm a nyi song bak.
“Nne no ki li ka me, ye nnekv ewame wo. Nne no tohk-m tob elkpuku bum edi ajehng, á kpꞌfare na faade.
“Eji esabsab etohko ma lohng nne, á kpo song yannge go adi nya kpꞌwaange,
“Á lꞌfeere ba, ba nyehn, etahk jio bo ma feenge, fere tuungu ejum ajehng ajehng bum go nseenge.
Owo á bahke feere song ko atohko nyako na asehma nya sabe sehnge yefono. Bo feere ba lene o. Nne no bahke kpe sab na sehng ana wuku wuku á jolo no.”
Eji Jisos ma bung ano, nnenkal awohng go ellong ane bao kehm bungu re, “Elfuulu li a nnenkal no jel-a no, fere yab-a.”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Elfuulu ga li ka ane ba wuku alum Esowo, fere jo lim.”
Eji ellong ane jo kpe ba budu, Jisos kehm kehme elbungu re, “Ane ba li anv, abi ane ba. Bo kpꞌsebe re bo nyehn nkpokosi.
Ana Jona jolo elliingi ka aneb Ninive, ano wo fvfo Mmon no nne bahke tob jol elliingi ka ane ba li anv.
“Go efung elam bio, ntul a nnenkal no Seba bahke mehle yiimi, ka ane ba li anv ebi. Tibre á lohngo nlaabambang ejahbe, ba goji Solomon re á ba wuk elkahne ene.
“Go efung elam bio, aneb Ninive bahke mehle yiimi, ka ane ba li anv ebi. Tibre bo gbꞌgbo ndon go bo abiafem, eji bo wuku alum Esowo nya Jona bungu no. Nyehnen, a wo li ejum ji gbale sehnge Jona.
“Nnene limm, no ma nyꞌnyaale etꞌrekahng, fere rod song behr, jol rod ejeere konngo. Á bahke rodo na, kunu go ejum ji bo kpo kunu etꞌrekahng, eji ane ba kpꞌyele ekpꞌkpa lꞌjo nyehn.
“Elmahr ena li ana etꞌrekahng ka ngubjing enya. Elmahr ena lꞌjol saang, ngubjing enya kpee bahke jolo ellennge.
“Jo kunu ekpu, eji ellennge ni wob-a go atahng lꞌkꞌfere gbo ejannge.
Ngubjing enya kpee lꞌjol ellennge, kꞌbel nkpohko anyehng anyehng nyi kpi ejannge, owo ngubjing enya bahke jolo ellennge ellennge kpee ana etꞌrekahng kpꞌyake tub-a.”
Eji Jisos kpi mbungu mbungu, nne a Farisi awohng kehm-e tongo re á song li nsol a ne. Owo á kehm yele ekpꞌkpa, song ji go ekpꞌkuru nsol alehke.
Nne a Farisi noo kehm-e kpoko esi, eji á nyehne re, Jisos ruum akidi, kehm kehme nsol li.
Owo Ntul a Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Wahn Farisis, ń kpo ru njahm a nkob, a njahm ekpingi. Go atahng, abꞌbi nya ma rur, a nsol ejv.
Wahn agboolo nya! Ye ji limi njahm elatahk sang tob lim atahnga?
Yaren akpak ka nsol nyi wob go egahne akob, a nkpingi, ejum ajehng ajehng ejahne bahke bare.

“Eyuu a nahne, wahn Farisis! Wahn kpo ka eltahme go asahkesahke nsol ana nkambe, a alamaje, a anyane nyako kpee, fere jo gbake elam, a elkoro ni Esowo bum go nkpe. Limen nsol ebal ebal! Kana gbake ejum ajehng, bum go nkpe!
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn Farisis! Go egahne ekpꞌkpa ero, kpo kor-n re wahn jo ji go mbuksong. Go are, kpo kor-n re ane jo gong na, kak-n nnyo.
“Eyuu a nahne! Ń li ana alahm nya bo kil nyehne, ane kpꞌkadde sehng, jol bo nehme kahn re, bobfere jol ane ba ki kpe li saang.”
Owo ntꞌtibi atahm na awohng kehm-e faange re, “Ntꞌtibi, alum nya a kpꞌbungu a, a kp-r suku nao!”
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Eyuu a nahne, wahn atꞌtibi ba atahm fvfo! Ń kpo si ane elsol ni nnen ni kpo riidi elsolo, jol wahnfono antahng, ń kpehme tohko gꞌgare elmehle.
“Eyuu a nahne! Wahn ba li ane ba kake alahm nya anyehnamahr Esowo go nsement, ba babnso ejahne wulu no.
Eji ḿ ma lim ano, ebtib re, wahn ebtaame tv ji babnso ejahne limi no. Tibre bo ba wulu bo. Wahn ma rod alahm ebo kpꞌkake nsement.
“Owo wahnge Elkahne ni Esowo bungu re, ‘M bahke tumu abanyehnamahr, fere tum abatiingetib tv bo. Bandiki, bo bahke wulu bo. Bandiki, bo bahke nohko bo,’
eji alung ma abanyehnamahr kpee ba bo wulu no, bomo ngare nyi njini bomo no lꞌtuunu ane ba li anv,
bomo goji Ebel tete ba rehng goji Sekaraya ji bo wul-e go elka elka ni edi njom alimi, a etahk Esowo. Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane ba li anv, Esowo bahke bo bahb bada nsol nyia kpee.
“Eyuu a nahne, wahn atꞌtibi ba atahm? Wahn ba ma rod egbokoro jio ji etahk elkahne. Wahnfono yelem. Ń kpo kpan ane ba jol yele.”
Eji Jisos ma tahm edi jio, owo atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi kehm-e kehme alum jamme, fere jo bahb-e abahbe gbalee bada nsol tvv,
fere jo baab-e go ege alum nnyo, eji bo lꞌbob-e.
Eji ellong ane gbalee ma ba rur edi ajehng, bo ruru sehng, fere jo kadde atem go akpade, owo Jisos kehm gboko mbang tong abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Jo gberen ayist nyao nya Farisis, nya li alum abal abal.
Ejumjum limm, ji bo bulu no, ji bo lꞌkꞌlennge. Ejumjum limm, ji bo behre no, ji lꞌkꞌjol gbuul.
Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ḿ bungu go ejannge, bo bahke wuku ngara njul. Ji ḿ bungu awꞌwa go nkimi, bo bahke kuumu go aro ntahk, tooro wahre wahre.
“Ate ebame wahn, n kp-n tongo re, Kana jo fahl ane ba kpo wul ngubjing, ba lꞌkꞌma kpe lim ejumjum budu.
M bahk-n tibi nne no fuumu re wahn fahl-e. Jo fahlen ye jio ji kpi nsahm nyi á bahke ma ro nne kak ellulagun ngare nyi ngubjing ma kpo. N kp-n tongo re, ye wo nobo re wahn fahl-e.
“Nne li ma gunu nruk elon go are, ka mpene ebal. Jol tvtv ona, abehng abehng limm, bi Esowo m-e yini.
Alv enyahne nya li go egahne esi, Esowo ebfange kpee.
“N kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng no lꞌyiim-m ntianse go esamahr ane, Mmon no nne bahk-e tob yiimi ntianse go esamahr enjel nyi Esowo.
Nne no lꞌten-m go esamahr ane, Mmon no nne bahke tob ten-e fvfo go esamahr enjel nyi Esowo.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌbung ellum tob Mmon no nne, á bahke ma bel eltahmeka.
Bo lꞌko-n, tahm a nahne go ntahk ero, afi jolo go esamahr atubesi, afi bo fere kak-n esub, kana jo tiiri bade ana ḿ bahke faange, jol kana jo tiiri ana ḿ bahke bungu.
Tibre Etingi Etohko bahk-n tibi ngare nyio ji ḿ bahke bungu.”
Nne awohng go ellong ane bao kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Ntꞌtibi, ba tong mmonannee, wahr baange nsol nyi e li elkv me!”
Owo Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Mbi, nnene limm, no tong-m re me n jo lam alam, fere jo bak-n nsol nyi ḿ ma li elkv.”

Á kehm bungu tong bo ane kpee re, “Jo kunen ekpu, wahn jo gbere elnahne, eji ń lꞌkꞌjo baare amahr enyahne go nsol ane re wahn jo bel na bel bel bel budu. Tibre nsol gbalee nyi nne kpi no sang li elkpin ene.”
Owo á kehm tubu bo elgan re, “Efange nne ajehng jolo gona, ji egbe eje sahb lꞌlak.
Á kehm bahbe elne re, ‘Anv, m bahke limi renan? Ebuungu ejame gbalem, ji m bahke lake eblu ebame.’
Owo á kehm bungu re, ‘Ana wo m bahke limi. M bahke kpe nyange ebuungu ejame. Owo m bahke lake eblu ebame, a nsol nyehko gona kpee.
Owo m bahke kehm bungu tong elname re, Me n li efa sehng. M bahke jehke, re ekv, bel elkpin, jo li na li li li, fere jo wo, bel eyebatahng. Tibre me m bel nsol gbalee nyi bahk-m biingi go nnya tvv.’
“Esowo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Wo egboolo jia, lela atv bo bahke bake, ba ko elkpin ena. Nsol nyi a ma kuuru bum elna, nne nondiki wo bahke ba ting ko.’
“Ano wo tob li ka nne no lꞌkpu nsol afang luk elne, no ki gbo afang nya Esowo.”
Jisos kehm bungu tong abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Ana wo wahnge n kp-n tongo re, wahn kꞌjo tiiri bada nsol alehke nyi ḿ bahke jo li, a nsol nyi ḿ bahke jo kak go egahna ngubjing.
Elkpin ni ga gbal sehnge nsol alehke. Ngubjing ga gbal sehnge abomo.
“Nyehnen nruk! Bo kpehme bahm. Bo kpehme kpa. Abuungu, bo kpimm, jol bo kpehme kak go ayake. Esowo bi kpo le bo. Anv, wahn sang ga gbal sehnge nruka?
Nne awo ewahne no bahke kpe ma budu abon nnya go ege elkpin, eji á kpꞌtiiri ana?
Eji ń lꞌkꞌma lim mmonsꞌsohko ejum ana noo, jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌtiiri bada nsol nyehko?

“Nyehnen ana atꞌtul nkpad kpo gbal go emahng! Bo kpehme nyennge, lim eltum. Bo kpehme jamme nsol, kak elbo. Wo, n kp-n tongo re, jol Solomon go ege ellub, á liibem ana etꞌtuul ajehng go ellong atꞌtul nyao.
Ana Esowo kpo liibi ajele nya li go emahng, nya kpo kpin lela lela, behna bo jahm fi, jen ji wahnge á lꞌki-n tob liibi, wahn ji kpꞌkahn taame ntiil?
“Ano wo fvfo nobo re wahn kꞌjo sahb sꞌseb nsol nyi ḿ bahke jo li, fere jo wo.
Tibre ane baka baka ba ki nyi Esowo ba kpo lim ano. Nso ejahne kpꞌkahne re, ń kpꞌsebe nsol nyia.
Ga nob re wahn gbo mbang seb etul bi Esowo. Nsol nyehko kpee á bahk-n budu.
“Kana kpe fahl, wahn mmoblong ejoro! Tibre koro Nso ejahne re wahn tob ji go eti etul eje.
“Gungen nsol nyi ń kpi no, wahn rod akpohko ka akpak.
Tibre edi ji nsol afang enya li no, owo eltim ena bahke jolo.
“Tooben ebjing, wahn gbaange agbaange go egahne ebun!
Jolen ana ane ba kpꞌsiki nde ebo re á kehnge elkak elbal ba, eji á lꞌfeere ba kahd, bo lꞌlennge ka-e.
“Elfuulu li ka alokeltum ba lꞌkꞌlal ngare nyi nde ebo bahke bake.
Á li ma ba nlum atv. Á li ma ba nkpese efungfu.
“Elfuulu li ka alokeltum bao ba, á lꞌba nyehn bo, bo ma toobo ebjing.
Jia ji nobo re wahn kahn. Tibre nfontahk kahne kahn ngare nyi nwajv kpꞌbake, kehn á jol baabe etahk eje, kꞌtaame nwajv lahm etahk eje yel.
“Wahn fvfo, tooben ebjing, tibre Mmon no nne bahke bake ngare nyi ń kil tiri re á kpꞌbake.”
Pita kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntul, elgan nia, a tubu tong wahra, afi nne awohng awohng?”
Owo Ntul a Jisos kehm faange re, “Li ka ekahnkahn nlokeltum no kpi ekakesehk, no nde bahke yake alokeltum bako, kak go ege ebo re á jo le bo ngare.
Eyebatahng bahke jolo a nlokeltum noo, no nde lꞌba, á bahke ba kpir-e, á kpꞌlimi ano.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, á bahke yake nsol enye kpee kak-e go ebo.
“Nlokeltum noo lꞌfere bung go ege eltim re, ‘Nsoo eblaange elbake,’ á lꞌbom alokeltum bako go eldohko, fere jo li, jo wo, fere jo buumu,

owo nde nlokeltum noo bahke bake efung bi á kil ekpu kunu re á bahke bake, ngare nyi á kil elkahne. Nde noo bahk-e boomo, kiimi akv akv akv, fere tuur-e eltuuru nꞌnehm ana ni á bahke tuuru ane ba ki taame tv-e.
“Nlokeltum no kahne ji nde sebe re á lim, kꞌtoobo ebjing, fere lim, bo bahk-e sahb dꞌdv.
“Nlokeltum no ki kahn ji nde sebe re á lim, á lꞌfere lim nsol nyi fuumu re bo dv-e, ye, bo we nehm ga dv.
“Nne awohng awohng no bo m-e ka nsol gbalee, bo bahke sebe nsol gbalee go ege abo.
“M ba re me m ba kono agun go njini. Kor-m kor re, kehn agun nyao bom ellulu.
Ewohngalahb jia, ji m bahke tohko bel, ji ji ma-m gba area. Bahke jolo anaana tete mal.
Anv, ń kpꞌtiri re, eji m ba njini nyia, n ko elkoono ba a nia? N kp-n tongo re, elkoono sang wahnge m ba no. M ba, eji ane lꞌyab.
Bomo anv asongo ane alon lꞌjol nlaaga anyehng, abal bahke yabe jol ebo ebo, ane ara bako jol ebo ebo.
Nde nne bahke woomo njahm nyehko, mmon ewe woomo njahm nyehka. Nnyehn nne bahke woomo njahm nyehko, mmon ewe woomo njahm nyehka. Nnyehn nne bahke woomo njahm nyehko, nkal a mmon woomo njahm nyehka.”
Jisos kehm tob bung tong ellong ane bao re, “Ń lꞌnyehn ekparesemsem ma tahl go erede nfam kpꞌbake, ń kpo bung tvtv re, ‘Elahb yahke ba elnake.’ Lohko na fvfo.
Nfeb lꞌkehme ellimi nyi lohng go elka emahng, ń kpo bung re, ‘Ewannge yahke ba.’ Lohko ba fvfo.
“Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Ń kpo mal seenge elbung abola ndi, fere kahn ana ji bahke jolo. Jen ji wahnge ń lꞌkꞌma kahn ngare nyi li anv?
“Jen ji wahnge wahnfono antahng kil ebtiki kahn ji kpꞌnobo?

Nnekv ewa lꞌfere ko-a, tahm a na go esub, nok, eji a lꞌtoobo a ne ngare nyi ń kpeke li go mbang, eji á lꞌki-a tohng, tahm a na goji nlamalam, nlamalam faak-a, kak mbehresi go ebo, mbehresi ko-a song kak ngbekobo.
N kpa tongo re, a nehm tiki lohng ona, tete a gohro gal mbong enya kpee mal, jol ederi ajehng ajehng nehm sa.”
Ngare nyio ane jolo o, ba tongo Jisos bade ana Pailet wulu aneb Galili, eji bo jo lim njom ka Esowo.
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Anv, ń kpꞌtiri re, aneb Galili bao ba ga jol aneb abiafem sehnge aneb Galili bako kpeea, tib eji bo nyehne erem bioa?
Eꞌee! N kp-n tongo re, ń tohko yaange mbang enyahne, ḿ bahke tob kpo kpee ana ane bao.
“Anv, elku ane ara ba kpo go Siloam, eji enyong gbo bulu bo mee? Anv, ń kpꞌtiri re, bo ba ga jol abi ane sehnge ane bako kpee ba lene go Jerusalema?
Eꞌee! N kp-n tongo re, ń tohko yaange mbang enyahne, ḿ bahke tob kpo kpee ana ane bao.”
Jisos kehm tubu bo elgan nia re, “Nne awohng bele eti ji bo kpo lung re efig go ege etahngga. Á kehm bake ba seb akab. Á tingem nkab anyehng anyehng.
Owo á kehm tongo nne no jo lim eltum go etahngga jio re, ‘Nyehnee, nnya era nyia, nyi n kpo ba, ba kpur akab go eti jia, jol n ka tiki bel. Gbahk eti jia tub, tibre yim na yim a mbol mbol.’
“Owo á kehm-e faange re, ‘Nsoo, nong tohko kpe jol elya nia ni ni. M bahke kpake kpee sennge, fere kak akpake elu, a ajele.
Owo e bahke nyehne, joare bahke kabe akab. Tohko fere kab, wo kehm gbahke tub.’ ”
Efung Esabat abehng Jisos jo tibi go etahk ero ajehng.
Nnenkal awohng jolo o, no bele ebi etohko ji bum-e eyam, bi ma kang elku a nnya era. Nnenkal noo fehde na fehd, á joom kpe ma tanne etannetanne.
Eji Jisos nyehn-e no, á kehm-e lungu tv elne, kehm-e tongo re, “Nnenkal, ngubjing enya ebfannge!”
Jisos kehm-e kunu abo, nnenkal noo soro tanne tvtv, fere jo tehk Esowo.

Ntubesi etahk ero noo, atahng kehm-e rake, tib eji Jisos ma lim nne, á ma nob efung Esabat. Á kehm kehme ane tong re, “Li nfung erakera nyi ane bahke jo lim eltum. Jo baan afung nyao, wahn jo ba nob ayam enyahne, go efung Esabat sang.”
Owo Ntul a Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Wahn aneb alum abal abal ba! Wahn ane kpee, wahn sang kpo fannge efong ebahne, a ebvankang ebahne go ntahk nyi bo kpo wooma, tahm a bo go alahb efung Esabata?
Nyehnen nnenkal noa no li mmon no Ebraham, no nnehm gba-e no go elku a nnya era. Nobem re á for go eyam bia efung Esabata?”
Alum nya Jisos faange no kehm riki anebekv ebe ndon, bo ane kpee.
Wo, ellong ane bako kpee jo bele na eyebatahng tib go agburu nsol nyi á ma lim.
Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Anv, etul bi Esowo li renan? M bahke koko gara jen?
Li ana mmohk asia nyi nne rodo, song bahm go ege etahngga. Kehm gbale egburu elrahn.
Jisos kehm kpe bung re, “Anv, m bahke koko etul bi Esowo gara jen?
Li ana ayist,
Eji Jisos jo tahm go Jerusalem, á jo sehnge go ajahbe ajahbe, fere jo tib ane.
Nne awohng kehm-e bahbe re, “Nsoo, anv, abon amohk ane abik abik ba bahke bele eltahra?”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re,
“Jo noken, eji ń lꞌsehng go nfiidifiida mbutahk.
“Nfontahk lꞌsi mꞌmehl, bam mbu, ḿ bahke yiimi go mbutahk, jo kahd, fere jo bung re, ‘Nsoo, lenng-r mbu!’ Owo á bahk-n kehm faange re, ‘N nehme kahn edi ji ń lohng no ba.’
“Owo ḿ bahke kehme elbungu re, ‘E jo li nsol a na, fere jo wo. A jo tibi go egahre ejahbe.’
“Á bahke bungu re, ‘N kp-n tongo re, N nehme kan edi ji ń lohng no ba. Wahn abi ane baa, tahm-m wahn go esamahr!’
“Go elatahk wo ḿ bahke jo ling, fere jo kono amahn go esi, ń lꞌnyehn Ebraham, Aisik, Jekob, a abanyehnamahr kpee go ejahbetul Esowo, wahnfono antahng fere sa elatahk.
Ane bahke lohngo go ejang njini abehng abehng ba ji, jo li nsol go ejahbetul Esowo.
“Egom jindiki ji kahle njahm bahke fere gbo mbang. Egom jindiki ji gbo mbang fere kahle njahm.”
Ngare nyꞌnehm ona aneb Farisi bandiki kehm ba kpiri Jisos, kehm-e tongo re, “Lohng a, song! Tibre Herod kpꞌsebe re á wul-a.”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Songen, wahn song tong ekpangang jio re, ‘N kpꞌkame ane abi atohko yehke, fere lim ane, bo nob ayam ebo. N kpꞌlimi lela, lim behna, lꞌbiingi nfung era, n gohro lim mal.’
M bahke tahme eljen ename asongo lela tete rehng behna, a etoono efung behko. Tibre nnyehnamahr, bo bahk-e tiki wul go Jerusalem, edi jindiki sang.
“Wahn Jerusalem, ń kpo wul abanyehnamahr, fere tuubu ane ba Esowo tumu tv-n atal. Nkpel tvv n jo gare re me n lung-n tv elname ana nkok abon kpo lung abon ebe, fere walle bo. Wahn korem elbake!
“Anv, etahk ejahne bahke sake nehme nehme.
Efung Esabat abehng Jisos kehm tahme song li nsol go etahk ntubesi a nne a Farisi awohng. Owo bo jo baab-e.
Nne awohng no gbo eyam ebyeenge kehm bake goji Jisos.
Owo Jisos kehm bahbe atꞌtibi ba atahm, a Bab Farisi re, “Anv, ntahm enyahre tꞌtaame re nne jo lim ane, bo nob efung Esabata, afi?”
Bo kehm belle.
Owo Jisos kehm rodo nne eyam noo, lim-e, á nob, fere yak-e, á song.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Anv, nne awo ewahne no mmon ewe, afi nfong enye bahke gboko yel elbing alahb ni kpꞌrahbe, á kꞌsong yehk-e efung Esabata?”
Jol bo we maam faange ejumjum.
Jisos nyehne kan ana ane ba bo tob tiingi bo elkak fvfo ma song yehke adi nji nya li wahre wahre,
“Nne lꞌtiing-a elkak elbal, ka song ji edi nji ji li wahre wahre. Fundiki nne no ga gbal sehnge wo, nfono elkak tꞌtob tiing-e fvfo.
Lꞌjol ano, nne no tiingi wahn ane abal abal bahke bake, ba tong-a re, ‘Tahm ka nne noa, á ji!’ Ndon bahk-a kehme elfili re wo fere song ji go nredereda nji.

“Bo lꞌtiing-a elkak, song ji go nredereda nji, eji nfono elkak lꞌba, á bahke ba tong-a re, ‘Mbi, mehl, wo ba ji ga nwahrewahra nji.’ Owo a bahke bele ellub go esamahr ane kpee ba jehk a na go ekpꞌkuru jio.
“Tibre nne awohng awohng no lꞌrod elne bum wahre wahre, bo bahk-e rede na. Nne no lꞌrede elne, bo bahk-e rodo, bum wahre wahre.”

Owo Jisos kehm tob bung a nne no tiing-e no re, “A lꞌtiingi ane re bo ba li nsol, afi jolo elkak, ka jo tiingi ate eba, jol abonane, jol nnahb enya, a aneb nkontahk eba ba li afang ane. Tibre bo fvfo bo bahk-a tob tiingi. A lꞌlim ano, wobbel eltuuru ena tvtv go ejum ji a limi no.
Ga nob re a lꞌtiingi ane elkak, wo jo tiingi akpak, a abanne, a awakamahr.
A bahke bele elfuulu, tibre bo nehm ma tob lim ka-a.
Eji nne awohng no woomo go ellong ane ba tob ji ekpꞌkuru jio a Jisos wuku ano, owo á kehm-e tongo re,
“Elfuulu li ka nne no bahke lehke nsol go ejahbetul Esowo.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nne awohng jolo go, no limi egburu elkak, tiingi ane gbalee.
Eji afung elkak ma rehng, á kehm tumu nlokeltum ewe re á song tong ane ba á tiingi bo re bo ba.
“Bo ane kpee kehm kehme ellaange kunu go nsol. Ngbokambang a nne kehm tongo nlokeltum noo re, ‘N gunu nfong ewubu, n yahke tahm song wuungu bo. Lub wuk ana n kp-a gboongo titi.’
Owo nne noko kehm kpe bung re, ‘N gunu edi egbe. M bahke tahme song nyehn. Lub wuk ana n kp-a gboongo titi.’
Nne noko kehm tob kpe bung re, ‘Me n ko nkal, owo wahnge n lꞌkꞌma ba.’
“Nlokeltum noo kehm feere song tong nde.
“Nfono elkak noo, atahng kehm-e rake. Á kehm tongo nlokeltum ewe re, ‘Foomo song go afak ejahbe, wo song ko akpak, fere ko abanne, a awakamahr ba a bo.’
“Eji nlokeltum noo je feere, á kehm ba tong nde re, ‘Nsoo, ana a bungu no, me n lim. Eyake jia, kpeke li, ji ane bahke kpe ji.’
“Nde kehm tongo nlokeltum noo re, ‘Song go abang ebud, a abang ekulugbe, wo jo fanne ane, eji bo lꞌba, ba yel, ane lꞌrur go egame ekpꞌkpa.’
Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng awohng go ellong ane ba bo tiingi bo nehm tiki li elkak ename.”
Ellong ane gbalee jo jene a Jisos. Owo á kehm keebe, kehm tongo bo re,
“Nne awohng awohng no lꞌba go egame, á nehm ma jol ntꞌtoono ewame, tohko jol re á ko nde ekv, a nnyehn, a nkal ewe, a abon ebe, a abonanyehn, a elkpin ene fvfo.
Nne no tohko sol ekros eje, tahm toon-m, á nehm ma jol ntꞌtoono ewame.
Nne awohng ewahne lꞌseb re á si enyong, á bahke tohko gbo mbang ji, gabe ana bahk-e kimi ekun, joare akpohko enye bahk-e biingi, á si kpee mal.
Á tohko lim ano, fundiki á bahke bumu nnahb ekahme nyi nyi, á nehm kpe ma soro asi. Ane kpee ba lꞌnyehn, bo bahk-e kehme elnyoko re,
‘Nne noa ana bomo etahk go elsehke, á kpeem ma gohro si mal.’

“Ntul no kpi nsoja atahltahl nkpel eltahl, no yahke tahm re á song nok ebta a ntul noko no kpꞌbake re á ba nok a ne, no kpi nsoja atahltahl nkpel atahl abal, á bahke tohko gbo mbang ji kpee, toobo, joare á li ma yiimi, nok a ntul noko.
Joare á nehm ma yiimi a ne, á bahke tumu ane tv ntul noko, eji á kpeke li go fee re bo song bahb-e ji á bahk-e kake, bo kehm koono.
“Ano wo fvfo, nne awohng awohng ewahne no tohko yake ejum ajehng ajehng ji á kpi no, á lꞌkꞌma jol ntꞌtoono ewame.
“Akang kpꞌyebe. Elyebe akang lꞌlohng, a bahke limi renan, akang kehm kpe yebe?
Jol nehm nob ka ndi, jol nehm nob re nne ko kak go abangenahb nti. Ane kpo sale na elkohn akang nio wohng go. Nne no kpi atung, nong, á wuk.”
Abakokatak, a aneb abiafem jo jeere kohlo Jisos, eji bo lꞌjo wuk-e.
Bab Farisi, a atꞌtibi ba atahm jo memme re, “Nne noa kpo ko aneb abiafem, fere jo li nsol a bo.”
Owo wahnge Jisos kehm tubu bo elgan re,
“Anv, nne ewahne awohng lꞌbel ejoro atahl alon, anyehng lꞌtan, á nehm tahm ejoro behko sa go elka emahng, song seb nyi tane no tete á nyehn-ea?
Á lꞌnyehn-e, á bahk-e rodo, kunu go ebahk, fere jo geere.
“Á lꞌba rehng etahk, á bahke lungu ate ebe, a aneb nkontahk ebe, fere tong bo re, ‘Tob-m wahn elgeere, tibre me n nyehn njoro enyame nyi tane no.’
“N kp-n tongo re, Eyebatahng bahke ga gbal go ejahbetul Esowo, nne abiafem awohng lꞌgbo ndon,
“Li re nnenkal kpi nsiring ewubu, anyehng kehm ba tan-e, anv, á nehm nyaale etꞌrekahng, fere feenge ekpꞌkpa, jo seb bem bem bem tete á nyehna?
“Á lꞌnyehn, á bahke lungu ate ebe, a aneb nkontahk ebe, tong bo re, ‘Ba tob-m wahn elgeere, tibre me n fere nyehn nsiring nyi tan-m no.’
“N kp-n tongo re, Ano wo fvfo enjel nyi Esowo kpo bel eyebatahng, nne abiafem awohng lꞌgbo ndon.”
Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Nne awohng jolo go, no bele abon ba nlum na abal.
Nkalla kehm tongo nde re, ‘Nsoo, ka-m ejang nsol nyi bahke jolo nyꞌnyame.’ Owo nde noo kehm bake abon ebe na abal nsol enye.
“Gaam kang, mmonkalla noo kehm kpuku nsol kpee nyi á bele no, tahm go nlaabambang ejahbe.
Eji á ma fad akpohko enye kpee mal, owo njal kehm bake go ejahbe jio, jol nyi nse sang. Á kehm sake abo abo.
“Á kehm tahme, song wu laake nfono ejahbe awohng. Á kehm-e tumu re á song, jo song baabe akuk.
Jol-e koro re, á jo li nsol nyi akuk kpo li. Jol nnene jolem no jo ka-e.
“Eji á ma fere gbo ntir, owo á kehm bungu re, ‘Ane kpee ba nsoo kpo lak bo eltum, bo kpi nsol alehke gbalee, jol sehnge ana nyi bo kpꞌsebe. Wo, me n jehk ana, kpꞌkpoko njal.
M bahke tahme, song kpiri nsoo, fere tong-e re, Nsoo, me n lim abiafem bade Esowo, fere tob lim bada na.
Me n kpeem fuumu re bo jo lung-m re mmon ewa. Tob lak-m, me n tob jol nlimeltum ewa.’
“Owo á kehm mehle, feere goji nde. Jol á gaam kabbe go etahk nde, nde kehm-e nyehne. Ndon kehm-e fili, á kehm beke, song bing-e, fere sod-e nnyo.
“Owo mmon noo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Nsoo, me n lim abiafem bade Esowo, fere lim bada na. N kpeem fuumu re bo jo lung-m re mmon ewa.’
“Nde kehm lungu alokeltum ebe, kehm tongo bo re, ‘Song koon ekpawobo ji nno a nno ba a ji, wahn ba kak-e. Tob kaken ye ebil go ebo, wahn fere kak-e akpaketa go akpade.
Song koon mmon a nfong no sahb jꞌjok, wahn ba wul, wahr limen elkak, fere bel eyebatahng.
Tibre mmon ewame noa kpꞌkpo, wo anv, yebfere jol go elkpin.
“Owo bo kehm soro bom elkak nio go ellimi.
“Ngbokambang a mmon jolo go egbe. Eji á jo kehnge abake, ba kabbe go nkpe etahk, á kehm wuku ase nya bo jo kub, fere jo bahn.
Á kehm lungu nlokeltum awohng, kehm-e bahbe re, ‘Ase nyao lohngo rejen?’
“Owo á kehm-e faange re, ‘Mmonanne wo ma feere kehnge. Nso ma wul mmon a nfong no joko jok. Tibre yebfere bel mmon ewe nob nob. Ejumjum we limem.’
“Eji á ma wuk ano, atahng kehm-e rake. Á kehm tene elyele go ekpꞌkpa.
“Owo nde kehm lohngo ba gboong-e.
“Á kehm faange nde re, ‘Nnya tvv nyi m ma-a loko. Ngare anyehng anyehng n kpo lim ajehng ajehng ji a tong-m no. Jol me, a ka kꞌka mbul re me n ko lim elkak ka ate ebame.
Wo anv, eji mmon ewa noa ma ba, no ma rannge akpohko enya eji á jo noongo abajenasꞌsa, ye wo, a ma wul mmon a nfong no joko jok ka-e.’
“Owo nde kehm-e faange re, ‘Mmon ewame, wo li a name ngare anyehng anyehng. Nsol kpee nyi li nyꞌnyame, tob li nyꞌnya fvfo.
Fꞌfuumu re wahr lim elkak, fere bel eyebatahng. Tibre mmonanne noa kpꞌkpo, anv, yebfere jol go elkpin. Á tꞌtan, anv a, m m-e nyehn.’ ”
Jisos kehm kpe bung tong abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Efange nne ajehng jolo gona, ji bele nlokeltum. Ane kehm song tong-e re, nlokeltum noo kpꞌfade akpohko enye.

“Owo nde noo kehm-e lungu, kehm-e bahbe re, ‘Jen ji wahnge n kpꞌwuku nsol ana nyia bada na? Ko awer ba a nya, nya a kpo nyon nsol enyame nyi n yake kak-a go ebo. Tibre a nehm kpe tiki jol nlokeltum ewame.’
“Owo nlokeltum noo kehm bungu go ege eltim re, ‘Anv, m bahke limi renan, eji nsoo yahk-m yehke go egame eltum? Eko n gaam kpi, ji m bahke jo bahm egbe. Ndon kp-m fili re me n jo gboongo na nsol.
Anv, me n kahn ji m bahke limi, eji n lꞌbel ane ba bahk-m koko, n lene tob bo ngare nyi nsoo ma-m yehke go eltum.’
“Owo á kehm lungu ane kpee, ba bele nde abong, kehm tongo ngbokambang re, ‘A kpi nsoo mbong rejen?’
Á kehm faange re, ‘Nsang akehng atahl alon.’ Nlokeltum noo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Rod nwer a mbong enya, wo ji elwaare, nyon nsang atahl abal a nsang ewubu.’
“Owo á kehm bahbe noko re, ‘Anv, wo, mbong enya li rejen?’ Á kehm-e faange re, ‘Ebam nkohl atahl alon.’ Nlokeltum noo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Rod nwer a mbong enya, wo nyon ebam atahl ani.’
“Owo nde kehm tehke nkimfahnga nlokeltum ewe noo, tib go elwake ni á ma wake. Tibre abon ba njini nyia ba kpꞌgaka wake go bo a ntum sehnge abon ba ellennge.
“N kp-n tongo re, Roden afang nya ki li nyanyahne, wahn ko lim etem, eji afang lꞌmal, bo lꞌko-n kak go ntahk nyi li go njinanjini.
Nne no lꞌbel ekakesehk go mmojum no nse, á tob kpi ekakesehk go egburu ejum. Nne no kil ma lim mmojum no nse go etingitingi, á kpehme ma tob lim egburu ejum go etingitingi.
“Eji ń ki ma lim nsol nyi njini nyia go ekakesehk, bahke limi renan, bo kehm yake atingitingi afang kak-n go egahne abo?
Eji ń ki bel ekakesehk go nsol nyi ki li nyꞌnyahne, nne awo me, no bahk-n kake ji bahke jolo jꞌjahne?

“Nlokeltum awohng awohng limm, no bahke ma loko nde na ebal. Noko, á bahk-e koko ekv, noko jo kor-e. Tohko jol ano á bahke lake nde noko, fere jo daange noko. Ń nehm ma loko Esowo, fere jo loko akpohko.”
Eji Bab Farisi wuku nsol nyio, bo kehm-e kehme elnyoko, tibre akpohko jo koro bo sehng.

Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Wahn li ane ba kpo tib elnahne go esamahr ane re, wahn li atingitingi ane. Wo, Esowo kpꞌkahne ntim enyahne. Tibre nsol nyi ane kpo tehk, nyi nyi li nsol eltehb go esamahr Esowo.

“Atahm nya Moses, a alum nya abanyehnamahr nyono no jolo ka ngare nyio nyi mahne mahne tete ba rehng ngare nyi Jon ji nwohngalahb. Bomo ngare nyio, owo bo kehme eltiingi nnoobo etib bi li bade etul bi Esowo. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌlim go nsahm, á bahke ma kuumu.
“Elbung abola ndi tohkem rꞌriidi re tan. Jol nrꞌrohka ntahm anyehng anyehng nehm tiki range.
“Nne awohng awohng no lꞌten nkal ewe, fere ko noko, yeblim erehbe. Nne no lꞌbaange nnenkal no nlum ewe m-e yehke elbal, eblim erehbe.”
“Efange nne ajehng jolo gona, ji jo liibi nsol nyi jo sahb kꞌkim ekun, fere jo lim egburu elkak efung abehng abehng.
“Nne awohng tob jolo ona, no bo jo lung-e re Lasaros, ji jolo nkpak. Ngubjing enye jolo alok alok. Á jo kono eljeke go mbutahk efange nne jio.
Á jo sebe re á jo kpiimi akahb elang li, nya jo fooro ekpꞌkuru efange nne jio gbo, eji á lꞌwohngo. Ebv jo lohngo ba lahb-e alok.
Toono o nkpak nyio ba kpo. Babenjel kehm ba sol-e, song bum-e, á ji kohlo Ebraham.
“Efange nne jio kehm tob kpo. Bo kpa-e kak.
Eji á woomo go ellulagun, jo nyehn erem, á kehm tabe esamahr ebe, kehm nyehne Ebraham go fee, fere nyehn Lasaros jehk kohl-e.

Owo á kehm rabe re, ‘Nso Ebraham, nong, me n fil-a ndon! Lub tum Lasaros, á song behde ebnyohkobo ebe go alahb, ba behd-m go ebliki, eji ebliki ebame lꞌlub naang-m. Tibre n kpꞌnyehne erem sehng go agun nyaa.’
“Owo Ebraham kehm-e faange re, ‘Mmon ewame, buumu re, ngare nyi a jolo go elkpin, a bele anoobo nsol, Lasaros bele asabsab nsol. Wo anv, bo m-e kak eltim, wo noa, kpi erem nyehn.
Wo gana, elka elka ni wahr a nahne, egburu edamme jia, ji nnene lꞌkꞌma sehng ga egahre, ba rehng go egahne, fvfo ji nnene lꞌkꞌtob ma sehng go egahne, ba rehng ga egahre.’
“Owo efange nne jio kehm bungu re, ‘Nsoo, n kp-a gboongo re, wo lub tum Lasaros tv go etahk nsoo,
eji á lꞌsong rehke abonanee. Tibre n kpi abonanyehn na alon, tohko jol ano, bo bahke tob ba, ba nyehn erem ebnohko edi jia.’
“Owo Ebraham kehm faange re, ‘Bo kpi awer nya Moses, a nya abanyehnamahr, nong, bo jo wuk.’
“Efange nne jio kehm tene re, ‘Eꞌee nso Ebraham, nne lꞌlohng akvne, fere song kpiri bo, bo bahke gboko ndon.’
“Ebraham kehm-e tongo re, ‘Bo tohko fere wuk alum nya Moses, a nya anyehnamahr, afi nne nyahme na go elkv, bo nehm taame.’ ”
Jisos kehm bungu tong abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Nsol nyi kpo lim nne gbo yel abiafem bahke tiki ba. Eyuu a nne no bahke wahnge re ba!
Ga nob re bo kahn-e eltal go emel, tub-e kak alahb, sehnge re á lim mmonse awohng go ellong abonse baa, á gbo yel abiafem.
“Jo gberen elnahne!
“Mmonanne lꞌlim abiafem, jo rehk-e. Á lꞌgbo ndon, tahm ka-e.
Á lꞌsood-a nkpel esehma efung abehng, fere ba gboong-a nkpel esehma re, ‘Ndon ma-m fili!’ tahm ka-e.”
Owo abatiingetib kehm tongo Ntul a Jisos re, “Lim eltaame enahre gbal!”
Ntul a Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Li re ń kpi eltaame ni se ana mmohk asia, kehn ń li ma bung tong etaamenti bia re, ‘Mehl, wo song yiimi go aya!’ kehn bahk-n wuku.
“Li re nne awohng ewahne kpi nlokeltum no kpo bahm egbe, tohko jol ano á kpo baabe ebul. Á lꞌkehnge egbe ba, nde kpo tong-e tong rea, ‘Ba elwaare, wo ba ji ekpꞌkuru li nsola?’
“Eꞌee! Á bahk-e tongo na re, ‘Song lam nsol ka-m, wo fere toobo ebjing bi a bahk-m loko ngare nyi n kpi nsol li. N lꞌli mal, wo kehm tob li.’
“Anv, á bahke kake nlokeltum ewe nnyo go nsol nyi á tong-e re á lima?
“Wahn fvfo, ń lꞌlim nsol kpee nyi bo tong-n re wahn lim, jo bungen re, ‘Wahr alokeltum baka baka ba. Wahr eblim ji li ka-r re wahr lim.’ ”
Eji Jisos je go Jerusalem, á sehnge go Samaria, a Galili.
Eji á rehnge go ejahbe ajehng, aneb abili na awubu kehm ba wan-e. Bo yiimi go fee,
kehm rabe re, “Jisos nso ejahre, nong, wahr fil-a ndon!”
Eji Jisos nyehne bo, á kehm tongo bo re, “Songen, wahn song kpiri abalimajom, fere tib bo elnahne.”
Eji bo jo jen asongo, bo kehme elnobo.
Nne awohng go bo ellong, eji á nyehne re yeblohko nob, á kehm feere abake, jo tehk Esowo wahre wahre,
kehm ba gbo go alata nya Jisos, kehm-e kake saam. Nne noo jolo nne a Samaria.
Owo Jisos kehm bungu re, “Anv, ane awubu sang nobo noa? Ane asehmwubu bako bana?
Nnene feerem ba re á ba tehk Esowoa, sehngem njenne nyia nyi nyi feere noa?”
Owo á kehm-e tongo re, “Mehl, wo song, eltaame ena eblim, wobnob.”
Egom Farisi jindiki kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Ngare anyi etul bi Esowo bahke bake!”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etul bi Esowo nehm ba go mbang nyi ane bahke nyehne.
Nne awohng awohng limm, no bahke bungu re, ‘Nyehn, bi gana!’ jol, ‘Nyehn, bi gona!’ Tibre etul bi Esowo bia, wob-n go atahng.”
Owo á kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Ngare kpꞌbake nyi ḿ bahke sebe re efung abehng bi Mmon no nne kpir-n, jol wahn nehm kpiri.
Bo bahk-n jo tong re, ‘Nyehnen gona!’ Ane bako bahk-n jo tong re, ‘Nyehnen ga!’ Kana lohng je ona! Jol kana toono bo!
Ana emangedu kpo lim, lennge go elbung, rehng ejang abehng abehng, ano wo fvfo Mmon no nne bahke jolo go ege efung.
Á bahke gboko mbang nyehn erem gbalee. Ane ba li anv bahk-e tene.
“Ana jolo ngare nyio nyi Noa, ano wo fvfo bahke tob jol afung nyao nya Mmon no nne.
Ngare nyio ane jo li, fere jo wꞌwo. Aneblum jo ko akal, anebkal jo bal alum, tete rehng efung bio bi Noa yele go egbang. Owo nnyel kehm yele, ba wul bo kpee.
“Bahke jolo ana jolo ngare nyio nyi Lot. Bo jo li, fere jo wꞌwo, jo gunu, fere jo gꞌgungu, jo bahm ebgbe, fere jo si ntahk.
Efung bi Lot lohngo go Sodom, agun, a asalfa kehm kehme elnake go ejahbetul Esowo, ba wul bo kpee.
“Ano wo bahke tob jol fvfo efung bi bo bahke lennge Mmon no nne tib.
Efung bio, nne no lꞌkuumu go ege ero etahk, á lꞌbadde, á kꞌtohko kpe ji, yel go ege ekpꞌkpa, song rod nsol enye. Ano wo fvfo tob li ka nne no li go ege egbe, á nehm tohko kpe feere go ege etahk.
“Buumen nkal a Lot!
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌgare re á tahre elkpin ene, á bahke tane na elkpin ene. Nne no lꞌtane elkpin ene, á bahke tahre na elkpin ene.
“N kp-n tongo re, atv mao ane abal bahke noongo go edilnong ajehng, noko, bo bahk-e rodo tahm a ne, noko sa.
Anebkal abal bahke jo gok nsol, noko, bo bahk-e rodo tahm a ne, noko sa.
Aneblum abal bahke jolo go egbe, noko, bo bahk-e rodo tahm a ne, noko sa.”
Owo abatꞌtoono ebe kehm-e bahbe re, “Nsoo, gan wo?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Edi ji ekpakv ejum li no, owo ntere kpo song rur.”
Jisos kehm tubu bo elgan, eji á lꞌtib bo ana bo bahke jo kak ero ngare anyehng anyehng, kꞌjo yini ekpu.
Á bungu re, “Nlamalam awohng jolo go ejahbe ajehng, no ki jo fahl Esowo. Ane we joom lub.
“Nkalebun awohng tob jolo ejahbe jio, no gbake jo je go ege, jo song tong-e re, ‘Lam elam ejame nob nob, ji n kpi a nnekv ewame.’
“Á kehm tene. Kpe kang kan a, á kehm fere bung go ege eltim re, ‘Jol eji n kil jo fꞌfahl Esowo, ane kil jo lub-m,
tib eji nkalebun noa kp-m gbiingi sꞌsehng, m bahke lame elam eje nob nob, tohko jol ano á bahk-m gboro tib go elbake ni á kpo ba ngare anyehng anyehng.’ ”
Ntul a Jisos kehm bungu re, “Wuken ana ebi nlamalam noo bungu no.
Anv, Esowo nehm tob lam elam ji nno ka ane ba á yehke no, ba kpo gboong-e atv a njula? Anv, á bahke tohko laange, kehm kake bo eboa?
N kp-n tongo re, á bahke lame elam ji nno elwaare ka bo. Anv, Mmon no nne lꞌba, á bahke nyehne ane ba kpꞌtaame go njini nyiaa?”
Jisos tob tubu elgan nia, tong ane ba jo bum elbo re, bo ba li go etingitingi, fere jo daange ane bako.
Á bungu re, “Ane abal je go etahk Esowo re bo song kak ero. Noko jolo nne a Farisi, noko jol nkokatak.

“Nne a Farisi kehm yiimi eje eje, jo kak ero re, ‘O Esowo, m ma-a kak saam, tibre n limm ana ane ba kpo v ejv, ba kil jo lim nsol go etingitingi. N limm ana ane ba kpo lim erehbe. M ma-a kak saam, tibre n limm ana nkokatak noo ona.
N kpo bade elname njal nkpel ebal go erahde. N kpo ka eltahme go ejum ajehng ajehng ji n lꞌbel.’
“Nkokatak yiimi eje go fee. Jol á tabem esamahr ebe, seenge go elbung. Á kohko na esi eje go ndi, kehm bungu re, ‘Esowo, nong, me n fil-a ndon, me nne abiafem wo.’

“N kp-n tongo re, Nkokatak noa wo li eno go esamahr Esowo, kehm kehnge go etahk, nne a Farisi sang. Tibre nne awohng awohng no lꞌmehl elne wahre, bo bahk-e rede na. Nne no lꞌrede elne, bo bahk-e mehle na wahre.”
Ane bandiki kehm koko abon ba nse, ba goji Jisos re á kooro bo abo. Eji abatꞌtoono Jisos nyehne ano, bo kehm nyame bo.
Owo Jisos kehm lungu bo tv elne, kehm bungu re, “Nongen, abon ba nse jo ba ga egame. Kana jo sahde bo! Tibre etul bi Esowo li ka nkohn nyia.
“Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, nne awohng awohng no tohko ko etul bi Esowo ana mmon no nse, á nehm tiki li.”
Ntubesi awohng kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Nnooba ntꞌtibi, m bahke limi renan, kehm bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Jen ji wahnge a kehm-m lꞌlung re nnooba nne fono? Nnene limm, no li nnooba nne, sehngem Esowo ntahngtahng bi li nnooba nne.
A kpꞌkahne atahm nya bungu re, ‘Ka jo lim erehbe! Ka jo wul nne! Ka jo v ejv! Ka jo yiimi ntianse efahnge! Jo kak nso, a nne!’ ”
Owo nne noo kehm faange re, “Atahm nyaa kpee m bomo elbumu ngare nyi n kpeke li ntiil.”

Eji Jisos wuku ano, á kehm bungu re, “Ebsa ejum ajehng ji a bahke gohro lim. Song gungu nsol kpee nyi a kpi no, wo ko akpohko nyao song ka akpak, owo a bahke bele afang go ejahbetul Esowo, wo fere tahm toon-m.”
Eji á wuku ano, á kehm kehme elguunu, tibre á fange sehng.
Jisos nyehne kan re á kpꞌguunu, á kehm bungu re, “Bahke riidi sehng re afang ane kehm lehke etul bi Esowo.
Re efange nne kehm yele ejahbetul Esowo, ekamel bahke sehnge go mbang a nga.”
Ane ba wuku no kehm bahbe re, “Anv, nne awo me, no bahke kehm bele eltahre?”
Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Ji nne kil ma lim, goji Esowo riidem.”
Pita kehm bungu re, “Nyehn, ana e ma tahm ntahk enyahre sa, kp-a toono.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nnene limm, no ma tahm etahk eje sa, jol nkal ewe, jol abonanyehn, jol babnde, a abon ebe tib go esi ji etul bi Esowo,
no lꞌkꞌbel na gbalee budu eying jia ji anv, fere bel elkpin ni li go njinanjini eying ji kpꞌbake.”

Owo Jisos kehm rodo abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal, tahm a bo go nkpohko, kehm song tong bo re, “Anv, e yahke tahm go Jerusalem. Go wo ejum ajehng ajehng ji abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono no bada Mmon no nne, bahke lohko lim ano go etingitingi.
Tibre bo bahk-e yake, kak ane ba ki li Jus go ebo. Bo bahk-e nyoko, fere son-e, fere so atel wohng-e.
Bo bahk-e dohko, fere wul-e. Lꞌkang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe wukem ejum ajehng ajehng ji á bungu no. Lenngem bo, tibre bo bꞌbehr bo alum nyao.
Jisos kehm jene song kabbe go Jeriko. Nwakamahr anyehng ji o nkpe a mbang, jo gboongo nsol.
Eji á wuku ellong ane kpꞌsehnge, á kehm bahbe re, “Nenan ana?”
Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Jisos ji Nasaret wo kpꞌsehnge.”
Owo á kehm soro rabe re, “Jisos mmon no Devid, nong, me n lub fil-a ndon!”
Ane ba jolo esꞌsong kehm-e nyame re á rahke ewok. Á kehm kpe tuungu na, rabe wahre wahre re, “Mmon no Devid, nong, me n fil-a ndon!”
Jisos kehm yiimi, kehm tongo bo re, bo ko-e ba. Eji á ba rehng kabbe Jisos, owo Jisos kehm-e bahbe re,
“Anv, a kpꞌsebe re me n lim jen ka-a?”
Á kehm faange re, “Nsoo, n kpꞌsebe re me n lub nyehn.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Fere jo nyehn anv! Eltaame ena ebwahng, wobnob.”
Tvtv ona á kehm soro nyehn, fere tahm toon-e, jo ka Esowo ellub.
Eji ane bako kpee nyehne ano, bo kehm kehme Esowo tehk.
Jisos kehm rehnge go Jeriko, sehng asongo.
Nne awohng jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Sakeus. Á jolo ntubesi abakokatak, fere fꞌfang.
Á jo sebe re á nyehn ana Jisos li no. We á joom nyehn, tib ellong ane gbale o sehng, ga fvfo á jolo nkpehrekahba nne.
Owo á kehm beke, gbo bo mbang, song wahr ekuntaake, eji á lꞌnyehn-e. Tibre Jisos jo ba elsehnge go mbang nyio.
Eji Jisos ba rehng edi jio, á kehm kpuru ero, kehm-e tongo re, “Sakeus, badde elwaare, tibre lela m bahke kange go ega etahk.”
Owo á kehm badde elwaare, ba vvr-e go eyebatahng.
Bo nyehne kan ano, bo kehm kehme elmemme ane kpee re, “Nne noa ebtahm re á song kang a nne no li na nne abiafem.”
Sakeus kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu tong Ntul a Jisos re, “Nsoo, m bahke yange nsol enyame, yehke ejang ka akpak. Nne awohng awohng no n nehm-e go ejum ajehng ajehng, m bahk-e gale nkpel eni budu.”
Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Lela eltahre ebba go etahk jia, tib eji á tob li mmon no Ebraham.
Tibre Mmon no nne ba re á ba seb, fere tahre jio ji ma tan.”
Eji ane bao wuku nsol nyio, Jisos kehm tubu bo elgan. Tibre ngare nyio yebkabbe go Jerusalem, ane bao jo fere tir re, etul bi Esowo bahke soro ba tvtv.
Owo wahng ka á kehm bungu re,
“Mmon a ntul awohng jolo go, no tahme nlaabambang ejahbe re á song li etul feere.
Re á kehm tahme, á lungu alokeltum ebe, ane awubu, ka bo mpon ewubu ewubu, kehm tongo bo re, ‘Roden akpohko nyaa, wahn jen are tete me n feere ba.’
“Ejahbe eje ko-e ekv, owo bo kehm tiingi etib tv-e re, bo nehme seb re á ba jol ntul abo.
“Eji á ma song li etul feere, á kehm ba lung alokeltum ebe, ba á ka bo akpohko re bo ba, eji á lꞌkahn ana bo ma li nsehng go are ma bo ma jen.
“Ngbokambang a nlokeltum kehm bake, ba yiimi go ege esamahr, kehm bungu re, ‘Nsoo, mpon ewubu enya nyi a ka-m no eblim mpon atahl alon.’
“Owo á kehm-e tongo re, ‘Woblim sehng, nnooba nlokeltum. Tib eji a ma bel ekakesehk go mmonsꞌsohka mmojum, a bahke jo fili ejahbe na ebwubu.’
“Etoono nlokeltum noko kehm kpe lohng ba, ba bung re, ‘Nsoo, mpon ewubu enya nyi a ka-m no eblim mpon atahl abal a mpon ewubu.’
“Owo á kehm-e tongo re, ‘A bahke jo fili ejahbe na eblon.’
“Noko kehm kpe lohng ba, ba bung re, ‘Nsoo, nyehn mpon ewubu enya ga! N kake go egame afiafong, song bum go.
N jo fahl-a fahl. Tibre a li ebibbib nne sehng. A kpo rod nsol nyi ki li wo bumu no. A kpo kpa nsol nyi a ki bahm.’
“Á kehm-e tongo re, ‘Wo ebꞌbi nlokeltum noa, m bahke koko alum nnyo enya lam-a. A kꞌkahn re, me ebibbib nne ji. N kpo rod nsol nyi n ki bum, fere kpa nsol nyi n ki bahm.
Jen ji wahnge a ki ka njenare akpohko enyame, kehn eji m ma feere ba, n jol ba ko, fere ko nsehng budu?’
“Owo á kehm bungu tong ane ba yiimi ona re, ‘Taaren ye mpon ewubu nyio, wahn faake a nyi ka nne no kpi mpon atahl alon.’
“Bo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Nsoo, á kpi mpon atahl alono!’
Á kehm faange re, ‘N kp-n tongo re, nne awohng awohng no lꞌbel, bo bahk-e kake na budu. Nne no ki kpi, jol ji á kpi no, bo bahk-e taare.
“ ‘Anebekv ebame bao ba kil sebe re me m ba jol ntul abo, song koon bo ba, wahn ba wul bo go egame esamahr.’ ”
Eji Jisos ma bung ano, á kehm soro asi asongo go Jerusalem.
Eji á ba rehng kohlo go Betfage, a Betani, ajahbe nya li go nnahb ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv, á kehm yehke abatꞌtoono ebe na abal tum.
Re á kehm tumu bo, á tongo bo re,
“Songen go ejahbe ji li go egahna mbuksong. Ń lꞌsong rehng ejahbe jio, eji ń fi no, ḿ bahke nyehne mmon a mbvankang no bo kal-e kꞌkuumu, no bo tohk-e go eti. Fanngen ye, wahn ko-e ba a ne!
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌbahb-n re, ‘Jen ji wahnge ń kp-e fannge?’ faangen ye re, ‘Ntul wo kp-e sebe.’ ”
Ane ba Jisos tumu bo kehm lohko je, lohko song nyehn ana Jisos tongo bo.
Eji bo jo fannge mmon a mbvankang noo, owo afono mbvankang nyio kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌfannge mbvankang nyio?”
Owo bo kehm faange re, “Ntul wo kp-e sebe.”
Bo kehm koko mbvankang nyio tahm a nyi goji Jisos, fere yehke nsol nyi bo kake no, yal mbvankang nyio go njahm, fere mehl Jisos jehke.
Eji mbvankang jo jen a ne asongo, bo kehme abomo ebo yal go mbang.
Eji á jo badde go ewong jio asongo, ngare nyi á ma kabbe go Jerusalem, ellong abatꞌtoono ebe gbalee kehm kehme elgeere, fere jo tehk Esowo wahre wahre tib go agburu akpokosi nya bo ma nyehn.
Bo jo bungu re, “Elfuulu li a ntul no kpꞌbake go mbing nyi Ntul Esowo. Elkoono jol go ejahbetul Esowo, ellub jol go ero!”
Egom Farisi jindiki ji woomo go ellong ane bao kehm-e tongo re, “Ntꞌtibi, nyam abatꞌtoono eba!”
Jisos kehm faange re, “N kp-n tongo re, Ane baa lꞌbelle, atal bahke kehme elrabe.”
Eji bo ba rehng kohlo go Jerusalem, eji á ma nyehn yefono ejahbe, á kehm kehme ellingi re,
“N kpꞌsebe re wahn lub kahn lela ejum ji bahke koko elkoono ba a ni,
Tibre afung nyao bahk-n kpiri, nya anebekv ebahne bahke bake, ba senng-n kak, fere kohk-n tv.
Bo bahke rannge ejahbe ejahne kpee, a ane kpee ba lene o. Jol eltal anehng anehng nehm kpe jol ni bahke sake kuumu a ntem egahne ejahbe.
Jisos kehm yange go etahk Esowo, song kehme ane bao kam, ba ji o, jo gungu nsol,
fere tong bo re, “Bo nyono go nwer Esowo re, Esowo bungu re, ‘Etahk ejame bahke jolo etahk ero akake.’ Wahn ebfere rod bum ana ebehre awajv.”
Jisos jo tibi efung abehng abehng go etahk Esowo. Atubesi abalimajom, atꞌtibi ba atahm, a atubesi ane jo sebe re bo wul-e.
Jol bo tikem kahn mbang ana nyi bo bahke limi.
Efung abehng eji Jisos jo tib ane go etahk Esowo, fere jo tiingi bo nnoobo etib, owo atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm, a anebkul nfam kehm lohngo ba,
ba bahb-e re, “Tong-r, nsahm anyi a kpi no, nyi wahnge a kpo lim nsol ana nyia?
Owo á kehm faange bo re, “Me fvfo, m bahk-n tob bahb mbahbe. Tong-m wahn,
anv, ewohngalahb ji Jon lohng go ejahbetul Esowoa, afi lohng goji ane?”
Bo kehm kehme eltoobo atemtem re, “E lꞌtong re, ‘Lohng go ejahbetul Esowo,’ á bahke bungu re, ‘Jen ji wahnge ń ki taame tv Jon?’
E lꞌfere tong re, ‘Lohng goji ane,’ ane kpee bahk-r atal tuubu.” Tibre bo jo sahb kꞌkahn re, Jon jolo nnyehnamahr Esowo.
Owo wahnge bo kehm faange re, bo nehme kahn edi ji lohng no ba.
Jisos kehm tob tong bo re, “Ano wo fvfo n lꞌki-n tob tong nsahm nyi n kpi no, nyi wahnge n kpo lim nsol nyia.”
Jisos kehm tubu elgan nia tong ane re,
“Nne awohng jolo go, no bahme avain go ege etahngga, fere rod yaame ane, kehm tahme eje song rehng go ejahbe jehko, kang go ekidi lꞌlab.
Ngare biingi kan a me, á kehm tumu nlokeltum ewe tv ane ba á yaame bo etahngga eje re bo song bong akab nti nyandiki go etahngga ba ka-e. Abayaame etahngga bao fere dv-e na, kam-e, á feere abo abo.
“Owo á kehm kpe tum nlokeltum noko. Ye fvfo, bo tob dv-e ano, fere son-e, kam-e, á feere abo abo.
Á kehm kpe bulu, kpe tum noko. Noa ana, bo bom-e elok, fere kam-e yake go.
“Owo nfono etahngga noo kehm bungu re, ‘Anv, m bahke limi renan abee? M bahke gohro tum akor-m mmon ewame. Fundiki á bahke bo lub.’
“Eji abayaame etahngga bao nyehn-e no, bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, ‘Ye wo li nlehkelkv, nong, wahr wulen ye, eji etahngga jia lꞌfere jol jꞌjahre.’
Owo bo kehm-e yehke go etahngga jio, song wul-e.
“Anv, jen ji nfono etahngga noo bahke bo lim?
Á bahke bake ba wul abayaame etahngga bao, fere faake etahngga jio ka ane bandiki.”
Eji ane bao wuku ano, bo kehm bungu re, “Esowo kꞌtaame!”
Owo Jisos kehm seenge bo too, kehm bungu re, “Anv, edi nwer Esowo jia lohngo renan, ji bungu re,
“ ‘Eltal ni asehketahk tene no,
ni ni ma fere jol nnahb ekahme?’
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌgbo go eltal nio, á bahke banne. Eltal nio lꞌfere gbo na, nyede nne, bahk-e wade na wade.”
Atꞌtibi ba atahm, a atubesi abalimajom gare re bo bob Jisos ngare nyꞌnehm ona. Tibre bo jo kahne re, á tubu elgan nio bada bo. Fvfo, bo jo fꞌfahl ane.
Owo bo kehm-e kehme elbaabe, fere tum ane ba bo ka bo ngu, bo song kehme awak lim, are bo atingitingi ane ba, eji bo lꞌbob-e go ege alum nnyo, fere yak-e kak ntubesi ejahbe go ebo, eji á lꞌlam-e.
Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntꞌtibi, e kpꞌkahne re, wo kpo bung, fere tib go nseenga nseenge. Wo kpehme rang nnene. A kpo lohko tib mbang nyi Esowo go etingitingi.
Anv, atahm enyahre tꞌtaame ka-r re wahr jo tahb etak ka ntul a Roma, afi taamem?”
Jisos kꞌkahn awak ebo. Owo á kehm tongo bo re,
bo tib-e nsiring, kehm fere bahb bo re, “Anv, esi jia ji nyehne ji? Mbing nyia nyi nyehne nyi?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Nyi ntul a Rom nyi.”
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Kaan ntul a Rom ji li ka-e, wahn ka Esowo ji li ka Esowo.”
Bo we maam tiki bob go ellum anehng anehng go esamahr ane. Owo bo kehm belle, tib eji nfaange enye jo kpo bo esi.
Egom Sadusi jindiki kehm lohngo ba goji Jisos. Bo ba li ane ba kpo bung re, “Elnyahme go elkv limm.”
Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Ntꞌtibi, Moses nyono ntahm ka-r re, ‘Nne lꞌkpo, nkal ewe sa, eji á ki jel mmon awohng awohng, mmonannyehn nkvne bahke koko nnenkal noo, jel abon ka mmonannyehn no ma kpo.’
“Jolo abonanyehn na asehma. Ngbokambang kehm koko nkal. Mmon awohng awohng á jelem, á kpo.
Etoono kehm tob ko nnenkal nonehm o, kehm kpoko.
Noko gona kehm kpe ko nnenkal nonehm o. Ano wo jolo a ane asehma bao kpee. Mmon awohng awohng bo jelem, kehm kpoko.
Esꞌkohro, nnenkal noo gohro kpo.
Go efung bi ane lꞌnyahme go elkv, á bahke jolo nkal a nyehne? Tibre bo ane asehma kpee ko-e ana nkal abo.”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ane ba li eying jia ji anv kpo ko akal, anebkal bal alum.
Ane ba fuumu re bo nyahme go elkv, fere jol go eying ji kpꞌbake nehm kpe jo ko akal, anebkal nehm kpe jo bal alum.
Bo nehm kpe jo kpo, tibre bobjol ana babenjel. Eji bo ma nyahme go elkv, bobfere jol abon ba Esowo.
Elnyahme go elkv nia. Jol Moses tib-r tib, eji á nyono bade eti jio ji jo lul. Owo á lungu Ntul Esowo re, ‘Esowo bio bi Ebraham, a bi Aisik, a bi Jekob.’
Á limm Esowo bi akvne, á li Esowo bi ane ba li go elkpin. Tibre bo kpꞌkpini ka ye.”
Atꞌtibi ba atahm bandiki kehm faange re, “Ntꞌtibi, a bungu go nseenge.”
Bo kpeem sahb bahb Jisos mbahbe anyehng anyehng.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Anv, jen ji wahnge bo kpo bung re, Mesaya mmon a Devid wo?
Tibre yefono Devid bungu go nwer a Saams re,
“ ‘Ntul Esowo tongo ntul ewame re, Ji go egame ejang eboblum,
tete me n lim anebekv eba etikunakpade eja.’
Eji Devid lung-e re, ‘Ntul ewame’, anv, á kehm jolo mmon ewe renan?”
Jisos kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe go esamahr ane kpee re,

“Jo gberen atꞌtibi ba atahm, ba kpo kor bo re bo jo kak akpawobo yannge. Kpo kor bo re, ane jo gong, kak bo nnyo go are. Go ekpꞌkpa ero, afi jolo go nkak, kpo kor bo re bo jo ji adi nji nya ajꞌjok ane kpo ji.
Bo kpo taare akalebun ntahk ebo, fere jo kak alaabe aro go nnyo a nnyo. Elam ji bo bahke gbale sehng.”
Jisos kehm tabe esamahr ebe, kehm nyehne afang ane kpꞌkake akpohko ayare ebo go elkohl akpohko ni jolo go etahk Esowo.
Á kehm tob nyehn nkpak a nkalebun kpꞌkake ederi ebbal.
Owo á kehm bungu re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nkpak a nkalebun noa wo ga ka sehnge bo ane kpee.
Egom jehko jo ka gbalee, jo sa bo gbalee go. Ye ji li nkpak ka kpee ji á bele no, ji kehn á jol ma ko, gunu nsol alehke.”
Egom ebo jindiki jo bungu bade etahk Esowo, ana bo liibi no go anoobo atal, a nsol nyi bo ko akpohko ayare gunu. Owo Jisos kehm bungu re,
“Bada nsol nyi ń kpꞌnyehne a, ngare kpꞌbake nyi eltal anehng anehng lꞌkꞌkpe sa kuumu a ntem. Bo bahke wake kpee wohng ndi.”
Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntꞌtibi, anv, jia bahke limi ngare anyi? Ellingi ani bahke tibi re, yahke ba ellimi?”
Owo Jisos kehm faange re, “Jo kunen ekpu, eji bo lꞌki-n nehm. Tibre ane gbalee bahke bake go egama mbing, fere jo bung re, ‘Me wo a!’ fere bung re, ‘Ngare ebkabbe!’ Kana jo toono bo!
Ń lꞌwuk bada nta, fere wuk bade ana ane bahke kehme asi tab, fere jo ten atubesi ebo, kana jo fahl! Nsol nyio bahke tohko gbo mbang lim. Fvfo, lohngem re, esꞌkohro ji ma kabbe o.”
Jisos kehm kpe tong bo re, “Ejahbe ajehng ajehng bahke noko a njahm ejahbe nyehko. Ajahbe bahke jo nok atemtem.
Adi nyandiki, ndi bahke jo gbehke sehng. Njal bahke jolo, a ayam nya bahke jo sehnge ane. Amenngemennge nsol, a agburu nliingi bahke jo tib go elbung.

“Re nsol nyia kpee kehm limi, bo bahke jo bob-n, fere jo nohk-n, jo ko-n tahm a nahne go ntahk ero, fere jo kak-n go ngbekobo. Bo bahk-n jo ko tahm a nahne, song yiimi go esamahr atul, a atubesi tib go egama mbing.
Jia ji bahk-n limi, eji ń lꞌyiimi ntianse ka-m.
