“Nong, ntim enyahne jo tahn-n, eji ń lꞌkꞌjo tiiri ana ḿ bahke faange, ngare kehm rehnge.
Tibre m bahk-n kake alum nya ḿ bahke bungu, fere ka-n elkahne, eji anebekv ebahne lꞌkꞌma faange, fere jo ten.
Jol babnso ejahne, a abonane ejahne, a nnahb enyahne, a ate ebahne bahk-n jabbe ka. Egom ejahne jindiki, bo bahke wulu na bo.
Ane kpee bahk-n koko ekv tib go egama mbing.
Jol ellv esi enahne anehng anehng limm, ni bahke tane.
Ń lꞌjo kpuumu, ḿ bahke tahre atohko enyahne.”
Ń lꞌnyehn nlong nsoja ma ba sennge Jerusalem kak, owo ḿ bahke kahne re, bahke gulu elrannge.
Nong, ane ba li go Judea be song go awong ngare nyio, ane ba li go Jerusalem tahm ejahbe jio song. Ane ba li go bo ebgbe, nong, bo kꞌkpe feere ba go Jerusalem.
Tibre afung nyao nya li afung elbongo, eji nsol kpee nyi bo nyono go nwer Esowo lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi.
Eyuu a anebkal ba bahke jolo ela, a ane ba bahke jo yab abon ngare nyio. Ndon bahke gbale sehng ejahbe jio. Erakatahng ji Esowo bahke gboko kuumu ane bao.

Bo bahke wulu bo go ekahngkahng. Egom jehko, bo bahke bobo bo, tahm abo, bo song jol aneb agbekobo go ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji li go njini. Ane baka baka bahke jo kadde Jerusalem go akpade akpade tete ngare abo biingi.
“Nliingi bahke jo tib go njul, fere jo tib go ebareka, a alonlo.
Ane bahke jo gbo elkv tib elfahle, eji bo kpꞌsiki nsol nyi kpꞌbake go njini kpee.
Owo bo bahke nyehne Mmon no nne kpꞌbake go ekparesemsem, a nsahm, a egburu ellub.
“Nsol nyio lꞌkehme ellimi, kpiiden asamahr enyahne go ero, wahn tab asi enyahne wahre, tibre eltahre enahne kpꞌkabbe abake.”
Jisos kehm tubu bo elgan re, “Kpuren eti ji bo kpo lung re efig,
Ń lꞌsoro nyꞌnyehn eji ma kehme elnyono, ḿ bahke kahne re, nnale yahke ba.
Mbang nyꞌnehm nyi, ń lꞌtob nyehn nsol nyio kpee kpꞌlimi, ḿ bahke kahne fvfo re, etul bi Esowo ebkabbe.
Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Ane ba bahke jolo go elkpin ngare nyio nehm kpo tete nsol nyio kpee lim.
Elbung abola ndi bahke tane, alum enyame nehm tiki tan.
“Jo baaben elnahne, goji nkak alimi, a amahm awoko a atꞌtiiri nya elkpin nia lꞌki-n gbal go egahna ntim, eji efung bio lꞌki-n gbede na.
Tibre efung bio bahke gbede ane kpee ba li go njini, ana ntahmfuk nyi bo kpo saade konngo nsahre.
Jo baaben ngare kpe kpe, wahn jo kak ero, eji ń lꞌbel eko ji ḿ bahke foro go nsol nyio kpee nyi bahke limi, wahn fere yiimi go esamahr bi Mmon no nne.”
Efung abehng abehng Jisos jo tibi go etahk Esowo. Atv lꞌbehde, á jo kono eljeke song kang go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv.
Efungfu atv atv ane kpee jo lohngo ba go etahk Esowo re bo ba wuk-e.
Eji elkak ni bo jo li abred nya bo kil jo kak ayist ma kabbe, ni bo kpo lung re Pasova,
owo atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm jo seb mbang ana nyi bo bahke wulu Jisos. Fvfo, bo jo fꞌfahl ane.
Ngare nyio nnehm kehm yele Judas ji bo jo lung-e re Iskariot, ji woomo go ellong abatꞌtoono Jisos, ewubu ane abal.
Owo Judas kehm tahme song kpiri atubesi abalimajom, a atubesi ane ba jo baabe etahk Esowo, fere toobo a bo ana á bahke jabbe Jisos ka bo.
Atahng yebe bo sehng, owo bo kehm taame re, bo bahk-e kake akpohko.
Judas kehm taame, kehm kehme mbang seb nyi á bahke jabbe Jisos ka bo, eji ane bako ki li.
Owo efung kehm ba rehng bi elkak ni abred nya ki kpi ayist, bi bo jo wul abon ejoro ba Pasova.
Jisos kehm tongo Pita abola Jon re bo song toobo edi bum bo, ji bo bahke lehke elkak Pasova. Owo á kehm tumu bo tv.
Re bo kehm tahme, bo tohk-e bahb re, “Gan wo a kpꞌsebe re wahr song toobo bum?”
Owo á kehm faange bo re, “Wuungen atung! Ń lꞌyel go nla ejahbe, ḿ bahke wane nne no solo etulahb.
wahn tong nfontahk re, ‘Ntꞌtibi kp-a bahbe re, Gan wo ekpꞌkpa li no, ji m bahke jehke, li elkak Pasova, a abatꞌtoono ebame?’
Á bahk-n tibi egburu ekpꞌkpa ajehng ji li go ero enyong ji bo ma jehke nti. Owo ḿ bahke toobo nsol kpee bum.”
Bo kehm lohko tahm, lohko song nyehn ejum ajehng ajehng ana Jisos tongo bo, kehm toobo nsol elkak Pasova bum.
Eji ngare biingi no, á kehm song ji go ekpꞌkuru, a abatiingetib ebe.
Owo á kehm tongo bo re, “Jo kor-m sehng re me n li elkak Pasova nia a nahne, kehm nyehne erem.
Tibre n kp-n tongo re, N nehm kpe tiki li elkak nia, tete n li etingitingi elkak a nahne go ejahbetul Esowo.”
Owo á kehm rodo nkob, kak Esowo saam, kehm bungu re, “Koon, wahn wo, wahn ane kpee.
Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Bomo anv asongo n nehm kpe tiki wo alahb avain tete etul bi Esowo ba.”
Owo á kehm rodo ebred, kak Esowo saam, fere bakke, ka bo, kehm bungu re, “A wo li ngubjing enyame, nyi bo kp-n kake. Jo limen ana, eji ń lꞌjo buum-m.”
Eji bo ma li nsol mal, go mbang nyꞌnehm nyi á tob ka bo nkob, fere bung re, “Nkob nyia nyi li egbanngalung ji nfenfe tib go alung emame ma kpꞌfabe ka-n.
“Nyehnen, nne no kp-m gungu, á jehk a name ana go ekpꞌkuru.
Tibre Mmon no nne bahke kpoko ana Esowo toobo no. Eyuu a nne no kp-e gungu.”
Owo bo kehm kehme elbahbe atemtem re, “Nne awo go egahre ellong no bahke limi elkohn ejum ana jia?”
Owo nfaabe kehm gboko abatꞌtoono Jisos bada nne no bo bahk-e bumu ana nne no ga gbal go bo ellong.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Atul ba njini nyia kpꞌkpi nsahm nyi bo kpo fili ane ebo. Atubesi ane, bo kpo lung bo re, ‘Akubi!’
Ano sang bahke jolo go egahne. Ga nob re nne no ga gbal go egahne ellong jol ana mmonse. Ntubesi bahke jolo ana nlokeltum.
Anv, nne awo ga gbal, nne no jehk go ekpꞌkuru, afi nne no kp-e loko wo? No jehk go ekpꞌkuru sang ga gbal? Eji n li a nahne, n li ana nlꞌloko.
“Wahn ba li ane ba ma jol a name kpee go egame elgaare.
Ana nsoo ma-m ka ejahbe re me n fili, ano wo fvfo m ma-n tob ka,
eji ń lꞌjo li nsol ekpꞌkuru ajehng a name go egame ejahbetul, fere ji go nti etul, jo lam ewubu etꞌtohngo ebbal bi Israel.”
Ntul a Jisos kehm bungu re, “Saimon, nnehm sebe re á ko nsahm nyi á bahk-n febe ana bo kpo febe arasi.
Me n kak ero ka-a, eji a lꞌkꞌgbo go egama mbang.
Owo Pita kehm-e faange re, “Ntul, me n toobo ebjing re me n je ngbekobo a na, jol afi elkv ni, m bahke kpoko a na.”
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Pita, n kp-a tongo re, Lela a bahke gbaame nkpel era re, me a nehme kahn, nkok kehm kuku.”
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Ngare nyi n tum-n no, eji ń ki fili abon abam akpohko, fere fili abam efilibo, a akpaketa, ejum jia ji rin-n noa?”
Bo kehm faange re, “Ejumjum wahr rinem.”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Anv, nne no lꞌbel mmombam akpohko, afi á bele ebam efilibo, nong, á fili. Nong, nne no ki kpi ekahngkahng gungu mbomo eme, song gunu.
Tibre n kp-n tongo re, Edi nwer Esowo ji bungu re, ‘Bo m-e fange kak go ellong abi ane’, bahke lohko jol go etingitingi. Tibre ji bo nyono bada name bahke lohko jol go etingitingi.”
Owo abatꞌtoono ebe kehm bungu re, “Ntul, nyehn akahngkahng na abal a!”
Á kehm faange bo re, “Ebgbal.”
Jisos kehm lohngo tahm go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv, ana á jo kono ellimi.
Eji á song rehng edi jio, á kehm tongo bo re, “Jo kaken ero, eji ń lꞌkꞌyel go elgaare.”
Á kehm jeere song rehng go esꞌsong ekidi labe ana nne bahke roko eltal song rehng. Owo á kehm jamme alahng, kehm kehme ero kak re,
“Nsoo, lꞌkor-a, fak-m nkob erem nyia! Ana koro me sang, ana koro wo wo.”
Owo enjel kehm soro lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba kak-e eko.
Eji ala jo sahb teel-e teele, á kehm nyennge, jo kak ero. Nwuuru nyi á wuuru no, nyi jo toongo wohngo ndi jolo ana agburu atoongo alung.
Eji á mehle go edi ji á jo kak ero, á kehm feere goji abatꞌtoono ebe, song kpiri bo, bo kpꞌlale, tib ndon nyi jo fili bo.
Owo á kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌlale? Tahmen, wahn kak ero, eji ń lꞌkꞌyel go elgaare.”

Eji á kpi mbungu mbungu, ellong ane kehm soro lohng abake. Nne no bo jo lung-e re Judas ji woomo go ellong abatꞌtoono Jisos, ewubu ane abal, ye wo jo tib bo mbang. Eji bo ma rehng goji Jisos, Judas kehm jeere kohlo Jisos re á sod-e nnyo.
Owo Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Judas, anv, a bahke jabbe Mmon no nne ka go nnyo asoda?”
Eji abatꞌtoono Jisos nyehne ji yahke lim, owo bo kehm bahbe re, “Ntul, wahr ko akahngkahng enyahre, song nok a boa?”
Nne awohng go bo ellong kehm fohko ekahngkahng ebe, kpale nju nyi ntubesi abalimajom etung eboblum.
Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ka kpe lim ano!” Á kehm rodo etung nne noo, feere a bi lak-e, á nob.
Jisos kehm bahbe atubesi abalimajom, a atubesi ane ba jo baabe etahk Esowo, a anebkul nfam ba ba re bo ba bob-e re, “Ń lohngo a akahngkahng, a atahmtahm atahmtahm ana ń kpꞌbake a nwajv boba?
N jo jolo a nahne go etahk Esowo efung abehng abehng, me ń lakem abo.
Owo bo kehm bobo Jisos tahm a ne go etahk ntubesi abalimajom. Jisos jo jene ekv, Pita jen ekv.
Bo kono agun go nlaaga nyio, ji sennge kak. Pita kehm tob song ji o a bo.
Eji nlokeltum no jolo nnenkal nyehne Pita jehk go agun, owo á kehm-e seenge too, kehm bungu re, “Nne noa fvfo tob jolo a ne!”
Owo Pita kehm gbaame re, “Nnenkal, me we n nehme kahn.”
Eji ma kpe ji mmongare ntiil, nne noko kehm-e tob nyehn, kehm bungu re, “A tob wob go bo ellong.”
Owo Pita kehm tene re, “Eꞌee mbi, me sang.”
Eji ma kpe ji ejum awa anyehng, nne noko kehm kpe bung tꞌtahne re, “Etingitingi, nne noa tob jolo a ne fvfo, tibre ye nne a Galili wo.”
Owo Pita kehm faange re, “Mbi, n nehme kahn ji a kpꞌbꞌbung.”
Tvtv ona eji á kpi mbungu mbungu, nkok kehm soro kuk.
Ntul a Jisos kehm soro keebe, seenge Pita.
Pita kehm soro lohng ona, song kehme ellingi ndon ndon.
Ane ba jabbe Jisos kehm-e kehme elnyoko, fere jo dv-e.
Bo tob gba-e mbomo go esamahr, kehm-e bahbe re, “Nyehn amahr me! Anv, nne awo ma-a rum?”
Bo kpe bung alum nyako gbalee, nya bo jo su-e.
Eji efungfu ma se, anebkul Jus, atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm kehm ba kono edi ajehng, kehm koko Jisos ba a ne go bo elam, kehm-e tongo re,
“Tong-r, joare wo wo li Mesaya!”
Owo Jisos kehm faange bo re, “N lꞌtong-n anv, ń nehm taame.
N lꞌfere bahb-n na, ń nehm faange.
Bomo anv asongo, Mmon no nne bahke jehke go eboblum Esowo bi gbale sehng.”
Bo ane kpee kehm bahbe re, “Anv, wo wo li Mmon no Esowoa?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Me wo, ḿ bungu nseenge.”
Owo bo kehm bungu re, “Anv, e bahke kpe seb ntiansea? Wahrfono antahng ebwuk go ege a nnyo.”
Ellong ane bao kpee kehm tahme, ko Jisos song rehng a ne goji Pailet.
Owo bo kehm-e kehme ebi ka re, “E sebe kahn re, nne noa kpi ane ebahre rannge, fere jo sahd-r re wahr kꞌkpe tahb etak ka Ntul a Rom,
Owo Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, wo wo li ntul no Jusa?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Me wo, a bungu nseenge.”
Pailet kehm tongo atubesi abalimajom, a ellong ane bao re, “Ebi ajehng ajehng n nyehnem ji nne noa ma lim.”
Bo kehm kpe nyennge na, jo bung re, “Á kpo lim ntim ane jo jokko go ege eltibi.
Eji Pailet wuku ano, á kehm bahbe, joare Jisos nne a Galili wo.
Á kahne kan a re á lohng go ejahbe ji ntul a Herod kpꞌfili,
Eji Herod nyehne Jisos, atahng yeb-e sehng. Tibre á bomo elsebe wuku wuku re á nyehn-e, tib eji á wuku bada ne.
Owo Herod kehm bahbe Jisos abahbe tvv, jol Jisos we tikem faange.
Atubesi abalimajom, a atꞌtibi ba atahm tob jolo ona fvfo. Owo bo jo ka-e ebi gbalee.
Herod, a nsoja enye bum Jisos daange daange daange, fere jo nyok-e, kehm-e kake ekpawobo ji nno a nno, ji jo nyane go amahr, kehm-e tumu tv Pailet.
Efung bio bi, Herod abola Pailet, bo fere jol go etem, tibre wuku wuku bo jolo go ekv.
Pailet kehm lungu atubesi abalimajom, a atubesi ane, a ane bako,
kehm tongo bo re, “Ń ko nne noa ba kak-m go ebo, no ḿ bungu re á kpi ane rannge. Eji m bahb-e abahbe go egahne esamahr, n nyehnem ebi ajehng ajehng ji á limi no, ji wahnge ń kp-e kake ebi.
Ano wo fvfo tob jol goji Herod, tib eji á feere a ne ba ka-m. Nne noa limem ejumjum ji fuumu re bo wul-e.
Owo wahnge m bahke tongo, bo dv-e, n fere yak-e, á song.”
Elkak Pasova anehng anehng Pailet jo yehke nne a ngbekobo awohng ka bo.
Ellong ane bao kpee kehm rabe nnyo nnyo amehng re, “Song a nne noo, wo song wul-e, wo yake Barabas ka-r.”
Barabas, bo kak-e ngbekobo tib eji á jo jokko ejahbe, fere wul nne.
Pailet jo sebe re á yehke Jisos yake, owo á kehm kpe bung a bo.
Bo kpe rabe na re, “Kum-e go ekros! Kum-e go ekros!”
Owo Pailet kehm kpe bahb bo go nkpel era re, “Anv, jen ji wahnge? Ebi aji á limi no? N nyehnem ebi ajehng ajehng ji á limi no, ji fuumu re bo wul-e. M bahke tongo bo dv-e, n fere yehk-e yake.”
Bo kehm kpe nyꞌnyennge na, jo rabe wahre wahre wahre re bo kum-e go ekros.
Owo á kehm kimi elam ana bo jo seb,
fere yehke nne no bo sebe no yake, no bo kak-e ngbekobo tib eji á jo jokko ejahbe, fere wul nne, kehm fere yehke Jisos ka, bo lim-e ana koro bo.

Eji bo ko Jisos, jo tahm a ne, bo kehm song wane nne awohng no bo jo lung-e re Saimon, ji jolo nne a Sirin. Á lohngo go mmojahbe noko kpꞌtahme go Jerusalem. Bo kehm-e bobo, kun-e ekros re á sol, jo toono Jisos go njahm.
Ellong ane gbalee ba jo toono Jisos, a anebkal ba jo ling-e ndon ndon.
Owo Jisos kehm keebe, kehm tongo bo re, “Anebkal ba Jerusalem, ka ma wahn kpe ling! Lingen elnahne, wahn ling abon ebahne!
Tibre ngare kpꞌbake nyi bo bahke bungu re, ‘Elfuulu li ka agum anebkal, ba kala jꞌjel, bo ji kala yꞌyabe abon.’
Owo bo bahke kehme elbungu tong awong re, ‘Gboon bul-r!’
Esowo lꞌlim eti mbir mbir ano, lꞌlim renan, á lꞌkꞌtob lim ekpakv eti ano?”
Ane abal bako ba jolo abi ane, bo tob ko bo tahm a bo re bo tob song wul bo a Jisos.
Eji bo song rehng go edi ji bo jo lung re edi nkpakesi, owo bo kehm kumu Jisos go ekros, a abi ane bao fvfo, noko go ege ejang eboblum, noko go ege ejang ebobkal.
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, tahm ka bo, tibre bo nehme kahn ji bo kpꞌlimi.”
Bo kehm tubu elfaange, eji bo lꞌkahn ana bo bahke baange nsol ebjing enye.
Ane yiimi ona, jo nyehn, eji atubesi Jus jo nyok-e re, “Á kpo tahre ane bako, nong, á tob tahre elne, joare ye wo li Kraist ji Esowo ma yehke.”
Nsoja tꞌtob nyok-e fvfo, owo bo kehm bake re bo ba ka-e amahm,
fere bung re, “Lꞌjol re wo wo li ntul no Jus, tahre elna!”
Bo tob nyono nwer lake kohlo go ege esi. Nwer nyio bo nyono go Grik, Latin, a Hibru re,
Ebi nne ajehng ji tob kpaake go ekros kohlo Jisos, kehm-e suku re, “Wo sang li Mesayaa? Tahre elna, wo tob tahr-r me!”
Noko kehm-e nyame re, “Anv, a nehme fahl Esowoa, eji bo ma tob kimi elam re bo wul-aa?
Wahr kpꞌnyehne erem bia go nseenge. Tibre e kpꞌbele eltuuru enahre ni fuumu re wahr bel go nsol nyi e limi no. Wo, nne noa, jol ebi ajehng ajehng á limem.”
Owo á kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Buum-m, a lꞌba ji go ega eti etul.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Etingitingi, n kp-a tongo re, Lela a bahke jolo a name go ejahbetul Esowo.”
Jolo ejum nkaranka ewubbal nyi efin, nyi ejannge gbo no ejahbe jio kpee, ji tete rehng nkaranka era nyi elgung.
Njul kpeem ya. Ekpiki ji tokko go etahk Esowo kehm yange ejang ebbal.
Owo Jisos kehm rabe wahre wahre wahre re, “Nsoo, me n yake etohko ejame kak go ega ebo.
Ntubesi a nsoja nyehne kan ji ma lim, á kehm kehme Esowo tehk, fere bung re, “Etingitingi, nne noa lohko jol etingi nne.”
Ellong ane ba kame ba rur re bo ba nyehn ana bo bahke wulu Jisos, eji bo nyehne ji ma lim, bo kehm feere ebo kehnge ndon ndon.
Ane kpee ba kahne Jisos, a anebkal ba lohngo go Galili toon-e ba rehng o, bo yiimi ebo fee, jo nyehn nsol nyia.
Nne awohng jolo go, no bo jo lung-e re Josef ji lohng go ejahbe Jus ji bo jo lung re Arimatia. Á jolo nnooba nne, no jolo go etingitingi, fere jol ntul esub.
Á jo siki etul bi Esowo bi kpꞌbake.
Á kehm tahme song bahb Pailet, joare á bahke taame, á song fono ekv ji Jisos tahm a ji.
Owo á kehm song fono ekv ji Jisos, fere kpennge ekpowo, rod song kak go elahm bi á rahme go ekpartal, bi bo kala kꞌkak nne awohng awohng.
Jolo efung bi bo jo toobo ebjing bi Esabat yahke rehng.
Anebkal ba lohngo go Galili jo toono Jisos kehm tob ba nyehn elahm, fere nyehn ana bo kak-e no.
Owo bo kehm feere, ba toobo anyane, fere toobo akehng bum. Efung Esabat bo kehm jehke, re ekv, ana ntahm bungu no.
Ngbokambang efung go erahde, efungfu atv atv, bo kehm rodo anyane nya bo toobo no, tahm a nya go elahm.
Eji bo rehnge go, bo kehm song nyehn eltal nio ma bannge go nnyo elahm, noongo go nkpe.
Owo bo kehm maade yel, jol ekv ji Ntul a Jisos bo nyehnem.
Eji bo yim o, ma bil bo amahr, bo kehm soro nyehn ane abal yim kohlo bo, ba kake nsol nyi jo nyane.
Eji anebkal bao jo fahl, fere kohk asamahr go ndi, ane bao na abal kehm soro kehme elbungu a bo re, “Jen ji wahng ń kpꞌsebe nne a mbir mbir go ellong akvne?
Ana á limm. Yebnyahme. Buumen ana á tong-n no ngare nyi á kpeke li go Galili re,
‘Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e yake, kak abi ane go ebo, bo kum-e go ekros, lꞌkang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv.’ ”
Owo anebkal bao kehm soro buumu alum enye,
kehm lohngo go elahm feere, song tooro nsol nyio tong abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu a nne awohng, fere tob tong erik ane bako fvfo.
Anebkal ba tongo abatiingetib nsol nyia jolo Meri ji lohng go Magdala, Joanna, Meri nnyehn Jems, a anebkal bako ba tob jol a bo fvfo.
Abatiingetib, alum nya anebkal bao tongo bo jolo bo ana emongo. Bo taamem tv bo.
Pita kehm tahme, be song rehng go elahm, kehm song reme fahng, nyehn akpowo nya nya nong no. Owo á kehm feere kehnge, fere jo tir bade ji ma lim.
Efung bꞌnehm ona ane abal ba woomo go bo ellong lohngo jo tahm go ejahbe ji bo kpo lung re Emmaus ji jolo ejum mmal esehma, a lꞌtahm go Jerusalem.
Bo jo tubu eka atemtem bada nsol nyia kpee nyi ma lim.
Eji bo kpi mbungu mbungu atemtem, fere jo tiiri, yefono Jisos kehm lohngo ba kpiri bo, jo jen a bo.
Ngare nyio amahr ebo ka lennge, owo bo ki-e liingi.
Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji ń kpꞌbungu tong atemtem, eji ń kpꞌjene asongo ndon ndon?”
Owo nne awohng no bo jo lung-e re Kleopas kehm-e faange re, “Anv, wo ntahngtahng wo ga li njenne nyi li go Jerusalema, nyi kil kahne nsol nyi ma lim a afung nyaa?”
Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Nsol anyi?”
Owo bo kehm-e faange re, “Nsol nyi ma lim Jisos ji Nasaret, ji jolo nnyehnamahr no jo bung alum nya kpi nsahm, fere jo lim agburu akpokosi go esamahr Esowo, a esamahr bi ane kpee.
Atubesi abalimajom ebahre, a atubesi ebahre ba yak-e no ka re bo kimi elam ji bo bahk-e wulu. Owo bo kehm-e kumu go ekros.
Wahr jo kunu ekpu re, ye wo bahke fake Israel yake.
“Fvfo, ji ma-r kpe kpꞌkpo esi, anebkal bandiki ba wob go egahre ellong fungu efungfu atv atv, je go elahm,
ekv eje bo nyehnem. Bo kehm feere ba, ba bung re, bobnyehn nkpokosi ejum, eji bo nyehne enjel nyi tongo bo re, á noa go elkpin.
Egom jindiki ji woomo go egahre ellong kehm jeke go elahm, lohko song nyehn jang jang ana anebkal bao bungu no, sehngem yefono wo bo ki-e nyehn.”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Wahn agboolo ane baa, jen ji wahnge kpo riid-n go eltaame ejum ajehng ajehng ji anyehnamahr nyono no?
Tiki li re, Mesaya gbo mbang nyehn erem bia kpee, kehm yele go ege ellub.”
Owo Jisos kehm lennge adi nwer Esowo kpee nya bungu bada ne tong bo, bomo go awer nya Moses, a awer nya anyehnamahr kpee.
Bo kehm kabbe ejahbe ji bo fi no. Jo jolo are Jisos yahke sehng asongo.
Bo kehm-e gboongo re, “Ba kang a nahre, tibre elgung ebba, gana ejannge ebkehme elgboko.”
Owo á kehm song yel ekpꞌkpa re á song kang goji bo.
Eji á ji ekpꞌkuru, jo li nsol a bo, owo á kehm rodo ebred, kak Esowo saam, bakke, ka bo.
Owo amahr ebo kehm soro lennge, bo kehm-e soro liingi. Á kehm soro lamme.
Owo bo kehm kehme elbungu, jo tong atemtem re, “Ano wo wahnge alum enye jo yall-r, eji á jo bung a nahre go mbang, fere jo lennge nwer Esowo tong-r.”
Owo bo kehm soro mehl tvtv, feere go Jerusalem, ba nyehn abatꞌtoono Jisos, ewubu a nne awohng ma ba kono edi ajehng, a ane ba tob jol a bo o fvfo,
ba jo bung re, “Ntul a Jisos eblohko nyahme go etingitingi. Saimon m-e nyehn.”
Owo ane abal bao kehm tob tooro ana ji limi go mbang tong bo, ana bo liing-e no ngare nyi á bakke ebred.
Eji bo kpi mbungu mbungu, yefono Jisos kehm soro ba lohng go bo elka, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Elkoono jol a nahne!”
Kehm mennge bo, bo kehm kehme elfahle, fere jo tir re, etohko ji bo kpꞌnyehne a.
Owo á kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge eko ma-n tan ana? Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌfaabe go egahna ntim?
Nyehnen abo enyame, wahn nyehn akpade enyame fvfo, eji ń lꞌkahn re mefono antahng wo. Dam-m wahn, wahn nyehn. Tibre etohko, ngubjing kpimm, ana ḿ ma-m nyehn, n kpi no.”
Á bungu kan ano mal, á kehm tibi bo abo enye, a akpade akpade.
Eji bo kala tiki taame tib go eyebatahng ji bo bele no, a esi ji jo kpo bo, owo Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, ń kpꞌkpi ejum ajehng ajehng a, ji ellehka?”
Bo kehm-e kake ekv nsahre ji bo ma lam.
Owo á kehm taare li go bo esamahr.

Á kehm tongo bo re, “Alum enyame nya ana, nya n jo bung a nahne ngare nyi n kpeke li a nahne re, Ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo nyono bada name go atahm nya Moses, fere nyon go awer nya abanyehnamahr, a nwer a Saams bahke lohko jol go etingitingi.”
Owo á kehm lennge ntim ebo, eji bo lꞌkahn nwer Esowo,
fere tong bo re, “Ana wo bo nyono re, Mesaya bahke nyehne erem, lꞌkang nfung era, á nyahme go elkv,
bo fere tiingi ane kpee ba li go njini etib bi egbokondon, a bi eltahmeka go abiafem. Go Jerusalem wo, bo bahke bomo etib bio go eltiingi go ege a mbing.
Wahn ba li atianse go nsol nyia.
M bahke tumu ji nsoo nyame no tv-n.
Owo á kehm rodo bo, tahm abo song rehng go Betani. Owo á kehm tabe abo enye wahre, fuulu bo.
Eji á jo fuulu bo, á kehm soro tahm bo sa. Nsahm nyi Esowo rod-e tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo.
Bo kehm feere go Jerusalem, a egburu eyebatahng.
Bo jo jolo go etahk Esowo ngare anyehng anyehng, jo tehk Esowo, fere jo kak-e saam.
Go mbomannahb Ellum ni jolo. Ellum nio ni jolo a Esowo. Ellum nio ni jolo Esowo.
Ellum nio ni jolo a Esowo go mbomannahb.
Ni ni Esowo ko, lim nsol kpee. Ki li ye, kehn ejumjum jolem jolo ji ma jol.
Ege wo elkpin jolo no. Elkpin nia ni jolo ellennge ka ane.
Ellennge nio li ana agun nya kpꞌyake go ejannge. Ejannge jio ka tiki lahme agun nyao.
Nne awohng jolo go, no Esowo tum-e no, no bo jo lung-e re Jon.
Á ba re á ba yiimi ntianse bade ellennge nio, eji ane kpee lꞌtaame tib go alum nya á bungu no.
Ye sang jolo ellennge nio. Á ba re á ba yiimi ntianse ka ellennge nio.
Etingitingi ellennge ni kpo ka nne awohng awohng ellennge, ni ni ma ba go njini.
Á jolo go njini. Ye wo Esowo ko-e, lim njini nyia. Jol njini nyia, we tikem liingi.
Á ba go ege ejahbe, ane ebe we koom.
Ane bao ba ko-e no, fere taame tv mbing enye, bo ba li ane ba á ka bo nsahm re bo jol abon Esowo.
Bo jelem bo ana ane baka baka, jol go elkoro ni anebkal sang, jol bo jelem bo tib ana nne tiri no. Esowo bi jele bo.
Ellum nio ni ba siingi nne, fere lene tob-r. Wahr ebnyehn ellub ene, ellub nio ni Nde ka Mmon mmon awohng ewe, no ma gbal go nnoobo, a etingitingi.
Jon ji nwohngalahb jo yiimi ntianse ka-e, fere jo rabe re, “Ye wo a, ji n jo bung bada ne re, ‘Nne no kpꞌbake toon-m go njahm gbale sehnge me. Tibre á tohko jol, me n kehm jini.’ ”
Go ege agbal wo, á jo yehke nnoobo, jo ka wahr ane kpee.
Moses wo ka atahm. Nnoobo, a etingitingi, Jisos Kraist wo ko ba ka.
Nnene limm, no ma nyꞌnyehn Esowo, sehngem Mmon mmon awohng no li a Esowo bad bad, ye wo ma lim re wahr kahn Esowo.
Alum nya ana, nya Jon bungu no. Eji Jus ji jolo go Jerusalem tumu abalimajom, a abon Livai tv-e, bo song bahb-e re, “Ekahmekahme kpee, wo nne awo?”
Á kehm lennge ka bo, á gbaamem. Á lennge ka bo re, “Me Kraist sang.”
Bo kehm-e kpe bahb re, “Ekahmekahme kpee, wo nne awo fono? Anv, wo Elaija woa?”
Á kehm faange re, “Eꞌee, me Elaija sang.”
Bo kpe-e bahb re, “Anv, wo nnyehnamahr no e kp-e siki woa?”
Á kpe faange re, “Eꞌee, me nnyehnamahr noo sang.”
Bo kehm-e kpe bahb re, “Anv, wo nne awo? Tong-r, eji e lꞌsong tong ane ba tum-r no. Anv, a kpo bung renan bade elna?”
Jon kehm faange re, “Me wo li ‘nne no kpꞌrabe go elka emahng re, Tuungen mbang nyi Ntul bahke sehnge, wahn lim tꞌtor’ ana nnyehnamahr Aisaya bungu no.”
Ane ba tumu bo, Bab Farisi ba.
Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Eji a tong-r re, wo Kraist sang, wo Elaija sang, wo nnyehnamahr noo sang, anv, jen ji wahnge a kpꞌwohngo ane alahb?”
Jon kehm faange bo re, “N kpo wohngo ane alahb maka maka. Go egahne ellong nne awohng noa yim, no ń kil-e elkahne.
Jol eji á kpꞌbꞌba toon-m go njahm, me n fuumem re me n kehme, fannge alehke akpaketa enye.”
Nsol nyia kpee limi go Betani, go egbuk Jodan jehko, edi jio ji Jon jo wohngo ane alahb.
Etoono efung behko Jon kehm nyehne Jisos kpꞌbake go ege. Á kehm bungu re, “Nyehnen, Mmon a Njoro no Esowo, no bahke ba rod abiafem nya njini.
Nne noa wo, n jo bung bada ne re, Nne no kpꞌbake toon-m go njahm gbale sehnge me, tibre á tohko jol, me n kehm jini.
Mefono antahng, we n tohkem kahn wuku wuku. Ji wahnge m ba no, fere kpi ane alahb wohngo, li, eji abon Israel lꞌkahn-e.”
Jon jo yiimi ntianse re, “N nyehne Etingi Etohko go elfoongo ebbehl ma lohng go ejahbetul Esowo badde ba kuum-e.

Mefono antahng, we n tohkem kahn wuku wuku. Esowo bio bi tum-m no re me m ba wohngo ane alahb, ye wo tong-m re, ‘Nne no, a lꞌnyehn Etingi Etohko ma badde ba kuum-e, ye wo li nne no kpo wohngo ane alahb go Etingi Etohko.’
Me n lohko nyehn, fere yiimi ntianse re, ye wo lohko li Mmon no Esowo.”
Etoono efung behko Jon kpe jol ona, a abatꞌtoono ebe, ane abal.
Á kehm nyehne Jisos, eji á jo jen abake, kehm bungu re, “Nyehnen, Mmon a Njoro no Esowo!”
Eji abatꞌtoono bao na abal wuku ano, bo kehm tahme toono Jisos.
Jisos kehm keebe, nyehn bo, eji bo kp-e toono, á kehm bahbe bo re, “Ń kpi jen seb?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Rabbi (ji lohngo re ntꞌtibi), gan wo a kpo kang?”
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Baan, wahn ba nyehn!”
Bo kehm jeke, song nyehn edi ji á jo kang, kehm tob kang o efung bio. Tibre ngare nyio jolo ejum nkaranka eni nyi elgung.
Nne awohng go ellong ane abal bao, no tob wuk ana Jon jo bung, kehm tahme toono Jisos. Bo jo lung-e re Andru ji jolo mmonannyehn a Saimon Pita.
Á gbo mbang song nyehn Saimon mmonannyehn, kehm-e tongo re, “Wahr ebnyehn Mesaya,” (ji lohngo re Kraist).
Á kehm koko Saimon ba a ne goji Jisos.
Jisos kehm-e seenge too, kehm bungu re, “Wo Saimon wo, ji mmon a Jon. Bo bahke fere jo lung-a re Kefas ji lohngo re Pita.”
Etoono efung behko Jisos kehm toobo re á bahke tahme go Galili. Owo á nyehne Filip, kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm toon-m!”
Filip lohng go Betsaida, ejahbe ji Andru abola Pita lene no.
Filip kehm song nyehn Natanael, kehme tongo re, “Wahr ebnyehn nne no Moses nyono bada ne go nwer atahm, no abanyehnamahr Esowo tob nyon fvfo bada ne, Jisos ji Nasaret, ji mmon a Josef.”
Natanael kehm faange re, “Anv, ejum ajehng ajehng ji nno jia, ji bahke tiki lohng go Nasareta?”
Filip kehm-e faange re, “Ba wahr tahm, wo ba nyehn!”
Eji Jisos nyehne Natanael kpꞌbake go ege, á kehm bungu bada ne re, “Nyehnen, a wo li etingitingi nne Israel, no enehm abehng abehng ki-e wob go atahng.”
Natanael kehm bahbe Jisos re, “A limi renan, kehm-m kahne?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Re Filip kehm-a lungu, n nyehn-a, a jehk no go nnahb eti ji bo kpo lung re efig.”
Natanael kehm bungu re, “Rabbi, a lohko li Mmon no Esowo.
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Anv, wobtaama, tib eji m ma-a tong re, N nyehn-a go nnahb efiga? A bahke nyehne akpokosi sehnge ana nyi a ma nyehn a.”
Jisos kehm kpe bung tong bo re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, ḿ bahke nyehne ejahbetul Esowo ma lennge, fere nyehn babenjel kpꞌtahme go ero, fere jo badde ba goji Mmon no nne.”
Eji ma kang nfung ebal, elkak elbal jolo go Kena ji Galili. Nnyehn Jisos jolo ona.
Jisos, bo tꞌtob tiing-e elkak elbal nio, a abatꞌtoono ebe.
Eji amahm male no, owo nnyehn Jisos kehm bake ba tong-e re, “Amahm ebmal.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nnenkal, nꞌnan a kp-m tohngo anv kak go ntong nyia?
Owo nnyehn Jisos kehm tongo alokeltum ba jolo o re, “Limen ajehng ajehng ji á bahk-n tongo!”
Etu ebrakebra jolo ona, nya bo bumu re bo jo ba ru elbo ana atahm ebo bungu no.
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Song tuken alahb, wahn ba ruru go atulahb nyao!”
Bo kehm tuku alahb, ba ruru atulahb nyao kpee.
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Limen alahb maa, wahn song ka nfakamahm!” Bo kehm limi, tahm a ma.
Nfakamahm no elkak nio kehm wuungu alahb mao ma ma siingi amahm.
kehm-e tongo re, “Nne awohng awohng kpo tohko ka amahm ma nno. Eji bo ma wo kpꞌbuumu, á kehm gohro ka bo ma ki ga nob. Wobrod amahm ma nno bum gona tete sik anv!”
Ngbokambang a nkpokosi nyi Jisos limi no nyi a, á limi go Kana ji Galili. Owo á tibi ellub ene. Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm taame tv-e.
Owo Jisos kehm tahme go Kapenium, a nnyehn, a abonanyehn, a abatꞌtoono ebe. Owo bo kange abon afung ntiil.
Ngare nyio elkak ni aneb Jus ni bo kpo lung re Pasova ebkabbe. Owo Jisos kehm tahme go Jerusalem.
Etahk Esowo ona wo, á nyehne ane ba jo gungu efong, a ejoro, go mbehl, fere nyehn ane ba jo yaange akpohko jehk no, kpꞌyaange akpohko go akpꞌkuru ebo.
Jisos kehm soro ko ebrꞌrare, kam ane kpee yehke go etahk Esowo jio, a efong efong fvfo. Á sale akpohko nya abayaangakpohko, fere gbul akpꞌkuru ebo tuubu go.
Á kehm tongo ane bao ba jo gungu mbehl re, “Roden nsol nyia, wahn song a nyi! Kana rod etahk Nsoo, bum ana edi are!”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm soro buumu ana nwer Esowo bungu no re, “Ntir nyi n yehke kak, eji n tuungu etahk Esowo, nyi nyi bahke fere wul-m.”
Jus kehm-e bahbe re, “Elliingi ani a bahk-r tibi, eji e lꞌkahn re, a kpi nsahm nyi a kpo lim nsol nyia?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Waan etahk Esowo jia, m bahke tuungu si ji nfenfe go nfung era.”
Jus kehm bungu re, “Bo ko nnya atahl abal a nnya erakera, si etahk Esowo jia, ji ji a ma fere tong re, a bahke tuungu si go nfung eraa?”
Etahk Esowo ji Jisos jo bung bade, ngubjing enye nyi.
Ngare nyi á nyahme go elkv, abatꞌtoono ebe bꞌbuumu alum nyao nya á bungu no. Owo bo kehm taame tv nwer Esowo, fere taame tv alum nya Jisos bungu no.
Eji Jisos jolo go Jerusalem ngare nyio nyi elkak Pasova, ane gbalee ba taame no tv mbing enye, eji bo nyehne akpokosi nya á jo lim.
Á joom bum bo go etingitingi, tibre á jo kahne bo kpee, ana bo li no.
Kpeem fuumu re nne awohng awohng tong-e bade ana ane li no, tibre yefono antahng kꞌkahn ana ntim ane li no.
Nne a Farisi awohng jolo gona, no bo jo lung-e re Nekodimos.

Atv amehng á kehm bake goji Jisos, ba tong-e re, “Rabbi, wahr kpꞌkahne re, wo li ntꞌtibi no Esowo tumu no. Tibre nnene limm, no bahke ma lim akpokosi ana nyaa nya a kpꞌlimi, sehngem re no, Esowo bi jol a ne.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-a re, Tohko tiki jol re, nne kpe tuungu jini, á nehm tiki nyehn etul bi Esowo.”
Nekodimos kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, nne bahke kpe tuungu jini renan, eji á ma kul? Á bahke kpe feere na song yel nnyehn go ala, á kpe-e jela?”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-a re, Tohko tiki jol re, nne kpe tuungu jini go alahb, a Etingi Etohko, á nehm nyehn etul bi Esowo.
Nne kpo jel nne.
Ki-a kpe kpo esi mbol mbol, tib eji n tong-a re, Tiki li re wahn kpe tuungu jini.
Nfeb kpo lim edi ajehng ajehng ji kor-e no. A kpo wuk ewahl ewahl. A kpehme kahn edi ji kpꞌlohngo abake, a edi ji fi no. Ano wo tob li jang jang a nne no Etingi Etohko jel-e no.”
Nekodimos kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, jia kehm jolo renan ana?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Wo ji li na ntꞌtibi Israel, nsol nyia a nehme kahna?
Etingitingi n kpꞌbungu tong-a re, Wahr kpo bung bada nsol nyi e kpꞌkahne, fere jo yiimi ntianse go nsol nyi e ma nyehn. Jol ń nehme tiki taame tv etib ebahre.
Eji m ma-n tong nsol nyi njini nyia, ń kil eltaame, lꞌlim renan, ń kehm taame, n lꞌtong-n nsol nyi ejahbetul Esowo?
Nnene limm, no ma jꞌje go ejahbetul Esowo, sehngem Mmon no nne wo wo ma lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba.”
Ana Moses rodo nnyo kum go ejangnti, rod jahm ngare nyi bo jolo go elka emahng, ano wo fvfo bo bahke tob rod Mmon no nne, kum go ejangnti, rod jahm,
eji nne awohng awohng no lꞌtaame tv-e, á lꞌbel elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
Esowo njini kor-e na, wo, á rodo Mmon mmon awohng ewe ka re, nne awohng awohng no lꞌtaame tv-e, á nehm tiki kpo tan, á kpi elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
Tibre Esowo tumem Mmon ewe tv go njini nyia re á ba ka njini ebi. Á tum-e re á ba tahre njini nyia.
Nne no lꞌtaame tv-e, á nehm li ebi. Nne no tohko taame, yebsi lꞌli ebi. Tibre á taamem tv mbing nyi Mmon mmon awohng no Esowo.
Ana wo li elam, eji ellennge ma ba go njini. Ane, ejannge ji kpi bo kor sehnge ellennge. Tibre nsol nyi bo kpꞌlimi, li abꞌbi abꞌbi.
Tibre nne awohng awohng no kpo lim abꞌbi, ellennge kpo sab-e sab. Á kpehme seb re á jen go edi ji ellennge li no, eji bo lꞌkꞌnyehn abꞌbi enye.
Nne no kpo lim jio ji li go etingitingi, ye wo li nne no kpꞌjene go edi ji ellennge li no, eji nne awohng awohng lꞌnyehn nnoobo eltum ni á limi no go elfahle ni Esowo.
Owo Jisos kehm tahme go Judea, a abatꞌtoono ebe. Ona wo bo kange no, jo wohngo ane alahb.
Jon fvfo jo tob wohngo ane alahb go Enon ji li kohlo Salim. Tibre alahb jolo o gbalee. Ane jo je o, song bel ewohngalahb.
Ngare nyio, Jon, bo we ka bob kak ngbekobo.
Abatꞌtoono Jon, a nne a Jus awohng, bo kehm kehme nfaabe lim bade eljini ni nne bahke jo bum elne saang.
Owo bo kehm bake goji Jon, kehm ba tong-e re, “Ntꞌtibi, nne noo no jolo a na go egbuk Jodan jehko, no a jo yiimi ntianse ka-e, á noa ona, kpi ane alahb wohngo, nne awohng awohng kpꞌjeke go ege.”
Owo Jon kehm faange re, “Nnene limm, no bahke ma bel ejum ajehng ajehng, sehngem re no Esowo bi ka-e.
Wahnfono antahng ebwuk ana n tong-n no re, Me sang li Kraist. Bo tum-m na re me n gbo-e mbang.
“Nne no kpi nkal, ye wo li nlumanne.
Ye bahke gbale na, me m bahke fere jol reed.”
“Ye jio ji lohng go ero ba, á gbale sehnge ane kpee. Nne no lohng go njini, á li ka njini. Á kpo bung nyi njini. Nne no lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba, á gbale sehnge ane kpee.
Á kpo yiimi ntianse go nsol nyi á ma nyehn, fere wꞌwuk. Nnene limm, no kpꞌtaame tv etib ebe.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtaame tv etib ebe, bahke lohko tib re, Esowo li go etingitingi.
Nne no Esowo m-e tum, á kpo bung alum nya Esowo. Tibre Esowo kpehme gare na etohko eje ka ane.
Esowo, Mmon ewe kor-e sehng, owo wahnge á ma yake nsol enye kpee, kak-e go ebo.
Nne no lꞌtaame tv Mmon Esowo, á kpi elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Nne no tohko wuk Mmon Esowo, elkpin á nehm bel. Erakatahng ji Esowo ji li a ne.”
Bab Farisi kehm wuku re, Jisos kpo wohngo ane alahb sehnge Jon, ane bao fere jo toon-e.
Jol Jisos wohngem nne awohng awohng alahb, sehngem abatꞌtoono ebe ba ba jo lim ano.
Ntul a Jisos sebe kan kahn ano me, á kehm tahme o Judea asongo go Galili.
Tiki jol re, á sehng go Samaria.
Á kehm song rehng go ejahbe Samaria ajehng, ji bo jo lung re Sikar, ji jolo kohlo edi ndi ji Jekob ka mmon ewe Josef.
Elbing alahb ni Jekob jolo ona. Eji Jisos ma lahng eljen, á kehm ba ji o elbing alahb nio. Ngare nyio jolo ngare efin.
Owo nnenkal a Samaria kehm bake re á ba tuk alahb. Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ka-m alahb, me n wo!”
Ngare nyio abatꞌtoono Jisos ebtahm go nla ejahbe re bo song gunu nsol alehke.
Nnenkal a Samaria noo kehm-e faange re, “Jen ji wahnge a kp-m bahbe re, me n ka-a alahb, wo ji li na nne a Jus, gana me nne a Samaria?” Tibre Jus, a Samaria, bo kpehme kod abo.
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Li re a kpꞌkahne ayare nya Esowo kpo ka, fere kahn nne no kp-a bahbe re, wo ka-e alahb, á wo, kehn a m-e gboongo na, á ka-a alahb mao ma elkpin.”
Mmonankal noo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nsoo, ejum limm, ji a bahke koko tuk alahb, gana elbing alahb nia kpꞌrahbe. Gan wo a bahke bele alahb mao ma elkpin?
Anv, wo ga gbal sehnge Jekob, nso ejahre, no ka-r elbing alahb nia? Á jo wo alahb ana, a abon abon ebe, a atohkondi enye kpee.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nne awohng awohng no lꞌwo alahb maa, bahk-e kpe kor.

Nne awohng awohng no lꞌwo alahb mao ma m bahk-e kake, ekor bahk-e tane. Alahb mao ma m bahk-e kake, bahke jo tub mbꞌbehl go ege atahng, fere gbo ebgba bi bahke jo fab, rehng go elkpin ni li go njinanjini.”
Mmonankal noo kehm-e faange re, “Nsoo, ka-m alahb mao ma ekor bahk-m tane, eji n lꞌkꞌkpe ba a, ba tuk alahb elbing nia.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Song, wo song lung nlum ewa, wahn ba!”
Mmonankal noo kehm-e faange re, “Nlum awohng awohng n kpimm.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Wobbung etingitingi, eji a tongo re, nlum a kpimm.
Wobbel alum na alon. Noo no a jehk-e etahk, etingitingi nlum ewa sang. A lohk-m tong etingitingi.”
Mmonankal noo kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, me n lohko kahn re, wo nnyehnamahr wo.
Babnso ejahre jo kake Esowo go ewong jia. Wahn Jus, ń kpo bung re, Go Jerusalem wo li edi ji fuumu re, ane jo ba, ba kak Esowo.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Nnenkal, taame tv alum enyame nya n kpꞌbungu tong-a re, Ngare kpꞌbake nyi ń lꞌkꞌkpe kak Esowo Nsoo go ewong jia, jol go Jerusalem fvfo.
Wahn aneb Samaria, ń kpo kak ejum ji ń kil elkahne. Wahr Jus, e kpo kak ji e kpꞌkahne. Tibre eltahre kpo lohng goji Jus.
Ngare kpꞌbake nyi atingitingi abakake Esowo bahke jo kak Esowo Nsoo go etohko, a etingitingi. Tibre elkohn ane ana bao ba, Esowo Nsoo kpꞌsebe re bo kak-e. Ngare nyꞌnehm nyi ma rehng a.
Esowo, etohko ji. Bao ba kp-e kake, bahke jo kak-e go etohko, a etingitingi.”
Mmonankal noo kehm-e tongo re, “N kpꞌkahne re, Mesaya kpꞌbake. Mesaya ji bo kpo lung-e re Kraist lꞌba, á bahk-r tibi nsol kpee.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Me jia ji kpꞌbungu a na, me wo li Mesaya.”

Tvtv ona abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm soro ba. Kpo bo esi area, eji bo nyehne re, á kpꞌbungu a nnenkal. Nnene jolem go bo ellong no bahbe Jisos re, “Jen ji a kpꞌsebe?” Jol bo we bahbem re, “Jen ji wahnge a kpꞌbungu a ne?”
Nnenkal noo kehm soro tahm etulahb eje sa, tahm song rehng go nla ejahbe, song tong ane re,
“Baan, wahn ba nyehn nne no ma-m tong nsol kpee, nyi n kpo lim. Ma ye wo li Mesaya nji!”
Ane bao kehm soro lohng ejahbe jio, tahm song kpiri Jisos.
Ngare nyꞌnehm nyi abatꞌtoono Jisos jo gboongo Jisos re, “Ntꞌtibi, ko nsol alehke, wo li me!”
Á kehm tongo bo re, “N kpi nsol alehke nyi m bahke lehke, nyi ń kil elkahne.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm kehme elbahbe atemtem re, “Anv, nne ebko nsol alehke ba ka-ea?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Nsol alehke enyame li re, me n lim mbang nyi nne no tum-m no, fere gohro mal eltum ene.
Wahn sang kpo kono elbungu re, ‘Ebsa nnyahng eni, ngare elkpake rehnga?’ N kp-n tongo re, wahn tab asamahr enyahne wahre, nyehn ana ebgbe ma kum, ngare ebrehng kpee, nyi elkpake.
Nne no lꞌkpa, á kpo bel eltuuru. Á kpo kpu nsol nyio bum, jol go elkpin ni li go njinanjini, eji mbꞌbahme, a nkpꞌkpake, bo lꞌbel eyebatahng egom egom.
Tibre jia ji bo kpo kono elbungu, lohko li go etingitingi re, ‘Nne noko bahm, noko kpa.’
M ma-n tum re, wahn song kpa egbe jio ji ń ki lim eltum anehng anehng. Ane bako ba ma lim eltum o, wahn ebba yel eltum nio, soro asi kpꞌlimi asongo.”
Aneb Samaria gbalee ba lene ejahbe jio, kehm taame tv Jisos, tibre mmonankal noo bungu re, “Á tong-m nsol kpee nyi m ma lꞌlim.”
Eji aneb Samaria bao ba goji Jisos, bo gboong-e re, á lub song kang a bo.
Ane gbalee kpe taame budu, tib go ege alum nya á bungu no.

Bo kehm tongo mmonankal noo re, “Wahr ebtaame anv. Lohngem re, wahr ebtaame tib eji a tong-r no. Wahr ebtaame, tibre wahrfono antahng ebwuk. Wahr eblohko kahn go etingitingi re, ye wo li ntꞌtahre no njini.”
Jisos kange kan nfung ebal o me, á kehm tahme go Galili.
Tibre Jisos jo yiimi ntianse antahng antahng re, “Nnyehnamahr Esowo kpehme lub go ege ejahbe.”
Eji Jisos ba no, ba rehng go Galili, aneb Galili jo vvr-e sehng, tib eji bo nyehne akpokosi nya á limi no go Jerusalem ngare elkak. Tibre bofono tꞌtob je elkak nio.
Á kehm feere tahm go Kena ji Galili, ejahbe jio ji á ko alahb lim, siingi amahm. Ntubesi ejahbe awohng jolo go Kapenium, no mmon ewe jo yam.
Á wuku kan re, Jisos eblohng go Judea ba go Galili, á kehm bake goji Jisos, ba gboong-e re, á je go Kapenium, song lim mmon ewe, á nob. Tibre mmon ewe nong go emel elkv.
Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Tohko tiki jol re, ń nyehne akpokosi, ń kpehme tiki taame.”
Ntubesi ejahbe noo kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, ba wahr tahm, mmon ewame yahke kpo.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Song, mmon ewa bahke kpini!” Nne noo kehm soro taame tv alum nya Jisos bungu no tong-e, kehm soro tahm eje.
Eji á jo kehnge, alokeltum ebe kehm ba wan-e go mbang, kehm-e tongo re, “Mmon ewa kpeke li go elkpin.”
Á kehm bahbe bo ngare nyi mmon ewe kehme elnobo. Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Nyaane ngare efin nkaranka anyehng, owo á nobo arumbum nyao.”
Nde mmon kehm soro buumu tvtv re, ngare nyio nyi Jisos tong-e re, “Mmon ewa bahke kpini.” Yefono antahng kehm taame tv-e, a ane ba lene go ege a nlaaga kpee.
Etoono nkpokosi nyi a, nyi Jisos kpe lim ngare nyio nyi á longo go Judea, feere go Galili.
Eji nsol nyio ma sehng kpee, owo Jisos kehm tahme go Jerusalem. Tibre ngare nyio jolo ngare elkak ni Jus.
Go Jerusalem, go eti mbu jio ji bo jo lung re, Eti Mbu Ejoro, owo eto jolo no, ji bo si nkpatahk elon sennge kak. Eto jio bo jo lungu go alum Hibru re Betsata.
Ona wo ellong ane gbalee noongo no, jo yam, awakamahr, abanne, a aneb ayam bandiki. (Bo jo baabe re alahb gbehke.

Tibre ngare nyimongo enjel nyi Ntul Esowo jo ba yel alahb mao, jo gbehke alahb. Nne eyam awohng awohng no lꞌfere gbo mbang song yel go alahb, eji kpꞌgbehke, ye wo bahke nobo eyam ebe, afi á bele elkohn eyam abehng abehng.)
Nne awohng jolo noa, no eyam ebe ma kang eltahl a nnya elku a nnya era.
Eji Jisos nyehn-e no, fere kahn re, yebnoongo ona edi jio ekidi eblab, á kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, a kpꞌsebe re wo noba?”
Nne eyam noo kehm-e faange re, “Ee nsoo, wo, nnene n kpimm, no bahk-m rodo kak go eto jia, eji alahb ma kehme elgbehke. N lꞌtahm re me n song yel, nne noko go tohko gbo mbang ka-m.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm, wo rod ekpa eja, jen song!”
Tvtv ona nne noa kehm soro nob eyam ebe, kehm rodo ekpa eje, kehme eljene.
Efung bio jolo efung Esabat.
Aneb Jus kehm tongo nne noo no ma nob eyam ebe re, “Lela efung Esabat bi. Nobem re wo sol ekpa eja.”
Nne noo kehm faange bo re, “Nne no lim-m no, n nob, ye wo tong-m re, ‘Rod ekpa eja, wo jen song!’ ”
Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nne awo tong-a tong re, wo rod ekpa eja, jen song?”
Nne noo no nobo eyam ebe kahnem nne no lim-e lim, á nob. Tibre Jisos tꞌtahm, eji ellong ane kame no ba rur o.
Eji ma ji ntiil, Jisos kehm song nyehn-e go etahk Esowo, kehm-e tongo re, “Nyehnee, anv wobnob. Ka kpe lim abiafem, eji ejum ji sabe sehnge jia lꞌki-a kpe lim.”
Nne noo kehm tahme song tong Jus re, Jisos wo lim-e no, á nob.
Owo wahng ka Jus kehm kehme Jisos gbak, tib eji á limi nne nob efung Esabat.
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Nsoo kpi nlimi nlimi eltum. Me fvfo, n kpꞌtob lim eltum.”

Jia ji wahnge aneb Jus kpe bel erakatahng gbalee tob-e, fere jo seb mbang ana nyi bo bahk-e wulu. Tibre bo jo bungu re, Jisos, ntahm Esabat nyi nyi sang á soodo no, á kpe bung re, Esowo, Nde no we wo, ji lohngo re, á kpꞌrodo elne bum jang jang a Esowo.

Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Mmon nehm ma lim ejumjum go ege a ngang antahng, sehngem ji á lꞌnyehn Nde kpꞌlimi, ji ji á kpo tob lim. Ajehng ajehng ji Nde lꞌlim, jꞌnehm ji Mmon kpo tob lim.
Tibre Nde, Mmon ewe kp-e koro sehng, owo wahnge á kp-e tibi nsol kpee nyi yefono antahng kpꞌlimi. Á bahk-e tibi nsol nyi gbale sehnge nyia a, eji lꞌjo kpo-n esi.
Ana Nde kpo nyahme ane go elkv, bo fere bel elkpin, ano wo fvfo Mmon bahke tob ka nne awohng awohng elkpin, no kor-e no.
Nsoo kpehme lam nne awohng awohng. Yebfaake elam eje kpee ka Mmon ewe re
eji nne awohng awohng lꞌkak Mmon ewe, jang jang ana bo kpo kak Nde. Nne no tohko kak Mmon ewe, lohngo re, á nehme kak Nde no tum-e no.
“Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Nne awohng awohng no lꞌwuk alum enyame, fere taame tv nne no tum-m no, á kpi elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Bo we nehm kpe lam. Yebsehng elkv sa rehng go elkpin.
Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Ngare kpꞌbake, ngare nyꞌnehm nyi ma rehng a, nyi akvne bahke wuku alum nya Mmon Esowo.
“Ana Nsoo kpi nsahm antahng nyi á kpo ko, ka elkpin, ano wo fvfo á ma tob lim Mmon ewe re, á tob bel nsahm nyi á bahke tob jo ka elkpin.
Á m-e ka nsahm nyi á bahke jo lam alam. Tibre ye wo li Mmon no nne.
Nong, ki-n kpe kpo esi mbol mbol. Tibre ngare bahke bake nyi akvne kpee nya wob go alahm bahke wuku alum enye.
Bo bahke nyahme lohng go alahm. Bao ba limi nob nob bahke nyahme, jol go elkpin. Bao ba limi abꞌbi bahke nyahme, ba yiimi go eti elam.
“N nehm ma lim ejumjum go egame eko. Ana n kpo wuk goji Esowo, ano wo n kpo lam. Elam ejame li go etingitingi. Tibre n nehme lim mbang nyꞌnyame. N kpꞌlimi mbang nyi nne no tum-m no.
N lꞌyiimi ntianse ka elname antahng, ntianse enyame nehm lub.
Nne noko noa, no kpꞌyiimi ntianse ka-m. N kpꞌkahne re, ntianse nyi á kpꞌyiimi ka-m, lohko li go etingitingi.
Ń tumu ane tv Jon ji jo yiimi ntianse ka etingitingi jia.
Jol nnene n sebem re á yiimi ntianse ka-m. M bungu jia, eji wahn lꞌbel eltahre.
Jon jolo ana etꞌrekahng ji jo lul, fere jo yꞌya. Jo kor-n re wahn jo bel eyebatahng mmongare ntiil tib go ege ellennge.
“Ntianse nyi me n kpi no, gbale sehnge nyi Jon. Tibre akpokosi nyao nya Nsoo ma-m ka re me n lim, eltum nꞌnehm ni n kpꞌlimi a, ni ni kpꞌyiimi ntianse ka-m re, Nsoo wo tum-m no.
Nsoo no tum-m no wo yiimi ntianse antahng antahng ka-m. Ellum ene wahn ka wuk a wuk, jol esamahr ebe ń ka nyehn a nyehn.
Ellum ene go egahne atahng wobem. Tibre ń nehme taame tv nne no á tum-e no.
Ń kpo kpili nwer Esowo, tibre ń kpo tir re, ona wo ḿ bahke bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Nwer Esowo nyio nyi kpꞌyiimi ntianse ka me.
“Wahn nehme kor elbake go egame, eji ń lꞌbel elkpin.
“N kpehme ko ellub goji ane.
Tibre n kpꞌsahb kꞌkahn re, ekor ji Esowo wobem go egahne atahng.
M ba go mbing nyi Nsoo. Me ń nehme ko. Nne nondiki lꞌfere ba go ege a mbing, ye wo ḿ bahk-e koko.
Bahke limi renan, ń kehm taame tv Esowo, eji ń kpo ko ellub goji ane? Esowo bi li na abehng, ellub ene ń kpehme seb.
“Kana tir re, m bahk-n kake ebi go esamahr Nsoo. Moses wo bahk-n kake ebi, ye jio ji ń kpꞌkunu ekpu go ege.
“Li re ń kpꞌtaame tv Moses, kehn ń kpꞌtob taame tv-m. Tibre Moses nyꞌnyon bada name.
Eji ń kil eltaame tv alum enye nya á nyono no, bahke limi renan, ń kehm taame tv alum enyame?”
Owo Jisos kehm tahme go egbuk eto jehko ji Galili, ji bo jo tob lung re eto ji Taibirias.
Ellong ane gbalee kehm-e toono, tibre bo jo nyehne akpokosi nya á jo lim aneb ayam, bo nob.
Jisos kehm wahre go ewong, song ji a abatꞌtoono ebe.
Ngare nyio elkak Pasova ni Jus ebkabbe.
Eji Jisos tabe esamahr ebe wahre, nyehn ellong ane bao kpꞌbake, á kehm bahbe Filip re, “E bahke limi renan, kehm gunu abred nya ane bao kpee bahke lehke?”
Á bungu ellum nia re á wuung-e. Tibre yefono antahng jo kꞌkahn kpee ji á bahke limi.
Filip kehm-e faange re, “Mpon eltahl, e lꞌko gunu abred, jol nehm tohko bꞌbiingi bo, afi nne awohng awong jo li ntiil.”
Ntꞌtoono ewe awohng no bo jo lung-e re Andru ji mmonannyehn a Saimon Pita, kehm-e tongo re,
“Mmonse awohng li ana, no kpi ebred na eblon, a abon nsahre na abal. Anv, nyaa a, tohko lꞌli jen, ka ellong ane ana nia?”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Tongen ane bao, bo ji ndi.” Tibre ajele jolo gbalee edi jio. Owo ane bao kehm jehke ndi. Bo jolo ejum aneblum atahltahl nkpel ewubbal atahl awubu (5,000).
Jisos kehm rodo abred nyao, kak Esowo saam, kehm bake ane bao ba ji go ndi. Ano wo fvfo á tob lim go abon nsahre bao.
Nne awohng awohng li ana kor-e no.
Eji bo ma wohngo ane kpee, Jisos kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Taaren bo erik ji ma sa, eji ejum ajehng ajehng lꞌkꞌrannge mbol mbol.”
Ebred eblon bi ane bao li no, bo kehm song taare erik ji sa no, ruru ewubu ejeere na ebbal.
Ane bao nyehne kan nkpokosi nyi Jisos ma lim, bo kehm kehme elbungu re, “A wo lohko li nnyehnamahr Esowo no e jo wuk re, á bahke bake go njini.”
Eji Jisos sebe kahn re, bo yahke ba, ba bob-e etul go nsahm, á kehm tahme bo sa, tahm go ewong ntahngtahng.
Eji elgung ba no, abatꞌtoono ebe kehm tahme go nkpe eto,
kehm song yel go egbang, kehm kehme elfingi re bo siiri eto jio rehng go Kapenium go egbuk jehko. Ngare nyio ejannge ebgbo. Jisos ka tiki ba, ba kpiri bo.
Alahb kehm kehme ebuku lim, tibre nfeb jo limi sehng.
Bo fingi kan ejum mmal era, fundiki mmal eni, bo kehm soro nyehn Jisos kpꞌjene go ero alahb, jo kabbe go bo egbang. Bo kehm kehme elfahle.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Kana kpe fahl, me wo!”
Eltim yebe bo sehng. Bo kehm-e solo go egbang. Tvtv ona egbang kehm soro rehng egbuk eto jehko ji bo jo jꞌje.
Etoono efung behko, ellong ane ba sa go egbuk eto jehko kehm sebe kahn re, egbang abehng bi bi jolo o. Egbang bio, Jisos yelem. Abatꞌtoono ebe ba, ba yel egbang bio tahm asongo bo bo.
Owo agbang nyandiki kehm lohngo go Taibirias ba edi ji bo li abred nyao ngare nyi Ntul a Jisos ma kak Esowo saam.
Eji ane bao sebe no kahn re, Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe, ona bo limm, bo kehm kpe yel agbang tahm go Kapenium, song seb Jisos.
Eji bo nyehn-e no go egbuk eto jehko, bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntꞌtibi, ngare anyi a rehnge a?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Elsebe ni ń kp-m sebe, me ń nehme seb tib eji ń nyehne akpokosi. Abred nya ń li wohngo, nya nya wahnge ń kp-m sebe.

Kana kpe nyennge, jo lim eltum ni ḿ bahke bele nsol alehke nyi bahke tane na. Jo noken mbang nyi ḿ bahke bele nsol alehke nyi bahke jolo go njinanjini, nyi Mmon no nne bahk-n kake. Tibre ye wo, Esowo Nsoo m-e kak elliingi nio ni nsahm enye.”
Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji e bahke lꞌlim, kehm jo lim eltum ni Esowo?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Eltum ni Esowo kpꞌsebe re wahn lim, li re, wahn taame tv nne no á tum-e no.”
Owo bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Elliingi ani a bahke tibi, ni e bahke nyehne, kehm taame tv-a? Nkpokosi anyi a bahke limi?
Babnso ejahre jo li nsol nyi bo kpo lung re mmanna go elka emahng, jang jang ana nwer Esowo bungu no re, ‘Á ka bo abred nya lohng go ejahbetul Esowo re bo li.’ ”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Moses sang ka-n abred nya lohng go ejahbetul Esowo. Nsoo wo kp-n kake etingitingi ebred ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo.
Tibre ebred ji Esowo li ebred ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo, ba ka njini elkpin.”
Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, jo ka-r ebred jio ngare anyehng anyehng!”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Me wo li ebred ji elkpin. Nne no lꞌba go egame, njal we nehm kpe yam. Nne no lꞌtaame tv-m, ekor alahb bahk-e tane.
M ma-n tong re, ḿ ma-m nyehn, jol ń nehme tiki taame.
Nne awohng awohng no Nsoo ka-m ye, ye wo bahke bake go egame. Nne no lꞌba go egame, we n nehm kam yake go.
Tibre n lohngo go ejahbetul Esowo ba re me m ba lim mbang nyi Nsoo no tum-m no. Mbang nyꞌnyame sang m ba ellimi.
Ejum ji ana, ji Nsoo no tum-m no tong-m re me n lim. Á tong-m re, me n kꞌwahng nne awohng awohng tan, no á ma-m ka. M bahke nyahme bo go elkv esꞌkohro efung.
A wo tob li ejum ji Nsoo kpꞌsebe re, nne awohng awohng no lꞌnyehn Mmon ewe fere taame, á bahke bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini. M bahk-e nyahme go esꞌkohro efung.”
Jus kehm kehme elmemme atemtem tob-e, tib eji á bungu re, “Me wo li ebred ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba.”
Bo kehm bungu re, “Jisos sang aa, ji li mmon a Josef, ji e kpꞌkahne nde, a nnyehna? Jen ji wahnge á bahke kehm bungu re, á lohngo go ejahbetul Esowo ba?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Kana kpe memme atemtem!
Nnene limm, no bahke ma ba go egame, tohko jol re Nsoo no tum-m no wo leeb-e. M bahk-e nyahme go elkv esꞌkohro efung.
Tibre abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono re, ‘Esowo bahke bo tib, bo ane kpee.’ Nne awohng awohng no ma wuk, fere kpili goji Nsoo, á bahke bake go egame.
“Jia lohngem re, nne awohng awohng ebnyehn Nsoo, sehngem nne no lohng goji Esowo Nsoo ba, ye wo ma nyehn Nsoo.
Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Nne no lꞌtaame, á kpi elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
Me wo li ebred ji elkpin.
Babnso ejahne jo li mmanna go elka emahng. Bobkpo kpee.
“A wo li ebred ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba, ji nne lꞌli, á lꞌkꞌkpo.

Me wo li ebred ji elkpin, ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌli ebred jia, á bahke bele elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Ebred ji m bahke kake njini re bo bel elkpin, ngubjing enyame nyi.”
Jus kehm kehme nfaabe lim atemtem re, “Bahke limi renan, nne noa kehm-r kake ngubjing enye, wahr li?”
Owo Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Tohko tiki jol re, ń li ngubjing nyi Mmon no nne, fere wo alung eme, ń nehm tiki bel elkpin go egahne atahng.
Nne no kpo li ngubjing enyame, fere jo wo alung emame, á kpi elkpin ni li go njinanjini. M bahk-e nyahme go elkv esꞌkohro efung.
Tibre ngubjing enyame lohko li etingitingi ejum alehke.
Nne no lꞌli ngubjing enyame, fere jo wo alung emame, á wob-m go eltim, me n tob wob-e go eltim.
Nsoo no li go elkpin wo tum-m. Esi eje ji wahnge n tob li go elkpin. Nne no lꞌli ngubjing enyame, á bahke tob jol go elkpin tib go egame esi.
A wo li ebred ji lohng go ejahbetul Esowo ba. Limm ana elkohn ni babnso ejahne li no, fere kpo. Nne no lꞌli ebred jia, á bahke jolo go njinanjini.”
Jisos jo bungu alum nyaa, eji á jo tib go etahk ero ji jolo go Kapenium.
Egom abatꞌtoono Jisos gbalee, eji bo wuku alum nyao, bo kehm bungu re, “Alum nyao kpꞌriidi sehng. Nne awo bahke ma wuungu atung go nsol nyio?”
Eji Jisos sebe kahn re, abatꞌtoono ebe kpꞌmemme bade alum nyao, owo á kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, alum nya m bungu a, ma-n saba?
Ḿ bahke bungu renan, ń lꞌnyehn Mmon no nne kpꞌfeere go ero edi ji á tohko jol?
Etohko ji kpo ka elkpin, ngubjing o mbol mbol wo. Alum nya m ma bung tong-n li etohko etohko, a elkpin.
Egom ejahne jindiki jia, ji kil eltaame.”
Jisos bungu ellum nia a, tibre á jo kahne kpee mboma mbomo. Á jo kahne egom ji lꞌkꞌtaame, fere kahn nne no bahk-e gungu.
Á kehm bungu re, “Owo wahnge n tong-n no re, Nnene limm, no bahke ma ba go egame, sehngem re no, Nsoo wo limi mbang ka-e.”
Tib go alum nyao, egom abatꞌtoono ebe gbalee kehm soro yaam-e sa, tahm ebo. Bo we kpeem jo tiki toono.
Jisos kehm bahbe abatꞌtoono ebe, ewubu ane abal re, “Wahn fvfo, ḿ bahke tob yaam-m saa?”
Saimon Pita kehm-e faange re, “Ntul, eji nyehne wo, e bahke jeke? Wo wo kpi alum nyao nya elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
Wahr ebtaame, fere kahn re, wo wo li Mbarebara nne no Esowo.”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Wahn sang n jak-n no yehka, wahn ewubu ane abala? Nne awohng go egahne ellong, nnehm nyi.”
Á bungu bade Judas ji mmon a Saimon Iskariot, ji woomo go ellong ane ebe, ewubu ane abal. Tibre ye wo jolo nne no bahk-e gungu.
Eji nyao kpee ma mal, Jisos kehm tahme, jo yannge go Galili. Á joom yannge go Judea, tibre Jus jo sebe re bo wul-e.
Ngare nyio ona elkak ni Jus jo si nkpatahk jo woomo, ebkabbe.
Owo abonanyehn Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm, wo song go Judea, eji abatꞌtoono eba lꞌnyehn akpokosi nya a kpꞌlimi me!
Nnene limm, no kpo behr nsol nyi á kpꞌlimi, eji á kpꞌsebe re nne awohng awohng kahn-e. A lꞌkehme nsol enya lim, jo tib elna go njini.”
Jol abonanyehn fvfo joom taame tv-e.
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ngare enyame ka biingi. Ngare nyꞌnyahne li ngare anyehng anyehng.
Njini nyia, ekv bo wahn nehme ko, me wo, bo kp-m koko ekv,
Songen go elkak nio wahn wahn. Me n nehme tahm elkak anv, tibre ngare enyame ka biingi.”
Á bungu kan ano me, á kehm sake eje go Galili.
Ngare nyi abonanyehn ma tahm go elkak, á kehm tob tahm fvfo. Á joom jen gbul gbul gbuul, á jo jene mbehr mbehr.
Jus jo seb-e go elkak nio, fere jo bahb re, “Ye nona?”
Ellong ane bao jo bungu awꞌwa bada ne. Bandiki jo bungu re, “Á li nnooba nne.” Bandiki re, “Eꞌee, á kpꞌnehme na ane.”
Tib eji bo jo fahl Jus, nnene jolem, no jo bung gbul gbul gbuul bada ne.
Elkak nio kpo kang nfung enehkeni. Elka elka ene wo, Jisos tahme go etahk Esowo, song kehme eltibi.
Kehm kpoko Jus esi, bo kehm kehme elbungu re, “Jen ji wahnge nne noa kpꞌkahne elkahne ana nia, jol eji á ki jꞌje nwer?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Eltibi ename ni n kpꞌtibi a, nꞌname sang, ni Esowo bi tum-m no ni.
Nne awohng awohng no kpꞌsebe re, á lim mbang nyi Esowo, á bahke kahne, joare eltibi ename ni n kpꞌtibi lohko lohng goji Esowo, afi n kpo bung go egama nsahm.
Nne no kpo bung go ege a nsahm, á kpo seb ellub nꞌne. Nne no kpꞌsebe ellub ni nne no tum-e no, á lohko li go etingitingi, ebꞌbi ajehng ajehng á kpimm.
Moses sang ka-n atahma? Nne ewahne awohng awohng limm, no kpꞌbumu atahm nyao.
Ane bao kehm faange re, “A kpi ebi etohko go ega atahng. Nne awo kpꞌsꞌseb re á wul-a?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “N limi nkpokosi anyehng ana nyꞌnyehng, jo kpo-n esi, wahn ane kpee.
Moses tong-n re, wahn jo yehke abon ebahne nrur. (Lohngem re, Moses wo ko nrur ayehke ba a nyi, lohng goji babnso ejahre.) Wahn kpo yehke mmon nrur efung Esabat.
Bo lꞌyehke mmon nrur efung Esabat, eji atahm nya Moses lꞌkꞌrange, jen ji wahnge lꞌlun ntim enyahne kp-n rake tob-m, tib eji n limi nne eyam nob kpee go ege a ngubjing efung Esabat?
Kana jo lam alam ane ana ń kpꞌnyehne esamahr ebo. Jo lamen elam ji nno!”
Aneb Jerusalem bandiki kehm bungu re, “Nne noa sang bo kpꞌsebe re bo wul-ea?
Ye sang ana, kpꞌbungu gbul gbul gbuula? Jol nnene nehme bung ejumjum tob-e. Ma atubesi ebahre eblohko kahn re, ye Mesaya wo nji.
Wahr kpꞌkahne edi ji nne noa lohng no. Mesaya lꞌba, nnene limm, no bahke kahne edi ji á bahke lohngo ba.”
Eji Jisos jo tib go etahk Esowo, á kehm jo bung wahre wahre re, “Ń kp-m kahne, ń kpꞌtob kahn edi ji n lohng no ba. M baam antahng a. Nne no tum-m no li go etingitingi. Wahn, we ń nehme kahn.
N kp-e kahne, tibre n lohng go ege ba. Ye wo tum-m no.”
Owo bo kehm gare re bo bob Jisos, jol nnene jolem, no lak-e abo. Tibre ngare enye ka biingi.
Ane gbalee jolo go ellong nio ba taame tv Jisos. Bo jo bungu re, “Anv, Mesaya lꞌba, á bahke limi akpokosi sehnge ana nya nne noa ma lima?”
Bab Farisi kehm wuku ana ellong ane bao jo bung awꞌwa bada Jisos. Owo atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi kehm tumu alokeltum ebo re bo song bob Jisos.
Jisos kehm bungu re, “M bahke kpe jol a nahne ana mmongare ntiil, kehm tahme goji nne no tum-m no.
Ḿ bahk-m sebe, me ń nehm kpe nyehn. Edi ji m bahke jeke, ń nehm ma ba.”
Jus kehm kehme elbahbe atemtem re, “Gan wo nne noa kpꞌbungu re, á yahke tahm, eji e lꞌki-e kpe nyehn? Anv, á yahke tahm goji Jus ji lene go ajahbe Grika, fere song tib aneb Grika?
Anv, jio ona lohngo renan, ji á kpꞌbungu re, ‘Ḿ bahk-m sebe, me ń nehm kpe nyehn. Edi ji m bahke jolo, ń nehm ma ba?’ ”
Esꞌkohro efung bi elkak nio, bi bi jolo egburu efung. Owo Jisos kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu wahre wahre re, “Nne awohng awohng no alahb lꞌkor-e, nong á ba ga egame, ba wo!
Ana wo nwer Esowo bungu no re, ‘Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtaame tv-m, aya ma elkpin bahke kehme elfabe go ege eltim lohng.’ ”
Jisos bungu ellum nia bade etohko ji ane ba lꞌtaame tv-e bahke bele. Tibre ngare nyio etohko ji Esowo ka ba, eji Jisos kala nyahme go elkv song ji go ege ellub.
Eji ane bao wuku alum nyao, egom jindiki kehm bungu re, “Nne noa ana lohko li nnyehnamahr Esowo noo.”
Egom jindiki jo bungu re, “Nne noa ana, Kraist wo.”
Egom jindiki jo bahbe re, “Anv, Kraist bahke lohngo go Galilia?
Nwer Esowo bungu re, ‘Kraist bahke lohngo go etꞌtohngo ji Devid. Bo bahk-e jele go Betlehem, ejahbe ji Devid.’ ”
Owo ane bao kehm kehme elyabe tib go ege esi.
Egom jindiki jo sebe re bo bob-e, jol nnene jolem, no lak-e abo.
Alokeltum bao kehm feere ebo, tahm goji Bab Farisi, a atubesi abalimajom. Bo kehm bahbe bo re, “Jen ji wahnge ń ki-e bob, ba a ne?”
Alokeltum bao kehm faange re, “Nnene limm, no kpo bung ana nne noo.”
Bab Farisi kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, wahn fvfo, á kp-n tob nehma?
Wahn ebtiki nyehn ntubesi awohng awohng, a nne a Farisi no ma tiki taame tv-ea?
Ellong ane bao nehme kahn atahm nya Moses. Owo wahng ka erakatahng ji Esowo li a bo.”
Nekodimos ji ma tohko je goji Jisos, ji woomo go ellong Farisis kehm bungu re,
“Atahm enyahre bungu re, wahr kꞌjo lam na lam nne, eji e kala wuk, fere seb kahn ji á limi no.”
Bo kehm faange re, “Anv, wo tob lohng go Galili fvfoa? Lung nwer Esowo, a bahke kahne re, nnyehnamahr awohng awohng limm, no bahke lohngo go Galili.”
Ane kpee kehm yaame kehnge.
Jisos kehm tahme go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv.
Efungfu atv atv á kehm kpe feere ba go etahk Esowo. Ane kpee kehm kame ba rur senng-e kak. Á kehm jehke, jo tib bo.
Bab Farisi, a atꞌtibi ba atahm kehm koko mmonankal awohng ba a ne, no bo bob-e no, eji á jo lim erehbe, ko-e song yiimi go esamahr ane kpee.
Bo kehm tongo Jisos re, “Ntꞌtibi, mmonankal noa, e m-e bob, eji á jo lim erehbe.
Go egahre atahm, Moses tong-r re, elkohn nnenkal noo, wahr jo wul-e na go atal atal. Anv, a bahke bungu renan bada ne?”
Alum nyao, bo bungu, eji bo lꞌgar-e. Bo jo sebe re, bo bel ejum ji bo bahk-e ebi ka.
Jisos kehm soro kabe, jo tennge ebnyohkobo go ndi.
Eji bo soro asi, jo bahb-e abahbe, Jisos kehm mehle yiimi, kehm tongo bo re, “Nong, nne awohng awohng go egahne ellong no kala lꞌlim abꞌbi, gbo mbang rod eltal tub-e.”
Jisos kehm kpe kabe, kpe kehme ebnyohkobo tennge go ndi.
Eji bo wuku ano, bo kehm kehme elyaame, go nne awohng awohng, nnenkul abo wo gbo mbang.
Jisos sa ntahngtahng, a nnenkal noo no yiimi o.
Jisos kehm tabe esamahr ebe, kehm-e tongo re, “Nnenkal, ane bako bana? Nnene limm, no kp-a kpeke ka ebia?”
Á kehm faange re, “Ntul, nnene me kpeem ka ebi.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Jol me, wa n nehm tob ka ebi.
Jisos kehm kpe kehme elbungu a bo re, “Me wo li ellennge ni njini. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtoon-m, á nehm kpe jen go ejannge, á bahke bele ellennge ni elkpin.”
Bab Farisi kehm-e tongo re, “Eji a kpꞌyiimi ntianse ka elna antahng, ntianse enya limm go etingitingi.”

Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Jol afi n kpꞌyiimi ntianse ka elname antahng, ntianse enyame lohko li go etingitingi. Tibre n kpꞌkahne edi ji n lohng no ba, fere kahn edi ji n fi no. Wahn nehme kahn edi ji n lohng no ba, jol ń nehme tob kahn edi ji n fi no.
Ń kpo lam alam ana ane kpo lam, wo, me n kpehme lam nnene.
Li re n kpꞌlame ane, kehn elam ejame li go etingitingi. Tibre me ntahngtahng sang kpo lam. E kpo lam awahr a Nsoo no tum-m no.
Bo nyꞌnyon go egahne atahm re, ane abal lꞌyiimi ntianse, bung nnyo amehng, lohngo re, alum nya bo bungu no lohko li etingitingi.
N kpo yiimi ntianse ka elname antahng. Nsoo no tum-m no kpo tob yiimi ntianse ka-m fvfo.”
Owo bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Nsoo li gan?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “M-e ń nehme kahnem. Nsoo, w-e ń nehme tob kahn. Li re ń kp-m kahne, kehn wahn ebtob kahn Nsoo fvfo.”
Jisos jo bungu alum nyaa, eji á jo tib go etahk Esowo, edi ji bo kpo kuuru akpohko.
Nnene jolem, no bob-e no, tibre ngare enye ka rehng.
Jisos kehm kpe tong bo re, “M bahke tahme, ḿ bahk-m sebe. Ngare nyio wo ḿ bahke kpoko go egahne abiafem. Edi ji n fi no, ń nehm ma ba.”
Jus kehm bahbe re, “Anv, á bahke wulu na elnea, tib eji á kpꞌbungu re, edi ji á fi no, wahr nehm ma jea?”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Wahn lohng go njini nyia. Me n lohng go ero ba. Wahn li ka njini nyia. Me n limm ka njini nyia.
M ma-n tong re, ḿ bahke kpoko go egahne abiafem. Tohko tiki jol re, ń taame na tv re, me nne noo wo, ḿ bahke kpoko go egahne abiafem.”
Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Wo nne awo?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Li ana m ma-n tohko tong mboma mbomo.
N kpi nsol gbalee nyi m bahke bungu bada nahne, fere lam-n. Nne no tum-m no li go etingitingi. Ajehng ajehng ji n wuku go ege, ji ji n kpꞌlennge ka njini nyia.”
Tikem lennge bo re, Jisos jo bungu bada Nde.
Owo Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Ngare nyi ḿ ma rod Mmon no nne, kum go ejangnti, rod jahm,
Nsoo no tum-m no li a name. Me á ka tahm sa. Tibre n kpo lim ji kpo kor-e ngare anyehng anyehng.”
Eji Jisos bungu alum nyaa, ane gbalee tꞌtaame tv-e.
Jisos kehm bungu tong aneb Jus ba ma taame tv-e re, “Ń lꞌsoro asi ana, jo toono alum enyame, ḿ bahke lohko jol atingitingi abatꞌtoono ebame.
Ḿ bahke kahne etingitingi. Etingitingi bahk-n limi, ń for.”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Wahr lohng go etꞌtohngo ji Ebraham. E ka jol a jol aju ka nne awohng awohng. Jen ji wahnge a kehm bungu re, bo bahk-r limi, e for?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Nne awohng awohng no lꞌlim abiafem, á li nju ka abiafem.
Nju kpehme jol etahk nde ngare kpe kpe. Mmon a nde nne wo kpo jol etahk nde ngare kpe kpe.
Mmon no Esowo lꞌlim-n re wahn for, wahn eblohko for go etingitingi.
N kpꞌkahne re, wahn lohng go etꞌtohngo ji Ebraham, gana ń kpꞌsebe re wahn wul-m. Tibre ń nehme ko alum enyame nya n kp-n tibi, kak go egahna ntim.
N kpo bung jio ji n nyehne goji Nsoo. Wahn kpo lim ji ń wuku goji nso ejahne.”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Ebraham wo li nso ejahre.”
Jisos kehm bungu tong bo re, “Li re ń li abon ba Ebraham, kehn ń kpꞌlimi ji Ebraham limi no.
Anv a, ń kpꞌsebe re wahn wul-m, me ji li nne no kp-n tongo etingitingi ji n wuku goji Esowo. Nsol ana nyia Ebraham joom lim.
Ń kpo lim nsol nyi nso ejahne limi no.”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Wahr limm abon ba ki nyi babnde. Wahr kpi nde na awohng no li Esowo.”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Li re Esowo nso ejahne wo, kehn n kp-n koro. Tibre n lohngo goji Esowo ba. Ye wo tum-m no. M baam go egama ngang antahng.
Jen ji wahnge alum nya n kpꞌbungu kil-n ellennge? Tibre wahn nehme kor re, wahn wuungu atung go egame alum.

Wahn li abon ba nnehm nyi nso ejahne. Ń kpꞌsebe re wahn toono mbang nyi nso ejahne. Á jolo nwulane go mboma mbomo. Ye, a etingitingi, bo kpehme koono. Etingitingi ajehng ajehng á kpimm. Á lꞌkim efahnge, á kpꞌlimi ana eljini ene li no. Tibre ye nkimfahnge nyi. Afahnge kpee lohng go ege.
“N kpo tong-n etingitingi, owo wahng ka ń kil taame tv-m.
Nne awo go egahne ellong bahk-m tibi ebꞌbi ajehng ajehng ji m ma lim?
Nne no lohng goji Esowo, ye wo kpo wuk alum nya Esowo. Ejum ji wahnge ń kil wuku alum Esowo, li re, ń limm ka Esowo.”
Jus kehm faange Jisos re, “Anv, e lꞌtong-a re, wo nne a Samaria wo, a kpi ebi etohko go ega atahng, etingitingi sang e kpꞌbunga?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Me, ebi etohko ajehng ajehng n kpimm go egame atahng. Esowo bi li Nsoo. Ye wo n kpo kak-e. Wahn, m-e nehme kak.
N nehme seb ellub nꞌname antahng. Nne noa go, no kp-m ellub ka. Ye wo li nlꞌlame.
Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Nne awohng awohng no lꞌbum alum enyame, á nehm kpe tiki kpo.”

Jus kehm-e tongo re, “Anv, wahr eblohko kahn re, a kpi ebi etohko go ega atahng. Tibre Ebraham kpꞌkpo, ano wo fvfo abanyehnamahr Esowo tob kpo, gana a kp-r fere tong re, nne no lꞌbum alum enya, á nehm kpe tiki kpo.
Anv, wo wo ga gbal sehnge Ebraham, nso ejahre no ma kpoa? Abanyehnamahr Esowo fvfo tꞌtob kpo. Anv, a kpꞌtiri re, wo elkohn nne awo?”
Jisos kehm faange re, “N lꞌka elname ellub antahng, ellub ename li mbol mbol. Nsoo wo kpo ka-m ellub, ye ji ń kpꞌtongo re, Esowo ebahne bi.
We ń ka tiki kahn. Me n kp-e kahne. N lꞌtong re, me, we n nehme kahn, n li nkimfahnga nne ana wahn. N kp-e kahne kpee, fere jo bum alum enye.
Ebraham, nso ejahne, eltim jo yeb-e sehng re, afung enyame kpir-e. Á nyꞌnyehn, fere bel eyebatahng.”
Jus kehm-e tongo re, “Jol nnya atahl abal a nnya ewubu a ka kang, gana a kpꞌbungu re, wobnyehn Ebraham!”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Re Ebraham kehm jini, me n noa.”
Owo bo kehm fohko atal re bo tuub-e.
Jisos kehm beke, biiri eje etahk Esowo o, fere lohng eje tahm.
Eji Jisos jo sehng go mbang, á kehm nyehne nne no bo jel-e nwakamahr.
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntꞌtibi, ye wo limi abiafema, afi nde abola nnyehn ba limi abiafem, ji wahng ka bo kehm-e jele ano?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re “Lohngem re abiafem nya nne noa nya, jol nya nde, a nnyehn sang. Jia li, eji ane lꞌnyehn nkpokosi nyi Esowo bahke limi go ege elkpin.
E bahke tiki jo lim eltum ni nne no tum-m no, eji njul kpeke li. Tibre atv bahke behde, ma nnene lꞌkꞌkpe ma lim eltum.
Me wo li ellennge ni njini, eji n kpeke li go njini.”
Á bungu kan ano me, á kehm soro so atel wohngo ndi, nyob ndi, roongo nne noo go amahr,
kehm-e tongo re, “Song, wo song ru esamahr eba go eto ji Siloam!” (ji lohngo re “eltumu”).
Nwakamahr nyio kehm soro tahm, song ru esamahr ebe, soro nyehn, kehm feere ba.
Aneb ebjing ebe, a ane ba jo nyehn-e, eji á jo ji, jo gboongo nsol, kehm kehme elbungu re, “Nne noa sang ana, no kpo kono eljehke, jo gboongo nsola?”
Egom jindiki jo bungu re, “Ye wo ana.” Egom jindiki re, “Ye sang, á kp-e foongo na.”
Yefono antahng kehm kehme elbungu re, “Me wo ana.”
Bo kehme bahbe re, “Anv, á limi renan, amahr enya kehm lennge?”

Á kehm faange re, “Nne no bo kpo lung-e re Jisos, ye wo nyobo ndi, roong-m go amahr, kehm-m tongo re, ‘Song go eto ji Siloam, wo song ru esamahr!’ Owo n kehm lohko tahm, song ru esamahr, lohko nyehn.”
Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, nne noo li gan?”
Á kehm faange re, “Me n nehme kahno!”
Bo kehm soro ko nne noo no tohko wa amahr, tahm a ne goji Bab Farisi.
Efung bi Jisos nyobo edob, fere lim nne noo amahr enye lennge, jolo efung Esabat.
Bab Farisi kehm-e kpe bahb ana limi lim, á kehm nyehne.
Á kehm tongo bo re, “Á roong-m edob go amahr, n kehm song ru esamahr, soro nyehn.”
Egom Farisi jindiki kehm bungu re, “Nne no limi ejum jia, á lohngem goji Esowo, tibre á nehme bum ntahm nyi Esabat.”
Egom jindiki jo bungu re, “Bahke jolo renan re, nne no li nne abiafem, kehm ma lim akpokosi ana nyaa?”
Ane bao kehm kehme elyabe.
Owo bo kehm kpe bahb nwakamahr a nne noo no ma nyehn re, “Anv, a kpo bung renan bada ne, eji á ma-a lim amahr enya ma lennge, a ma nyehn?”
Nne noo kehm faange re, “Nnyehnamahr wo.”
Jus tikem taame re, nne noo lꞌlohko wa amahr, á ma fere nyehn, tete bo lung nde, a nnyehn nne no ma nyehn, bo ba.
Bo kehm bahbe bo re, “Mmon ewahne wo aa, no ń kpo bung re, ń jel-e nwakamahra? Á limi renan, kehm nyehne?”
Nde, a nnyehn kehm faange re, “E kpꞌkahne re, mmon ewahre wo a, no e jel-e nwakamahr.
Ana á ma fere nyehn anv, e nehme kahn ana limi lim, á kehm nyehne. E nehme kahn nne no lenng-e amahr. Bahben ye, yebgbal, á bahke ma faange antahng.”
Nde, a nnyehn bungu alum nyaa, tibre bo jo fahle Jus. Tib Jus bungu bum nnyo amehng re, nne awohng awohng no lꞌsi bꞌbung re, Jisos, Mesaya wo, bo bahk-e kame yehke go ero.
Esi jio ji wahng ka nde, a nnyehn tongo re, “Yebgbal, bahben ye!”
Bab Farisi kehm kpe lung nne noo no bo jel-e nwakamahr, kehm-e tongo re, “Ka Esowo ellub! E kpꞌkahne re, nne noo, nne abiafem wo.”
Á kehm faange re, “Ma nne noo nne abiafem wo nji. Me n nehme kahn. Ejum ajehng ji n kpꞌkahne, li re, n jolo nwakamahr, anv, me n nyehn.”
Bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, á lim-a renan? Á limi renan, kehm lennge amahr enya?”
Á kehm faange bo re, “M ma-n tohko tong wuku wuku, ń wuungem atung. Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌsebe re, me n kpe-n tong, wahn kpe wuk? Anv, ń kpꞌsebe re wahn tob jol abatꞌtoono ebea?”
Bo kehm-e suku re, “Wo wo li ntꞌtoono ewe, go, wahr abatꞌtoono ba Moses ba.
E kpꞌkahne re, Esowo jo bungu a Moses. Nne noo, wahr nehme kahn edi ji á lohng no ba.”
Á kehm kpe faange re, “Anv, ejum jia nkpokosi sanga? Ń nehme kahn edi ji á lohng no, gana yeblennge amahr enyame.
E kpꞌkahne re, Esowo kpehme wuungu aneb abiafem atung. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌkak-e, fere lim mbang enye, ye wo Esowo kpo wuung-e atung.
Bomo go mbomannahb nyi njini bomo no tete rehng anv, nnene limm, no ma wꞌwuk re, nne noa, no ma lꞌlennge amahr nne no bo jel-e nwakamahr.
Li re nne noo lohngem goji Esowo, kehn á jolem ma lim ejumjum.”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Bo jel-a go abiafem, a ejannge, anv, a kpꞌsebe re wo tib-ra?”
Bo kehm soro kam-e yehke go ero bio.
Jisos kehm wuku re, bo m-e kam yehke go ero. Eji á song nyehn-e, á kehme bahbe re, “Wobtaame tv Mmon no nnea?”
Á kehm faange re, “Nsoo, nne awo m bahke taame tv-e?”
Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “A m-e nyehn. Ye wo ana, kpꞌbungu a na.”
Á kehm faange re, “Ntul, me n taame,” fere gbo jamm-e alahng.
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Esi elam jio ji wahnge m ba go njini nyia, eji ane ba kil elnyehne lꞌnyehn, eji ane bao ba kpꞌnyehne lꞌfere wa amahr.”
Egom Farisi jindiki ji jolo kohl-e, kehm wuku, bo kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, wahr tob li awakamahra?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Li re wahn ebwa amahr, kehn ebꞌbi ajehng ajehng a nahne limm. Anv, eji ń kpꞌtongo re, ‘E kpꞌnyehne,’ ebi jia, a nahne.”
Jisos kehm kpe tong bo re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Nne awohng awohng no tohko yel go mbutahk mi etahk ejoro, á lꞌfere wahr edi jindiki yel, nne noo ona nwajv nyi.
Nne no lꞌyel go mbutahk,
Ye wo, nne no kpo baabe mbu bahke lennge ka-e, á yel. Ejoro ebe kpo wuk ellum ene. Á kpo lung ejoro ebe go bo abing, fere lohng a bo.
Á lꞌyehke bo kpee, á kpo fere gbo bo mbang, ejoro jo toon-e go njahm. Tibre bo kpꞌliingi ellum ene.
Njenne, bo we nehm toono. Bo bahk-e beke na, yaam-e sa. Tibre alum ajenne, bo nehme liingi.”
Eji Jisos tubu bo elgan nia, bo kahnem ejum ji á jo tꞌtong bo.
Jisos kehm kpe tong bo re, “Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re,
“Me wo li mbutahk mi ejoro.
Egom jehko kpee ji gbo mbang ba ka me, awajv nya.
Me wo li mbutahk. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌyel go mbutahk mio, á bahke bele eltahre.
Nwajv kpo ba re á ba v, fere wul, fere rꞌrannge. Me m ba re me m ba ka bo elkpin budu sahb gbꞌgbal.
“Me wo li nnooba mbaabebul, nnooba mbaabebul no bahke kake elkpin ene go esi ejoro ebe.
Nne no bo lak-e na, no ki li nfono ejoro, á lꞌnyehn ebi nnyam kpꞌbake, á bahke beke, ejoro bio sa. Ebi nnyam nyio bahke bake, ba bob ejoro bindiki, behko yaame ebo kpee.
Nne noo bahke beke, tibre bo lak-e na, á nehme tiiri ejoro bio.
“Me wo li nnooba mbaabebul. N kpꞌkahne ejoro bꞌbame, ejoro ebame kp-m tob kahn.
Ana Nsoo kp-m kahne, ano wo fvfo n kpꞌtob kahn Nsoo. Me n yake elkpin ename ka go esi ejoro ebame.
N kpi ejoro bindiki, bi ki wob go ellong nia. Bo fvfo, m bahke tob ko bo ba. Bo bahke wuku alum enyame, fere jol ellong anehng, a mbaabebul awohng.
Ana wo wahnge n kpꞌkoro Nsoo, tibre me n yake elkpin ename ka, goji n lꞌfere kpe ko elkpin ename.
“Nnene limm, no bahke ma taare elkpin ename, sehngem re no, n ka na antahng.
Jus kehm kpe kehme elyabe, tib go alum nyao nya Jisos bungu no.
Egom Jus gbalee jo bungu re, “Á kpi ebi etohko go ege atahng. Yebgbo esahl. Jen ji wahnge ń kp-e wuungu atung?”
Egom jindiki jo bungu re, “A alum nya nne no kpi ebi etohko sang. Anv, ebi etohko bahke ma lennge nwakamahr amahra?”
Elkak nio ni elbuumu ni bo kpe lennge etahk Esowo jolo go Jerusalem.
Ngare nyio jolo ngare elkoko. Jisos jo yannge go nlaaga nyi etahk Esowo, edi ji bo jo lung re etahk Solomon.
Jus kehm kame ba rur senng-e kak, kehm-e bahbe re, “Bahke kpe kang renan, a kehm-r tongo? Wahr ga li-r ekpehlekpehle. Joare wo Mesaya wo, lennge tong-r.”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “M ma-n tohko tong, ń nehme taame. Ntum nyi n kpꞌlimi go mbing nyi Nsoo, nyi nyi kpꞌyiimi ntianse ka-m.
Wahn nehme taame, tibre ń wobem go ellong ejoro ebame.
“Ejoro ebame kpo wuk alum enyame. N kpꞌkahne bo, bo kp-m toono.
N kpo ka bo elkpin ni li go njinanjini. Bo nehm tiki kpo tan. Nnene limm, no bahke ma fooro bo go egame abo, tahm a bo.
Nsoo no ka-m bo, gbale sehnge nne awohng awohng. Nnene limm, no bahke ma fooro bo go ebo bi Nsoo.
Wahr awahr a Nsoo, e li ajehng.”
Owo Jus kehm kpe fohko atal re bo tuub-e.
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Me n lim nnoobo gbalee ka-n, nnoobo nyi Nsoo ka-m no re me n lim. Go nsol nyia kpee, ekahmekahme ejum aji wahnge ń kpꞌsebe re, wahn tuub-m atal?”
Jus kehm-e faange re, “E nehme seb re, wahr tuub-a atal tib go nnoobo nyi a kpꞌlimi. E kpꞌsebe re, wahr tuub-a atal tib eji a kpꞌsuku Esowo, eji a kpꞌrodo elna, jo bum ana Esowo, wo ji li na nne.”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Bo nyono go egahne atahm re, ‘Esowo re, wahn li are Esowo bi.’
“E kpꞌkahne re, ji nwer Esowo bungu no, nnene limm, no bahke ma range alum nya Esowo. Esowo kpo lung ane bao ba á ka bo alum enye re, ‘Esowo’,
jen ji wahnge ń kp-m tongo re, n kpꞌsuku Esowo, tib eji n tong-n re, me Mmon Esowo wo, me ji Esowo Nsoo yehke no, fere tum tv go njini nyia?
N tohko lim eltum ni Nsoo, kana taame tv-m!
N lꞌfere lim eltum ni Nsoo, ń tohko taame tv-m, lub taamen tv eltum ni n kpꞌlimi, eji ń lꞌkahn, fere taame re, Nsoo noa, wob-m go atahng, me n tob wob Nsoo go atahng.”
Bo kehm kpe gare re bo bob-e, Jisos kehm weele eje be.
Á kehm feere song siiri Jodan, song kang eje go egbuk jehko, edi jio ji Jon gbo mbang jo wohngo ane alahb.
Ellong ane gbalee kehm bake go ege, kehm ba bung re, “Jol eji Jon ki lꞌlim nkpokosi anyehng anyehng, ejum ajehng ajehng ji á bungu no bada nne noa eblohko jol go etingitingi.”
Ane tvv tꞌtaame tv-e edi jio o.
Nne awohng jolo gona, no bo jo lung-e re Lasaros ji jo yam. Á lene go Betani, ejahbe ji Meri lene no, a Mata mmonannyehn.
Meri jio wo yaange akehng ma nno a nno wohngo Ntul a Jisos, fere ko alv esi enye dohk-e akpade.
Abonanyehn Lasaros bao kehm tiingi etib tv Jisos re, “Ntul, ekpondahme eja ji kpo kor-a sꞌsehng kpꞌyame.”
Eji Jisos wuku no, á kehm bungu re, “Eyam bio, eyam elkv sang, li re Esowo tib ellub ene, eji Mmon Esowo lꞌbel ellub.”
Jisos, Mata jo kor-e sehng, a Meri mmonannyehn, go Lasaros.
Jisos wuku kan re, Lasaros kpꞌyame, á kpe kang nfung ebal edi jio ji á jolo no.
Owo á kehm tongo abatꞌtoono ebe re, “Ba, wahr feeren go Judea!”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm-e tongo re, “Ntꞌtibi, nyanjehle Jus jo sebe re bo tuub-a atal, anv ana, a kpꞌkpeke seb re wo kpe feere goa?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ewubu awa na abal sang li go efung kohro kohra? Nne awohng awohng no lꞌjen ngara njul, á kpehme seele. Tibre á kpꞌnyehne ellennge ni njini nyia.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌjen go ejannge, á kpo sꞌseele. Tibre ellennge go ege atahng limm.”
Ana wo Jisos bungu no, kehm kpe soro asi bung tong bo re, “Lasaros, nte ewahre kpꞌlale. N kpꞌtahme song nyahm-e.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm-e tongo re, “Ntul, lꞌjol re Lasaros kpꞌlale na, eyam ebe bahk-e tele.”
Jisos bungu bade elkv ni Lasaros. Bo jo tiri re, Jisos bungu bade ellu nehka nehka ni nne kpo lal.
Owo Jisos kehm lennge tong bo re, “Lasaros ebkpo.
Esi ejahne ji wahnge eltim kp-m yebe, eji n ki jol ona, eji ń lꞌtaame. Nong, wahr tahmen go!”
Tomos ji bo jo lung-e re Ayafele, kehm tongo abatꞌtoono Jisos bako re, “Nong, wahr tob tahmen toon-e, eji afi jolo elkv, e lꞌtob kpo a ne a ne.”
Eji Jisos ba no, á sebe kahn re, Lasaros, bo m-e kak elahm, ebkang nfung eni.
Tahm go Betani rehng go Jerusalem labem, jolo mmal na ebal.
Jus gbalee ji ba no re bo ba ji, jo kak Mata, a Meri eltim, tib go elkv ni mmonannyehn ebo ma kpo.
Eji Mata wuku re, Jisos kpꞌbake, á kehm tahme song wan-e. Meri ji eje ga etahk.
Mata kehm tongo Jisos re, “Ntul, li re, a jolo jol ana, kehn mmonannee jolem kpoko.
Jol anv, n kpꞌkahne re, ejum ajehng ajehng ji a lꞌbahb Esowo, á bahk-a kake.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Mmonanne bahke nyahme go elkv.”
Mata kehm-e tongo re, “N kpꞌkahne re, á bahke nyahme go elkv go esꞌkohro efung bi ane kpee bahke nyahme.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Me wo li enyahme ngubjing go elkv. Me wo li elkpin. Nne no lꞌtaame tv-m, afi á kpo na, á bahke fere jol go elkpin.
Nne no lꞌjol go elkpin, fere taame tv-m, á nehm kpe tiki kpo ekpokokpoko.
Á kehm-e faange re, “Ee Ntul, me n taame re, wo wo li Kraist ji Mmon no Esowo no bo tong-r re, á kpꞌbake go njini.”
Eji Mata bungu ano mal, á kehm tahme song lung Meri mmonannyehn, kehm-e tongo go awꞌwa re, “Ntꞌtibi ebba, á kp-a lungu.”
Meri wuku kan ano me, á kehm mehle tahm re, á song kpir-e.
Ngare nyio o Jisos ka rehng go ejahbe jio, á kpeke yim go edi ji Mata kpir-e no.
Eji aneb Jus ba ji a Meri go ege etahk, jo kak-e eltim, nyehne re, yebmehl fi, bo kehm tob tahm toon-e. Tibre bo jo tiri re, Meri fi song ling go elahm.
Meri ba kan a, ba rehng edi ji Jisos jolo no, á kehm soro nyehn-e, soro gbo jamm-e alahng, kehm bungu tong-e re, “Ntul, li re, a jolo jol ana, kehn mmonannee jolem kpoko.”
Eji Jisos nyehn-e no, á kpꞌlingi, fere nyehn Jus ji toon-e no ba, kpꞌtob ling, owo ndon kehm-e fili go eltim, fere moong-e go atahng.
Á kehm-e bahbe re, “Gan wo ń kak-e no?” Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Ntul, ba wahr tahm, wo ba nyehn!”
Jisos kehm lingi.
Owo Jus kehm bungu re, “Nyehnen ana á kp-e korae!”
Egom ane bandiki jo bungu re, “Ye sang lennge nwakamahr amahra? Anv, á jolem ma lim nne noa, á kꞌkpoa?”
Jisos, ndon kehme kpe gbal go eltim. Á kehm bake go elahm. Elahm bio o, bo rahme go ekpartal, fere bannge eltal bulu go nnyo elahm.
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Banngen eltal nio, wahn bum go nkpe!”
Mata ji mmonannyehn nkvne kehm-e tongo re, “Ntul, á bahke vohko tꞌtokko sehng, tibre ebkang nfung eni nyi á kpo no.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Wa n tongem re, a lꞌtaame, a bahke nyehne ellub ni Esowoa?”
Owo bo kehm bannge eltal nio bum go nkpe. Jisos kehm kpiidi amahr go ero, kehm bungu re, “Nsoo, m ma-a kak saam, tibre a ma-m wuk.
N kpꞌkahne re, a kpo wuk-m ngare anyehng anyehng. M bungu jia tib go esi ji ane baa ba yim a, eji bo lꞌtaame re, wo wo lohk-m tum.”
Jisos bungu kan ano me, á kehm rabe wahre wahre re, “Lasaros, lohng me!”
Nne no kpo no, kehm soro lohng go elahm, a abomo nya bo kpenng-e no go abo, a akpade akpade. Esamahr ebe, bo tob kpenng-e mbomo.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Fanngen ye, wahn yak-e, á song!”
Jus gbalee ji ba no, ba ji a Meri, fere nyehn ji Jisos limi no, bo soro taame tv-e.
Egom jindiki kehm tahme goji Bab Farisi, song tooro tong bo ana ji Jisos ma lim.
Owo atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi kehm lungu atubesi nfam, bo ba kono edi ajehng. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, e bahke limi renan, tib eji nne noa kpꞌlimi akpokosi gbalee?
E lꞌyak-e, á lꞌsoro asi ana, nne awohng awohng bahke taame tv-e. Aneb Rom bahke bake, ba rannge ejahbe ejahre, fere rannge mbarebare etahk Esowo jia.”
Nne awohng no tob woomo go ellong ane bao, no bo jo lung-e re Kayafas ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom go elya nio, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Ń nehme tohko kꞌkahn ejumjum.
Ń nehme kahn re, nobo re, nne awohng kpo, tib go esi ane kpee, sehnge re ejahbe kohro kohro rannga?”
