Alum nya á bungu no, á bungem go ege a ntir. Tib eji á jolo ntubesi abalimajom, owo wahnge á nyehne amahr nya Esowo re, nobo re Jisos kpo go esi ejahbe kohro kohro.
Lohngem re ejahbe Jus ji ji, fvfo tob li ka abon Esowo ba ma yaame rur go njini, eji bo lꞌfere jol ajehng.
Bomo efung bio asongo, owo bo toobo no ana bo bahk-e wulu.
Owo wahnge Jisos ki kpe jo jen gbul gbul gbuul, jo yannge go Judea. Á jo tahme ona, song rehng go ejahbe ji li kohlo elka emahng, ji bo jo lung re Efraim. Owo á jolo no eje, a abatꞌtoono ebe.
Ngare nyio elkak ni Jus ni Pasova ebkabbe. Ane gbalee jo tahme ajahbe nyako, jo je go Jerusalem, eji bo lꞌsong bum elbo saang, elkak nio kehm rehnge.
Bo jo sebe Jisos. Eji bo song kono asi go etahk Esowo, bo kehm kehme elbahbe atemtem re, “Anv, ń kpꞌtiri renan? Á nehm ba go elkak niaa?”
Ngare nyio nyi atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi kehm tongo re, nne awohng awohng no lꞌkahn edi ji Jisos li no, á ba tong bo, eji bo lꞌje, song bob-e.
Eji ma sa nfung erakera, Pasova rehng, Jisos kehm tahme go Betani, edi ji Lasaros lene no, ji á nyahme go elkv.
Owo bo kehm lame nsol ka-e. Mata wo jo loko bo. Lasaros tꞌtob woomo go ellong ane ba ji ekpꞌkuru nsol alehke a Jisos.
Meri kehm koko egburu elom akehng ji sahb kꞌkim ekun, ba a ji, ba yaange wohngo Jisos go akpade, kehm fere ko alv esi enye, jo dohk-e akpade.
Judas Iskariot ji woomo go ellong abatꞌtoono Jisos, ye jio ji bahk-e gungu, kehm bungu re,
“Jen ji wahnge bo ki gungu akehng maa, ko eltahl a mpon ewubu ka akpak?”
Alum nyaa nya á bungu no, lohngem re á tiiri akpak, lohngo re á tiiri elne. Tibre ye jolo nwajv. Á jolo nne no jo kuuru akpohko, fere jo yehke o, jo kak elne ebo.
Jisos kehm bungu re, “Yaken nnenkal noo! Á kuuru akehng maa sik elkv ename.
Akpak li a nahne ngare anyehng anyehng, wo, me n limm a nahne ngare anyehng anyehng.”
Eji ellong Jus tvv wuku no re, Jisos li o, bo kehm jeke. Bo jeem tib Jisos wo wo. Bo je re, bo tob song nyehn Lasaros ji Jisos nyahm-e go elkv.
Atubesi abalimajom kehm toobo re, bo tob wul Lasaros fvfo.
Tib go ege esi wo wahnge egom Jus gbalee jo yake bo, fere jo taame tv Jisos.
Etoono efung behko ellong ane gbalee ba, ba go elkak kehm wuku re, Jisos kpꞌbake go Jerusalem.
Owo bo kehm jake amang mbohng, tahm a nya re bo song wan-e. Bo kehm kehme elrabe re,
“Tehken Esowo!
Elfuulu li a nne no kpꞌbake go mbing nyi Ntul Esowo.
Elfuulu li a ntul no Israel!”
Jisos nyehne mmombvankang no nse, kehm kuumu, ana bo nyono go nwer Esowo re,
“Ka kpe fahl Jerusalem, mmon a Sayon.
Nyehn, ntul ewa kpꞌbake,
á kun go mmombvankang no nse.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe wakem lennge bo ngare nyio. Eji Jisos ma bel ellub ene, owo bo kehm buumu re, edi nwer Esowo jio ji bo nyono bada Jisos. Eblohko jol ano ka-e.
Ellong ane ba jolo o ngare nyi á lungu Lasaros go elahm, fere nyahm-e go elkv, bo ba yiimi Jisos ntianse.
Owo wahnge ellong ane kame no re bo ba kpiri Jisos, tibre bo wuku re, ye wo ma lim nkpokosi nyio.
Bab Farisi kehm bungu atemtem re, “Ń kpꞌnyehne re, ń nehm ma lim ejumjum. Nyehnen ana njini kpee ma tahm kp-e toono.”
Aneb Grik bandiki woomo go ellong ni ane ba je elkak go Jerusalem re bo song kak Esowo.
Aneb Grik bao kehm bake goji Filip ji lohng go Betsaida ji Galili,
Filip kehm tahme song tong Andru. Andru abola Filip, bo kehm tahme ano, song tong Jisos.
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ngare ebrehng nyi Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e egburu ellub ka.
Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Tohko tiki jol re mmohk eti fooro na gbo go ndi kpo, bahke sake ano ano. Lꞌkpo, bahke kabe akab gbalee.
Nne no elkpin ene lꞌkor-e, á kpꞌtane na elkpin ene. Nne no elkpin ene lꞌsab-e go njini nyia, á kpꞌkuuru na elkpin ene bum go njinanjini.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtong re á kp-m loko, á bahk-m tiki toono. Edi ji n li no, owo nlokeltum ewame bahke tob jol. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌlok-m, á bahke jo lub Nsoo.
“Anv, eltim ename kp-m gbiingi. M bahke bungu renan a? Lꞌli re me m bung re, ‘Nsoo, tahr-m go ngare nyiaa?’ Eꞌee, jꞌnehm ana ji wahnge m ba no re me m ba nyehn erem ngare nyia.
Nsoo, lim, goji mbing enya lꞌbel ellub!”
Bo kehm soro wuk ellum go ejahbetul Esowo ni bungu re, “Me n lim re, mbing enyame bel ellub, m bahke kpe lim, kpe bel ellub.”
Ellong ane ba yiimi kohlo o wꞌwuk ellum nio. Egom jindiki kehm bungu re, ndan ebta. Egom jindiki bungu re, enjel nyi ma bung a ne.
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ellum nia a, ba tib go egahne esi, go egame esi sang wahnge.
Anv wo li ngare nyi njini nyia yim go eti elam. Ngare nyia nyi ntubesi no njini nyia, bo bahk-e kame yake go.
Ngare nyi bo ma-m kum go ejangnti, rod jahm,
Jisos bungu ellum nia, goji á lꞌtib ane elkohn elkv ni á bahke kpoko.

Ellong ane bao kehm-e faange re, “Wahr ebwuk go atahm nya Esowo re, Mesaya bahke jolo go njinanjini. Jen ji wahnge a kehm bungu re, Mmon no nne, bo bahk-e kumu go ejangnti, rod jahm? Nne awo li Mmon no nne?”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Ellennge nia, li a nahne mmongare ntiil. Jo jenen, eji ellennge kpeke li, goji ejannge lꞌki-n kpiri. Nne no kpꞌjene go ejannge, á kpehme kahn edi ji á fi fi.
Eji ellennge nia, kpeke li a nahne, taamen tv ellennge nia, eji ń lꞌjol abon ba ellennge.”
Jisos bungu kan a mal, á kehm tahme song seb edi biiri, eji bo lꞌki-e nyehn.
Jus tikem taame tv Jisos, jol eji á jo lꞌlim akpokosi gbalee, tib bo.
Jia jolo, tib goji ellum ni nnyehnamahr Aisaya bungu no lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi, ni á bungu re,
“Ntul, nne awo ma taame tv etib ebahre?
Nne awo no Ntul Esowo m-e tib nsahm enye?”
Tib go esi alum nyao, bo tikem ma taame. Tibre Aisaya kpe bung re,
“Esowo ebwa bo amahr,
fere lim asi ebo tahne.
Ki li ano, kehn bo kpꞌnyehne go bo amahr,
fere kahn go bo a ntim, fere sennge,
feere go egame, eji n lꞌlim bo,
bo nob.”
Aisaya bungu alum nyaa, tibre á nyehne ellub ni Mesaya, fere bung bada ne.
Tvtv o, atubesi Jus gbalee tꞌtaame tv Jisos. Tib eji bo jo fahl Bab Farisi, bo joom bung gbul gbul gbuul, eji bo lꞌkꞌkam bo yehke go ero.
Tibre ellub ni bo kpo ko goji atem, ni ni jo ga kor bo, sehnge ellub ni Esowo.
Jisos kehm kehme elbungu wahre wahre re, “Nne no lꞌtaame tv-m, á taamem tv me me, á tob taame tv nne no tum-m no.
Nne no lꞌnyehn-m, yebnyehn nne no tum-m no.
M ba go njini nyia ba jol ellennge, eji nne awohng awohng no lꞌtaame tv-m, á lꞌkꞌkpe sa go ejannge.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌwuk alum enyame, kꞌfere bum alum nyao, we n nehm lam. Tibre m baam re me m ba lam njini nyia. M ba na re me m ba tahre njini nyia.
“Nne no lꞌten-m, kꞌko alum enyame, ye wo elam nong kp-e siki. Alum nya m ma bung a, nyanehm nya bahk-e lame go esꞌkohro efung.
Tibre alum nya m bungu no, nyanyame sang. Nsoo no tum-m no, ye wo tong-m ji m bahke bungu, fere tib.
N kpꞌkahne re, alum enye kpo ka elkpin ni li go njinanjini.

Ngare nyio ebsa efung abehng elkak Pasova rehng. Jisos kꞌkahn re, ngare ebbiingi nyi á bahke tahme njini nyia song rehng goji Nde. Ane ba jolo ane ebe go njini nyia, jo kor-e sꞌsehng. Bo jo kor-e tete rehng go esꞌkohro.
Eji Jisos, a abatꞌtoono ebe jo li nsol, ngare nyio nnehm ebkak Judas Iskariot ji mmon a Saimon ntir go ege eltim re á gungu Jisos.
Jisos kꞌkahn re, Nde m-e kak nsol kpee go ebo. Á jo tob kahne re, á lohng goji Esowo ba, á bahke kpe feere goji Esowo.
Jisos kehm mehle go ekpꞌkuru nsol alehke yiimi, kehm soro fannge mbomo eme, fere rod ntawehre bobo.
Á kehm yaange alahb kak ngbanggbang, jo ru abatꞌtoono ebe akpade, fere jo dohk bo go ntawehre nyi á bobo go ebun.
Á kehm bake goji Saimon Pita. Saimon Pita kehm-e tongo re, “Ntul, anv, a yahk-m ru akpada?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ji n kpꞌlimi a, a nehme kahn anv, behnjehle go wo bahk-a lennge.”
Pita kehm-e tongo re, “A nehm tiki ru akpade enyame!”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “N tohk-a ru, lohngo re, wo nne ewame sang.”
Saimon Pita kehm-e faange re, “Ntul, akpade enyame nya nya sang, a bahk-m ruku. Fvfo, a bahk-m tob ru abo enyame, a esi.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nne no ma wuumu alahb, kpeem li re á kpe ru akidi, tibre yebbar kpee,
Tibre Jisos jo kꞌkahn nne no bahk-e gungu. Owo wahnge á bungu no re, “Wahn ane kpee sang ma bar.”
Á ru kan bo akpade mal, á kehm rodo mbomo eme bobo, feere song ji go ege a nji, kehm bahbe bo re, “Ń kpꞌkahne ji n lim-n aa?
Ń kpo lung-m re ntꞌtibi, fere lung-m re Ntul. Kpꞌnobo, eji ń kpo lung-m ano. Tibre ano wo n lohko li.
Me wo li ntul ewahne, a ntꞌtibi ewahne. M ma-n ru akpade enyahne. Nobo re wahn fvfo, wahn tob jo ru atemtem akpade.
M ma-n tib ntugare, eji wahn fvfo ń lꞌtob lim ana m ma lim ka-n.
Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Nlokeltum kpehme gbal sehnge nde no á kp-e loko. Ntiingetib awohng awohng limm, no kpo gbal sehnge nde no tum-e no.
Eji ń kpꞌkahne nsol nyia, ń lꞌlim, elfuulu bahke jolo ka-n.
“N nehme bung bade wahn ane kpee. N kpꞌkahne bao ba m ma yehke. Bahke tiki jol go etingitingi ana nwer Esowo bungu no re, ‘Nne no jo li nsol alehke enyame, ye wo jolo nne no ma lam kak-m.’
N kp-n tongo anv ana re kehm limi, eji lꞌlim, ń lꞌtaame re, me nne noo wo.
Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Nne awohng awohng no lꞌko nne no n tum-e no, á ko me. Nne no lꞌko-m, á tob ko nne no tum-m no.”
Jisos bungu kan ano mal, ndon kehm-e gbale go ege atahng. Á kehm kehme elbungu gbul gbul gbuul re, “Etingitingi, n kp-n tongo re, Nne awohng go egahne ellong bahk-m gungu.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm kehme elkeebe, seenge atemtem. Bo joom kahn nne no á jo bꞌbung bada ne.
Ntꞌtoono awohng no Jisos jo kor-e sꞌsehng ji kohlo Jisos.
Saimon Pita kehm-e faake ebo, kehm bungu re, “Tong-r nne no á kpꞌbung bada ne.”
Owo ntꞌtoono noo kehm jeere kohlo Jisos, kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntul, nne awo me?”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Ye ji m bahk-e kake ejum alehke jia ji m bahke tohko go abehne wo.”
Jisos kehm rodo ejum alehke jio, tv abehne, kehm faake ka Judas ji mmon a Saimon Iskariot.
Eji Jisos ma lim ano, nnehm kehm soro yel Judas.
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ejum ji a fi ellimi, song lim elwaare.”
Nnene jolem no ji ekpꞌkuru jio, no kahne ji wahnge Jisos bung ano.

Egom jindiki jo tiri re, eji Judas jo kuuru akpohko, owo wahnge Jisos tong-e no re, á song gunu nsol nyi bo bahke lehke go elkak nio. Egom jindiki tiri re, “Fundiki Jisos tong-e re, á yehke apene song ka akpak.”
Eji Judas ma taare ejum alehke jio, á kehm soro lohng tvtv tahm. Ngare nyio atv ebbehde.
Eji Judas ma lohng fi, Jisos kehm bungu re, “Anv wo, Mmon no nne ma bel ellub ene. Eji á ma bel ellub, owo Esowo ma tob bel ellub.
Esowo lꞌbel ellub ni Mmon ewe, á bahke kpe feere a ni, ka Mmon ewe. Á bahke limi ano elwaare.
Abon ebame wahn, m bahke gohro jol a nahne mmongare ntiil. Ḿ bahk-m sebe. Ana m bungu tong Jus, ano wo n kp-n tob tong re, Edi ji n fi no, ń nehm ma ba.
N kpꞌjehke ntahm nyi nfenfe ka-n anv re, wahn bel elkoro atemtem. Ana ń kp-m koro, nobo re wahn tob bel elkoro atemtem.
Ń lꞌbel elkoro atemtem, owo ane kpee bahke kahne re, wahn lohko li abatꞌtoono ebame.”
Saimon Pita kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Ntul, gan wo a kpꞌtahme?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Edi ji n fi no, me a nehm ma toono anv. Ngare esꞌsong wo, a bahk-m toono rehng edi jio.”
Pita kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntul, jen ji wahnge n lꞌki-a ma toono anv? Me n taame re, m bahke kake elkpin ename, kpo go ega esi.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Anv, a bahke taame, yake elkpin ena ka go egame esia? Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-a re, a bahke gbaame nkpel era re, me, m-e a nehme kahn, nkok kehm kuku.
“Kana jo taame re, ntim enyahne jo gbiing-n! Taamen tv Esowo, wahn tob taame tv me!
Go etahk Nsoo akimi nyaa tvv. Tibre n fi song toobo edi bum-n. Ki li ano, kehn wahn n jolem tongo.
N lꞌje song toobo edi jio bum-n, wo m bahke kpe feere ba, ba ko-n tahm a nahne go edi ji n li no, eji ń lꞌtob jol go edi jio ji n li no.
Anv, wahn ebkahn mbang nyi ḿ bahke sehnge rehng go edi ji n fi no.”
Tomos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Ntul, e nehme kahn edi ji a fi no. E bahke limi renan, kehm kahne mbang?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Me wo li mbang, me wo li etingitingi, me wo li elkpin. Nnene limm, no bahke sehnge rehng goji Nsoo, tohko tiki jol re á sehnge go egame.
Li re ń kp-m kahne, kehn ń kpꞌtob kahn Nsoo. Bomo anv asongo ń kp-e kahne, tibre ḿ m-e nyehn.”
Filip kehm bungu tong Jisos re, “Ntul, tib-r Esowo Nsoo. Ejum jia ji e kpꞌsebe.”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Filip, me n jol a nahne afung tvv. Me a nehme tiki kahna? Nne no lꞌnyehn-m, yebnyehn Esowo Nsoo. Jen ji wahnge a bahke kpe bung re, ‘Tib-r Esowo Nsoo?’
A nehme taame re, me n wob Nsoo go atahng, Nsoo tob wob-m go atahnga? Alum nya n kpꞌbungu tong-n, nyanyame sang. Nsoo no wob-m go atahng, ye wo n kpi eltum ene lim.
Taamen tv-m re me n wob Nsoo go atahng, Nsoo tob wob-m go atahng. Tohko jol ano, lub taamen tib go eltum ename ni n kpꞌlimi.
“Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Nne no lꞌtaame tv-m, á bahke tob lim eltum ni n kpꞌlimi. Jol á bahke limi na eltum ni gbale gbal sehng eltum ni n kpꞌlimi.
Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌbahb go egama mbing, m bahke limi ka-n, eji Mmon lꞌtib ellub ni Nde.
Ejum ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌbahb go egama mbing, m bahke limi ka-n.
“N lꞌkor-n, ḿ bahke bumu atahm enyame.
M bahke gboongo Nsoo, á fere tum nkakebo noko tv-n, eji á lꞌba jol a nahne go njinanjini.
Nne noo, Etingi Etohko ji, ji njini lꞌkꞌma bel. Tibre njini we nehme nyehn, jol bo we nehme kahn. Wahn ba kp-e kahne. Tibre á bahke jolo a nahne, fere woom-n go egahne atahng.
“Wahn n nehm yake abo, ń jol ana abon akubin. M bahke kpe feere ba go egahne.
Mmongare ntiil, njini nyia me nehm kpe nyehn. Wahn bahk-m jo nyꞌnyehn. Tib eji me n li go elkpin, owo wahnge ḿ bahke tob jol go elkpin.
Efung bio bi ḿ bahke kahne re, me n wob Nsoo go atahng, wahn wob-m go atahng, me n tob wob-n go atahng.
“Nne no lꞌwuk atahm enyame, fere bum, ye wo li nne no n kp-e koro. Nne no, me n lꞌkor-e, á bahke tob kor Nsoo. Me fvfo, á bahk-m tob kor, n fere lennge elname ka-e.”
Judas jehko ji mmon a Jems kehm-e bahbe re, “Ntul, bahke jolo renan re wo lennge elna ka-r, kꞌtob lennge elna ka njini?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Nne no, me n lꞌkor-e, á bahke bumu alum enyame. Á bahke koro Nsoo. Me, a Nsoo, e bahke bake, ba lene tob-e go ege atahng.
Nne no, me n tohk-e kor, á nehm jo bum alum enyame. Alum nya ḿ ma wuk, alum nyanyame sang, nya Nsoo no tum-m no nya.
“Nsol nyia a, n kpꞌbungu a nahne, eji n kpeke li a nahne.
Nkakebo no Nsoo bahke tumu go egama mbing, no li Etingi Etohko, á bahk-n tibi nsol kpee, fere buum-n nsol kpee nyi m ma-n tohko tong.
N kpꞌtahme elkoono sa-n. Elkoono nꞌname ni m bahk-n kake.
“Ń wꞌwuk, eji n tong-n no re, ‘M bahke tahme, kehm kpe feere ba go egahne.’ Li re n kp-n koro, kehn ń jol bele eyebatahng. Tibre n kpꞌtahme goji Nsoo. Nsoo wo ga gbal sehnge me.
Anv, m ma-n tohko tong, ngare nyio kehm rehnge, eji lꞌkehme ellimi, ń lꞌtaame.
N nehm kpe ga bung a nahne gbalee. Tibre ntubesi no njini nyia kpꞌbake. Jol we n wobem go elwo.
N kpo lim ana Nsoo tong-m no, eji njini nyia lꞌkahn re, Nsoo kpo kor-m sehng. Tahmen, wahr tahm edi jia!
“Me wo li etingitingi evain. Nsoo wo li nne no kpo lim eltum go etahngga, jo kuuru nti enye.
Mbꞌbo eti anyehng anyehng nyi tohko kab akab, á gbahk tub go. Mbꞌbo eti anyehng anyehng nyi lꞌkab akab, á kpo tele na sere, eji lꞌkpe kab akab gbalee budu.
Wahn ebsi bꞌbar tib go alum nya m ma bung tong-n.
Jolen a name, m bahke tob jol a nahne. Ana mbo eti lꞌkꞌma kab akab antahng, tohko tiki jol re á laake go ekꞌkv eti, ano wo tob li ka-n fvfo re, ń nehm ma kab akab, tohko tiki jol re ń laake me.
“Me wo li ekꞌkv eti, wahn ba li abꞌbo eti. Nne no lꞌya laak-m, ye wo m bahke tob laak-e, á bahke kabe akab gbalee. Tib tohko tiki jol re, ń ya laake me, ń nehm ma lim ejumjum.
Nne no tohko ya laake me, bo bahk-e kimi tub go ana mbꞌbo eti. Á bahke wuudu sa o kpo. Abꞌbo nyao, bo bahke kpuku na luk edi ajehng, jahm agun.
Ń lꞌya laak-m, alum enyame tob jol a nahne, bahben ajehng ajehng ji ń kpꞌsebe, ḿ bahke bele.
Ana wo Nsoo bahke jo bel ellub, ń lꞌjo kab akab.
Ana n kpꞌkoro Nsoo, ano wo wahn kp-m tob kor. Jolen go egame elkoro!
Ń lꞌbum atahm enyame, ḿ bahke jolo go egame elkoro, jang jang ana m ma bum atahm nya Nsoo, fere jol go ege elkoro.
M ma-n tong nsol nyia ana, goji eyebatahng ejame lꞌjol a nahne, fere rur go egahna ntim.
“A wo li ntahm enyame, nyi li re, wahn bel elkoro atemtem, ana ń kp-m koro.
Elkoro anehng anehng limm, ni nne bahke ma bel, ni biingi a nia ni li re, nne yake elkpin ene ka go esi atem.
Wahn ate ebame ba, ń lꞌlim ji n tong-n no.
“Wahn n nehme kpe lung re alokeltum nkpel anyehng anyehng. Tibre nlokeltum kpehme kahn ji nde kpꞌlimi. M ma-n lung re ate ebame. Tibre nsol kpee nyi n wuku goji Nsoo, me n lennge kpee ka-n.
Wahn sang yehke me, me wo yehk-n na re wahn song kab akab, akab enyahne jol kꞌbol. Owo bahke wahnge ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌbahb Nsoo go egama mbing, á bahk-n kake.
Ji n kp-n tongo li re, wahn bel elkoro atemtem.
“Njini nyia lꞌko-n ekv, nobo re wahn kahn re, bo gbo mbang ko me ekv, kehm tob ko-n ekv.
Li re ń wob go njini nyia, kehn ḿ bahke jo kor njini nyia, are wahn ane ebe ba.

“Jo buumen ellum ni m bungu tong-n re, ‘Nlokeltum kpehme gbal sehnge nde.’ Ana bo jo gbak-m, ano wo fvfo bo bahke tob jo gbak-n. Ana bo jo bum alum enyame, ano wo fvfo bo bahke tob jo bum alum enyahne.
Bo bahk-n limi nsol nyia kpee tib go egame esi. Tibre bo nehme kahn nne no tum-m no.
“Ki li re m ba, ba bung a bo, kehn bo jolem lehke ebi go bo abiafem. Wo anv, aneb abiafem bao, ejum ellaange kunu ajehng ajehng bo kpeem kpi.
Nne no lꞌko-m ekv, á tob ko Nsoo ekv.
“Li re n limem akpokosi nyao go bo ellong, nya nne awohng awohng kala lꞌlim, kehn bo jolem lehke ebi go bo abiafem.
Jia li, eji ellum ni bo nyono go bo atahm lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi, ni li re, ‘Bo ko-m ekv, eji n ki lim ejumjum.’
“Nkakebo no li a Nsoo lꞌba, no m bahk-e tumu tv-n, ye ji li Etingi Etohko ji lohng goji Nsoo, á bahke jo yiimi ntianse ka-m.
Wahn fvfo, wahn tob li atianse enyame, tibre ń jolo a name, go mbomannahb.
N tong-n alum nyaa, eji ń lꞌkꞌgbo.
Tibre bo bahke jo kam-n yehke go ero. Etingitingi, ngare kpꞌbake nyi nne awohng awohng no lꞌwul-n, á bahke tiri re, á kpi Esowo loko.
Bo bahke jo lim ana, tibre bo me nehme kahn, jol Nsoo bo we nehme kahn.
M ma-n tong nsol nyia re, eji ngare nyio lꞌbiingi nyi bo bahke limi ano, ń lꞌbuumu nsol nyi n tong-n no bada bo. Wahn n tongem nsol nyia go mbomannahb, tibre n jolo a nahne.
“Anv, n kpꞌtahme goji nne no tum-m no. Nne ewahne awohng awohng limm, no kp-m bahbe re, ‘Gan wo a kpꞌtahme?’
Alum nya m ma-n tong nya wahnge ndon ma-n jol go atahng gbalee.
N kp-n tongo etingitingi re, bahke nobo a nahne sehng, n lꞌtahm. N tohko tahm, Nkakebo nehm ba. N lꞌtahm, m bahk-e tumu tv-n.
“Á lꞌba, á bahke ba lennge ane ba li njini nyia bade ana abiafem li no, fere lennge bo bade ana eno alehke li no, go elam ji Esowo ji kpꞌbake.
Abiafem nyao nya li nya bo kil taame tv-m.
Eno alehke jio, jꞌjame ji. Tibre n kpꞌtahme goji Nsoo, bo me nehm kpe tiki nyehn.
Elam jio ji li elam ji bo ma lam ntubesi no njini nyia.
“N kpe kpi nsol tvv nyi n jol kpe bung a nahne. Anv, ngare nyia, kpꞌriidi re wahn kehm kahne.

“Etingi Etohko jio lꞌba, á bahke jo tib-n mbang anyehng anyehng nyi etingitingi. Tibre á nehm jo bung alum nyanye go ege a nsahm. Ajehng ajehng ji á wuku no, jꞌnehm ji á bahke bungu. Á bahk-n lennge nsol nyi kpꞌbake go esꞌsong.
Á bahke me ellub ka. Á bahke koko nsol nyꞌnyame, ba lennge ka-n.
“Ejum ajehng ajehng ji Nsoo kpi no, tob li jꞌjame. Ana wo wahnge n tong-n re, á bahke koko jꞌjame, ba lennge ka-n.
“Mmongare ntiil me ń nehm kpe nyehn. Lꞌkpe kang mmongare noko, ḿ bahk-m kpe nyehn.”

Abatꞌtoono ebe bandiki kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, alum nyaa lohngo renan, nya á kp-r tongo a re, ‘Mmongare ntiil me ń nehm kpe nyehn, lꞌkpe kang mmongare noko, ḿ bahk-m kpe nyehn,’ a ellum nehko ni kpe li re, ‘Tibre n kpꞌtahme goji Nsoo?’ ”
Bo kehm bahbe re, “Anv, ‘mmongare ntiil’ lohngo renan? E nehme kahn ji á kpꞌsebe re á bung tong-r.”

Jisos kꞌkahn re, bo kpꞌsebe re bo bahb-e. Owo á kehm tongo bo re, “M bungu re, ‘Mmongare ntiil me ń nehm kpe nyehn. Lꞌkang mmongare noko, ḿ bahk-m kpe nyehn.’ Ellum nia ni, ń kpꞌbahbe atemtem ana lohngo noa?
Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Ḿ bahke lingi, fere jo ka agohrobi, gana njini bahke jo bel na eyebatahng. Ḿ bahke jo ji ndon ndon, ndon enyahne bahke fere siingi eyebatahng ka-n.
Eji nnenkal yahke jel, á kpo nyehn erem, tibre ngare erem enye ebrehng, ngare nyi á ma jel mmon, á nehm kpe tiki buumu erem bi á nyehne no, tib go eyebatahng ji á ma jel mmon kak go njini nyia.
Mbang nyꞌnehm nyi, ń li go ndon anv, ḿ bahk-m kpe nyehn. Ngare nyio ntim enyahne bahke gbale go eyebatahng.
Efung bio me ń nehm kpe jo bahb ejumjum. Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-n re, Ajehng ajehng ji ń lꞌbahb Nsoo, á bahk-n kake tib go egama mbing.
Jol tete sik anv, ń ka tiki bahb ejumjum go egama mbing. Bahben, ḿ bahke bele, goji eyebatahng ejahne lꞌkpe gbal go egahne atahng.
“Alum nya m bungu tong-n, m bungu go ngaane. Ngare kpꞌbake nyi n lꞌkꞌkpe bung a nahne go ngaane. M bahke jo bung gbuul tong-n bada Nsoo.
Afung nyao lꞌbiingi, ḿ bahke jo bahb Nsoo go egama mbing. Wahn n nehme tong re, m bahke jo bahb Nsoo ka-n.
Tibre yefono Nsoo, wahn kp-e koro, tib eji me n kp-n koro, ḿ ma fere taame re, n lohng goji Nsoo ba.
N lohng goji Nsoo ba go njini nyia. Anv, n kpꞌtahme njini nyia, feere goji Nsoo.”
Abatꞌtoono ebe kehm-e tongo re, “Anv, a kpꞌbungu gbuul tong-r, go ngaane sang.
Anv, wahr ebkahn re, a kpꞌkahne ejum ajehng ajehng. Kpeem fuumu re, nne awohng awohng bahb-a mbahbe. Owo wahng ka e ma taame re, a lohko lohng goji Esowo ba.”
Jisos kehm faange bo re, “Anv wo, ḿ ma kehm rahng taama?
Ngare kpꞌbake nyi nne awohng awohng ewahne bahk-m yaame sa, tahm go ege ejahbe.
M bungu alum nyaa tong-n, eji ń lꞌbel elkoono tib go egame esi. Go njini nyia ḿ bahke jo bel afemfem. Kana jo tiiri, me n ga njini nyia.”
Eji Jisos ma bung alum nyao kpee mal, á kehm kpiidi amahr enye go ero, kehm kehme ero kak re, “Nsoo, ngare ebbiingi. Ka mmon ewa ellub, eji mmon ewa lꞌtob ka-a ellub.
Tibre wobyake ane kpee kak go ege elwo, eji á lꞌka ane ba a yehke no ka-e elkpin ni li go njinanjini.
“Elkpin ni li go njinanjini ni li elkahne ni ane ma-a kahn, fere kahn re, wo ntahngtahng wo li etingitingi Esowo, tob kahn Jisos Kraist ji a tum-e no.
Eji n jolo go njini, n jo ka-a ellub. Me n lim eltum ni a ka-m no mal.
Nsoo, ka-m ellub anv go ega esamahr, ellub ni m bele go ega ngare nyi njini kala jol.
“Me n lennge mbing enya tong ane ba a yehke no go njini nyia ka-m. Bo jolo ane eba, ba a yehke no ka-m. Boblohko bum alum enya.
Anv, bo kpꞌkahne re, ajehng ajehng ji a ka-m no lohng go ega.
Tibre me m bung alum enya tong bo, nya a tong-m no. Bobtaame tv alum nyao, fere kahn go etingitingi re, me n lohng go ega ba. Boblohko taame re, wo wo tum-m no.
N kpꞌkake ero ka bo. N nehme kak ero ka njini nyia a. N kpꞌkake ero ka bao ba a ka-m no. Tibre bo ane eba ba.
Ejum ajehng ajehng ji n kpi no, jꞌja ji. Ajehng ajehng ji a kpi no, jꞌjame ji. Bo ba kpꞌtibi ellub ename.
Anv, n kpeem li go njini, bo ba kpeke li go njini. N kpꞌbake go ega. Mbarebara Nsoo, jo fili bao ba a ka-m no go nsahm nyi li go ega mbing, eji bo lꞌjol ajehng ana wahr li ajehng.

Eji n jolo a bao ba a ka-m no, n jo fili bo go ega mbing, fere jo baabe bo. Nne awohng awohng limm, no ma tan, sehngem nne no tiki jol re á tan, ye wo ma tan, eji nwer Esowo lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi.
“Anv, n kpꞌbake go ega. Alum nya n kpꞌbungu ga njini nyia li, eji eyebatahng ejame lꞌgbal go bo atahng.
Me m bung alum enya tong bo. Njini ebko bo ekv, tibre bo wobem go njini nyia, jang jang ana me n ki tob wob go njini nyia.
N nehme kak ero re, wo yehke bo go njini nyia. N kpꞌkake ero re, wo baabe bo nob nob, eji abꞌbi lꞌkꞌyel go bo atahng.
Bo wobem go njini, ana mefono antahng ki tob wob go njini.
“Ko etingitingi, wo yehke bo, bo jol ebo ebo. Alum enya, etingitingi ji.
Ana a tum-m no tv go njini nyia, ano wo fvfo m ma tob tum bo tv go njini.
Tib go bo esi wo wahnge, n kpꞌrodo elname ka, eji bofono antahng lꞌjol ebo ebo, fere sa go etingitingi.
“N kpꞌkake ero ka bo, fere tob kak ero ka ane bako fvfo, bao ba bahke tob taame tv-m tib go bo alum.
Nsoo, n kpꞌkake ero re bo jol ajehng, bo ane kpee, ana a wob-m go atahng, me n tob wob-a go atahng, eji bo kpe lꞌtob woom-r go atahng, eji lꞌtoono o, njini nyia tob taame re, wo wo tum-m no.
Ellub ni a ma-m ka, me n faake a ni ka bo, eji bo lꞌjol ajehng ana wahr li ajehng,
m bahke woomo go bo atahng ana wo wob-m go atahng, eji bo lꞌlohko jol na ajehng ana jꞌjehng. Ano wo bahke wahnge njini kahn re, wo li nne no tum-m no, fere kahn re, bo kp-a koro ana n kp-a koro.
“Nsoo, n kpꞌsebe re, ane ba a ka-m no jol a name edi ji n li no, eji bo lꞌnyehn ellub ni a ma-m ka, tib go ega elkoro ni n kor-a no ngare nyi njini kala jol.
Nnobonoba nsoo, njini nyia ana wa ka kahn. Wo, me n kp-a kahne. Ane baa ana kpꞌkahne re, wo wo tum-m no.
Me n lennge mbing enya ka bo. M bahke soro asi, jo lim ano ano, eji elkoro ni n kp-a koro lꞌwoomo go bo atahng, me n fere tob woomo go bo atahng.”
Eji Jisos ma kak ero mal, á kehm tahme, a abatꞌtoono ebe, song siiri ebgba bi bo jo lung re Kidron. Etahngga jolo ona edi jio. Jisos kehm yele ona, a abatꞌtoono ebe.
Judas ji gungu Jisos jo tob kahn edi jio. Tibre Jisos, bo jo kono eljeke ona song kono, a abatꞌtoono ebe.

Judas kehm song kpiri atubesi abalimajom, a Bab Farisi. Bo kehm-e kake nsoja, a egom ane bandiki ba kpo baabe etahk Esowo. Bo fili atꞌrekahng, fili nrꞌrare nyi bo bunu no, jo ko nyaale agun, fere fili nsol ebta, tahm a nyi edi jio o.
Jisos kꞌkahn nsol kpee nyi bahk-e limi. Á kehm jeere song kpiri bo, kehm bahbe bo re, “Nne awo ń kp-e sebe?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Jisos ji Nasaret wo.”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Me wo a.”
Judas ji gung-e no, tob yiimi o go bo ellong.
Eji Jisos tongo bo re, “Me wo a,” bo kehm feere njahm njahm, song gbo go ndi.
Á kehm kpe bahb bo re, “Nne awo ń kp-e sebe?” Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Jisos ji Nasaret wo.”
Jisos kehm kpe faange bo re, “N tong-n re, ‘Me wo ana.’ Joare me wo ń kp-m sebe, yaken ane baa, bo song.”
Á bungu ellum nia, eji lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi, ana á tohko bung re, “Ane ba a ka-m no, nne awohng awohng limm, no ma tan.”
Saimon Pita bele ekahngkahng ona, á kehm wobo go mbak, kpale nju nyi ntubesi abalimajom etung eboblum. Nju nyio, bo jo lung-e re Malkus.
Jisos kehm tongo Pita re, “Feere ekahngkahng eba, wo kak go mbak. Anv, me n kꞌwo go nkob erem nyi Nsoo ka-m noa?”
Ntubesi a nsoja, a nsoja enye nyio, a egom ane ba jo baabe etahk Esowo kehm ba bob Jisos, fere gba-e alehke.
Bo tohko gbo mbang ko-e tahm a ne goji Annas ji jolo nde nkal a Kayafas, Kayafas ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom go elya nio.
Kayafas wo jolo nne no tubu Jus elle re, “Nobo re nne awohng kpo go esi ane kpee.”
Saimon Pita, a ntꞌtoono Jisos noko, bo kehm kehme Jisos toono. Ntꞌtoono Jisos noko kehm song yange go nlaaga nyi ntubesi abalimajom, tibre ntubesi abalimajom noo jo kahn-e kpee.
Pita ji gana kohlo mbuga. Ntꞌtoono Jisos noko no ntubesi abalimajom jo kahn-e, kehm lohngo song tong nnenkal no jo baabe mbuga re á nongo Pita yange.
Nnenkal noo no jo baabe mbuga kehm bahbe Pita re, “Anv, wo ntꞌtoono a nne noo sanga?”
Pita kehm faange re, “Ee, me ntꞌtoono ewe sang.”
Ngare nyio ona alohk jo fꞌfili. Owo alokeltum bao, a abꞌbaabe edi kehm kono agun go akal nsehng. Bo kehm yiimi sennge agun nyao kak, jo wooro. Pita yiimi go bo ellong o, tob jo wooro.
Ntubesi abalimajom jo bahbe Jisos bade abatꞌtoono ebe, fere bahb-e bade eltibi ene.

Jisos kehm-e faange re, “N jo bungu gbul gbul gbuul tong nne awohng awohng. Ngare anyehng anyehng n jo tibi eltibi ename go ntahk ero, fere jo tib go etahk Esowo, edi ji Jus kpee jo ba kono. Ejumjum limm, ji n jo bung mbehr mbehr.
Jen ji wahnge a kp-m abahbe bahb? Bahb ane ba wuku nsol nyi m bungu no. Bo kpꞌkahne nsol nyi m bungu no.”
Eji Jisos bung ano, owo mbꞌbaabe awohng no yiimi kohl-e kehm-e rumu elkpal, kehm-e tongo re, “Jen ji wahnge a kehm faange ntubesi abalimajom elkohn nfaange ana nyia?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Joare me n soodo, eji m bungu a, lennge tong nne awohng awohng ji n soodo no. Joare ellum ni m bungu no, m bungu go etingitingi, jen ji wahnge a kehm-m rumu elkpal?”
Owo Annas kehm tumu Jisos, a alehke alehke nya bo gba-e no tv goji Kayafas ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom.
Eji Saimon Pita kpeke yim, kpi agun wooro, bo kehm-e kpe bahb re, “Wo ntꞌtoono a nne noo sanga?”
Pita kehm kpe gbaame re, “Ee, me ntꞌtoono ewe sang.”
Nlokeltum a Ntubesi abalimajom awohng no jolo mmonannyehn nne no Pita kpal-e etung, kehm bahbe Pita re, “Wo sang n nyehn-a no go etahngga, a nne nooa?”
Pita kehm kpe gbaame. Nkok kehm soro kuk tvtv.

Efungfu atv atv bo kehm koko Jisos go etahk Kayafas, tahm a ne go etahk ntubesi ejahbe. Jus joom yel go ekpꞌkpa ntubesi, tibre bofono antahng jo sebe re bo bum elbo saang, eji bo lꞌmal li elkak Pasova.
Owo Pailet kehm lohngo go elatahk, ba kpiri bo, kehm ba bahb bo re, “Ejum aji wahnge wahng ń kpi nne noa ebi ka?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Li re nne noa ebi nne sang, kehn we e jolem koko ba a ne.”
Pailet kehm tongo bo re, “Koon ye, wahn lam-e ana atahm enyahne bungu no.”
Jus kehm-e faange re, “Bo nehm taame re, wahr wul nne.”
Jia limi, eji ebung ji Jisos bungu no lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi, ana á bungu no bade elkohn elkv ni á bahke kpoko.
Pailet kehm feere song yel go ege ekpꞌkpa, kehm lungu Jisos, kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, wo wo li ntul no Jusa?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Anv, mbahbe nyia a tiri antahnga, afi ane bandiki ba tong-a bada name?”
Pailet kehm bungu re, “Anv, me nne a Jus woa? Ane eba, a atubesi abalimajom, bo ba yak-a no ka-m. Anv, a limi jen?”
Jisos kehm faange re, “Me ntul sang go njini nyia. Li re n li ntul go njini nyia, kehn alokeltum ebame jol noko ka-m, eji bo lꞌki-m yake kak Jus go ebo. Tibre me ntul sang go njini nyia.”
Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, lohngo re wo ntul woa?”

Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ee, wobbung etingitingi re, me ntul wo. M ba go njini nyia re, me m ba bung bade etingitingi. Tibre esi jia ji wahnge bo jel-m no. Nne awohng awohng no lꞌjol ka etingitingi jio, á kpo wuk alum enyame.”
Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “Ejum aji li re etingitingi?”
Eji Pailet ma bung ano mal, á kehm kpe lohng go elatahk, ba kpiri Jus, kehm ba tong bo re, “Ebi ajehng ajehng n nyehnem ji nne noo ma lim.
Ń kpi eljini ni n kpo kono nne a ngbekobo ewahne awohng yehke yake ngare elkak Pasova. Ń kpꞌsebe re me n yehke ntul ewahne noo yaka?”
Bo kehm-e faange wahre wahre wahre re, “Barabas wo e kpꞌsebe re wo yehk-e yake. Nne noo sang!” Barabas jolo nne no jo jen, jo taare ane nsol go nsahm.
Pailet kehm kake nsahm re, bo ko Jisos song dv-e.
Nsoja nyio kehm koko akpiri, tahng ekpasi, konng-e go esi. Bo kehm rodo ekpawobo kak-e, mbilibili ekpawobo ji atul kpo kono elkake.
Bo kehm jo ba lim ayok re, “E ma-a kak nnyo, ntul no Jus,” fere jo ruum-e nkpal.
Pailet kehm kpe lohng go elatahk, kpe song tong Jus re, “M bahke kpe lohng a ne ba, eji ń lꞌkahn re, ejumjum n nyehnem ji á limi no.”
Owo Jisos kehm lohngo ba go elatahk, a ekpasi akpiri jio go esi, a mbilibili ekpawobo ji bo kak-e no. Pailet kehm tongo bo re, “Nyehnen nne noa ga.”
Eji atubesi abalimajom, a abꞌbaabe nyehn-e no, bo kehm kehme elrabe re, “Kum-e lake go ekros! Kum-e lake go ekros!”
Pailet kehm tongo bo re, “Koon ye antahng, wahn song kum-e, tibre ejumjum n nyehnem ji á limi no.”
Jus kehm-e faange re, “E kpi ntahm, tib go ntahm nyio ona fuumu re á kpo. Tibre yebrod elne bum re, ye Mmon Esowo wo.”
Eji Pailet wuku alum nya bo bungu no, á kpe fꞌfahl na budu.
Á kehm kpe maade yel go ege ekpꞌkpa, song bahb Jisos re, “Anv, a lohng gan?”
Jisos we faangem efaangefaange.
Owo Pailet kehm-e bahbe re, “A nehm bung a nama? Anv, a nehme kahn re, n kpi nsahm nyi m bahk-a ma yake, a fora, fere bel nsahm nyi m bahk-a ma kum go ekrosa?”
Jisos kehm-e faange re, “Ki li re Esowo bi ka-a nsahm, kehn a jolem ma bel nsahm nyi a bahk-m wulu. Nne no ko-m no, ba kak-a go abo, ye wo ma ga lim abiafem.”
Pailet wuku kan alum nyao o, á kehm kehme elsebe mbang ana nyi á bahk-e yehke yake.
Jus kehm kpe kehme elrabe re, “A lꞌyehke nne noo yake, a nehm kpe jol ntem a ntul no Rom. Tibre nne awohng awohng no lꞌtong re, ye ntul wo, á li nnekv no ntul a Rom.”
Pailet wuku kan alum nyaa a me, á kehm soro yehke Jisos lohng a ne go elatahk, kehm fere song ji go ege eti elam, edi ji bo jo lung re Pevment ji bo jo lung go alum Hibru re Gabata.
Efung bio jolo efung bi bo jo toobo ebjing bi Pasova.
Ngare efin Pailet kehm tongo Jus re, “Nyehnen, ntul ewahne gana!”
Bo kehm rabe re, “Tahmen a ne! Tahmen a ne! Song kumen ye go ekros!”
Pailet kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, ń kpꞌsebe re me n kum ntul ewahne go ekrosa?”
Atubesi abalimajom kehm faange re, “Ntul awohng awohng e kpimm, sehngem ntul a Rom wo wo e kpi no.”
Pailet kehm yake Jisos ka bo re bo song kum-e go ekros. Bo kehm-e koko tahm a ne.
Jisos kehm solo ekros eje, song rehng go edi ji bo jo lung re edi nkpakesi, ji bo jo lung go alum Hibru re Golgota.
Owo bo kum-e lake go ekros. Ane abal ba bo tob kum bo o, nne noko go ejang eboblum, noko go ejang ebobkal, Jisos woomo go elka elka.
Pailet nyono mmonwer lake go ekros, no bungu re, “Jisos ji Nasaret, ntul no Jus wo ana.”
Aneb Jus gbalee ba jo lung mmonwer noo. Tibre edi ji bo kumu Jisos jolo kohlo go nla ejahbe. Mmonwer noo bo nyono go Hibru, fere nyon go Latin, fere nyon go Grik.
Atubesi abalimajom kehm tongo Pailet re, “A jolem nyono re Ntul no Jus, a jol nyono re, Nne noa bungu re, ye ntul no Jus wo.”
Pailet kehm faange re, “Ji m ma nyon, tiki li ana n nyono no.”
Ngare nyi nsoja nyio ma kum Jisos go ekros, bo kehm rodo nsol ebjing enye baange, bo ane ani. Bo tꞌtob rodo nsubu enye nyi bo tubu no, nyi ki bel nkon anyehng anyehng.
Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Nong, wahr kꞌkiimi nsubu nyia baange, wahr tub na elfaange, nyehn nne no bahke bele.”
Jia limi, eji nwer Esowo lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi ana bungu no re, “Bobbaange nsol ebjing enyame, fere tub elfaange, gohro ko nsubu enyame.”
Owo nsoja nyio kehm limi ano.
Nnyehn Jisos yiimi ona kohlo go ekros, a mmonannyehn, a Meri nkal a Klopas, go Meri ji lohng go Magdala.
Eji Jisos nyehne nnyehn, a ntꞌtoono ewe no jo sahb kor-e kor yim kohlo o, á kehm tongo nnyehn re, “Nnenkal, nyehn mmon ewa o!”
Á kehm tongo ntꞌtoono ewe noo re, “Nne no wa wo a.”
Bomo ngare nyio asongo ntꞌtoono noo kehm-e koko tahm a ne go ege etahk, á song lene tob-e.
Eji ma jol ano, Jisos kꞌkahn re, nsol kpee ebmal. Owo á kehm bungu re, “Alahb ma-m kor,” goji alum Esowo lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi.
Etu jekke ona, ji bo kake alahb ma bo kpo lung re evinegar. Bo kehm soro tub ndꞌdahng kak go alahb mao, tung go ebti, song koor-e go nnyo.
Jisos wo kan alahb mao, á kehm bungu re, “Ebmal,” kehm soro yake elkpin ene ka go, bahk emel kpo.

Efung bio jolo efung ebjing atoobo bi Esabat. Jus kehm song bahb Pailet, joare á bahke taame re, bo song banne ane ba kpaake go akros akpade, fere fono bo. Bo joom seb re, akv ebo kpe kpaake go akros egburu efung Esabat bi jolo etoono efung behko.
Nsoja kehm bake, ba banne nne noko no bo kum-e kohlo Jisos akpade, fere kpe banne nne noko akpade fvfo.
Eji bo ba rehng goji Jisos, bo sebe kahn re, yeblohko kpo. Bo we bannem akpade.
Nne a nsoja awohng kehm-e jahme elkong go ngbaange. Owo alung kehm lohngo, semme alahb.
Nne noo no nyehne ji ma lim o, ye wo yiimi ntianse,
Nsol nyia kpee limi, goji nwer Esowo lꞌlohko jol go etingitingi, nyi bungu re, “Ekahb eje ajehng ajehng limm, ji bo bahke bahne.”
Edi nwer Esowo jehko kpe bung re, “Ane bahke seenge nne noo no bo jahm-e elkong.”

Josef ji lohng go Arimatia kehm song bahb Pailet, joare á bahke taame, á fono ekv ji Jisos tahm a ji. Josef jo toono Jisos mbehr mbehr, tib á jo fahle Jus. Pailet kehm taame, owo Josef kehm bake, ba fono ekv ji Jisos tahm a ji.
Nekodimos ji tohko je goji Jisos atv amehng kehm koko nsol nyi kpo v esꞌsvv ji nno a nno, ba a nyi, nyi jo lub ana ekpa akang ji nnen.
Bo ane abal abal kehm rodo ekv ji Jisos ba a ji, ba wohngo nsol nyio, kpennge abarebare abomo, ana eljini elkv alimi ni Jus jolo no.
Etahngga jolo edi ji bo kumu Jisos go ekros. Elahm jolo go etahngga jio, bi bo kala kꞌkak nnene.
Eji jolo efung bi bahke sene efung Esabat, tibre elahm bio jolo kpidi kpidi, owo bo kehm koko ekv ji Jisos song kak elahm bio.
Ngbokambang efung go erahde, Meri ji lohng go Magdala kehm fungu go elahm efungfu atv atv, kehm song nyehn eltal ni bo bannge bulu go nnyo elahm ma bannge noongo go nkpe.
Á kehm beke tahm goji Saimon Pita, a ntꞌtoono Jisos noko go fvfo, no jo sahb kꞌkor Jisos,
Pita, a ntꞌtoono noko, bo kehm mehle tahm gona elahm.
Bo ane abal abal jo be abahl. Ntꞌtoono noko be sehnge Pita, gbo mbang song rehng go elahm.
Á kehm song kehme, jo fahng go elahm, kehm nyehne abarebare abomo nyao nong no go atahng. Á yelem go atahng.
Saimon Pita ji jo tob toon-e, kehm bake, ba sehng na sehng, yel go elahm, kehm nyehne abarebare abomo nyao nong no,
fere nyehn mbomo mi bo kpennge Jisos go esi. Noongem edi ajehng a abarebare abomo nyako. Mbomo mio mi bo kpennge Jisos go esi noongo elfehd.
Owo ntꞌtoono noko no gbo mbang rehng go elahm, kehm tob yel song nyehn, fere taame.
Tibre wuku wuku bo tikem kahn edi nwer Esowo ji bungu re, á bahke nyahme go elkv.
Abatꞌtoono Jisos bao kehm feere kehnge.
Meri yiimi eje kohlo elahm, jo ling. Eji á jo ling, á kehm kehme, jo fahng go elahm.
Á kehm nyehne enjel na ebal nyi kake abarebare nsol jehk no go edi jio ji bo kake ekv ji Jisos, noko ji edi ji esi Jisos noongo no, noko ji edi ji akpade nya Jisos noongo no.
Enjel nyio kehm-e bahbe re, “Nnenkal, jen ji wahnge a kpꞌlingi?”
Á kehm faange bo re, “Tibre bobyehke Ntul ewame fi a ne. N nehme kahn edi ji bo bum-e no.”
Á bungu kan ana mal, á kehm soro keebe, nyehn Jisos yim no. Á kahnem re, Jisos wo.
Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Nnenkal, jen ji wahnge a kpꞌlingi? Nne awo a kp-e sebe?”
Meri jo tiri re, nne no kpo lim eltum etahngga jio wo. Owo á kehm-e tongo re, “Nsoo, joare wo wo rod-e, tib-m edi ji a bum-e no, eji n lꞌsong rod-e tahm a ne.”
Jisos kehm-e lungu re, “Meri!”
Meri kehm keebe, kehm bungu go ellum Hibru re, “Rabbuni,” ji lohngo re ntꞌtibi.
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Ka ma lak abo, eji n kala tahm go ero goji Nsoo. Song goji abonanee,
Meri ji lohng go Magdala kehm tahme song kpiri abatꞌtoono Jisos, kehm tongo bo re, “Me n nyehn Ntul,” fere tong bo ana Jisos bungu no tong-e.
Efung bꞌnehm ona bi jolo ngbokambang efung go erahde, elgung nio ona, abatꞌtoono Jisos woomo ekpꞌkpa ajehng, gbaange abutahk kpee tv elbo, tibre bo jo fahle Jus.
Jisos kehm bake, ba yiimi go bo ellong, kehm kake bo nnyo re, “Belen elkoono!”
Á bungu kan ano mal me, á kehm tibi bo abo enye, a ngbaange.
Abatꞌtoono ebe bele eyebatahng sehng, eji bo nyehne Ntul abo.
Jisos kehm kpe kak bo nnyo re, “Belen elkoono! Ana Nsoo tum-m no, ano wo fvfo n kp-n tob tum.”
Á bungu kan ano mal me, á kehm soro fahle elfeb wohngo bo, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Taaren Etingi Etohko!
Ń lꞌtahm ka nne go ege abiafem, yeblohko bel eltahmeka. Ń tohko tahm ka nne go ege abiafem, á bahke sake ano go ege abiafem.”
Tomos ji woomo go ellong abatꞌtoono Jisos, ewubu ane abal, ji bo jo lung-e re Ayafele, á jolem a bo ona ngare nyi Jisos ba no.
Owo abatꞌtoono Jisos bako kehm-e tongo re, “Wahr ebnyehn Ntul.”
Á kehm faange bo re, “Tohko tiki jol re, n nyehne anv nya abang aba go ege abo, nya bo kum-e no, fere kooro ebnyohkobo go anv nyao, fere lak ebo ebame go ege a ngbaange, n nehm tiki taame.”
Eji ma kang nfung enehkeni, abatꞌtoono Jisos kpe je edi jio. Tomos jolo a bo o fvfo. Bo ta abutahk kpee.
Jisos kehm kpe ba lohng go bo ellong, kpe kak bo nnyo re, “Belen elkoono!”
Á kehm tongo Tomos re, “Koor-m ebnyohkobo a, wo fere nyehn abo enyame. Tanne ebo eba, wo lak-m go ngbaange. Ka kpe faabe, taame na taame!”
Tomos kehm-e faange re, “Wo wo li Ntul ewame, a Esowo ebame!”
Jisos kehm-e bahbe re, “Wobtaame tib eji a ma-m nyehna? Elfuulu li ka ane ba ki nyehn go amahr, bo taame na taame.”
Jisos limi akpokosi gbalee go esamahr abatꞌtoono ebe, nya ki wob nwer nyia.
Nyaa bo nyono, goji ń lꞌtaame re, Jisos wo li Kraist ji Mmon no Esowo. Ń lꞌtaame, ḿ bahke bele elkpin go ege a mbing.
Owo Jisos kehm kpe song tib elne go ellong abatꞌtoono ebe go eto ji Taibirias. Ana wo á tibi elne.
Saimon Pita, a Tomos ji bo jo lung-e re Ayafele, go Natanael ji lohng go Kena ji Galili, a abon ba Sibidi, go abatꞌtoono ebe bako na abal, bo ane kpee jolo o edi ajehng.
Saimon Pita kehm tongo bo re, “N kpꞌtahme nsahre.”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “E bahke tob tahm toon-a.”
Bo kehm soro tahm, song yel go egbang. Jol ejumjum bo bobem atv mao ona.
Eji efungfu yahke se, Jisos kehm bake ba yiimi go nkpe eto. Abatꞌtoono ebe we liingem re, Jisos wo.
Jisos kehm bahbe bo re, “Abon ebame, ḿ bꞌbob nsahra?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Eꞌee, ejumjum e bobem.”
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Yaken erim ebahne kak alahb go ejang eboblum bi egbang, ḿ bahke bobo nsahre.”
Owo bo kehm limi ano. Bo kpeem ma tohng erim bio, tibre nsahre ruru go erim sehng.
Ntꞌtoono no jo kor Jisos sꞌsehng, kehm tongo Pita re, “Ntul ewahre wo o!”
Saimon Pita wuku kan a re, Ntul wo, á kehm soro kak nsol enye go ege a ngubjing, nyi á yehke no lim eltum, kehm soro yehb yel go alahb.
Abatꞌtoono Jisos bako fingi egbang, ba rehng go nkpe egbuk. Bo jo tohngo erim bi nsahre ma gbo gbalee, tibre nkpe egbuk gaam jol fee, jolo ejum eyake ego ewaya ajehng.
Eji bo rehnge go egbuk, bo kehm nyehne agun nya bo fohko go akal nsehng, fere nyehn nsahre kun go akal ngun, a ebred.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Koono nsahre nyindiki ba a nyi, nyi ń kpꞌna bobo.”

Owo Saimon Pita kehm tahme song tohng erim bio ona, lohng a bi go egbuk. Erim bio nsahre ruru sehng. Nfange enyamalahb bio jolo nnyamalahb atahl asehma kunu ewubu a nnyamalahb era. Jol eji nsahre ruru rur ano, erim yarem.
Jisos kehm tongo bo re, “Baan, wahn ba bob ala go elehke ejum jia.” Jol ntꞌtoono ewe awohng awohng jolem, no sahbe no bahb-e re, “Wo nne awo?” Tibre bo jo kꞌkahn re, Ntul a Jisos wo.
Jisos kehm bake ba rod ebred jio ka bo, tob rod nsahre nyio ka bo.
Nkpel nyia nyi biingi nkpel era nyi Jisos tibi abatꞌtoono ebe elne, bomo eji á nyahme go elkv.
Eji bo ma li nsol alehke mal, Jisos kehm bungu tong Saimon Pita re, “Saimon ji mmon a Jon, anv, n kp-a koro sehnge ane bakoa?”
Pita kehm faange re, “Ee Ntul, a kpꞌkahne re, a kpo kor-m sehng.”
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Le abon ejoro ebame!”
Jisos kehm-e kpe bahb go nkpel ebal re, “Saimon ji mmon a Jon, anv, n kp-a kora?”
Pita kehm-e faange re, “Ee Ntul, a kpꞌkahne re, a kp-m koro.”
Jisos kehme tongo re, “Baabe ejoro ebame!”
Jisos kehm-e kpe bahb go nkpel era re, “Saimon ji mmon a Jon, anv, n kp-a kora?”
Pita atahng kehm-e moongo, tib eji Jisos bahb-e nkpel era re, “N kp-a kora?” Á kehm faange re, “Ntul, a kpꞌkahne ejum ajehng ajehng.
Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Le ejoro ebame!

Etingitingi, n kpꞌbungu tong-a re, Ngare nyi a jolo njangkun, a jo gbaange egbaange eja go ebun, jo je edi ajehng ajehng ji kor-a no. Eji a ma kul, a bahke tanne abo enya. Nne nondiki bahk-a gbaange egbaange eja go ebun, ko-a tahm a na go edi ji ki-a kor re wo je.”
Jisos bungu alum nyaa re, á tib Pita elkohn elkv ni á bahke kpoko, ka Esowo ellub. Owo Jisos kehm-e tongo re, “Tahm toon-m!”
Pita kehm keebe, nyehn ntꞌtoona Jisos noko, kpi bo toono, no jo kor Jisos sꞌsehng, no ji kohlo Jisos, eji bo jo li nsol alehke elgung, fere bahb-e re, “Ntul, nne awo li nne no bahk-a gungu?”
Eji Pita nyehn-e no, á kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Ntul, nne noa mee?”
Jisos kehm faange Pita re, “Lꞌkor-m re á jol a, tete me n feere ba, elam eja sang, wo toon-m na toono!”

Eka jia kehm yeere na yeere go ellong aneb Esowo re, ntꞌtoono a Jisos noo nehm kpo, jol eji Jisos ki-e tꞌtong ejumjum re, á nehm kpo. Alum nya Jisos bungu no li re, “Lꞌkor-m re á jol a, tete me n feere ba, elam eja sang.”
Ntꞌtoona Jisos noo wo kpꞌyiimi ntianse go nsol nyia a. Ye wo fere nyon nwer nyia. E kpꞌkahne re, alum enye nya á yiimi ntianse lohko li go etingitingi.
Nsol nyehko nyia gbalee, nyi Jisos limi no. Li re bo nyono nsol kpee kak go awer, me m bum re, njini ebse sehng re awer nyaa kpee jol.
Teofailus,
Ngbokambang a nwer enyame nyi n nyono no, n nyono bada nsol nyi Jisos limi no, fere tꞌtib, bomo ngare nyi á bomo eltum ene,
tete bo rod-e tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo. Re bo kehm-e rodo tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo, á jo tibi abatꞌtoono ebe ba á yehke no go nsahm Etingi Etohko.

Bomo goji Jisos kpo no, nfung atahl abal nyi á ko no, tib abatꞌtoono ebe elne, fere jo kpiri bo nkpel a nkpele, fere jo bung bade etul bi Esowo. Ano wo á tibi no re, á lohko li go elkpin, jol nfaabe limm.
Eji á jolo a bo, á jo tongo bo re, bo song jol go Jerusalem, bo kꞌkpe yaame je edi ajehng ajehng, bo ji sik nnoobo nyi Esowo Nsoo nyame re á bahke bo ka, nyio nyi á bungu no tong bo re,
“Jon jo wohngo ane alahb maka maka. Re kang abon afung ntiil, ḿ bahke bele ewohngalahb ji Etingi Etohko.”
Eji bo ma fadde edi ajehng, bo kehm bahbe Jisos re, “Ntul, ngare nyio nyi a bahke feere etul ka Israela?”
Á kehm faange bo re, “Jio li ka Nsoo, tibre ye wo kunu afung. Limm re wahn kahn.
Wahn bahke bele nsahm ngare nyi Etingi Etohko lꞌba a nahne. Ḿ bahke jo yiimi atianse ka-m bomo go Jerusalem, rehng go Judea, fere rehng go Samaria, tete rehng ejang njini abehng abehng.”
Á bungu kan a mal, bo kehm-e soro mehl tahm a ne, eji abatꞌtoono ebe jo seeng-e. Ekparesemsem kehm soro bul-e, á lahm.
Eji bo jo seenge go elbung too, eji á ma tahm, bo kehm soro nyehn ane abal ma lohng ba yiimi kohlo bo, ba kake abarebare akpawobo.

Bo kehm bungu re, “Aneb Galili, jen ji wahnge ḿ ma sa kpꞌseenge elbung too? Jisos jꞌnehm a, ji bo m-e rod go egahne ellong tahm a ne go ejahbetul Esowo, á bahke feere ba, ana ń nyehn-e no á kpꞌtahme go ejahbetul Esowo.”
Abatꞌtoono Jisos kehm kehme elbadde go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Oliv asongo go Jerusalem. Bomo go ewong jio rehng go Jerusalem rehngem mmal anyehng nob nob.

Eji bo rehnge go Jerusalem, bo kehm song yel ekpꞌkpa ajehng ji jolo go ero enyong, ji bo jo kono eljolo. Bo jolo Pita, Jon, Jems, Andru, Filip, Tomos, Batolomi, Matiu, Jems ji mmon Alfeus, a Saimon ji woomo go ellong ane ba bo jo lung bo re Silot (bo ji jo nok re ejahbe ebo for go abo nya anebe Rom), go Judas ji mmon a Jems.
Bo kpee jolo go nnyo nnyo amehng, jo kak ero bi ekakesehk, go anebkal fvfo, a Meri nnyehn Jisos, go abonanyehn Jisos.
Ane ba jolo o kpee jolo ane atahl arakera.
Ngare nyio nyi Pita kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu re,
“Abonanee, nwer Esowo eblohko jol go etingitingi ana Etingi Etohko bungu no tong Devid bada Judas ji ko ane song tib Jisos, bo bob-e.
Á jolo nne no woomo go egahre ellong, fere jo lim eltum ni wahr jo lim.
Á ko akpohko nyao nya á limi ebi, song gunu edi egbe. Owo á gbo no sahb lꞌlohko, ngubjing joodo, akpidla bohngo.
Ane kpee ba lene go Jerusalem wꞌwuk. Owo wahnge bo kpo lung edi egbe jio go bo ejahbe re Akeldama, ji lohngo re egbe alung.
“Tibre bo nyono go nwer a Saams re,
“ ‘Nong, etahk eje jol na jol, nnene kꞌwoomo.’
Bo kpe nyon re,
“ ‘Eltum ene, nne nondiki wo bahke fere ko.’
“Nne noo bahke jolo nne no woomo egahre ellong ngare kpe kpe nyi Jisos jolo a nahre,
bomo ngare nyi Jon jo wohngo ane alahb tete rehng efung bi Jisos, bo rod-e tahm a ne go ero. Nne ana noo wo bahke yele ellong enahre, fere jo yiimi ntianse bade elnyahme ni Jisos.”
Owo bo kehm yehke ane abal, nne noko Josef ji bo jo lung-e re Barsabas, mbing enye nyehko, bo jo kpe-e lung re Justus. Nne noko, bo jo lung-e re Matayas.
Bo kehm kehme ero kak re, “Ntul Esowo no kpꞌkahne ntim nyi ane kpee, tib-r nne no a ma yehke, ane abal baa,
re á ko eltum nio ni ntiingetib, ni Judas yake no bum, tahm go ege edi.”
Bo kehm tubu elfaange, eji bo lꞌmal yehke nne awohng. Elfaange nio gbo tub Matayas. Bo kehm-e koko, budu go ellong abatiingetib, ewubu a nne awohng.
Eji efung bio bi Pintikost rehnge no, bo kpee jolo edi edi ajehng.
Tvtv ona egburu ewahl ji nnen a nnen ji lohng go elbung kehm kehme elwahle ana nfeb nyi nnen a nnen, kehm ba rur go ekpꞌkpa jio ji bo ji no.
Bo kehm nyehne nsol ana nlikagun ma yaame na yaame, kuumu nne awohng awohng.
Etingi Etohko kehm ruru bo kpee go atahng. Bo kehm kehme elbungu alum ajahbe nyandiki, ana Etingi Etohko jo lim bo re bo bung.
Jus jindiki ji lene go Jerusalem, ji lohngo go ejang njini abehng abehng ba, bo jolo anoobo ane ba Esowo jo kor bo.
Eji ellong ane wuku ewahl jio, bo kehm kame song rur, kehm kehme bo esi kpo. Tibre nne awohng awohng jo wuku abatꞌtoono Jisos kpꞌbungu go ege ejahbe.
Eji bo ma nyehn nkpokosi nyio, bo kehm bahbe re, “Anv, ane ba kpꞌbungu a, aneb Galili sanga?
“Jen ji wahng ka nne awohng awohng ewahre kpꞌwuku alum nyao go ege ejahbe?

Wahr lohng go Partia, ane bandiki lohng go Midis, ane bandiki lohng go Elam, ane bandiki lohng go Mesopotemia, ane bandiki lohng go Judea, ane bandiki lohng go Kapadosa, ane bandiki lohng go Pontus, ane bandiki lohng go Esia,

ane bandiki lohng go Frigia, ane bandiki lohng go Pamfilia, ane bandiki lohng go Ijipt, ane bandiki lohng go ejang Libia ji li kohlo Sirin. Ajenne nyandiki lohng go Rom, ane bandiki Jus ji, ane bandiki ane baka baka ba, ba kpꞌlimi eljini ni Jus.
Egom ejahre jindiki lohng go Gris, ane bandiki lohng go Arebia. E kpꞌwuku bo kpꞌbungu ajahbe enyahre bade ajꞌjoko nsol nya Esowo ma lim.”
Esi kehm kpoko bo ane kpee, amahr fere jo bil bo. Bo kehm kehme elbungu atemtem re, “Anv, elgan nsol nyia lohngo renan?”
Ane bandiki kehm kehme bo nyok re, “Amahm ma bo ma wo kpꞌbuumu.”

Pita kehm mehle yiimi, a abatiingetib bako, ewubu a nne awohng, kehm bungu wahre wahre tong ellong ane bao re, “Juda, ejahbe ejame, a wahn ji lene go Jerusalem kpee, wuungen atung, wahn wuk ji n yahke bung.
Ane baa ana, amahm sang bo kpꞌbuumu, ana ń kpꞌtiri. Tibre anv ebrehng nkaranka esehmwubu nyi nyi, nyi efungfu.
“Ji ma lim a, ji ji nnyehnamahr a Joel bungu no re,
‘Esowo re,
“ ‘Go ngare esꞌkohro afung m bahke yaange etohko ejame wohngo nne awohng awohng.
Abon ebahne bahke kehme amahr nya Esowo nyehn.
Ajangkun enyahne bahke tob jol abanyehnamahr fvfo.
Anebkul ebahne bahke jo leeme alem.
Alokeltum ebame, aneblum, a anebkal anebkal, bo fvfo m bahke tob yaange etohko ejame wohngo bo ngare nyio.
Bo bahke jo nyehn enyehnamahr ji Esowo.
M bahke jo lim akpokosi go elbung, a ndi.
Bahke jolo go alung, go agun, a atꞌtohk nya ma sahb tꞌtehm.
Njul bahke fere gbo ejannge,
ebareka bahke fere siingi alung,
efung bi Ntul Esowo bahke bake.
Bahke jolo egburu efung bi Esowo bahke tibi nsahm enye.
Owo nne awohng awohng no lꞌgboongo Ntul Esowo go ege a mbing, á bahke bele eltahre.’ ”

Pita kehm kpe bung re, “Israel, ejahbe ejame, wuungen atung go alum nya n kpꞌbungu. Jisos ji Nasaret wo, Esowo ka-e nsahm re á jo lim akpokosi, fere jo tib nliingi go egahne ajahbe, eji ń lꞌkahn re Esowo bi tum-e no.
Esowo go ege elkahne wo, á toobo no re á yake Jisos ka. Wahn ba jabb-e kak abi ane go ebo. Bo kum-e lake go ekros, á kpo.
Esowo bi nyahm-e go elkv. Á yehk-e go erem bi elkv. Tibre elkv we maam kpan.
“Tibre Devid bꞌbung bada ne re,
“ ‘Ngare anyehng anyehng n jo nyehne Ntul Esowo bad bad a name.
Á li go egame eboblum,
eji nnene lꞌki-m ma nyeenge.
Owo wahng ka eltim jo yeb-m,
n kehme ase yim.
Afi n kpo na,
ekunukpu ejame li re, Esowo bahke tiki lim ka-m.
Tibre a nehm yake etohko ejame sa go ndi,
go ellong akvne.
A nehm taame re mbarebara Mmon ewa bol.
A ma-m tib mbang nyi li rehng go elkpin.
Eji a bahke jolo a name, a bahke jo ka-m eyebatahng.’
(Ana wo Devid bungu fel.)”
Pita kehm kpe bung re, “Abonanee, n kpꞌbungu gbul gbul gbuul re, Devid nso ejahre kpꞌkpo mahne mahne, bo kpa-e kak. Elahm ebe bia, kpeke li tete sik anv.
Tib eji á jolo nnyehnamahr Esowo, á jo kꞌkahn ji Esowo nyame tong-e re, ‘Mmon ewa wo bahke jehke go ega eti etul.’
Á nyehne amahr bade elnyahme ni Mesaya re, ‘Esowo we yakem, á sa woomo go ellong akvne, ekv eje bol.’
“Jisos jꞌnehm o wo, Esowo lohk-e nyahme go elkv. Wahr kpee ba li atianse enye, tibre wahr nyꞌnyehn nsol nyio kpee.
Bo mehl-e, song jehke go eboblum Esowo bi ka-e Etingi Etohko ana á nyame no tong-e, ji ji á ma yaange wohng-r, jꞌnehm ji ń kpꞌnyehne a, fere jo wuk.
“Jol yefono Devid tohkem je na go ejahbetul Esowo. Á bungu na bung re,
“ ‘Ntul Esowo bungu tong ntul ewame re,
Ji a, egame ejang eboblum,
tete n lim anebekv eba etikunakpade eja.’
“N kpꞌsebe re wahn anebe Israel kpee, wahn sahb kꞌkahn re, Jisos jꞌnehm ji ń kum-e go ekros, Esowo m-e rod lim ntul, fere rod-e lim Kraist.”
Eji bo wuku ana, ala kehm teele bo. Bo kehm bahbe Pita, a abatiingetib bako re, “Abonanee, anv, e bahke limi renan?”
Pita kehm tongo bo re, “Gboon ndon go egahne abiafem, wahn ane kpee, wahn fere bel ewohngalahb go mbing nyi Jisos Kraist, eji ń lꞌbel eltahmeka go egahne abiafem, Esowo fere yar-n ka Etingi Etohko.
Enyam bia li ka wahn, a abon ebahne, a ajahbe nya li fee, a nne awohng awohng no Ntul Esowo bahk-e lungu tv elne.”
Pita bungu na bung bung bung, jo tong bo, fere jo kak bo erehke re, “Nobo re wahn for go erem bi bahke gboko tub abi ane baa ba li anv.”
Ane bao ba wuku alum enye fere taame, bo ba bele ewohngalahb. Bo jolo ejum ane atahltahl nkpel esehma ane atahl awubu (3,000), ba Esowo budu no efung bio.
Bo jo kake esi re bo kahn eltibi ni abatiingetib Jisos jo tib bo, fere jo kono edi ajehng, jo bakke ebred, fere jo kak ero.
Abatiingetib Jisos jo limi akpokosi gbalee, fere jo tib nliingi. Owo wahnge nne awohng awohng jo fahl.
Ane ba taame no soro asi, jo kono edi ajehng. Nne awohng lꞌbel ejum, fere jo jol ka bo ane kpee.
Bo jo gungu nsol ebo, fere jo baange akpohko, jo ka nne awohng awohng ana nsol m-e lehng.
Efung abehng abehng bo jo song wane go etahk Esowo, fere jo bakke ebred go bo a ntahk, jo li nsol ebo go eyebatahng,
fere jo tehk Esowo. Bo jo koro nne awohng awohng.
Esowo jo kpe kpele na ane efung abehng abehng go ellong abatꞌtoono Jisos, ba jo bel eltahre.
Eji ma rehng nkaranka era nyi elgung, ngare nyi bo jo kono ero kak, Pita abola Jon kehm tahme go etahk Esowo.

Eji bo ma rehng go eti mbu ji bo jo lung re eti mbu ji nno, bo kehm nyehne mbanne nyi kala jꞌjen bomo eji bo jel-e no. Efung abehng abehng bo jo sol-e ba bum eti mbu jio re á jo gboongo apene goji ane bao ba jo sehng yange go etahk Esowo.
Eji á nyehne Pita a Jon, bo yahke yange go etahk Esowo, á kehm soro gboongo bo re bo ka-e akpohko.
Bo kehm-e seenge too, Pita kehm bungu re, “Seeng-r gae!”
Mbanne nyio kehm kehme amahr baare re, anv, bo bahk-e kake ejum.
Pita kehm bungu re, “Asilva, a agul n kpimm. Ji n kpi no, ji ji m bahk-a kake. N kp-a tongo go mbing nyi Jisos Kraist ji Nasaret re, Mehl, wo jen!”
Á kehm-e jabbe go eboblum, tab-e yiimi. Akpade enye kehm soro tahne.
Á kehm soro mehl karab yiimi, kehme eljene yannge, soro toono Pita abola Jon, yange etahk Esowo, kehme eljene yannge, fere jo feebe, jo tehk Esowo.
Ane kpee ba nyehn-e no, eji á kpꞌjene, jo tehk Esowo,
bo kehm soro liing-e tvtv re, ye wo jolo ngbꞌgboongo nyi jo ji eti mbu ji li go etahk Esowo, jio ji bo jo lung re eti mbu ji nno.
Kpo bo esi area, eji bo ma nyehn ji ma jol ka-e.
Eji nne noo jo jen bad bad a Pita, go Jon, ane kpee kehm jo kpo bo esi. Bo kehm kame, song kpiri bo go edi ji bo jo lung re etahk Solomon.

Pita nyehne kan ane bao ana, á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Israel wahn, jen ji wahng ka esi kp-n kpoko ana, ḿ ma sa anyo kaa kpꞌseenge? Anv, ń kpꞌtiri re, go egahra nsahm wo, e ma lim nne noa á ma noba, afi go egahre elkake ni e kpꞌkake Esowo, ni e m-e lim á kpꞌjene?

Esowo bi Ebraham, a bi Aisik, a bi Jekob, Esowo bio bi babnso ejahre, ye wo ma ka nlokeltum ewe Jisos ellub ene. Jisos jꞌnehm ji ń senng-e njahm, fere ten-e go esamahr Pailet, eji á tiri re á yehke Jisos yake.
Ń tene Jisos ji li Nnooba Nne no Esowo, no li go etingitingi, fere taame re bo yehke nwulane ka-n.
Ń wulu nfono elkpin. Esowo fere nyahm-e go elkv. Nsol nyio nyi wahnge wahr kpꞌyiimi ntianse.
“Nsahm nyi li go mbing nyi Jisos nyi wahng ka, nne noa ma nob, ye ji ń kp-e kahne, fere kp-e nyehne. Eltaame ni á ma taame tv Jisos, ni ni ma wahng á ma nob, anv, á yim a go egahne esamahr.
“Abonanee, n kpꞌkahne re, ji ń limi no, a atubesi ebahne, ń limi ekpehlekpehle.
Mahne mahne Esowo tongo abanyehnamahr ebe re, bo song bung re, ‘Tiki li re, Kraist bahke tiki nyehn erem.’ Ana wo Esowo lohko lim enyam ebe re lohko jol go etingitingi.
Ano wo fvfo nobo re, wahn gbo ndon, fere sennge njahm go egahne abiafem, eji Ntul Esowo lꞌfvvdv abiafem enyahne, ngare nyio nyi eyebatahng nfenfe ji lohng goji Esowo bahk-n kpiri.
Á bahke tob tum Jisos Kraist ji á yehke no ka-n.
“Jisos bahke tohko jol go ejahbetul Esowo tete ngare rehng nyi nsol kpee bahke yaange, jol nfenfe, ana Esowo bungu no tong abanyehnamahr ebe, bomo mahne mahne tete sik anv.
“Moses bungu re, ‘Ntul Esowo bahke tumu nnyehnamahr no bahke lohngo go egahne ellong, ana á tob yehk-m tum. Jo wuungen ye atung go ellum anehng anehng ni á lꞌtong-n.
Nne awohng awohng no tohko wuungu nnyehnamahr noo atung, Esowo bahk-e yabe go ellong ane ebe, fere ranng-e.’
“Abanyehnamahr bao kpee, ba ba no, bomo go ngare nyio nyi Samuel tete sik anv, bo kpee jo bungu bada ngare nyꞌnehm ana.

“Wahn ba li abon ba abanyehnamahr bao, a ba babnso ejahre, ba Esowo limi egbanngalung a bo, ana á bungu tong Ebraham re, ‘Nne no bahke lohngo go ega etꞌtohngo, ye wo bahke wahng ka nnahb anyehng anyehng go njini bel elfuulu.’
Wahn ba li agbokombang ane ba Esowo yehke nlokeltum ewe tum tv-n re á ba fuul-n, fere lim-n wahn ane kpee, ń sennge njahm go egahne abꞌbi.”
Ngare nyi Pita abola Jon kpi mbungu mbungu a ellong ane bao, owo abalimajom, a ntubesi ane ba kpo baabe etahk Esowo, go aneb Sadusi fvfo kehm tob ba kpiri bo.
Eltim jo rake bo, tibre Pita abola Jon jo tibi ane re, Jisos ebnyahme go elkv, ji ma lohng re, akvne bahke fere nyahme, bel elkpin.
Bo kehm soro bob bo, kak bo go ngbekobo tete etoono efungfu behko. Tibre elgung bꞌba ngare nyio.
Ane gbalee ba wuku alum Esowo nyao tꞌtaame. Nfange aneblum jolo ejum ane atahltahl nkpel ewubbal ane atahl awubu (5,000).
Etoono efungfu behko atubesi, a anebkul nfam, go atꞌtibi ba atahm, bo kehm ba kono edi ajehng go Jerusalem.
Nkon nyio nyi bo song kono a Annas ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom, go Kayafas, Jon Aleksanda, a ane bako ba tob woomo go nnahb nyi ntubesi abalimajom.
Bo kehm koko Pita, a Jon song yiimi go bo esamahr, kehm kehme bo bahb re, “Ń limi renan ejum jꞌnehm? Nsahm anyi ń ko no? Mbing nyi nyehne nyi ń ko no?”
Pita ji ruru go etohko ji Esowo kehm faange bo re,
lela bo kp-r abahbe bahb bada nnoobo nyi e ma lim, eji e limi mbanne nyio á nob.
Nobo re wahn kahn, a anebe Israel kpee re, nne no yim go egahne ellong a, yebnob kpee go nsahm nyi li go mbing nyi Jisos Kraist ji Nasaret ji ń kum-e go ekros, Esowo fere nyahm-e go elkv.
“Jisos jꞌnehm ji nwer Esowo bungu no bada ne re, Ye wo li ‘eltal ni wahn asehketahk tene no, ye wo ma fere jol etingitingi eltal ni nnahb ekahme.’
Eltahre li go ege wo wo. Mbing anyehng anyehng limm go njini nyia, nyi Esowo ma ka ane, nyi e bahke koko bel eltahre.”
Eji bo nyehna no re, Pita abola Jon, bo bele esahb, kehm kpoko bo esi, tibre Bab Pita jolo ane baka baka ba ki kahn nwer. Bo kehm soro seb kahn re, bo jolo a Jisos.
Eji bo nyehne mbanne nyio nyi ma nob, yim kohlo Pita abola Jon, mbang anyehng anyehng kpeem jol nyi bo bahke kpe ma faabe.
Bo kehm tongo bo re, bo lohng go ekpꞌkpa elam song elatahk. Bo kehm kehme eltoobo re,
“Anv, e bahke limi ane bao renan? Nne awohng awohng no lene go Jerusalem ebkahn re, bo ba li ane ba limi egburu nkpokosi nyia. Anv, e nehm kpe ma gbaame.
Nong, wahr rehke bo, bo kꞌkpe bung tong ane go mbing nyi Jisos, eji eka jia lꞌkꞌkpe yeere nkpel anyehng anyehng.”
Bo kehm lungu Pita, a Jon, bo feere ba yel ekpꞌkpa. Bo kehm rehke bo re, bo kꞌkpe bung go mbing nyi Jisos nkpel anyehng anyehng, fere jo tib.
Pita abola Jon kehm faange re, “Wahnfono antahng bahke toobo kahn, joare nꞌnob go ejang bi Esowo re nne wuk wahn, afi á wuk Esowo.
Wahr nehm tiki rahke elbungu bada nsol nyi e ma nyehn, fere wuk.”
Bo kehm kpe rehke bo tꞌtahne, kehm yake bo, bo song. Bo nyehnem mbang anyehng anyehng nyi bo bahke kake bo erem tib ane ba jolo o. Tibre nne awohng awohng jo tehke Esowo tib go nkpokosi nyi ma lim.
Nne no bo lim-e no, á nob, ngare nyio yebkang sehnge nnya atahl abal.
Tvtv ona eji bo yehke Pita abola Jon yake, bo kehm soro tahm goji atem ebo, kehm song tooro tong bo ana atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam bungu no.
Eji bo wuku no, bo ane kpee kehm kehme ero kak ka Esowo re, “Egburu Esowo bi limi elbung, a ndi, a alahb, a nsol kpee nyi li no,
go nsahm Etingi Etohko wo, nso ejahre Devid nlokeltum ewa jo bung re,
“ ‘Jen ji wahnge ane baka baka ba ki nyi Esowo, ntim kpi bo maange ana?
Jen ji wahnge ane bao kpꞌtoobo mbol mbol?
Atul ba njini jo toobo ebjing ebo, atubesi song ji edi ajehng,
jo toobo nfem bada Ntul Esowo, a Mesaya enye.’
“Tibre etingitingi, Herod abola Pailet, a ane baka baka ba ki nyi Esowo, a anebe Israel, bo kono edi ajehng go ejahbe jia, jo lam kak Jisos, mbarebara nlokeltum ewa, no a ko-e lim Mesaya.
Bo kono edi ajehng re bo lim ejum ajehng ajehng ana ji a toobo wuku wuku bum.
Ntul Esowo, nyehn esabsab enyam bi bo ma nyam! Ka abon eba nsahm, eji bo lꞌjo sahb tiingi etib eba,
wo fere tanne ebo eba, goji ane lꞌnob ayam ebo, wo fere lim akpokosi go mbing nyi mbarebara nlokeltum ewa Jisos.”
Eji bo ma kak ero mal, edi jio ji bo ji no, jo lim nkon, kehm gbehke. Etingi Etohko kehm ruru bo kpee go bo atahng, bo kehm kehme etib bi Esowo tiingi a esahb esahb.
Ellong ane ba taame tv Esowo jolo ntir ntir anyehng. Nnene jolem, no jo bung re, nsol nyꞌnye li ka ye ntahngtahng. Bo jo baange na ejum ajehng ajehng ji bo bele no egom egom.
Abatiingetib Jisos jo yiimi ntianse bade elnyahme ni Jisos a nsahm a nsahm. Esowo kehm fuulu bo egburu elfuulu bo ane kpee.
Nnene jolem go bo ellong, no ejum jo lehng-e. Tibre ane bao ba bele ebgbe, a ntahk, bo jo gungu, ko akpohko ba a nya,
ba faake a nya, kak abatiingetib Jisos go ebo. Akpohko nyao bo jo ka nne awohng awohng ana nsol m-e lehng.
Joses ji lohng go etꞌtohngo ji Livai, ji bo jel-e go Saiprus, ye ji abatiingetib Jisos ka-e mbing re Barnabas, ji lohngo re nkakeltim a mmon,
ye wo gungu egbe eje, ko akpohko nyao ba ka abatiingetib Jisos.
Nne awohng jolo go, no bo jo lung-e re Ananayas. Nkal ewe bo jo lung-e re Safira. Bo gungu ejang nsol ebo.
Ananayas yange ejang akpohko bum elne go, ejang jehko á ko ba ka abatiingetib Jisos. Nkal ewe kꞌkahn kpee.
Pita kehm-e bahbe re, “Ananayas, jen ji wahnge nnehm ma ko nji go ega eltim kp-a fili, a ma bum akpohko nyako go, ba yiimi go esamahr Etingi Etohko kpi afahnge kiimi?

Re wo kehm gungu nsol enya nyio, jolo nyꞌnya. Eji a ma gungu nsol nyio, akpohko jolo nyanya. Jen ji wahnge a kehm tiri ano go ega eltim, lim elkohn ejum ana jia? A kimem efahnge soodo ane, a kimi efahnge soodo Esowo.”
Ananayas wuku kan ano me, á kehm soro tuulu gbo kpo.
Ajangkun kehm soro lohng ba, ba gbad-e, rod-e tahm a ne song kpa kak.
Ji kan ekidi rehng awa ara, nkal ewe kehm tob ba. Á wukem ji ma lim.
Pita kehm-e bahbe re, “Tong-m, akpohko nya a kpee, nya ń gungu edi egbe ejahna?”
Á kehm faange re, “Ee, nya nya a kpee.”
Pita kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji wahnge ń lame no re, wahn ba gare etohko ji Ntul Esowo? Ane ba rodo nlum ewa song kpa kak, bo baa, yim mbutahk o. Bo bahk-a tob rod lohng a na.”
Tvtv ona á kehm soro gbo ndi go ege alata kpo. Eji ajangkun nyao yele ekpꞌkpa, bo lohko nyehn re, yeblohko kpo. Bo kehm-e soro rod, lohng a ne, song kpa kak kohlo nlum ewe.
Aneb ero bao kpee, a egom jindiki ji wuku no, bo kehm kehme elfahle tete.
Abatiingetib Jisos jo limi akpokosi gbalee go esamahr ane. Aneb Esowo jo jolo edi ajehng go etahk Esowo, ejang bio bi bo jo lung re etahk Solomon.
Ane bako joom sahb yel ellong ebo, tvtv ona bo jo kake bo sehng.
Esowo jo kpe budu na budu budu ane ba jo taame go bo ellong, anebkal, a aneblum aneblum.
Ane jo solo aneb ayam ba a bo, ba bum bo go elatahk, egom jindiki noongo go adilnong, egom jindiki noongo go ebkpa, eji afi Pita sehnge na, etohko eje lꞌjo kooro bandiki.
Ellong ane gbalee kehm lohngo ba, ni lohngo go ajahbe nya li sennge Jerusalem kak. Bo ko aneb ayam, fere ko ane ba bele abi atohko, ba a bo, bo nob ane kpee.
Ntubesi abalimajom, a ane ebe kpee ba tob woomo go ellong nio ni aneb Sadusi,
Owo wahnge bo kehm bobo abatiingetib Jisos kak ngbekobo.
Ngare atv enjel nyi Esowo kehm bake, ba lennge abutahk agbekobo nyao, yehke abatiingetib Jisos bao, kehm bungu tong bo re,
“Songen go etahk Esowo, wahn song tong ane alum kpee nya li bade elkpin nia ni nfenfe.”

Eji bo wuku ana, bo kehm tahme go etahk Esowo ngare nyi efungfu ma se, song kehme eltibi. Ntubesi abalimajom, a ane ebe kehm tiingi tv anebkul nfam, a atul esub re bo ba kono edi ajehng. Bo kehm tumu alokeltum ebo tv go ekpꞌkpa ngbekobo re bo song ko abatiingetib Jisos ba a bo.
Eji bo ba no, bo nyehnem Bab Pita go ngbekobo. Bo kehm feere song tooro tong bo re,
“E nyehne abutahk ngbekobo ta ta, fere nyehn abꞌbaabe yim no go abutahk kpꞌbaabe. Eji e lennge abu, nnene atahng e nyehnem.”
Eji ntubesi abꞌbaabe etahk Esowo, a atubesi abalimajom wuk ano, kehm fohko bo nkv, fere kpo bo esi ana ji bahke jolo.
Nne awohng kehm lohngo ba, ba tong bo re, “Ane ba ń kake bo ngbekobo, bo yim na go etahk Esowo kpi ane tib.”
Ntubesi abꞌbaabe etahk Esowo kehm tahme, a ane ebe song ko bo, ba a bo. Bo joom lim go nsahm, tibre bo jo fahle re, ane bako bahke bo atal tuubu.
Bo kehm koko abatiingetib Jisos bao, ba a bo, bo ba yiimi go esub. Ntubesi abalimajom kehm kehme bo abahbe bahb, fere tong bo re,
“E rehk-n re, wahn kꞌkpe tib go mbing a nne noo. Wahn ba ma wahng ka etib bia ma yeere go Jerusalem kpee. Wahn ba kp-r ebi ka tib go elkv ni nne noo.”
Pita, a abatiingetib Jisos bako kehm faange re, “E bahke tiki jo wuk Esowo, nne sang e bahk-e wuku.
Esowo bi babnso ejahre bi nyahme Jisos go elkv, ji ń wul-e no, eji ń kum-e go ekros,
Esowo m-e lim njꞌjok a nne, fere rod-e jehke go ege eboblum ana ntubesi, a ntꞌtahre, eji Israel lꞌbel egbokondon, fere bel eltahmeka go bo abiafem.
Wahr ba li atianse nsol nyia kpee, wahr, a Etingi Etohko fvfo ji Esowo kpo ka ane ba kp-e wuku.”
Eji bo wuku ano, eltim kehm kehme bo rak. Bo kehme elsebe ana bo bahke wulu bo.
Nne awohng jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Gamaliel.
Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Abonanee wahn Israel, kunen ekpu go ejum ji ń kpꞌtiri re wahn lim ane baa.

Mahne go, nne awohng no bo jo lung-e re Tudas, á tabe esi, fere rod elne bum wꞌwahre re, ye wo li njꞌjoka nne. Ejum ane atahltahl ba tahme no toon-e. Bo wul-e wul, abatꞌtoono ebe kpee yaame ebo tahm. Etul ebe gbo.
“Kange kan a, Judas ji lohng go Galili kehm kpe ba, ngare nyi bo jo fange ane. Ye fvfo tob bele ellong ane ba jo toon-e. Á tob kpo tan. Abatꞌtoono ebe kpee yaame ebo tahm.
“Elam jia ji anv, n kp-n tongo re, wahn yake ane baa ana, bo song. Eltum nio ni bo kpꞌsebe re bo lim lꞌfere jol ni nne, bahke tane na.
Lꞌfere lohng goji Esowo, wahn, nnene limm, no bahke ma sahde bo. Fundiki bahke jolo ana ń kpꞌnoko a Esowo.”
Bo kehm koko elle ni Gamaliel, fere lung abatiingetib Jisos bao re bo feere ba. Bo kehm dohko bo, kehm rehke bo re, bo kꞌkpe tiki bung go mbing nyi Jisos, kehm yake bo, bo song.
Abatiingetib Jisos kehm lohngo, ane bao sa ekpꞌkpa esub o, tahm ebo. Bo bele eyebatahng tib eji Esowo kpunu bo, bo nyehn erem bio bi esono tib go esi ji Jisos.
Efung abehng abehng bo tikem rahke eltibi go etahk Esowo, fere jo tib go ntahk ane, fere jo tiingi nnoobo etib re Jisos wo li Kraist.

Ngare nyio o eji nfange ane nyi abatꞌtoono Jisos jo kpe rur na budu, nfem kehm gboko anebe Jus ba lohng go Gris, a anebe Jus baka ga ba li etahk. Anebe Jus ba lohng go Gris jo bungu re, efung abehng abehng bo lꞌkehme nsol bak, akalebun ebo kpehme bel jang jang ana ane bako.
Abatiingetib Jisos, ewubu ane abal kehm lungu abatꞌtoono Jisos bako, bo ba kono edi ajehng, kehm bungu re, “Fuumem re wahr yake alum Esowo abungu, fere jo ba bak nsol alehke.
Abonanee, yehken ane asehma go egahne ellong, ba kpꞌyiimi ntianse nyi nno, ba etohko ji Esowo, a elkahne ma rur go bo atahng, wahr ka bo eltum nio.
Wahr bahke rodo ngare enyahre kak go ero akake, fere jo bung alum Esowo.”

Alum nya bo bungu no, yebe ellong ane bao atahng sehng. Owo bo kehm yehke Stiven ji etohko ji Esowo ruru go ege atahng, á fere gbal go ekakesehk, a Filip, go Prokoros, Nikanor, Taimon, Parmenas, a Nikolas ji ki jol nne a Jus, ye ji lohng go Antiok.
Bo kehm koko bo, ba goji abatiingetib Jisos. Bo kehm kake ero fere kunu bo abo.
Alum Esowo kehm yeere na yeere. Abatꞌtoono Jisos kpe rur na go Jerusalem gbalee. Abalimajom gbalee ba tob taame, jo toono eltibi ni Jisos.
Stiven jolo nne no Esowo fuul-e no, fere ka-e nsahm gbalee. Á jo limi akpokosi go esamahr ane.

Ane bandiki joom taame tv-e. Bo kehm kehme nfaabe lim a Stiven. Bandiki lohng go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Silisia, bandiki lohng go Esia, bandiki jo kono elkono go etahk ero ji ane bao ba bo jo lung bo re aforfor ane.
Etohko ji Esowo ka Stiven elkahne gbalee. Eji á jo bung, á jo ga bo. Bo kpeem jo kahn ana bo bahk-e jo faange.
Owo bo kehm nyare ane kak re bo song bung re, “E jo wuku ana á jo su Moses abola Esowo.”
Bo kehm tob nyare ane bako, fere nyare anebkul nfam, a atꞌtibi ba atahm. Bo kehm ba bob-e, ko-e tahm a ne go esub.
Bo kehm koko akimfahnge atianse ba a bo. Atianse nyao ba bungu re, “Nne noa kpo kono ebi bung bada mbarebare etahk Esowo jia, a atahm nya Moses.
E m-e wuk, eji á jo bung re, Jisos ji Nasaret bahke wake etahk Esowo jia, fere yaange atahm nya Moses ko no ba ka-r.”
Kpee ane ba ji ekpꞌkpa elam jio kehm kehme Stiven seenge too. Bo jo nyehne esamahr ebe, jolo are bi enjel bi.
Ntubesi abalimajom noo kehm bahbe Stiven re, “Anv, lohko li anoa?”
Stiven kehm faange re, “Babnso wahn, a abonanee, wuungen atung! Esowo bi kpi ellub kpiri nso ejahre Ebraham eji á lene go Mesopotemia. Ebraham kehm song jol go Haran.
Esowo bungu tong-e re, ‘Tahm nnahb enya sa, wo tahm ejahbe eja sa, song go edi ndi ji m bahk-a tibi.’
Á kehm tahme o ejahbe jio ji bo kpo lung re Kaldea, song lene go Haran. Eji nde kpo no, Esowo kehm yehke Ebraham ejahbe jio, tum-e tv ejahbe jia ji ń lene a anv.
Esowo we kaam edi ndi jio re jol jꞌje. Jol mmokpuku ndi awohng awohng á belem. Esowo nyame tong-e re, á bahk-e kake, jol jꞌje, a ji abon ebe. Jol ngare nyio Ebraham, mmon awohng awohng á ka jel.
“Ana wo Esowo bungu no tong-e re, ‘Abon eba bahke lene go ejahbe jindiki ana ajahmjahm. Bo bahke jolo aju. Ane bao bahke fere jo nohk bo go nnya atahltahl.’
Esowo kehm kpe bung re, ‘M bahke lame ejahbe jio ji bo bahke jo loko bo. Abon eba bahke tahme ejahbe jio o, fere ba lok-m edi jia a.’

“Esowo kehm limi etem a Ebraham, kehm-e tongo re, ‘Wahn kpee bahke jolo ane ba bahke jo yehke nrur. A wo li elliingi ni etem bia.’ Ebraham kehm jele Aisik, kehm-e tob yehke nrur, eji Aisik ma kang nfung enehkeni. Aisik kehm tahme jel Jekob, kehm-e tob yehke nrur. Jekob kehm yehke abon ebe, ewubu ane abal nrur. Ewubu ane abal bao ba jolo babnso ejahre.
“Babnso ejahre bao ba, Josef teele bo ala, bo kehm-e gungu, á jol nju, bo tahm a ne go Ijipt. Esowo jolo a ne sehng.
Á jo tahr-e yehke go erem abehng abehng. Eji Josef ba yiimi go esamahr Fero, Esowo ka-e elkahne. Á fere jo kor Fero, Fero rod-e lim ntul re á jo fili Ijipt, fere fili etahk ntul.
Njal kehm bake go Ijipt, a Kenan. Erem gbale sehng ngare nyio. Babnso ejahre, nsol alehke anyehng anyehng bo kpeem bel.
“Eji Jekob wuku re, nkohl nyia go Ijipt, á kehm tumu babnso ejahre tv go ngbokambang a nkpele.
Nkpel nyehko nyi bo kpe je, Josef kehm lennge elne ka abonanyehn. Ngare nyio nyi Fero kehm kahne ana nnahb a Josef li no.
Josef kehm tiingi etib tv nde re, á ba, a ane ebe kpee. Bo jolo ane atahl ara ane elku kpe kpe.
Owo Jekob kehm tahme go Ijipt. Owo á kpo no, babnso ejahre tob kpo.
Bo solo bo, feere a bo go Sikem, song kak go elahm bi Ebraham gunu goji abon Hemor, ka akpohko gbalee.
Eji ngare ma kabbe nyi Esowo nyame no tong Ebraham, owo ane ebahre kehm ruru go Ijipt.
Ntul no jo fili Ijipt ngare nyio kahnem Josef.
Á jo nehme ane ebahre, jol ndon we joom fili. Á kehm jehke ntahm re, babnso ejahre jo rod abonbili ebo, song bum go ekul, eji bo lꞌjo kpo.
“Ngare nyio nyi bo jele Moses. Á jolo nnobonoba mmon sehng. Á kange nnyahng era mi mi go etahk nde.
Eji bo rod-e no song kak go aya, mmon a Fero no nkal kehm-e song ting. Á kehm-e rodo, le-e ana mmon ewe.
Bo jo tib-e elkahne ni Ijipt kpee. Á kehm jolo njꞌjoka nne go alum abungu, a nsol alimi.
“Eji Moses ma kang nnya atahl abal, á kehm tiri go ege eltim re, á bahke tahme song nyehn abonanyehn Israel.
Eji á je no, á kehm song nyehn nne awohng no nne Ijipt kp-e nohko, kehm kake nne noo ebo, no nne Ijipt jo nohk-e, kehm bongo nne Ijipt noo go elwulu.
Á jo tiri re, ane ebe bahke kahne re, Esowo m-e yehke re, á tahre bo yake. Jol bo tikem kahn.

“Njahmfungfu á kehm kpe song kpiri anebe Israel na abal kpꞌnoko abohng. Á jo gare re á lim, bo bel elkoono. Owo á kehm bungu tong bo re, ‘Wuungen atung, wahn abonanyehn ba. Jen ji wahng ka ń kpꞌnoko atemtem?’
“Nne noko no bohko ntem abohng, kehm gbulu Moses tv go nkpe, kehm-e tongo re, ‘Nne awo lim-a re wo jol ntubesi, fere jo lam alam enyahre?
A kpꞌsebe re wo wul-m ana a wulu nne Ijipt nyaana?’
“Eji Moses wuku ano, á kehm beke go Ijipt, fere song lene go ejahbe ji bo jo lung re Midian. Owo á jele abon abal.
“Eji ma sehng nnya atahl abal, á kehm nyehne enjel nyi Esowo elka emahng go ewong ji bo kpo lung re Sainai. Enjel nyio woomo go agun nya jolo go eti ajehng ji jo lul.
Ejum ji Moses nyehne no, kpo-e esi sehng. Eji á jeere no je re á song nyehn, á kehm wuku ellum ni Ntul Esowo bungu no re,
‘Me wo li Esowo bi babnso ejahne, Esowo bi Ebraham, a bi Aisik, a bi Jekob.’
“Moses kehm kehme elkahme, jol á kpeem sahb seenge.
“Esowo kehm-e tongo re, ‘Yehke akpaketa enya, tibre edi ndi ji á yim ona li mbarebare edi.
Me n lohko nyehn erem bi ane ebame kpꞌnyehne go Ijipt. Me n wuk aromo nya bo kpꞌtuubu. Me m badde ba re me m ba tahre bo. Ba, m bahk-a tumu go Ijipt.’

“Moses ji bo ten-e no, fere bung re, ‘Nne awo lim-a re wo jol ntubesi, fere jo lam alam enyahre?’ ye wo Esowo tum-e no re, á song jol ntubesi, fere jol ntꞌtahre. Enjel nyio nyi á nyehne no go eti jio, nyꞌnehm nyi song tv-e go Ijipt.
Moses kehm yehke bo go Ijipt. Á jo limi akpokosi go Ijipt, a Abilaya fvfo, a elka emahng go nnya atahl abal.
“Moses jꞌnehm o wo bungu tong abone Israel re, ‘Esowo bahk-n tumu nnyehnamahr no bahke lohngo go egahne ellong, jang jang ana á tum-m no.’

“Moses wo jolo a abone Israel go elka emahng. Ye wo jolo a babnso ejahre, a enjel nyi Esowo nyi bungu a ne go ewong jio. Ye wo jolo nne no ko etib bi li go elkpin ba tiing-r. Etib bio lohng goji Esowo.
“Babnso ejahre tꞌten. Bo taamem tv-e. Bo yab-e na tv go nkpe. Go bo a ntim bo jo tiri re, bo feere go Ijipt.
Owo bo kehm bungu tong Eron re, ‘Lim eblom ka-r, jo gbo-r mbang. E nehme kahn ji ma lim Moses ji yehk-r no go Ijipt.’
“Bo kehm limi elom jio go elfoongo ni mmon a nfong, jo jom, eltim jo yebe bo sehng go ejum ji bo limi go bo abo.
“Esowo kehm sennge bo njahm, kehm yake bo re bo jo kak nsol nyi li go elbung, ana ebareka, a njul, go alonlo. Ana bo nyono no go nwer nyi abanyehnamahr Esowo re,
“ ‘Anebe Israel wahn,
me sang wahng ka ń jo wul enyam, jo lim ajom
go nnya atahl abal nyi ń jolo go elka emahng.
Wahn ebsol etahk ji Molohk, elom ejahne,
a elom ji bo jo lung re Refan,
ji jolo go elfoongo ni elonlo.
Bio bi jolo eblom bi ń li no, fere jo jom.
M bahk-n kame tv fee sehng Bebilon sa.’
“Babnso ejahre bele ebkpatahk go elka emahng bi Esowo jo ba kpiri bo, bi bo limi ana Esowo tongo Moses re á lim, jang jang ana á nyehne goji Esowo.
Eji Josua jolo ntubesi abo, owo babnso ejahre kehm kpudu ebkpatahk bio song yel a bi ejahbe jio ji ane ba Esowo kame no. Ebkpatahk bio jolo o tete rehng afung nya Devid.
“Esowo, Devid jo kor-e sehng. Devid kehm bahbe Esowo re, joare nꞌnob re á si etahk ka-e, ye ji li Esowo bi nsoo Jekob.
Solomon wo si etahk jio ka-e.
Esowo bi gbale sehng kpehme lene go ntahk nyi ane si go ebo, ana nnyehnamahr Esowo bungu no re,
“ ‘Elbung ni li eti etul ejame.
Njini nyi li etikunakpade ejame.
Elkohn etahk ani ḿ bahke sehke ka-m?
Gan wo li edi erekekv ejame?
Mefono antahng sang limi nsol nyia kpeea?’
“Wahn ebtahne asi sehng. Ntim enyahne li ntim nyi ane ba ki li aneb Esowo. Atung enyahne eblak. Ngare anyehng anyehng ń kpo kono Etingi Etohko ten. Ana babnso ejahne jo lim, ano wo fvfo ń kpꞌtob lim.
Nnyehnamahr awo no babnso ejahne ki-e nohk? Bo wulu bao ba jo tiingi wuku wuku re, ‘Etingitingi nne kpꞌbake.’ Ye wo ń gung-e no, fere wul-e.
Wahn ba li ane ba ko atahm nya Esowo, nya enjel ko ba ka-n. Ḿ bumem atahm nyao!”
Eji atul esub wuku ana Stiven jo bung, ntim kehm maange bo sꞌsehng.
Stiven ji Etingi Etohko ji Esowo rur-e go ege atahng, kehm kpiidi esamahr ebe seenge go elbung, kehm nyehne ellub ni Esowo, Jisos yim no go eboblum Esowo.
Á kehm bungu re, “Nyehnen, me n nyehn ejahbetul Esowo ma lennge, fere nyehn Mmon no nne yim go ejang eboblum bi Esowo.”
Bo kehm rabe wahre wahre, lohko abo atung, kehm soro song buul-e,
kehm-e tohngo, lohng a ne go ejahbe jio, song rehng a ne go esi mbang. Owo bo song kehm-e atal tuubu re bo wul. Atianse nyao fannge abomo ebo, bum njangkun anyehng, nyi bo jo lung-e re Sol re á kpur.
Eji bo jo tuubu Stiven atal, á jo kake ero re, “Ntul a Jisos, ko-m etohko ejame!”
Á kehm jamme alahng, soro rabe tiim re, “Ntul, nong, abiafem nyaa kꞌkuumu bo go esi!”
Eji á bunga no, á kehm soro kpo.
Sol tꞌtaame tv elwulu ni bo wulu Stiven. Efung bio bo kehm kehme abon Esowo ba jolo go Jerusalem nohk tete. Bo kehm yaame ebo kpee tahm go Judea, a Samaria,
Ane bandiki ba jo fahl Esowo kehm rodo ekv ji Stiven, song kpa kak, fere jo ling tete.
Sol jo sebe re, ero tan. Á jo je etahk ajehng ajehng, jo bob abon Esowo, aneblum, a anebkal, fere jo kak bo go ngbekobo.
Abon Esowo ba yaame no, kehm kehme elyannge edi ajehng ajehng, jo bung alum Esowo.
Filip kehm tahme go Samaria, kehm song tong ane bada Mesaya.
Ane bao wꞌwuungu atung wuk ana ji Filip jo bung. Bo wuku alum nyao nya á jo bung, bo ane kpee, fere nyehn akpokosi nya á jo lim.
Abi atohko gbalee jo biingi tiim, fere jo lohng ane gbalee. Abanne tvv, a agboodo agboodo tꞌtob nob fvfo.
Eyebatahng gbale sehng go Samaria.
Nne awohng jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Saimon. Á jo limi ntaane, fere jo lim nsol nyi jo kpo aneb Samaria esi. Á jo lungu elne re njꞌjoka nne.
Nne awohng awohng go ejahbe jio jo wuk-e wuk, afi á jolo ntul, afi á jolo nja, bo fere jo bung re, “Ye wo kpi nsahm nyio nyi Esowo, nyi bo kpo lung re Egburu Nsahm.”
Bo jo wuk-e, tibre ebkang ji á bomo ntaane nyio go ellimi, jo kpo ane bao esi.
Eji bo taame tv Filip go alum nya á jo bung bade etul bi Esowo, fere jo bung bada mbing nyi Jisos, ji li Kraist owo bo kehm bele ewohngalahb, aneblum, a anebkal anebkal.
Saimon kehm tob taame fvfo. Eji á ma bel ewohngalahb, á jo jene a Filip. Kpo-e esi area, eji á nyehne agburu akpokosi nya Filip jo lim.
Eji abatiingetib Jisos ba jolo go Jerusalem wuku no re, Samaria ebtaame tv alum Esowo, bo kehm tumu Pita abola Jon tv bo.
Eji bo je no, bo kehm song kehme ero kak ka ane bao ba ma taame, eji bo lꞌbel Etingi Etohko.
Tibre nnene limm, no ma bel, sehngem re ewohngalahb ji ji bo bele no go mbing nyi Jisos.
Bo kehm kunu bo abo go esi, bo kehm soro bel Etingi Etohko.
Eji Saimon nyehne re, eji abatiingetib kunu bo abo, owo wahnge bo ma bel Etingi Etohko, owo á kehm taame akpohko ka Pita abola Jon,
kehm bungu re, “Tob ka-m wahn nsahm nyia, eji nne awohng awohng no n lꞌkun-e ebo, á lꞌtob bel Etingi Etohko.”
Pita kehm bungu tong-e re, “Wo, a akpohko akpohko enya ḿ bahke yele go ellulagun, eji a kpꞌtiri re a bahke gunu ayare nya Esowo go akpohko.
Egahre ellong a wobem. Tibre eltim ena limm saang go esamahr bi Esowo.
Gbo ndon go abꞌbi nyaa, wo kak ero ka Ntul Esowo, eji fundiki á lꞌtahm ka-a go ebi ntir nyi a ma tir a.
N kpꞌnyehne re, ala kpo teel-a sehng, a wob ngbekobo nyio nyi abiafem.”
Saimon kehm faange Pita, a Jon re, “Kaken ero ka Ntul Esowo ka-m, goji ejum ajehng ajehng ji ḿ bungu no lꞌki-m lim.”
Eji bo ma bung alum Esowo, fere yiimi ntianse ka Esowo, Pita abola Jon kehm feere go Jerusalem. Go mbang elkehnge ebo, bo jo bungu alum Esowo mbang mbang go abon ajahbe ba Samaria.
Enjel nyi Ntul Esowo kehm bungu tong Filip re, “Mehl, song go erede nfam, edi jio ji mbang li no, nyi bomo go Jerusalem tete rehng go Gasa, mbang nyio nyi li elka emahng.”

Á kehm mehle, soro tahm. Nne Itiopia awohng no bo fang-e no, kehm kehme elsehnge kehnge. Nne noo jolo njꞌjoka nne no jo kuuru nsol afang nya ntul a nnenkal no jo fili Itiopia, no bo jo lung-e re Kandes. Á je go Jerusalem song kak Esowo.
Eji á kpꞌkehnge, á ji go ege a ntrok, jo lung nwer nyi nnyehnamahr Aisaya nyono no.
Etingi Etohko kehm bungu tong Filip re, “Song, wo jen kohlo ntrok nyio!”
