Filip kehm soro be asongo, kehm wuku nne noo kpꞌlungu nwer nyi nnyehnamahr Aisaya nyono no. Á kehm-e bahbe re, “Anv, a kpꞌkahne ji a kpꞌlꞌlunga?”
Nne noo kehm-e faange re, “Tohko tiki jol re, nne wo lennge ka-m, n nehm kahn.”
Á kehm tongo Filip re á wahr, ji go ntrok nyio kohl-e.
Edi nwer Esowo ji á jo lꞌlung li re,
“Á jolo ana njoro nyi bo ma rod,
yahke wul.
Á jolo ana mmon a njoro no kil biingi,
eji bo kp-e kpudu anyar.
Á belle na belle, jol ellum anehng anehng á bungem.
Bo kehm-e rede.
Jol eji bo kahne no re,
yebli eno, bo ten-e tv o.
Nnene limm, no bahke ma bung bade etꞌtohngo eje.
Tibre elkpin ene kpeem li go njini nyia.”
Nne noo o kehm bahbe Filip re, “Anv, nnyehnamahr Esowo bungu bada nyehne? Á bungu bade elnea, afi bada nne nondikandiki?”
Filip kehm bomo elbungu bade edi nwer Esowo ji á jo lung, fere tiing-e nnoobo etib bada Jisos.
Eji bo jo sehng asongo, bo kehm song rehng go ebgba abehng. Nne noo kehm soro bung re, “Nyehn ebgba ana! Jen ji bahke wahnge n kꞌbel ewohngalahb!”
(Filip kehm faange re, “A li ma bel ewohngalahb anv, a lꞌtaame eltim eltim ena kpee.” Nne noo kehm faange re, “Me n taame re, Jisos Kraist wo li Mmon Esowo.”)
Á kehm limi re ntrok nyio yiimi. Filip, a nne noo, bo kehm badde yel go ebgba. Filip kehm-e wohngo alahb.
Eji bo lohngo alahb mao, etohko ji Ntul Esowo kehm soro rod Filip, tahm a ne. Nne noo we kpeem nyehn. Á kehm soro asi eljen asongo a eyebatahng.
Bo kehm nyehne Filip go Asdod. Á kehm soro asi asongo go Sisaria, jo bung alum Esowo mbang mbang go ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji jolo go mbang.
Ngare nyio Sol kpꞌkpeke nyam abatꞌtoono Ntul a Jisos re á bahke wulu bo. Á kehm tahme goji ntubesi abalimajom,

kehm song tong-e re á ka-e awer, á tahm a nya, song tib go ntahk ero nyi li go Damaskus, eji jol afi á nyehne ane bao ba kpꞌtoono mbang nyio nyi nfenfe, á lꞌbob bo aneblum, a anebkal anebkal, feere a bo go Jerusalem.
Eji Sol ma kabbe go Damaskus, ellennge kehm lohngo go elbung ya tub-e.
Á kehm fooro gbo ndi, fere wuk nne no jo bung a ne re, “Sol, Sol, jen ji wahng ka a kp-m nohko anae?”
Sol kehm bahbe re, “Wo nne awo, Ntul?”
Á kehm faange re, “Me Jisos wo, ji a kpꞌnohko.
Mehl, wo song ejahbe jio, owo bo bahk-a tibi ji a bahke limi.”
Ane bao ba jo jen a ne, wuku ellum ellum. Nnene bo nyehnem. Kehm kpoko bo esi, bo yiimi na yiimi anyo kaa.
Sol kehm mehle. Eji á lennge amahr enye, ejumjum á kpeem jo ma nyehn. Bo kehm-e jabbe ebo, tahm a ne go Damaskus.
Á kpeem jo nyehn tete nfung era, jol ejumjum á kpeem jo li, alahb á kpeem jo wo.
Ntꞌtoono Jisos awohng jolo go Damaskus, no bo jo lung-e re Ananayas.
Á nyehne Ntul a Jisos kp-e lungu re, “Ananayas!”
Á kehm faange re, “Me ga, Ntul.”
Ntul a Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Mehl, wo song go etahk Judas ji li go efak ji bo kpo lung re Ntoorambang, wo song kpiri nne no lohng go Tarsus, no bo kpo lung-e re Sol. Á kpi ero kak.
Sol nyehne nne go nlem, no bo kpo lung-e re Ananayas kpꞌbake re á ba kun-e ebo, eji á lꞌkpe nyehn.”
Ananayas kehm faange re, “Ntul, ane gbalee ma-m tub eka bada nne noo, ana á ma sahb nꞌnohk ane eba go Jerusalem.
Anv ana, á ko nsahm goji atubesi abalimajom, eji á lꞌba bob ane kpee ba kpꞌkake ero go ega mbing.”
Ntul a Jisos kehm bungu tong-e re, “Song na song! M m-e yehke re á lok-m, eji mbing enyame lꞌyeere goji ane ba ki nyi Esowo, a atul, go abone Israel.
M bahk-e tibi ajoobo arem nya á bahke nyehne tib go egame esi.”

Ananayas kehm soro tahm song rehng go etahk jio, sehng song yel ekpꞌkpa, kehm song kunu Sol ebo ebe, kehm bungu re, “Egban Sol, Ntul a Jisos ji a nyehn-e go mbang nyi a lohngo no jo ba, ye wo ma-m tum a, eji a lꞌkpe nyehn, Etingi Etohko fere rur go ega eltim.”
Amahr Sol kehm soro lennge, jolo ana eblꞌlu bi laad-e no. Á kehm soro nyehn saang, kehm soro tahm, bel ewohngalahb.
Á kehm lehke nsol, fere kpe bel eko, fere kang abon afung ntiil a abatꞌtoono Jisos go Damaskus.
Sol kehm soro tahm go ntahk ero, song kehme eltibi bada Jisos re, ye wo li Mmon no Esowo.

Ane kpee ba jo wuk-e, kehm kpoko bo esi. Bo kehm kehme elbungu re, “Nne noa sang jo wul ane ba jo taame tv mbing nyia go Jerusalema? Ji wahnge á ba a, á ba re á ba bob bo, feere a bo song ka atubesi abalimajom.”
Sol kpe gbal na, bel eko go alum Esowo abungu. Jus ji jolo go Damaskus, jo fohko bo nkv, tib eji á jo tib re, Jisos wo li Kraist.
Eji ma kang afung tvv, Jus kehm toobo re bo wul-e.
Sol kehm sebe kahn ana bo toobo no. Tibre bo jo baab-e go ati mbu atv a njul re bo wul-e.
Atv, abatꞌtoono ebe kehm-e kake go ejeere, siir-e ekahme ji jolo sennge Damaskus kak, bum njahm ekahme nyehko.
Eji Sol rehnge go Jerusalem, á jo sebe re, á yel go ellong abatꞌtoono Jisos. Bo jo fahl-e fahl. Bo joom bum re, á tob li ntꞌtoona Jisos.

Owo Barnabas kehm-e koko ba ane goji abatiingetib Jisos, fere tooro tong bo ana Sol nyehne Jisos go mbang, Jisos fere bung a ne. Á tꞌtob tong bo ana Sol jo bung alum Esowo go mbing nyi Jisos esahb esahb go Damaskus.
Sol jo jene a bo, fere jo bung alum Esowo go mbing nyi Jisos esahb esahb go Jerusalem.
Á kehm tob bung tong Jus ji jo bung Grik. Bo kehm kehme nfaabe lim, fere jo gare ana bo bahk-e wulu.
Eji abatꞌtoono Jisos bako sebe ano kahn, owo bo kehm koko Sol, tahm a ne go Sisaria, fere tum-e re á song go Tarsus.

Owo wahnge aneb ero bao ba jolo go Judea, a Galili, a Samaria bele eyebatahng ngare nyio, tibre nfem anyehng anyehng kpeem jol. Ero kpe gbal na go nrur, fere tꞌtahne. Bo jo jene go elfahle ni Esowo. Etingi Etohko jo kake bo eltim.
Pita jo yannge, je edi ajehng ajehng. Efung abehng á kehm jeke go Lida, song nyehn aneb Esowo ba jolo go.
Owo á nyehne nne no bo jo lung-e re Anias ji jolo mbanne. Nnya enehkeni nyi á ki kpe jo ma mehl go edilnong.
Pita kehm bungu tong-e re, “Anias, Jisos Kraist bahk-a limi, a nob. Mehl, wo tuungu edilnong eja ya!”
Tvtv ona Anias kehm soro mehl.
Eji ane bao kpee ba jolo go Lida, a Seron nyehn-e no, bo kehm taame tv Esowo.

Nnenkal awohng jolo go Jobba, no bo jo lung-e re Tabita. Á tob jolo ntꞌtoona Jisos. Mbing enye nyi Grik, bo jo lung-e re Dorkas ji lohngo re mbilekpa. Á jo limi nnoobo ngare anyehng anyehng, fere jo kak akpak ebo.
Ngare nyio á kehm gboko eyam, soro kpo. Eji bo wul-e alahb, bo kehm-e rodo song bum go nkimi nyi jolo go ero enyong.
Lida jolo kpidi kpidi kohlo Jobba. Eji bo wuku re, Pita li go Lida, bo kehm tumu ane abal tv re bo song tong Pita re, titi, á ba elwaare, á kꞌlaange.

Owo Pita kehm soro toobo ebjing, tahm toono bo. Eji bo ba no, ba rehng go Lida, bo kehm-e koko tahm a ne go nkimi nyio nyi jolo go ero enyong. Akalebun kpee ba jolo o jo ling, kehm bake ba sennge Pita kak, kehm-e tibi akpawobo, a nsol elliibi nyindiki budu, nyi Dorkas limi no, eji á kpeke li go elkpin.
Pita kehm tongo bo re bo lohng go nkimi nyio. Á kehm jamme alahng, kehm kake ero, kehm keebe seenge nkvne nyio, kehm bungu re, “Tabita, mehl me!”
Á kehm soro lennge amahr enye. Eji á nyehne Pita, á kehm mehle ji.
Pita kehm-e jabbe go ebo, mehl-e yiimi, kehm lungu aneb Esowo, a akalebun, kehm tibi bo Dorkas ana á ma lohko nyahme.
Eka jia kehm yeere go Jobba. Ane tvv kehm taame tv Ntul Esowo.
Pita kange o Jobba afung tvv go etahk Saimon ji jolo nne eltum agunyam.
Nne awohng jolo go Sisaria, no bo jo lung-e re Kornilius. Á jolo ntubesi a nsoja no jo lim eltum go ellong nsoja nyi bo jo lung re, “Ellong nsoja nyi lohng go Itali.”
Á jolo nne no Esowo jo kor-e. Á fere jo fahl Esowo, a ane kpee ba jolo go ege a nlaaga. Á jo wehre abo, jo ko akpohko enye, jo lim nnoobo ka ane, fere jo kak ero ka Esowo kpe kpe ngare.
Jolo ejum nkaranka era nyi elgung, nyi á nyehne enjel nyi Esowo kpꞌbake, kehm ba lung-e re, “Kornilius!”
Eji á jo seenge enjel too, anyar kehm-e lamme. Á kehm-e bahbe re, “Jen ji, nsoo?”
Enjel nyio kehm-e faange re, “Esowo ma-a buumu, eji á ma nyehn nnoobo enya, fere wuk ero eba.
Tum ane anv, bo song go Jobba, song lung Saimon ji bo kpo lung-e re Pita.
Á kpo kang go etahk Saimon, nne eltum agunyam. Etahk eje li go nkpe agburu aya.”
Eji enjel nyio nyi jo bung a ne ma tahm, Kornilius kehm lungu alokeltum ebe na abal, a nne a nsoja awohng no jolo a ne bad bad, no Esowo jo tob kor-e,
kehm tongo bo kpee ji ma lim, kehm tumu bo tv go Jobba.
Etoono efung behko eji bo ma kabbe Jobba ngare efin, Pita kehm wahre go ero etahk re á song kak ero.
Owo njal kehm-e yame. Á kehm kehme elsebe ejum ji á bahke lehke. Ngare nyi bo jo lam nsol alehke re bo ka-e, Pita kehm nyehne nkpokosi ejum.
Á nyehne elbung ma lennge, fere nyehn ejum ji kpꞌbadde abake, jolo ana nsubu nyi bo ma jabbe go esꞌsili emni emni kpꞌbadde beem abake ba rehng go ndi.
Ajoobo enyam gbalee woomo ona atahng, enyam ana eguumu, a enyo, go ntere.
Pita kehm wuku nne no bungu a ne re, “Pita tahm, wo wul li!”
Pita kehm faange re, “Eꞌee Ntul, n ka li a li esabsab nnyam nyi ki li saang.”
Á kehm kpe wuk ellum nehko re, “Ji Esowo ma tong re, li saang, ka kpe bung re, li esabsab ejum.”
Limi ano nkpel na era, tete bo rod nsubu nyio tahm a nyi go elbung.

Eji Pita nyehne nkpokosi nyio, kehm-e fohko nkv. Ngare nyi á kpi ntiri ntiri bade ana nkpokosi nyio lohngo lohng, ane bao ba Kornilius tumu bo ebba yiimi go mbuga. Tibre bobtohko bahb edi ji etahk Saimon li no.
Bo kehm lungu ane ba jolo etahk Saimon, fere bahb bo re, joare Saimon ji bo kpo lung-e re Pita noa o.
Ngare nyio Pita kpi ntiri ntiri bade ejum ji á ma nyehn. Etohko ji Esowo kehm soro tong-e re, “Nyehnee, ane ara baa go, kp-a sebe.
Mehl, wo badde song! Ka fahl eltoono bo, tibre me wo ma tum bo.”
Pita kehm badde je goji ane bao, kehm song tong bo re, “Me wo a, ji ń kp-m sebe. Jen ji wahng ka ḿ ba no?”

Bo kehm faange re, “Kornilius ji li ntubesi a nsoja wo ma-r tum. Á li nnooba nne no kpo fahl Esowo, no Jus kpee kpo kak-e. Enjel nyi Esowo nyi tong-e no re, á tiingi tv-a, wo je go ege etahk, eji á lꞌwuk ji a bahk-e tongo.”
Pita kehm tongo ane bao re bo ba, ba kang o. Etoono efung behko Pita kehm tahme toono bo. Abon Esowo bandiki ba jolo go Jobba kehm-e tob toono.
Njahmfungfu nyehko bo kehm rehnge go Sisaria. Ngare nyio Kornilius ebtiingi ane ebe, a ate ebe re, bo ba ji, jo sik bo.
Eji Pita yahke yel ekpꞌkpa ji Kornilius, Kornilius kehm ba wan-e, gbo jamm-e alahng go ege alata, gong kak-e.
Pita kehm-e tabe yiimi, kehm bungu re, “Mehl yiimi, me nne wo, ana wo.”
Ngare nyi Pita yele go ekpꞌkpa, á kpi mbungu mbungu a Kornilius. Á kehm song kpiri ane gbalee ma ba ji edi ajehng.

Á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahnfono antahng kpꞌkahne re, wahr Jus, ntahm enyahre bungu re, wahr kꞌjo ji elbong goji ane baka baka ba ki li Jus, fere jo kod abo a bo, jo lim ejum ajehng ajehng. Esowo ma-m tib re, me n kꞌjo lung nne awohng awohng re nne noka noka. Jol me n kꞌjo lung nne re, á limm saang.
Eji ń tumu ane tv-m, m ba na ba. N kp-n bahbe re, Jen ji wahnge ń tumu tum ane tv-m?”

Kornilius kehm faange re, “Lela nfung eni ngare nyꞌnehm ana n jo kak ero egame etahk nkaranka era nyi elgung ana n kpo kono ellimi. Nne awohng kehm lohngo ba, ba yiim-m go esamahr. Á kake abarebare nsol nya jo ya na ya.
Á kehm bungu re, ‘Kornilius, Esowo ma-a buumu, eji á ma nyehn nnoobo enya, fere wuk ero eba.
Tum ane, bo song go Jobba, song lung Saimon ji bo kpo lung-e re Pita. Á kpo kang go etahk Saimon ji kpo lim eltum agunyam, ji lene go nkpe agburu aya.’
N kehm soro tum ane tvtv tv-a. Emnob sehng goji a ma taame ba. Owo wahng ka e jehk ana go esamahr bi Esowo kpꞌsiki re wahr wuk ajehng ajehng ji Esowo ma-a tong re wo ba tong-r.”
Pita kehm kehme elbungu re, “Anv, me n seb kahn re, etingitingi, Esowo kpehme rang nne awohng awohng.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌfahl-e, fere lim mbang nyi kpꞌnobo, á bahk-e koko.
Wahn kpꞌkahne etib bi á tiingi Israel, eji Jisos Kraist ko nnoobo etib bio bi elkoono ba a bi. Ye wo li Ntul no ane kpee.
Ngare nyi Jon ma tiingi etib bio bi ewohngalahb, bo kehm bomo elbungu alum nya Jisos go Galili. Alum nyao kehm yeere go Judea kpee.
Wahn kpꞌkahne ana Esowo yaange etohko eje wohngo Jisos ji Nasaret, fere ka-e nsahm. Jisos jo yannge, fere jo lim nnoobo, jo lim ane bao ba nnehm jo nohk bo, bo jo nob. Tibre Esowo jolo a ne.
“Wahr ba li atianse go nsol nyio nyi á limi no go Jerusalem kpee tete rehng go nkpohko ejahbe Jus anyehng anyehng. Bo kehm-e kumu lake go ekros, á kpo.
Esowo kehm-e nyahme go nfung era, fere tib-r ye.
Ane kpe kpe sang nyehn-e no, sehngem wahr ba nyehn-e no, wahr jia ji Esowo yehk-r no ana atianse enye, wahr jia ji jo li, fere jo wo a ne ngare nyi á ma nyahme go elkv.
Á tong-r re wahr jo bung alum Esowo tong ane, fere jo yiimi ntianse re, ye wo Esowo m-e yehke re á lam aneb mbir mbir, fere lam ane ba ma kpo.
Abanyehnamahr Esowo kpee jo bungu bada ne re, nne awohng awohng no lꞌtaame tv-e, á bahke bele eltahmeka go ege abiafem, tib go ege a mbing.”
Ngare nyio eji Pita kpi mbungu mbungu, Etingi Etohko kehm gboko, bulu ane bao ba wuku alum Esowo nyao.
Aneb Esowo ba jolo Jus, ba toono Pita je, kehm kpoko bo esi. Tibre Esowo ebtob ka ane baka baka ba ki li Jus Etingi Etohko.
Bo kehm wuku bo, bo kpꞌbungu ajahbe nyandikandiki, fere jo tehk Esowo.
Pita kehm bungu re,
“Anv, lꞌli nyi nne bahke tene re, wahr kꞌwohngo ane baa alahba? Tibre bobbel Etingi Etohko ana wahr bele no fvfo.”
Á kehm tongo bo re, bo bel ewohngalahb go mbing nyi Jisos Kraist. Bo kehm-e tongo re, á kang abon afung a bo.
Abatiingetib Jisos, a aneb Esowo ba lene go Judea, kehm wuku re, ane baka baka ebtob taame tv alum Esowo.
Eji Pita je no go Jerusalem, ane bao ba jo kor bo re ane baka baka yehke nrur, kehm kehme ntong lim a ne,
fere jo bahb-e re, “Jen ji wahng ka a kehm jeke goji ane ba kil yehke nrur, fere li nsol a bo?”
Pita kehm kehme ellennge ejum ajehng ajehng tong bo ana jolo no. Á bungu re,
“N jolo go Jobba, jo kak ero. N kehm nyehne nkpokosi ejum, nyi bo jabbe go esꞌsili emni, jo badde abake tete ba rehng egame.
Eji n seenge no nob nob, n kehm nyehne enyam, bindiki abibbib enyam, bindiki enyam ana eguumu, a enyo, go ntere.
Owo n kehm wuku ellum ni jo bung tong-m re, ‘Pita tahm, wo wul li!’
N kehm tene, nde, ‘Eꞌee Ntul, n ka li a li esabsab ejum ajehng ajehng ji ki li saang tete sik anv.’
N kehm kpe wuk ellum ni lohng go elbung, ni bungu re, ‘Ji Esowo ma tong re li saang, ka kpe lung re, li esabsab ejum!’
“Limi anaana nkpel na era, nsubu nyio kehm feere tahm go elbung.
“Ngare nyꞌnehm ona, ane ara kehm soro lohng a etahk ji e jolo no. Bo tumu bo go Sisaria tv me.
Etohko ji Esowo kehm soro tong-m re, me n toono bo, me n kꞌfaabe. Abon Esowo, ane arakera baa tꞌtob tahm toon-m. E kehm song rehng etahk nne noo.
“Á tong-r ana á nyehne enjel yim no go ege etahk, nyi bungu re, ‘Tum ane, bo song go Jobba, song lung Saimon ji bo kpo lung-e re Pita, á ba.
Ye wo bahk-a tiingi etib bi bahke wahnge ka a bel eltahre, a etahk etahk eja kpee.’
“Eji m bomo elbungu, Etingi Etohko kehm soro gbo, bulu bo, jang jang ana tob lim-r go mbomannahb.
N kehm soro buumu ellum ni Ntul a Jisos bungu re, ‘Jon jo wohngo ane alahb maka maka, wahn bahke bele ewohngalahb ji Etingi Etohko.’
“Esowo ka ane baka baka ayare nyao, ana á tob ka-r, eji e taame tv Ntul a Jisos Kraist. Anv, me n li renan ji m bahke kehm sahde Esowo?”
Eji bo wuku ano me, bo kehm belle na belle soom, kehm kehme Esowo tehk re, “Esowo ebtob ka ane baka baka eyake re bo gbo ndon, fere bel elkpin.”
Ngare nyi bo wulu Stiven, ebnohko gbale sehng, aneb Esowo yꞌyaame.
Aneb Esowo bandiki ba lohngo go Saiprus, a Sirin kehm tahme go Antiok. Bo kehm song bung alum Esowo bade Jisos tong aneb Grik fvfo.
Nsahm nyi Ntul Esowo jolo a bo. Ellong ane gbalee ba taame no, feere goji Ntul Esowo.
Aneb ero ba jolo go Jerusalem kehm wuku ana ji ma lim go Antiok. Bo kehm tumu Barnabas tv go Antiok.
Eltim yeb-e sehng, eji á je no, song nyehn ana Esowo ma fuulu bo. Á kehm rehke bo ane kpee re, bo soro asi go eltoono Ntul a Jisos a ntim a ntim ebo.
Tibre Barnabas jolo nnooba nne no bele ekakesehk, etohko ji Esowo ruru go ege eltim. Ellong ane gbalee ba kpe jo taame tv Ntul a Jisos.
Barnabas kehm tahme go Tarsus re á song kpur Sol.
Eji á nyehn-e no, á kehm-e koko ba a ne go Antiok. Bo kehm jolo ona elya anehng, a aneb ero, jo tib ane gbalee. Go Antiok wo, bo gbo mbang lung abatꞌtoono Jisos re ane ba Kraist.
Ngare nyio nyi abanyehnamahr Esowo kehm lohngo go Jerusalem ba go Antiok.
Nne awohng go bo ellong, no bo jo lung-e re Agabus kehm mehle yiimi, kehm kehme elbungu go nsahm nyi Etingi Etohko bade esꞌsong re, egburu njal bahke bake go njini kpee.
Abatꞌtoono Jisos bao kehm toobo re bo bahke jo tꞌtum nsol alehke tv abon Esowo ba li go Judea, ana nne awohng awohng bele no.
Bo kehm limi ano, kehm kake Barnabas abola Sol nsol nyio go abo re bo ko song ka anebkul ero.
Ngare nyio nyi Herod kehme aneb ero bandiki nohk.
Á wulu Jems mmonannyehn Jon go ekahngkahng.
Á nyehne kan re, eji á limi ano, ebyebe Jus atahng, á kehm kpe bob Pita fvfo. Ejum jia limi ngare elkak ni abred nya ki kpi ayist.
Eji bo bob-e no, bo kehm-e song kak go ngbekobo. Bo rod-e kak nsoja na eni go ebo, re bo baab-e. Ni ellong bele nsoja ane ani. Herod tiri re, elkak nio ni Pasova lꞌmal, á kehm-e yehke ba ka Jus.
Ngare nyio eji Pita kpeke wob go ngbekobo, aneb ero jo kake ero tꞌtahne ka Esowo tib go esi ji Pita.
Atv mao ma Herod jo tiri re, á bahke yehke Pita ba ka ane, Pita woomo go elka elka ni nsoja na ebal, jo lal.
Owo enjel nyi Ntul Esowo kehm lohngo ba. Ellennge kehm yake go nkimi ngbekobo nyio. Enjel nyio kehm bunu Pita go ebahk, nyahm-e, kehm-e tongo re, “Mehl elwaare!”
Agbekobo nyao kehm soro won-e abo gbo.
Enjel kehm-e tongo re, “Gbaange egbaange eja, wo kak akpaketa enya!”
Pita kehm limi ano kpee.
Enjel kehm-e kpe tong re, “Konngo nsubu enya, wo tahm toon-m!”
Pita kehm lohngo toon-e. Á kahnem re, ji enjel jo lim lohko li etingitingi. Pita jo tiri re, á kpꞌleeme na.

Eji bo ma sehng ngbokambang a mbꞌbaabe sa, fere sehng etoono sa, bo kehm song rehng go eti mbu ji bo ko akuungu lim, ji nne bahke sehnge o rehng go nfam. Lennge ntahngtahng ka bo. Bo kehm lohngo, jo jen asongo alab mbang. Enjel kehm soro tahm, Pita sa.
Pita, amahr kehm-e bange, á kehm bungu re, “Anv, me n lohko kahn re, Ntul Esowo ebtum enjel enye, ba tahr-m go abo nya Herod. Á ma-m fere yehke go nfem nyi Jus tiri re bo lim-m.”
Á sebe kan kahn ana ma jol me, á kehm tahme go etahk Meri nnyehn Jon, Jon jio ji bo jo lung-e re Mak.
Eji Pita jo kahd go mbutahk, nlokeltum no bo jo lung-e re Roda kehm bake.
Á liingi kan ellum ni Pita, á bele eyebatahng sehng, jol mbu á lenngem. Á be na be, yel ekpꞌkpa, kehm song tong ane bako re, “Pita noa, yim go mbutahk.”
Bo kehm-e tongo re, “Anv, esahl bi kp-a lima?” Á kehm faange re, “Lohko li etingitingi.”
Bo kehm bungu re, “Enjel enye nyi ona.”
Ngare nyio Pita kpi nkahde nkahde go mbutahk. Bo kehm song lennge mbu, kehm-e nyehne. Eji bo nyehn-e no, kpo bo esi sehng.
Pita kehm bunu bo ebo re bo rahke, bo kꞌkpe bung. Á kehm kehme eltooro ana Esowo m-e yehke go ngbekobo, kehm bungu re, “Tob tongen Jems,
Pita kehm soro tahm eje ejahbe jindiki.
Eji efungfu se no, ebud nsoja jokko na jokko. Bo kpeem kahn ji ma lim eyaame ji Pita.

Herod kehm tongo ane ebe re bo song seb Pita. Bo seb-e, bo we tikem nyehn. Á kehm kehme abꞌbaabe bao abahbe bahb, kehm tongo re bo wul bo. Herod kehm tahme go Judea, sehng song rehng go Sisaria, sa kang go.

Herod, eltim jo rak-e tob aneb Taya, a Saidon sehng. Bo kehm tahme egom re bo song nyehn Herod. Bo gbo mbang sennge Blastus eltim feere go bo ejang. Blastus jolo ntubesi alokeltum Herod. Bo kehm tahme goji Ntul a Herod, song gboong-e re, “Titi, e ma-a gbo.” Tibre ajahbe ebo belem edi jindiki ji bo jo je, song gunu nsol alehke, sehngem ejahbe ji Herod ji ji bo jo je.
Efung bio bi Herod kunu tv, á liibi nsol nyi atul kpo liibi, kehm ba ji go eti etul eje, kehm kehme elbungu a ane.
Ane bao kehm soro rabe re, “O alum nya nne sang, nya Esowo nya!”
Tvtv ona enjel nyi Ntul Esowo kehm soro gbul Herod tub ndi. Tibre á kaam Esowo ellub. Aroongo kehm-e lehke, á kpo.
Alum Esowo kehm kpe yeere, fere gbꞌgbal.
Barnabas, a Sol, eji bo ma mal eltum ebo go Jerusalem, bo kehm koko Jon Mak tahm a ne kehnge.

Abanyehnamahr Esowo jolo go ero bio bi Antiok, a atꞌtibi fvfo. Abing ebo, noko, bo jo lung-e re Barnabas, noko Simeon ji bo jo lung-e re Naija, noko Lusius ji jolo nne a Sirin, noko Manaen ji bo jolo nlaaga anyehng a ntul a Herod tete bo gbal, noko Sol.
Eji bo jo kak Esowo, fere jo bade elbo njal, Etingi Etohko kehm bungu tong bo re, “Yaken Barnabas, a Sol, bo jo lim eltum ni n yehke bo.”
Bo kehm bade elbo njal, fere kak ero, kunu bo abo, kehm tumu bo re bo song.
Ana etohko ji Esowo tumu bo, bo kehm tahme go Silusa. Ona wo bo yele go egbang, tahm go Saiprus.
Eji bo rehnge go Salamis, bo kehm kehme alum Esowo bung go ntahk ero nyi Jus. Jon Mak jolo a bo, jo kak bo ebo go eltum.
Eji bo jo yannge ejahbe jio ji li elka alahb, bo kehm song rehng go Pafos. Owo bo kpiri nne a ntaane awohng no bo jo lung-e re Barjisos. Á jolo nne a Jus no jolo nkimfahnga nnyehnamahr.
Á jolo a ntubesi ejahbe no bo jo lung-e re Serjes Polos ji jolo ekahnkahn nne. Ntubesi noo kehm lungu Barnabas, a Sol, tibre á jo sebe re á wuk alum Esowo.
Nne a ntaane noo no bo jo lung-e go alum Grik re Elimas joom taame tv Bab Sol. Á jo sebe re, á sennge ntubesi noo eltim, á kꞌtaame.
Sol ji bo jo lung-e re Pol ji etohko ji Esowo rur-e go ege eltim, kehm seenge nne a ntaane noo too,
kehm bungu re, “Wo mmon a nnehm noa, wobgbal go enehm sehng, a abꞌbi. A kpo ko etingitingi ekv. A kpo seb re, wo yaange etingitingi ji Esowo, fere kak efahnge.
Erakatahng ji Esowo bahke gboko tub-a anv, a bahke wake amahr. A nehm kpe waka nyehn njul nyia.”
Tvtv ona ejannge kehm soro gbo-e, á kehm kehme ane seb, ba bahk-e jabbe go ebo, jo tib-e mbang.
Ntubesi noo kehm taame, eji á nyehne ejum ji ma lim. Tibre eltibi nio ni Esowo jo kpo-e esi sehng.
Pol, a ane ebe bako, bo kehm yele egbang go Pafos, song rehng go Perga ji Pamfilia. Jon Mak kehm beke bo sa, feere eje go Jerusalem.
Bo kehm tahme go Perga, sehng song rehng go Antiok ji Pisidia. Eji efung Esabat rehnge no, bo kehm tahme go etahk ero ji Jus, song ji.

Eji ane bao ma lung atahm nya Moses, fere lung alum nya abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono no, atubesi etahk ero jio kehm lungu bo re, “Abonanee, joare ń kpꞌkpi elle anehng anehng ni ḿ bahke tubu ane, tuben bo!”
Pol kehm mehle yiimi, faake ebo, kehm bungu re, “Anebe Israel, a wahn jia ji kpi Esowo fahl, wuungen atung!
Esowo bio bi Israel, ye wo yehke babnso ejahre, fere lim bo, bo rur, eji bo jolo go Ijipt. Esowo kehm yehke bo go Ijipt ege a nsahm.
Á le bo go elka emahng ejum nnya atahl abal.
Esowo tane ejahbe na ebsehma go ndi nyi Kenan, faake a ndi nyio bak bo.
“Owo á kehm kake bo abalamalam ba jo lam alam ane bao go ejum nnya atahltahl atahl abal a nnya ewubu, tete kehm song rehng go ngare nyi nnyehnamahr Samuel.
Bo jo sebe re bo bel ntul. Esowo kehm kake bo ntul no bo jo lung-e re Sol mmon a Kis, no lohng go etꞌtohngo ji Benjamin. Á jolo ntul go nnya atahl abal.

“Eji Esowo ma fak Sol, á kehm fere lim Devid jol ntul abo. Alum nya Esowo bungu bade Devid li re, ‘Devid ji mmon a Jesi wo li elkohn nne no kor-m no, no bahke limi ajehng ajehng ji n lꞌtong-e re á lim.’
“Go etꞌtohngo ji Devid wo, Jisos lohng no. Esowo lim-e ntꞌtahre no Israel ana á nyame no.
Re Jisos kehm bake, Jon ebtohko tiingi etib bi ewohngalahb, tong anebe Israel kpee re bo gbo ndon go bo abiafem.

Eji eltum ni Jon yahke mal, á kehm bungu tong bo re, ‘Anv, n kpꞌtir re, me n li elkohn nne awo? Me sang li nne no ń kp-e siki, no kpꞌbake go, jol me n tohkem fꞌfuumu re, me n fannge alehke akpaketa enye.’
“Abonanee, abon Ebraham, a ane ba wob go egahne ellong, ba kpꞌfahle Esowo, wahr ba wahnge etib bia bi eltahre ma ba.

“Tibre ane ba jolo go Jerusalem, a atubesi ebo, tib esi ji bo ki-e liingi re ye ntꞌtahre wo, jol alum nya abanyehnamahr nya bo jo lung go efung Esabat abehng abehng bo kahnem, bo lohko lim ebung ji enyehnamahr jio jol go etingitingi ji bo kimi elam re bo wul-e.
Jol ebꞌbi ajehng ajehng bo nyehnem ji kehn fuumu re bo wul-e. Tvtv ona bo tongo Pailet re á yak-e ka nsoja, bo wul-e.
Eji bo ma lim kpee, ana nwer Esowo bungu no bada ne, bo kehm-e fono go ekros, song kak elahm.
Esowo nyahm-e go elkv.
Afung tvv nya á jo kpiri ane ba jo lohng go Galili, jo toon-e tahm go Jerusalem. Bao ba li atianse enye anv.
“Wahr ko nnoobo etib ba abi, bi Esowo nyame no tong babnso ejahre.
Ana Esowo nyame no tong bo, ano wo á ma lim ka wahr ji li abon ebo, eji á nyahme Jisos go elkv. Ano wo fvfo bo tob nyon go nwer ebal nyi Saams re,
“ ‘Wo wo li mmon ewame,
lela wo a ma jini.’
“Ano wo Esowo bungu no bade elnyahme ni Jisos go elkv, fere bung bade ana á lꞌkꞌbol go ndi re, ‘Elfuulu ni m bahk-e fuulu bahke jolo etingitingi elfuulu ni kpꞌbare saang, ni n nyame tong Devid.’
“Edi nwer a Saams jehko kpe bung re, ‘A nehm taame re nnooba nlokeltum ewa bol go ndi.’
“Tibre Devid go ege a ngare á loko Esowo, fere jo lim ejum ajehng ajehng ji Esowo sebe re á lim, tete á kpo. Bo kpa-e kak kohlo alahm nya babnsoo. Á bꞌbol go ndi.
Ye ji Esowo nyahm-e go elkv, á bolem go ndi.
“Owo nobo re wahn kahn abonanee re, nne noo wo wahng ka e kp-n tiingi etib bi eltahmeka go abiafem.
Nne awohng awohng no lꞌtaame tv-e, á bahk-e limi, á for go ege abiafem kpee. Tibre atahm nya Moses nehm ma lim nne, á for go ege abiafem.
“Kunen ekpu, goji ejum ji abanyehnamahr Esowo bungu no lꞌki-n lim, ji bo bungu re,
“ ‘Wahn ane ba nsol kil jo lub-n,
nyehne nkpokosi, wahn kpo, kꞌkahn.
Tibre ejum ji m bahke limi go egahne ngare,
ń nehm tiki taame,
jol afi nne lennge na ka-n.’ ”
Eji Pol, a Barnabas jo lohng ekpꞌkpa ero jio, ane bao kehm gboongo bo re, bo kpe feere ba efung Esabat behko, kpe ba tib bo budu.
Eji ane ma lohng ekpꞌkpa ero, Jus gbalee, a ane baka baka ba jo kak Esowo ana Jus, bo kehm toono Pol, a Barnabas. Bab Pol kehm tibi bo, fere rehke bo re bo soro asi, yiimi ano go nnoobo nyi Esowo.
Etoono Esabat jehko, ka riki ejahbe jio kpee kame na kam ba rur, jo wuk alum Esowo.
Eji Jus nyehne ellong ane ana bao, ala kehm kehme bo teele. Alum nya Pol jo bung, jo sabe bo sehng, bo kehm-e jahre alum, fere jo su-e.
Pol, a Barnabas, bo jo kpe bung na esahb esahb re, “Fuumu re bo tohko bung alum Esowo tong-n.
Tibre Ntul Esowo tong-r re,
“ ‘M ma-n yehke re wahn jol ellennge ka ane ba ki nyi Esowo,
goji eltahre lꞌrehng go ejang njini abehng abehng.’ ”
Eji ane baka baka wuku ano, eltim yebe bo sehng. Bo kehm kehme alum Esowo tehk. Ane bao ba Esowo ma yehke re bo bel elkpin ni li go njinanjini, bo tꞌtaame.
Alum Ntul Esowo kehm yeere na yeere go ejahbe jio kpee.
Jus kehm kehme atubesi nfam nyare, fere nyare anebkal ba ki jol Jus, ba jo kak Esowo, ba jolo ajꞌjok ane. Bo kehm kehme Pol a Barnabas gbak, fere kam bo re bo tahm ejahbe jio song.
Bab Pol kehm kumu ebtohko go bo akpade tv bo, fere tahm go Ikonium.
Abatꞌtoono Jisos ba jolo o, etohko ji Esowo ruru bo go bo a ntim, bo fere bel eyebatahng.
Eji bo rehnge go Ikonium, Pol, a Barnabas, bo song yel go ekpꞌkpa ero ji Jus. Bo bungu sehng, toono o, Jus gbalee taame, a ane baka baka gbalee fvfo.
Jus ji ki taame, kehm kehme ane baka baka nyare, fere sennge bo ntim tob aneb Esowo.
Abatiingetib Jisos bao kange ona afung tvv. Bo jo bungu a esahb esahb bada Ntul Esowo no yiimi ntianse ka alum nyao nya nnoobo enye, eji á ka bo nsahm re bo jo lim akpokosi.
Ane ba jolo go ejahbe jio kehm yabe. Egom jindiki jolo ka Jus, egom jehko jolo ka abatiingetib Jisos.
Owo ane baka baka, a anebe Jus, go atubesi ebo kehm toobo re, bo nohk Pol, a Barnabas, fere tuubu bo atal.
Bab Pol wuku kan ano me, bo kehm soro be tahm go Listra, sehng o song rehng go Derbe, a abon ajahbe ba Likaonia ba tob jol o fvfo.
Owo bo bungu alum Esowo.
Nne jolo go Listra, no ki jo ma jen. Á jolo mbanne bomo ngare nyi bo jel-e na jel.
Á ji, jo wuungu atung go alum Esowo nya Pol jo bung.
Pol kꞌkahn re, nne noo ebtaame elkohn eltaame ni á bahke nobo.
kehm bungu wahre wahre tong-e re, “Mehl yiimi?”
Á kehm soro mehl, kehme eljene.
Eji ellong ane bao nyehne nkpokosi nyi Pol ma lim, bo kehm kehme elrabe go alum nya Likaonia re, “Esowo ebbadde ba go elfoongo ni nne!”
Bo lungu Barnabas re Sus, fere lung Pol re Hermes, tibre Pol wo jolo mbꞌbungu.
Nlimajom no elom ji bo jo lung re Sus kehm koko efong, a atꞌtul, tahm a nya go eti mbu, tibre bo si etahk elom jio go esi mbang. Owo bo je no re bo song lim njom ka abatiingetib Jisos bao.
Eji Pol, a Barnabas wuku ji bo yahke song lim, bo kehm yare awobo ebo, be song yel go ellong ane bao, kehm kehme elrabe re,

“Wahn jia, jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌlimi ana? Wahr li ane ana wahn! E ko nnoobo etib ba a bi, eji ń lꞌsennge njahm go nsol nyi li mbol mbol, feere goji Esowo bi li go elkpin, bi limi elbung, a ndi, a aya, go nsol kpee nyi li no.
Mahne mahne Esowo yake ane kpee, bo jo jen go mbang nyi koro bo.
Tvtv o, á kpo lennge elne go anobonobo nsol nya á kpo lim, ana elahb ji kpo lohng go elbung, na ka-n, ana nsol enyahne nyi kpo lak go ngare. Á kpo ka-n nsol alehke, fere ka-n eyebatahng.”
Sa ntiil ane bao lim njom ka bo, jol eji bo jo bꞌbung alum nyao tong bo.
Jus jindiki lohngo go Antiok ji Pisidia, bandiki lohng go Ikonium, ba sennge ane bao ntim, feere goji bo. Bo tuubu Pol atal, tohng-e, lohng a ne go esi mbang. Tibre bo jo tiri re, yebkpo.
Eji abatꞌtoono Jisos ba no, ba rur senng-e kak, Pol kehm soro mehl, tahm go nla ejahbe. Etoono efungfu behko Pol, a Barnabas kehm tahme asongo go Derbe.
Bo kehm bungu alum Esowo go Derbe. Ane gbalee ba taame no o. Bab Pol kehm feere go Listra, sehng song rehng go Ikonium, sehng o kehm song rehng Antiok ji Pisidia.
Bo jo kake abatꞌtoono Jisos ba jolo o eltim, fere jo rehke bo re bo soro asi ano ano go mbang nyi Esowo. Bo jo tibi ane re, “E bahke tiki nyehn erem, kehm yele go ejahbetul Esowo.”
Bo jo yehke anebkul ero go ero abehng abehng, fere rod bo kak Ntul Esowo bi bo ma taame tv-e go ebo, jo kak ero, fere jo bade elbo njal.
Bo kehm sehnge asongo go Pisidia, fere sehng o rehng go Pamfilia.
Eji bo ma bung alum Esowo go Perga, bo kehm tahme asongo go Atalia.
Owo bo yele go egbang asongo go Antiok, ejahbe jio ji bo rodo bo, kak Esowo go ebo, tib go eltum ni bo ma lim mal.
Eji Pol, a Barnabas ma ba rehng go Antiok, bo kehm lungu aneb ero kpee, ba kono edi ajehng, kehm tooro nsol nyi Esowo ma ko bo lim, tong bo ana Esowo ma lennge mbang ka ane baka baka re bo tob taame.
Bo kange afung tvv a abatꞌtoono Jisos bao.
Ane bandiki lohngo go Judea ba go Antiok, ba kehme abon Esowo ba li o tib re, “Tohko tiki jol re, ń yehke nrur ana ntahm nyi Moses tibi no, ń nehm tiki bel eltahre.”

Pol, a Barnabas, bo jo limi nfaabe a bo bada nsol nyio, edi jooko na jooko. Ano wo wahnge bo toobo no re, Pol, a Barnabas, a aneb Esowo bandiki ba li go Antiok, bo song go Jerusalem, song kpiri abatiingetib, a anebkul ero, bo toobo nfem nyio.

Aneb ero kehm tumu bo, bo kehm tahme, song sehng go Fenisa, a Samaria. Edi ajehng ajehng bo jo tooro ana ane baka baka kpꞌgboko ndon go bo abiafem, feere goji Esowo. Eji abatꞌtoono Jisos bao wuku ano, ntim yebe bo sehng.
Eji Bab Pol song rehng go Jerusalem, aneb Esowo, a abatiingetib a anebkul ero vvrv bo sehng. Bo kehm tooro nsol nyi Esowo ma ko bo lim, tong bo.
Aneb Esowo bandiki ba woomo go ellong Farisis kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu re, “Tiki li re, bo tiki yehke nrur, fere bum atahm nya Moses.”
Abatiingetib Jisos, a anebkul ero kehm bake ba ji edi ajehng re bo toobo nfem nyia.

Eji bo ma bung tetete, Pita kehm mehle yiimi, kehm bungu re, “Abonanee, ń kpꞌkahne re, ebkang ji Esowo yehk-m no go egahne ellong re, go egama nnyo wo ane baka baka bahke wuku nnoobo etib, fere taame.
“Esowo bi kpꞌkahne ntim ane. Ye wo yiimi ane baka baka ntianse, eji á ka bo Etingi Etohko ana á tob ka-r.
Elyaange anehng anehng limm, wahr a bo. Yebtahm ka bo go bo abiafem, tib eji bo ma taame.
“Anv, jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌgare Esowo? Jia li ana e kpꞌrodo elsol ni nnen si ane baka baka, elsol ni jol babnso ejahre ki ma sol, awahr awahr fvfo.
Wahr kpꞌtaame re, nnoobo nyi Ntul a Jisos nyi kpo wahng ka e bel eltahre, ano wo fvfo bo ma tob bel.”
Ellong ane bao kpee belle na belle, eji bo wuku Barnabas, a Pol kpꞌtooro bade akpokosi nya Esowo ka bo re bo lim go ellong ane baka baka ba ki li Jus.
Bo bungu kan a rahke, Jems kehm bungu re, “Abonanee, wuungen atung?
Saimon Pita kpꞌna bungu anv anv re, Esowo ebgbo mbang tib elkoro ene goji ane baka baka, tibre yebyehke ane go bo ellong re bo jol ane ebe.
Alum nya abanyehnamahr Esowo bungu no ebwane a nya Pita, ana nwer Esowo bungu no re,
“ ‘Nyaa lꞌsehng, owo m bahke feere ba tuungu etahk ji Devid ji ma gbo, si.
M bahke tuungu nkultahk nyio si,
goji egom ane bako lꞌseb Ntul Esowo,
a ane baka baka kpee, ba li abehn nyanyame.
Ano wo Ntul Esowo bungu no,
eji á lennge nsol nyia mahne mahne.’ ”
Owo Jems kehm kpe soro asi go elbungu re, “Egame, kor-m re wahr kꞌjo gbiingi ane baka baka ba kpꞌtaame tv Esowo.
Ji li no li re, wahr nyon nwer tong bo re, bo kꞌjo li nsol nyi bo ma ko jom eblom, nyi ki li saang, bo jo jahng asꞌsa, bo kꞌjo li nnyam nyi bo kahn-e ekehd, á kpo, bo kꞌjo li alung.
Tibre atahm nya Moses, bo bomo ellungu mahne mahne go ntahk ero enyahre efung Esabat abehng abehng. Alum nyao, ejahbe ajehng ajehng limm, ji bo kala bung.”

Abatiingetib Jisos, a anebkul ero, a aneb ero kpee, bo toobo re bo yehke ane go bo ellong tum tv go Antiok. Bo yehke Judas ji bo jo lung-e re Barsabas, fere yehke Sailas, ane abal baa ba jo sahb lꞌlub aneb ero bao. Bo toono Pol, a Barnabas.
A wo li nwer nyi bo tumu no, nyi bo nyono re, “Wahr abatiingetib Jisos, a anebkul ero, ba li abonanee ejahne, e ma-n kak nnyo, wahn abonanee ba ki li Jus, ba lene go Antiok, a Siria, go Silisia.
Wahr ebwuk re, ane ebahre bandiki ebba ba bung alum nya ma-n bil amahr, fere joob-n go egahna ntim. Elle anehng anehng e tubem bo re bo ba bung elkohn alum ana nyao.
Wahr ebkono edi ajehng, yehke ane re wahr tum bo tv-n. Bo bahke toono akpondahme enyahre Pol, a Barnabas,
bo ji ma taame elkv go esi ji Ntul a Jisos Kraist.
E yehke Judas, a Sailas re bo ba tong-n nsol nyꞌnehm go nnyo a nnyo ana e nyono no.
Etingi Etohko, a wahr ebtaame re, e nehm si-n elsol ni nnen, sehngem re akahmekahme nsol nyaa, nya nya fuumu re wahn kꞌjo lim.
Kana jo li nsol nyi bo ma ko jom eblom, nyi ki li saang.
Bo kehm tumu ane ba bo yehke bo, bo song rehng go Antiok, kehm song lung aneb Esowo bao, ba kono edi ajehng, kehm kake bo nwer nyio.
Eji bo lungu no, eltim yebe bo sehng go erehke ji bo kake bo.
Judas, a Sailas, bo ji jolo abanyehnamahr Esowo kehm kehme bo rehke, fere jo kak bo eltim.
Eji bo ma kang abon afung o, ane bao kehm tongo bo re, bo feere song kehnge a eyebatahng goji ane ba tumu bo.
(Sailas kehm tiri re, ye bahke jolo o).
Pol, a Barnabas, bo sa ona Antiok, fere jo tib ane alum Esowo, fere jo bung alum Esowo tong ane. Ane gbalee bako jo tꞌtob bung fvfo.
Eji ma kang abon afung ntiil, Pol kehm tongo Barnabas re, “Ba wahr feere tahm goji aneb Esowo ba li go ajahbe nya e bungu alum Esowo, song nyehn ana bo li no.”
Barnabas jo sebe re, Jon Mak toono bo.
Pol kehm bungu re, “Nobem re wahr kpe-e ko, tibre á tahm-r sa go Pamfilia. Á jolem a nahre tete e lim eltum mal.”
Bo kehm kehme nfaabe lim tꞌtahne bo bo, kehm yaame. Barnabas kehm koko Mak, bo yel egbang tahm go Saiprus.
Pol yehke Sailas. Aneb Esowo kehm jabbe bo kak Ntul Esowo go ebo, bo kehm soro tahm.
Pol je go Siria, fere sehng song rehng go Silisia, jo kak aneb ero eko.
Pol kehm soro asi rehng go Derbe, a Listra. Ntꞌtoona Jisos awohng jolo ona, no bo jo lung-e re Timoti. Nnyehn jolo nne a Jus. Á tob jolo mmon Esowo. Nde jolo nne a Grik.
Abon Esowo ba jolo go Listra, a Ikonium jo tehke Timoti sehng.
Pol jo sebe re Timoti toon-e. Á kehme koko, song yehk-e nrur, tib go esi ji Jus ji jolo adi nyao. Tibre bo kpee jo kahne re, nde Timoti jolo nne a Grik.
Eji bo jo sehng ajahbe nyao o, bo jo tongo bo re bo jo bum alum nya abatiingetib Jisos toobo no go Jerusalem, a anebkul ero.
Aneb ero bao ona gbale na, fere yiimi tꞌtahne go mbang nyi Esowo. Ane jo kpe rur na efung abehng abehng, ba jo taame.
Bo jo yannge go Frigia, a Galesa. Etingi Etohko joom taame re bo bung alum Esowo go Esia.
Eji bo ma kabbe Misa, owo bo kehm gare re bo sehng go Bitinia. Etohko ji Jisos taamem.
Bo sehnge go nkpe ejahbe nyi Misa rehng go Troas.
Pol kehm nyehne nkpokosi anyehng atv. Á nyehne nne a Masedonia yim no, kp-e gboongo re, “Ba ga Masedonia, wo ba kak-r ebo!”
Pol nyehne kan nkpokosi nyio o, wahr ane kpee, e kehm soro toobo ebjing, tahm go Masedonia. Tibre wahr ebseb kahn re, Esowo bi ma-r lung re wahr song bung alum enye tong bo.
E yele egbang go Troas tete song rehng go Samotres. Etoono efung behko e rehng go Neapolis.
Owo e sehnge no song rehng go Filipai ji jolo ngbokambang ejahbe go Masedonia. Ejahbe jio woomo go elwo ni Rom. Owo e kange abon afung.
Efung Esabat e kehm lohngo ejahbe jio, tahm go nkpe aya. Tibre e tiri re, edi jio ji li edi ero akake. E kehm jehke, kehm kehme elbungu a anebkal bao ba ba no, ba kono edi ajehng.
Nnenkal awohng jolo ona, no bo jo lung-e re Lidia ji jolo nne a Tiatira. Á jo jene are abomo nya nno, fere jo kak Esowo. Á jo wuungu atung go alum nya Pol jo bung, tibre Esowo bi lennge eltim ene.
Owo Lidia, a aneb etahk ebe kehm bele ewohngalahb.
Á kehm soro tong-r re, “Joare wahn ebbum re, me n lohko taame tv Esowo, baan, wahn ba jol go egame etahk.” Á kehm jo gbiing-r re wahr tiki je.

Efung abehng eji e jo tahm go edi ji bo kpo kak ero, e kehm nyehne mmonse no nkal no jolo nju. Á bele ebi etohko ji amahr anyehne. Á jo limi akpohko gbalee ka ane bao ba jo fil-e, eji á jo nyehn ane amahr.
Á jo toono Pol, a wahr, jo rabe tiim re, “Ane baa, alokeltum Esowo bi li go ero ba! Bo kpo tib-n mbang nyi ḿ bahke sehnge kehm bele eltahre!”
Alum nyaa á jo kono elbungu nkpel a nkpele. Pol, eltim kehm-e rake, á kehm keebe, kehm bungu tong ebi etohko jio re, “N kp-a tongo go mbing nyi Jisos Kraist re, wo lohng go ege a ngubjing!”
Á kehm soro lohng ngare nyꞌnehm o.
Eji afono nju nyio sebe no kahn re, mbang anyehng anyehng nyi bo bahke kpe ting akpohko kpeem li, bo kehm soro bob Pol, a Sailas, tahm a bo go are, edi ji atubesi nfam jolo no.
Eji bo ma ko bo, je go esamahr atul esub, bo kehm bungu re, “Ane baa a, anebe Jus ba. Bo kpꞌsebe nfem go egahre ejahbe.
Bo kpi eljini tib, ni ki nob re wahr aneb Rom, wahr leeme, fere jo lim.”
Ane bako ba jolo o, kehm nake ba bulu bo. Abalamalam bao kehm tohngo bo awobo yare. Bo yehke bo awobo nyao, kehm soro ka ane bao nsahm re bo dv bo go nrꞌrare.
Eji bo ma dv bo gbalee, bo kehm kake bo go ngbekobo, tong mbꞌbaabe agbekobo re á baabe bo nꞌnob.
Eji á wuku ano me, á kehm kake bo go nkimi nyi li atahng atahng, fere kak bo afung go akpade.
Nlum atv, Pol, a Sailas kehm kehme ero kak, fere jo yim ase, jo tehk Esowo. Aneb agbekobo bako jo wuungu atung, jo wuk.
Tvtv ona ndi kehm kehme elgbehke na gbehke. Nnahb ekahme nyio nyi ngbekobo jo gbꞌgbehke. Abutahk ngbekobo kpee kehm soro lennge. Agbekobo kehm soro won bo ane kpee gbo.
Mbꞌbaabe agbekobo noo nyahme kan a me, á kehm ba nyehn abutahk ma lennge. Á kehm soro rod ntahme enye, yahke wul elne. Tibre á jo tiri re, anv, aneb agbekobo ebbe kpee fi.
Pol kehm soro bung wahre wahre re, “Ka bom elna! Wahr baa ane kpee.”
Mbꞌbaabe agbekobo noo kehm lungu ane re, bo ko agun ba. Á kehm beke yel ekpꞌkpa ngbekobo jio, kehm kehme elfahle, jo kꞌkahm, gbo jamme Pol, a Sailas alahng go alata.
Á kehm lohngo a bo go elatahk, kehm bahbe bo re, “Anv, jen ji m bahke limi, kehm bele eltahre?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Taame tv Ntul a Jisos, a bahke bele eltahre, a etahk etahk eja.”
Bo kehm bungu alum Esowo tong-e, a ane kpee ba jolo go ege etahk.
Mbꞌbaabe noo kehm koko bo atv manehm o, tahm a bo, song ru bo alok nyao kpee, kehm soro bel ewohngalahb, a ane ebe kpee.
Á kehm koko bo tahm a bo go ege etahk, song ka bo nsol alehke. Á bele eyebatahng, a etahk etahk eje, tib eji á ma taame tv Esowo.
Etoono efungfu behko abalamalam kehm tumu mbehresi re bo ba yehke ane bao yake, bo song.
Mbꞌbaabe agbekobo noo kehm tooro tong Pol re, “Abalamalam ebtiingi tv re wahn song. Lohngen anv, wahn song go eyebatahng.”
Pol kehm bungu tong mbehresi nyio re, “Bo dv-r go elkab ane. Elam jolem, jol ebi ajehng ajehng e liim. Bo kak-r go ngbekobo, wahr ji li na anebe Rom.
Mbehresi nyio kehm song tooro alum nyao tong abalamalam bao. Eji bo wuku re, bo anebe Rom ba, bo kehm kehme elfahle.
Bo kehm bake ba gboongo bo, kehm yehke bo yake re bo tahm ejahbe jio song.
Bab Pol kehm lohngo go ngbekobo tahm song nyehn Lidia, a aneb ero bako, kak bo eltim, kehm soro tahm.
Bo kehm tahme go Amfipolis, sehng song rehng go Apolonia, soro song rehng go Tesalonaika, edi ji etahk ero ji Jus jolo no.
Pol kehm song yel go ekpꞌkpa ero, ana á jo kono ellimi. Aneb Jus jo limi nfaabe a ne bada nwer Esowo tete biingi Esabat na ebra.
Á jo lennge bo, fere jo tib bo re, “Tiki jol re, Kraist nyehn erem, kpo, fere nyahme go elkv.” Á kehm kpe bung re, “Jisos jia ji n kpꞌbungu bada ne, Kraist wo.”
Egom jindiki lꞌlennge bo, bo taame, fere jo toono Pol, a Sailas. Ano wo fvfo ellong aneb Grik gbalee ba jo kak Esowo, a atubesi anebkal bandiki gbalee tob taame, jo toono bo.

Ala kehm kehme aneb Jus teele. Bo kehm lungu abi ane bandiki tum, bo song lung ane ba kono edi ajehng, kehm kehme edi sohko na sohko. Bo kehm song yel ekpꞌkpa Jeson, jo seb Bab Pol re, bo ko bo ba ka ane bao.
Eji bo ki nyehn bo, bo kehm tohngo Jeson, a abon Esowo bako gona, tahm a bo goji atubesi nfam, fere jo rabe re, “Ane bao ba ma rod njini nyia kpiidi akpade go ero, bobkpe ba a.
Jeson wo ma ko bo ba kak go ege etahk. Bo ba kpi atahm nya ntul a Rom range. Bo kpo bung re, Ntul noko noa, no li Jisos.”
Eji ellong ane bao, a atubesi nfam wuku ano, ntim kehm jokko na jokko bo.
Bo kehm tongo Jeson, a ane bako re bo ba ka akpohko nkpaneka. Eji bo ma ka akpohko nyao, bo kehm yake bo.
Eji atv behde no, aneb Esowo bao kehm tumu Pol, a Sailas tv go Berea. Eji bo rehnge o, bo kehm sehnge tahm go etahk ero ji Jus.
Aneb Jus bao ba ga nob sehnge ane bao ba jolo go Tesalonaika. Bo ko alum Esowo nyao kak go bo a ntim, fere jo kak ekpuku, jo feede go nwer Esowo efung abehng abehng, joare lohko li ano.
Owo wahnge ane gbalee go bo ellong taame no. Go bo ellong o, ajꞌjok anebkal Grik tob woomo o semme aneblum.
Eji Jus ji jolo go Tesalonaika wuku re, Pol ebtob bung alum Esowo go Berea, bo kehm tob je o fvfo, song kehme ane nyare. Nfam kehm kehme eljokko na jokko.
Abon Esowo bao kehm soro tong Pol re á song go mbang nyio nyi agburu aya li no. Sailas, a Timoti, bo sa ona Berea.
Ane bao ba jo tv Pol, ko-e tete song rehng a ne go Atens. Bo ko elle goji Pol, ni jolo re, Sailas, a Timoti gulu eljeke song kpir-e. Bo kehm feere kehnge go Berea.
Eji Pol ji go Atens, jo sik Sailas, a Timoti, eltim rak-e sehng, tibre ejahbe jio alokelom tv sehng.
Á jo bungu a anebe Jus go bo etahk ero, fere jo bung a ane baka baka ba ki jol Jus, ba jo kak Esowo. Efung abehng abehng á jo je go are, jo song bung tong ane ba jo ba si are.
Atꞌtibi bandiki ba jo toono eltibi ni Epikur, a atꞌtibi bako ba bo jo lung bo re Stoik, kehm tob song kpiri Pol.
Ane bandiki kehm bungu re, “Jen ji á kpꞌbꞌbung o? Akpaale abuuru nyaa lohngo renan?”
Ane bandiki re, “Li are á kpꞌbungu bade ajen eblom bi ane bamongo.”
Tibre Pol jo bungu bada Jisos, a elnyahme ngubjing go elkv.
Bo kehm koko Pol tahm ane go edi ji bo jo lung re Areopagus, kehm-e tongo re, “E kpꞌsebe re wahr kahn eltibi nia ni nfenfe, ni a kpꞌbungu bade.
Nsol enya nyi a kpꞌtibi, nyindiki li-r nfenfe go egahre atung. E kpꞌsebe re wahr kahn ana nsol nyio lohngo lohng.”
Ane kpee ba lene go Atens, a ajenne fvfo jo rannge ngare ebo re bo jo wuk aka nfenfe nya nya, fere jo tub.
Pol jo yiimi go elka ane bao ba jo kono nkon go Areopagus, jo bung re, “Aneb Atens wahn, me n nyehn re, ń li ane ba kpꞌgare area re wahn sehng go mbang nyi Esowo.

Eji n jo sehng abake, n nyehne eblom bi ń kpꞌkake. N tob nyehne edi njom alimi ji bo nyono re, ‘Jia li ka Esowo bi e kil-e elkahne.’ Esowo bio bi ń kpo kak-e, bi ń kil-e elkahne, bi bi n yahk-n tong bada ne anv.
“Esowo bi limi njini, a nsol kpee nyi li no. Ye wo li ntul no elbung abola ndi. Á kpehme lene go ntahk ero nyi ane si no.
Esowo, ejum ajehng ajehng we kpehme rin ji nne bahk-e kake, tibre ye wo kpo ka ane elkpin, go nsol alehke, a ejum ajehng ajehng.

Go etꞌtohngo nne awohng no á lim-e no, owo ane ba li njini nyia kpee lohng no. Á limi bo re bo jol go njini nyia kpee. Eji á limi bo, á ka bo ngare ana nyi bo bahke kpini, fere bak bo adi ndi nya bo bahke jo lene,
eji bo lꞌseb Esowo. Fundiki bo bahk-e nyehne, eji bo kp-e sebe nkamme nkamme. Jol fee á limm go egahre.
Tib go ege esi wo wahnge, e li go elkpin, fere kpꞌjene tete sik anv. Li ana akahnkahn ane ebahne bandiki bungu no re, ‘Wahr lohng go ege etꞌtohngo.’
Eji wahr lohng go etꞌtohngo ji Esowo, wahr kꞌjo tir re, Esowo li go elfoongo ni agul, a ni asilva, a ni atal, a ni nsol nyi ane kpo lim abo, nyi lohng go bo a ntir atahng.
“Ngare nyio nyi ane ki liingi Esowo, Ntul Esowo kpooro na. Anv, yebtong nne awohng awohng go edi ajehng ajehng re á gbo ndon go ege abiafem.
Tibre yebkunu afung nya á bahke njini nyia kpee lam nob nob go nnyo mi nne no á ma yehke. Esowo eblennge jia ka nne awohng awohng, eji á nyahme nne noo go elkv.”
Eji bo wuku bade elnyahme ngubjing go elkv, egom jindiki kehm-e elnyoko. Egom jindiki re, “E bahke kpe wuk ana a bahke kpe bung efung bindiki.”
Owo Pol kehm soro lohng ekpꞌkpa nkon jio.

Egom ane bandiki tꞌtaame toon-e. Nne awohng no bo jo lung-e re Dionisius ji woomo go ellong ane ba jo kono nkon go Areopagus tob woomo go ellong ane ba taame no, a nnenkal awohng no bo jo lung-e re Damaris, a egom ane bandiki fvfo.
Owo Pol kehm tahme Atens, song rehng go Korint.
Owo á song mahnge nne a Jus awohng no bo jo lung-e re Akwila ji bo jel-e go Pontus. Ngare nyio á kpꞌna lohngo na lohng go Itali, a nkal ewe Priskilla ba.
Á song jolo a bo, bo jo limi eltum edi ajehng.
Efung Esabat abehng abehng Pol jo je go etahk ero ji Jus, jo song bung a ane, fere jo sennge Jus ntim, a Grik fvfo.
Eji Sailas, a Timoti lohngo go Masedonia ba kpiri Pol go Korint, Pol rodo ngare enye kpee kak go alum Esowo abungu, fere jo yiimi ntianse tong Jus re, Jisos wo li Kraist.

Eji bo jo ten alum enye, fere jo su-e, á kehm kumu ebtohko go ege ewobo, kehm faange bo re, “Joare wahn ebten, ebi jio bahke kuumu wahn, me sang. Bomo anv asongo, me n fi goji ane baka baka ba ki li Jus.”
Á kehm tahme eje song rehng go etahk nne no bo jo lung-e re Taitus Justus ji jo kak Esowo. Etahk eje jolo kohlo etahk ero ji Jus.
Krispus ji jolo ntubesi etahk ero ji Jus tꞌtaame tv Ntul Esowo, a etahk etahk eje kpee.
Atv amehng Ntul Esowo kehm bungu a Pol go nkpokosi a mbang re, “Ka fahl! Jo bung, ka belle!
Tibre n li a na. Nnene limm, no bahke sahbe, lak-a ebo, fere lim-a ejum. Tibre ane ebame baa gbalee go ejahbe jia.”
Pol kange ona elya kunu nnyahng erakera, jo tib bo alum Esowo.
Ngare nyi Gallio jolo ntubesi go Akaya, nyi nyi aneb Jus na, bulu Pol, bob-e tahm a ne go ekpꞌkpa esub.
Bo kehm bungu re, “Nne noa ana kpo sennge ane ntim re bo kak Esowo go mbang nyi kpo range atahm enyahre.”
Eji Pol tahme re á bung, Gallio kehm tongo Jus re, “Li re yebseb nfem, fere lim ebi, kehn elgbiingi enahne ni ń kp-m gbiingi me jolem kpene.
Eji li nfem nyi alum abungu, a abing, go atahm enyahne, limen antahng. Me n nehme seb re, me n lam alam nyaa.”
Á kehm kame bo re bo lohng ekpꞌkpa esub song.
Jus kehm soro bob Sostenes ji jolo ntubesi go bo etahk ero, fere dv-e go esamahr Gallio. Jol Gallio we lubem.
Pol kpe kang afung gbalee a abon Esowo go Korint, kehm tahme bo sa. Go Kenkrea Pol kehm soro kpud esi o, tibre á nyame ejum tong Esowo.
Bo kehm sehnge song rehng go Efesus. Pol kehm tahme Akwila, a Priskilla sa o, kehm song yel go ekpꞌkpa ero ji Jus, jo bung a bo.
Eji bo jo tong-e re á kpe kang a bo afung tvv, á tꞌten.
Eji á jo tahm bo sa, á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Esowo lꞌtaame, m bahke feere egahne a.”
A kehm kpe yel egbang o Efesus asongo.
Eji á song rehng go Sisaria, á kehm sehnge song rehng go Jerusalem, song kak aneb ero nnyo, kehm soro tahm go Antiok.
Eji á ma kang abon afung o, á kehm tahme, jo yannge edi ajehng ajehng go Galesa, a Frigia, jo kak abatꞌtoono Jisos eltim.
Nne a Jus awohng no bo jo lung-e re Apollos ji bo jel-e go Aleksandria kehm bake go Efesus. Á jolo nne no sahb kꞌkahn nwer Esowo, fere jo mal elbungu.
Bo tib-e mbang nyi Ntul Esowo nob nob. Á jo bungu nsol nyi li bade Esowo eltim eltim ene, fere jo tib jang jang ana lohko jol, tvtv o á kahne ewohngalahb ji Jon ji ji.
Á jo bungu esahb esahb go etahk ero ji Jus. Eji Akwila, a Priskilla, bo wuk-e no eji á jo bung, bo kehm-e koko tahm a ne, kpe song tib-e mbang nyi Esowo budu.

Eji á sebe re á yel egbang tahm go Akaya, abon Esowo bao tꞌtaame re á song. Bo kehm fere nyon nwer tv abatꞌtoono Jisos bako go re, á lꞌrehng go, bo ko-e. Eji Apollos rehnge go, á jo kake abon Esowo ebo area, ba ma taame tib go nnoobo nyi Esowo.
Á jo bungu area, fere jo ga anebe Jus go elkab ane, eji á jo lennge nwer Esowo ka bo re, Jisos wo li Kraist.
Eji Apollos jolo go Korint, Pol kehm sehnge go alab ejahbe nya Esia, kehm song rehng go Efesus. Owo á ba nyehn abatꞌtoono Jisos bandiki.
Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Eji ń tiki taame tv Esowo, wahn ebtiki bel Etingi Etohka?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Eꞌee, jol e ka wuk a wuk na re Etingi Etohko jia.”
Á kehm bahbe bo re, “Elkohn ewohngalahb aji ḿ bele no?”
Bo kehm-e faange re, “Ewohngalahb ji Jon ji.”
Pol kehm bungu re, “Jon jo wohngo ane alahb ma egbokondon, fere jo tong bo re bo taame tv nne no kpꞌbake toon-e, no li Jisos.”
Eji bo wuku ano, bo kehm tuungu bel ewohngalahb go mbing nyi Ntul a Jisos.
Pol kunu kan bo ebo, bo kehm soro bel Etingi Etohko, jo bung go ajahbe nfenfe, fere jo nyehn amahr.
Bo kpee jolo ejum ewubu aneblum abal.
Pol jo je go etahk ero ji Jus, jo song bung alum Esowo tong ane esahb esahb go nnyahng era. Á jo bungu bade etul bi Esowo, fere jo gare ana á bahke sennge bo ntim.

Ane bandiki jolo atahnsi ane, bo joom taame. Bo jo su na mbang nyi Esowo go esamahr ane kpee. Owo Pol kehm koko abatꞌtoono Jisos tahm a bo, tahm atahnsi ane bao sa, fere jo tib ane efung abehng abehng go ekpꞌkpa ji Tirannus.
Á limi anaana nnya ebal tete Jus, a Grik kpee ji lene go Esia wuk alum nya Ntul a Jisos.
Esowo jo ko Pol, jo lim ajoobo akpokosi gbalee, nya kala lꞌlim.
Ane jo ko afiafong nya Pol bele no, a abomo enye, jo tahm a nya goji aneb ayam, bo jo nob ayam ebo, abi atohko fere jo lohng bo.

Jus jindiki ji jo yannge, jo kam ane abi atohko yehke, bo jo gare re bo lim nsol nyio go mbing nyi Ntul a Jisos. Bo jo bungu tong abi atohko nyao re, “N kp-n tongo go mbing nyi Jisos re wahn lohng, Jisos jio ji Pol kpo bung bada ne.”
Nne awohng jolo go no bo jo lung-e re Skiva ji jolo ntubesi abalimajom. Á bele abon ba nlum na asehma, ba jo lim nsol nyio.
Ebi etohko jio kehm faange bo re. “Jisos, n kp-e kahne. Pol, n kp-e kahne. Anv, wahn ane aba?”
Nne no bele ebi etohko jio kehm kehme elyebbe, jo nyede bo tv ndi, fere dv bo. Bo kehm soro be etahk jio, tahm ebo ebun ebun, a alok alok.
Jus kpee ji jolo go Efesus, a Grik kpee wuku kan nsol nyio, bo kehm kehme elfahle, bo ane kpee, fere jo tehk mbing nyi Jisos.
Aneb Esowo gbalee ba ma taame, kehm bake ba kehme elfvvrv, jo tooro nsol nyi bo ma lim.
Egom ane bandiki gbalee ba jo lim ntaane, kehm rodo awer ebo kpee, ba luk edi ajehng, jamme fi go esamahr ane kpee. Bo kehm gabe ekun ana bi bo ka go awer nyao, jolo ekpa akpohko atahl awubu.
Owo alum Esowo kehm kpe gbal, fere nyꞌnyab, fere tahne.
Eji nsol nyio ma sehng kpee, Pol kehm tiri re, á bahke sehnge go Masedonia rehng go Akaya, sehng song rehng go Jerusalem. Á kehm bungu re, “N lꞌje o, m bahke tob rehng go Rom.”
Á kehm tumu alokeltum ebe na abal, Timoti abola Erastus tv go Masedonia, yefono sa, kang abon afung ntiil ga Esia.
Ngare nyio nyi egburu ntong nyi nnen a nnen gbo go Efesus tib mbang nyi Esowo.
Nne awohng jolo go, no bo jo lung-e re Demetrius. Á jolo nne etahl no jo ko asilva, jo tahl abontahk elom ba Artemis, jo gungu. Alokeltum ebe ba jolo a ne, jo limi akpohko sehng.
Á kehm lungu bo kpee, fere lung ane bako ba eltum ebo tob jol ana ni bo, kehm tongo bo re, “Ń kpꞌkahne re, eltum nia ni kpi-r afang ka.

Anv, nde, ń kpꞌnyehne, fere jo wuk ana ji Pol kpꞌlimi. Á kpo bung re, alokelom nya ane kpꞌrahme, fuumem re nne kak. Jol go Efesus wo wo sang, á ma sennge ane gbalee ntim, ka riki Esia kpee ji á ma sennge bo ntim.

N kpꞌfahle re, eltum enahre nia bahke bele ebi mbing. Etahk elom ejahre ji Artemis bahke tob jol mbol mbol. Jol egburu mbing enye nehm kpe lohng, elom jia ji nne awohng awohng go Esia kpo jom, a njini kpee.”
Eji ellong ane bao wuku ano, eltim kehm rake bo sꞌsehng. Bo kehm kehme elrabe re, “Elom ejahre, Artemis ji aneb Efesus, ji ji li njꞌjok elom!”
Ejahbe jio kpee kehm kehme eljokko na jokko. Bo kehm bobo Gayus abola Aristarkus, bo ji lohng go Masedonia, jo jen a Pol, tahm a bo go ekolo. Ane kehm kame song rur.
Pol jo sebe re á woomo go ellong ane bao. Abatꞌtoono Jisos taamem.
Ane bandiki ba jolo atubesi ejahbe, ba jolo atem Pol, kehm tiingi etib tv-e re á kꞌlohng je go ekolo.
Egom ane bandiki jo rabe eje eje, egom jehko jo rabe eje eje. Nkon nyio jolo jokko jokko jokko. Ane tvv joom kahn esꞌsi ji wahnge wahng bo je no, song kono edi ajehng.

Eji egom ane bandiki ba woomo go ellong nio nyehne Jus kpꞌtehme Aleksanda re á lohng song bung ka bo, bo kehm-e tohngo yehke re á lohng. Aleksanda kehm faake ebo ebe, tibre á jo sebe re á bung a ane bao, tahre Pol yake.
Bo kahne kan a re á jolo nne a Jus, bo kpee kehme elrabe nnyo nnyo amehng re, “Elom ejahre Artemis ji aneb Efesus, ji ji li njꞌjok elom!” Bo rabe ano ano rehng awa na abal.

Esꞌkohro, nne no kpo nyon nsol nfam kehm male sahde bo ewok, kehm bungu tong bo re, “Aneb Efesus wahn, nne awohng awohng kpꞌkahne re, Efesus ji li ejahbe ji kpo kuuru etahk elom jia ji njꞌjok Artemis, a mbarebare eltal ni lohngo go elbung gbo.
Nnene limm, no bahke ma faabe nsol nyia a. Jolen soom, kana lim ejum ajehng ajehng sohk sohk.
Jol ane baa ka v elom ejahre. Jol elom ejahre, bo ka su a su. Wahn ebko na ko ane baa, ba a bo.
“Demetrius, a alokeltum ebe, joare nne ebsoodo bo, afung elam nyaa, nya bo kpo lam alam. Atubesi ane baa. Go esamahr elam wo, fuumu re bo bung nfem nyia.
Joare ejum jindiki ji ń kpꞌsebe na, bo bahke lame elam jio go nkon nyi nfam kpo kono ngare anyehng anyehng.
N kpꞌfahle re, bo bahk-r ebi ka go nfem nyi e ma lim lela. Ejumjum limm, ji e bahke ma laange kunu, tib go nfem nyi e ma lim a.”
Eji á bungu ano mal, á kehm yaame ane bao.
Eji nfem nyio o ma mal, Pol kehm lungu abon Esowo, bo ba kono edi ajehng. Á kake kan bo eltim mal, á kehm tahme bo sa, tahm go Masedonia.
Eji á jo yannge ajahbe nyao, jo kak aneb Esowo eltim, fere jo bung alum gbalee, á kehm tahme go Gris.
Owo á kange nnyahng era. Á jo toobo ebjing bi á bahke tahme go Siria. Eji á sebe no kahn re, Jus kpꞌlame kak-e, owo á kehm toobo re, elfeere, á bahke sehnge mbang a Masedonia.
Owo Sopater mmon a Pirus ji lohng go Berea kehm tahme toon-e,
Ane bao kpee kehm gboko mbang song ji go Troas, jo sik-r.
E yele egbang go Filipai, eji elkak ni abred nya ki kpi ayist ma sehng. Kange nfung elon, e kehm song rehng go Troas, song kpiri bo. Owo e kange nfung esehma.
Ngbokambang efung go erahde e kehm song kono asi edi ajehng re wahr bakke ebred.
Bo nyaale atꞌrekahng gbalee bum go ero enyong, edi ji e kono no.

Njangkun anyehng nyi bo jo lung-e re Yutikus ji go eyake ewindu. Eji Pol kpi mbungu mbungu, á kehm lale kpꞌkpoodo kpꞌkpoodo. Eji á ma sahb lꞌlal, á kehm fooro go ero enyong song gbo ndi. Bo song rod-e ekpakv.
Pol kehm soro badde go ero enyong, song rehng go ndi, kehm song gbo konng-e, fere wall-e, kehm bungu re, “Kana kpe fahl, á kpeke li go elkpin.”
Pol kehm kpe feere song wahr go ero enyong, kehm bakke ebred, bo li. Á bungu a bo tetete efungfu se, á kehm soro tahm eje.
Nkpokosi nyia nyi kake bo eltim, eji bo rodo njangkun nyio kehnge a ne, á kpeke li go elkpin.
E yele go egbang song rehng go Assos, tibre owo e sebe re wahr song kak Pol go egbang, tib eji á tong-r re wahr lim ano, ye kpꞌsehnge egbuk egbuk song rehng go.
Eji á kpir-r go Assos, e kehm-e kake go egbang, song rehng go Mitilin,
kehm soro asi asongo. Etoono efung behko e sehng kohlo Kayos. Njahmfungfu nyehko e kehm song rehng go Semos. Etoono efung behko e soro rehng go Miletus.
Pol tiri re á sehng Efesus sa, eji á lꞌkꞌkpe rannge ngare go Esia. Tibre á jo foomo re á gulu elrehnge go Jerusalem, á lꞌmal, efung Pintikost kehm rehnge.
Go Miletus wo, Pol tiingi etib tv anebkul ero go Efesus re bo ba kpir-e o.
Eji bo ba no, á kehm bungu tong bo re, “Wahnfono antahng kpꞌkahne elkpin ni n jo lim ngare anyehng anyehng eji n jolo a nahne bomo gona ngbokambang efung bi n gbo mbang rehng go Esia,
ana n jolo rede rede, jo loko Ntul Esowo a abonngo abonngo go amahr, fere jo bel elgaare go nsol nyi Jus jo lam kak-m.
Ń kpꞌkahne re, ejum ajehng ajehng limm, ji m behre no, ji li ji nno ka-n, eji n jo tib-n elkab ane, fere jo tib-n etahk ajehng ajehng.
N jo lennge tong Jus, fere tong Grik re bo gbo ndon go bo abiafem, feere goji Esowo, fere jo taame tv Ntul a Jisos Kraist.
“Anv a, n kpꞌtahme go Jerusalem, tibre Etingi Etohko ji ma-m mehl.
Ajehng ji n kpꞌkahne li re, go ejahbe ajehng ajehng ji n sehnge no Etingi Etohko ji jo tong-m re, ngbekobo nyia go esꞌsong kp-m siki, a erem.
Elkpin ename, ejum elkoko sang, lohngem ejumjum ka-m. Ji li no li re, me n gohro lim eltum ni Ntul a Jisos ka-m no mal, gohro be abahl enyame, fere tong ane alum nya nnoobo nyi Esowo.
Wahn ane kpee, n jo yannge go nlaaga anyehng anyehng enyahne, jo bung alum Esowo tong-n bade etul bi Esowo. Anv a, n kpꞌkahne re, me ń nehm kpe nyehn enyehnenyehne.
N kpꞌbungu go esamahr Esowo lela re, Nne awohng awohng ewahne no lꞌtan tib go ege abiafem, ebi ejame sang.
Ellum Esowo anehng anehng limm, ni m behr-n no. M ma-n tong kpee.
Baaben elnahne, a ejoro bi Esowo kpee, bi Etingi Etohko ma-n ka re wahn baabe. Leen abon Esowo ba Jisos ma gunu bo, ka alung eme.
N kpꞌkahne re, ngare nyi m ma tahm, abibbib enyam ana agabe bahke ba yel egahne ellong. Njoro anyehng anyehng limm, nyi bo bahk-e sehnge sa, kꞌgare re bo wul-e.
Ane bandiki ba bahke lohngo go egahne ellong. Bo bahke jolo akimfahnge atꞌtibi, fere jo gare re bo sennge abon Esowo ntim, bo fere jo toono bo.
Jo kunen ekpu! Buumen ana n jolo a nahne nnya era, jo rehke nne awohng awohng ewahne a abonngo go amahr atv a njul.
“Anv, m ma-n rod, kak Esowo go ebo, a alum enye nya kpo tib nnoobo enye, nya bahk-n ma lim, ń gbal, fere ka-n elfuulu ni Esowo ma kuuru bum ane ebe ba á ma ru ntim ebo.
N ka baare nne awohng awohng amahr re á ka-m akpohko, jol á ka-m abomo.
Wahnfono antahng kpꞌkahne re, abo enyame nyaa nya n kpo ko, jo lim eltum, kehm jo ting nsol alehke li, a ane ebame.

Go nsol nyia kpee nyi n jo lim, m ma-n tib ana nne bahke jo bade, jo lim eltum, jo kak ane ba kil tahne ebo. Buumen alum nya Jisos bungu no re, ‘Elfuulu ga li ka nne no kpꞌkake, sehnge nne no kpꞌkoko.’ ”
Eji Pol ma bung alum nyaa kpee mal, á kehm jamme alahng a bo, kehm kehme ero kak.
Bo kpee kehm kehme ellingi, eji bo bingi Pol.
Bo bele erakatahng sehng go ekahmekahme ellum nio ni á bungu re, bo we nehm kpe nyehn enyehnenyehne. Bo kehm song tv-e, á yel go egbang.
E kehm tongo bo re, “Wahn jol o,” egbang kehm soro wob a nahre o, tete song rehng go Kos. Etoono efung behko e rehnge go Rodes. E kehm kpe sehng o, song rehng go Patara.
Owo e nyehne egbang bi jo tahm go Fenisa. E kehm soro yel tahm.
Eji e nyehne Saiprus go ejang ebobkal, e kehm maake song rehng go Siria. Go Taya wo, e yiimi no, tibre owo bo raade nsol are go egbang.
E nyehne abatꞌtoono Jisos ona, kehm kange a bo nfung esehma. Go nsahm nyi Etingi Etohko nyi bo tongo Pol re á kꞌje go Jerusalem.

Eji afung enyahre biingi no, e kehm soro tahm, soro asi go egahre eljen asongo. Bo kehm bake ba tv-r go esi mbang, a akal ebo, a abon abon ebo. Eji e rehnge go nkpe agburu aya, e kehm jamme alahng, kehme ero kak.
E kehm soro kak atemtem nnyo, kehm song yel egbang. Bo soro yaame ebo kehnge.
E kehm kpe soro asi go Taya asongo, kehm song rehng go Ptolemais. Owo e song kak aneb Esowo nnyo, jol a bo efung kohro kohro.
Njahmfungfu e kehm tahme song rehng go Sisaria. Owo e song rehng etahk Filip ji jolo mbungalum Esowo, kehm jolo a ne. Á jolo nne no woomo go ellong ane asehma ba bo yehke bo go Jerusalem.
Á bele abon ba nkal na ani, ba kala bal alum. Bo jo nyehne amahr nya Esowo.
Eji e ma kang abon afung ntiil ona, nnyehnamahr no bo jo lung-e re Agabus kehm lohngo go Judea ba.

Eji á ba no, ba rehng egahre, á kehm rodo egbaange ji Pol, gbade elne abo, a akpade, kehm bungu re, “Ejum ji ana, ji Etingi Etohko ma bung re, ‘Ana wo Jus ji li go Jerusalem bahke gbake nfono egbaange noa, rod-e kak ane baka baka go ebo.’ ”
Eji e wuku ano, wahr, a ane bako ba jolo o, kehm kehme Pol gboongo re á kꞌje go Jerusalem.
Pol kehm faange re, “Jen ji wahnge ń kpꞌlingi ana, jo lim eltim jo maang-m! Me n toobo ebjing kpee, jol afi ngbekobo nyi, jol afi elkv ni m bahke kpoko go Jerusalem tib go esi ji Jisos.”
E kpe-e tahre re á kꞌje, á ten. Owo e kehm soro yak-e abo, kehm bungu re, “Nong, mbang Esowo lim, ana kor-e no.”
Owo e kehm toobo ebjing, tahm go Jerusalem.
Abatꞌtoono Jisos bandiki ba jolo go Sisaria tꞌtahm toon-r, fere ko-r, song rehng go etahk Mneson ji jolo nne a Saiprus, ye ji bomo eltoono Jisos wuku wuku. Go ege wo, e song jol.
Eji e song rehng go Jerusalem, aneb Esowo bao gbaam-r sehng go eyebatahng.
Etoono efung behko Pol kehm tahme a nahre re wahr song nyehn Jems.
Pol kehm kake bo nnyo, kehm fere tooro ajehng ajehng ana ji Esowo ka-e re á lim ka ane baka baka ba ki li Jus.
Eji bo wuku ano, bo kehm kehme Esowo tehk, kehm bungu tong Pol re, “Egban, a kpꞌnyehne re, anebe Jus atahl nku a nku ba ma taame. Bo kpeke li ane ba kpꞌsahb bꞌbum atahm.
Bobtooro gana re, a kpꞌtibi Jus kpee ji lene go ajahbe nyandiki re, bo yake atahm nya Moses, kꞌkpe yehke abon ebo nrur, kꞌkpe lim eljini ni Jus.
Jen ji e bahke limi anv a? Bo bahke tiki seb kahn re, wobrehng a.
“Anv, lim ana ji e bahk-a tongo. E kpi ane ani a, ba ma nyam enyam tong Esowo.

Song toono ane bao, wahn song bum elnahne saang, wo fere kpi akpohko go bo esi, eji bo lꞌmal kpud ebsi ebo. Owo nne awohng awohng bahke kehm kahne re, nyao kpee nya bo bungu bada na etingitingi sang, fere kahn re, a kpꞌlohko bum atahm nya Moses.

Bade ane baka baka ba ma taame tv Esowo, wahr ebtum nwer tv bo, ana e ma toobo re, bo kꞌjo li nsol nyi bo ma ko jom eblom, nyi ki li saang, bo kꞌjo li alung, bo kꞌjo li nnyam nyi bo kahn-e ekehd, á kpo, bo jo jahng asꞌsa.”

Pol kehm soro ko ane bao. Etoono efung behko, bo kehm bumu elbo saang, kehm tahme go etahk Esowo, eji bo lꞌtong bo afung ana nya bahke kange, elbumu elbo saang nio kehm male. Ngare nyio wo, bo bahke limi njom tib esi ji Pol, a ji ane bako.
Eji nfung esehma nyio yahke biingi, anebe Jus bandiki ba lohng go Esia ba, kehm ba nyehn Pol go etahk Esowo. Bo kehm soro nyare ellong ane re, bo song bob Pol. Bo kehm-e soro bob.

Bo kehm kehme elrabe re, “Israel wahn, kaken ebo! Á wo li nne no kpꞌyannge edi ajehng ajehng, jo tib nne awohng awohng, fere jo bung tob anebe Israel, a atahm nya Moses, a etahk Esowo jia. Yebgohro ko aneb Grik ba kak go etahk Esowo jia, fili edi jia kpꞌrannge.”
Tibre bo tohko nyehn Trofimus ji lohng go Efesus go nla ejahbe a Pol. Owo wahnge bo kehm tiri re, Pol m-e ko ba kak go etahk Esowo.
Edi kehm kehme eljokko na jokko, ane kehm fere kam song rur edi ajehng, kehm bobo Pol, tohng-e yehke go etahk Esowo. Tvtv ona bo kehm soro bam abutahk nya etahk Esowo.
Eji bo jo gare ana bo bahke wulu Pol, nne kehm tahme song tooro tong ntubesi a nsoja nyi Rom re, “Ga Jerusalem edi kpꞌjokko area.”
Ntubesi a nsoja noo kehm soro ko atubesi nsoja, a nsoja nyindiki gbalee, tahm a bo. Eji Jus nyehne ntubesi, a nsoja enye kpꞌfoomo abake, bo kehm rahke Pol go eldohko.
Ntubesi a nsoja kehm bake, a nsoja enya, ba tong bo re, bo bob Pol, kak-e agbekobo abal. Á kehm bahbe re, “Anv, ye nne awoo! Jen ji á ma lim?”
Egom jindiki jo rabe eje eje, egom jehko jo rabe ebo ebo. Eji ntubesi noo ki kahn ejum ji ma gbꞌgbo tib go eljokko no bo jo jokko edi, á kehm tongo re, bo ko Pol song a ne go bo ebud.
Eji bo ba rehng mbuga, nsoja nyio kehm mehle Pol, sol, tibre ellong ane bao jo gbiingi bo sehng.
Bo jo jene a bo bad bad, jo rabe re, “Wulen na ye!”
Eji nsoja yahke rehng a Pol go bo ebud, Pol kehm tongo ntubesi noo re, “N kpꞌsebe re me m bung a na.”
Ntubesi kehm bahbe re, “Anv, a kpo mꞌma bung Grika?
Wo nne a Ijipt sanga, no bomo ebta anoko a nahre nyanjehla, no jake akpuuru ane atahltahl nkpel ewubu, ba fili nsol ebta, song biiri go elka emahnga?”
Pol kehm faange re, “Ee, me nne a Jus wo. N li nne a Tarsus ji li go Silisia. N li nfono ejahbe no lohng go egburu ejahbe, titi, nong me n tohko bung a ane bao.”
Ntubesi noo kehm taame. Pol kehm yiimi go mbuga, kehm faake ebo ebe. Bo kehm naange kpꞌtii, are alahb ma. Pol kehm bungu go alum Hibru re,
“Babnsoo, abonanee, ane ebame wahn, wuungen atung, eji n yahke lennge elname ka-n.”
Eji bo wuk-e no, á kpꞌbungu go alum Hibru, bo kehm sahb nꞌnaange kpꞌtii.
Pol kehm bungu re,
“Me nne a Jus wo. Bo jel-m go Tarsus ji Silisia. Bo ko-m ntiil ntiil, ba a name go Jerusalem. Gamaliel wo jolo ntꞌtibi ewame.
N jo nohko ane ba jo toono mbang nyi Jisos. N jo bobo aneblum, a anebkal anebkal, jo kak bo afarebok, tum bo ngbekobo, egom jindiki n jo wul na bo.

Ntubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam, bo kpee kpꞌkahne re, n kpꞌbungu etingitingi. Bo jo ka-m awer re me n song ka aneb Jus ebahre ba li go Damaskus. N kehm jeke re me n song bob ane ba Jisos ba jolo o, kak bo afarebok, feere a bo go Jerusalem, eji bo lꞌkak bo erem.
“Eji e ma tahm asongo, yahke ba elrehnge go Damaskus, ngare nyio jolo ngare efin, n kehm nyehne egburu ellennge ni lohngo go elbung, ya tub-m.
“N kehm fooro gbo ndi, kehm wuku ellum ni bungu re, ‘Sol, Sol, jen ji wahng ka a kp-m nohko anae?’
“N kehm faange re, ‘Wo nne awo, Ntul?’
“Á kehm bungu tong-m re, ‘Me Jisos ji Nasaret wo, ji a kpꞌnohko.’
“Ane ba jene a name nyehne ellennge ellennge. Bo wukem ellum ni nne noo jo bung a name.
N kehm-e soro bahb re, ‘Jen ji m bahke limi, Ntul?’
“Ntul a Jisos kehm-m tongo re, ‘Tahm, wo song go Damaskus. Owo bo bahk-a tongo ejum ajehng ajehng ji Esowo ma toobo bum-a re wo lim.’
“Eji amahr wa-m no tib go egburu ellennge ni n nyehne no, ane ba jene a name kehm-m jabbe go ebo, rehng a name go Damaskus.
“Nne awohng jolo o, no bo jo lung-e re Ananayas. Á jo fahle Esowo, fere jo bum atahm enyahre. Jus kpee ji lene go Damaskus jo kak-e sehng.
Á kehm bake go egame, ba yiimi kohl-m, kehm bungu re, ‘Egban Sol, kpe nyehn!’
“Tvtv ona amahr enyame kehm soro lennge n kehm-e nyehne.
“Ananayas kehm bungu re, ‘Esowo bi babnso ejahre ma-a yehke re wo kahn mbang enye, fere nyehn Etingitingi Nne ewe, fere wuk alum enye go ege a nnyo antahng.
Tibre wo bahke jolo ntianse enye, fere tong nne awohng awohng nsol nyi a ma nyehn, fere wꞌwuk.
Anv, jen ji wahnge a kpꞌkpeke laange? Tahm, wo bel ewohngalahb, fere gboong-e go ege a mbing, eji á lꞌru eltim abiafem ena.’
“Eji n feere go Jerusalem, n song kehme ero kak go etahk Esowo, n kehm nyehne nkpokosi.
Nkpokosi nyi n nyehne no, n nyehne Ntul a Jisos kpꞌbungu a name re, ‘Foomo elwaare, wo tahm a Jerusalem. Tibre ane ba li a, nehm taame tv ntianse nyꞌnya, nyi a bahke yiimi ka-m.’
“N kehm faange re, ‘Ntul, bofono antahng kpꞌkahne re, n jo je go etahk ero ajehng ajehng, jo song bob ane ba kpꞌtaame tv-a, jo dv bo, fere kak bo ngbekobo.
Eji bo wulu Stiven, nne a ntianse ewa, mefono antahng tob jolo o. N tꞌtaame, eji bo wul-e no, fere jo baabe abomo nya ane ba wul-e no.’
“Ntul a Jisos kehm bungu tong-m re, ‘Song, m bahk-a tumu fee goji ane baka baka ba ki li Jus.’ ”
Bo wuung-e atung tete rehng alum nyao. Bo kehm kehme elrabe wahre wahre re, “Tahmen a ne, wahn song wul-e! Kpeem fuumu re, elkohn nne ana noa kpe jol go elkpin!”
Bo jo rabe wahre wahre wahre, jo fokko abomo, fere jo kpu atꞌto, jo saade tv go ero.
Ntubesi nsoja kehm tongo nsoja enye re bo ko Pol song a ne go ebud, song dv-e, eji bo lꞌseb kahn ji wahnge Jus kpꞌrꞌrabe ano tob-e.
Eji bo m-e gba alehke re bo dv-e, Pol kehm bungu tong mmontubesi a nsoja noko no yiimi kohl-e re, “Anv, fꞌfuumu re, wahn dv nne a Rom, eji bo kala kahn ejum ji á limi noa!”
Mmontubesi noo wuku kan ano me, á kehm tahme goji ntubesi no nnen, kehm song tong-e re, “Jen ji a yahke lim? Nne noa ana, nne a Rom wo.”
Ntubesi noo kehm bake goji Pol, kehm ba bahb-e re, “Tong-m anv, a lohko li nne a Roma?” Pol kehm taame.
Ntubesi noo kehm faange re, “Re me n kehm jolo nne a Rom, n ka akpohko gbalee.”
Pol kehm bungu re, “Bo jel-m ana nne a Rom.”
Tvtv ona ane bao ba ba re bo ba bahb Pol abahbe, kehm soro jeere, fere njahm. Ntubesi noo kehm kehme elfahle, eji á sebe kahn re, Pol jolo nne a Rom, tibre á m-e gba alehke.

Ntubesi noo jo sebe re, á kahn etingitingi, ana ji wahnge Jus ka Pol ebi. Etoono efung behko á kehm tongo atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam kpee re bo ba kono edi ajehng. Á kehm yehke Pol agbekobo, ko-e ba yiimi go esamahr ane bao kpee.
Pol kehm seenge ellong ane bao too, fere kehme elbungu re, “Abonanee, atahng ala enyame kpꞌbare saang go esamahr Esowo, bomo wuku wuku tete sik anv.”
Ntubesi abalimajom no bo jo lung-e re Ananayas kehm tongo ane bao ba yiimi kohlo Pol re bo rum-e go nnyo.
Pol kehm bungu tong-e re, “Esowo bahke tob rum-a, wo jia ji li ana ekahme ji bo taame efem. A jehk ana re wo lam-m ana ntahm bungu no, wobfere gbo ntahm, eji a tongo re, bo rum-m.”
Ane ba yiimi kohlo Pol kehm bungu re, “A kpꞌsuku ntubesi abalimajom no Esowo!”
Pol kehm faange re, “Abonanee, n kahnem re, ye wo li ntubesi abalimajom. Tibre nwer Esowo bungu re, nne kꞌjo bung ebi tob ntubesi ejahbe ewe.”

Eji Pol sebe no kahn re, egom jindiki jolo Sadusis, egom jehko Farisis, á kehm soro bung wahre wahre tong ane bao re, “Abonanee, me nne a Farisi wo, babnsoo, Farisis ba. N yim esamahr elam a, tib eji n kpꞌtaame re, akvne bahke nyahme go elkv.”
Pol bungu kan ano mal, Farisis, a Sadusis kehm kehme eltaange, nkon kehm yabe, jol ejang ebbal.
Tibre Sadusis jo bungu re, “Elnyahme ngubjing go elkv limm, jol enjel limm, jol atohko limm.” Farisis jo tꞌtaame tv nsol nyio kpee.
Edi kehm kehme elwahle.
Atꞌtibi ba atahm bandiki ba woomo ellong Farisi kehm mehle yiimi, kehm kehme eltaange a Sadusis re, “Ebi ajehng ajehng e ka nyehn ji nne noa ma lim. Ma etohko ji ma bung a ne nji, ma enjel nyi nji.”

Nfaabe kehm kpe gbal, are yahke gbo abohng. Owo ntubesi kehm kehme elfahle re, fundiki bo bahke tohngo Pol yare. Á kehm tongo nsoja enye re, “Badden song, wahn song yehke Pol go ellong ane bao, song a ne go ebud.”
Etoono atv mako, Ntul a Jisos kehm lohngo ba yiimi kohlo Pol, kehm bungu re, “Bob eltim! Wobyiimi ntianse ka-m go Jerusalem. A bahke tob kpe yiimi ntianse go Rom fvfo.”
Etoono efungfu behko Jus kehm song kono edi ajehng, jo lam kak Pol, fere nyam tꞌtahne re, bo tohko tiki wul Pol, bo nehm li nsol, jol alahb bo nehm wo.
Ane bao ba lame no, bo jolo ejum ane atahl abal kꞌkunu.
Bo kehm jeke goji atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul nfam, kehm song tong bo re, “Wahr ebnyam tꞌtahne re, nsol alehke anyehng anyehng e nehm li, tete e wul Pol.

Anv, nobo re wahn, a abalamalam, wahn tiingi tv ntubesi a nsoja no nnen re á ko Pol ba a ne. Limen awak, wahn tong-e re, ń kpꞌsebe re, wahn kpe lennge elam eje. E bahk-e wulu go mbang. E nehm taame, á rehng ga.”
Mmon no mmonannyehn Pol no nkal wuku kan ana bo lame no, á kehm tahme song rehng go ebud, kehm song tong Pol.
Pol kehm lungu ntubesi a nsoja awohng, kehm-e tongo re, “Ko mmonse noa, song a ne goji ntubesi a nsoja no nnen, tibre á kpi ejum ji á bahk-e tongo.”
Owo á kehm-e koko tahm a ne goji ntubesi no nnen, kehm song tong-e re, “Pol nne a ngbekobo, ye wo lung-m no, fere tong-m re, me n ko mmonse noa ba a ne go ega, tibre á kpi ejum ji á bahk-a tongo.”
Ntubesi noo no nnen kehm jabbe mmonse noo go ebo, tahm a ne go nkpohko, edi ji nnene lꞌkꞌwuk. Owo á kehm-e bahbe re, “Ejum aji a yahk-m tong!”
Mmonse noo kehm bungu re, “Jus ebtoobo re, bo ba bahb-a re, wo ko Pol je a ne behna go elam. Bo kpꞌlimi awak re bo kpꞌsebe re bo kpe lennge elam eje.

Ka taame tv bo! Tibre ane baa, ba ma biiri go ekane kpi Pol sik. Bo li ane atahl abal kꞌkunu. Bobnyam tꞌtahne re, bo tohko tiki wul Pol, ejumjum bo nehm tiki li, jol alahb bo nehm wo. Anv, bobtoobo ebjing kpꞌsiki re wo lim ana bo bahk-a bahbe.”
Ntubesi a nsoja noo kehm bungu re, “Ka tong nne awohng awohng ji a ma-m tong a!” Á kehm-e tongo re á song.

Ntubesi noo no nnen kehm lungu atubesi bako ba nse, ane na abal, kehm tongo bo re, “Yehken nsoja atahl awubu, bo toobo ebjing tahm go Sisaria nkaranka esehmwubu nyi atv, wahn tob yehke ane atahl ara ane awubu ba bahke kuumu go anyꞌnya, a ane atahl awubu ba bahke fili nkong.
Tooben anyꞌnya nyandiki, wahn bum Pol kuumu, wahn ko-e song rehng a ne goji ntul a Feliks, ejumjum ki-e lim go mbang.”
Ntubesi a nsoja noo no nnen kehm nyono nwer nyi bungu re,
“Me Klodius Lisias, Feliks ntul ewame, m ma-a kak nnyo.
Jus bobo nne noa, bo jol-e wulu. N sebe kahn re, á jolo nne a Rom, n kꞌko nsoja enyame song tahr-e.
Eji n sebe re me n kahn ji wahnge bo jo ka-e ebi, n kehm-e koko je a ne go bo elam.
N sebe kahn re, bo jo ka-e ebi tib go esi atahm ebo. Ebꞌbi ajehng ajehng á limem ji fuumu re bo wul-e, jol bo kak-e ngbekobo.
Eji bo lennge no ka-m re, Jus kpꞌlame kak-e, owo n kehm-e soro tum tv-a. N tongo ane ba jo ka-e ebi re, bo ba tooro tong-a ji wahnge bo kp-e kake ebi.”
Nsoja nyio kehm soro ko Pol, tahm a ne go Antipatris atv, ana ntubesi tongo bo.
Eji efungfu se no, nsoja nyehka kehm feere ga ebud. Nsoja nyi kuumu anyꞌnya soro asi asongo a Pol.
Eji bo song rehng go Sisaria, bo kehm koko nwer nyio song ka ntul a Feliks, kehm-e soro tib Pol.
Eji ntul noo ma lung nwer nyio kpee, á kehm bahbe Pol ejahbe ji á lohng no. Á kahne kan a re, á lohng go Silisia,
á kehm bungu tong-e re, “M bahke wuku elam eja nob nob ngare nyi ane ba kp-a kake ebi ma ba.” Á kehm tongo re, bo ko Pol song kak-e go etahk ji ntul a Herod, fere jo baab-e.

Eji ma kang nfung elon, ntubesi abalimajom no bo jo lung-e re Ananayas kehm bake go Sisaria, a anebkul nfam bandiki, go nne no jo kahn atahm kpee, no bo jo lung-e re Tertullus. Bo kehm tahme song kpiri ntul a Feliks, kehm kehme Pol tooro tong ntul.

Eji bo ma lung Pol, á ma ba, owo Tertullus kehm kehme Pol ebi ka, kehm bungu re, “Njꞌjoka ntul ewahre Feliks, elkahne ena ni a kp-r male elfili ebko elkoono gbalee ba ka-r. Wo wo ma kehme ejahbe ejahre tuungu, owo wahnge ejahbe ejahre ma kehme elnobo.
Kpee nsol nyi a ma kehme ellimi go edi ajehng ajehng kp-r atahng yebe tob-a sehng, e kp-a kake saam.
Anv, me n nehme kpe seb re me n kpe rannge ngare enya. N kp-a gboongo re, lub kor-a, wo tohk-r wuungu atung ntiil.
“Wahr ebseb kahn re, nne noa nsebantong a nne wo. Á li nkakanyooda nne no kpo jen ejang njini abehng abehng bi Jus li no, jo seb afem. Ye wo li ntubesi go ellong ane ba bo kpo lung bo re Nasarin.
Á gare re á rannge etahk Esowo, kꞌkpe jol saang, e kehm soro bob-e. E jol-e lame ana ntahm enyahre bungu no.
Ntubesi a nsoja no bo kpo lung-e re Lisias, a ane ebe kehm bake ba taar-r ye go eko tahm a ne.
Lisias kehm tongo re, ane ba kp-e kake ebi, bo ba go ega. A lꞌbahb nne noo abahbe, owo a bahke kehm kahne ejum ajehng ajehng antahng ji wahnge e kp-e ebi ka.”
Jus kehm taame kpee re, “Ebi ji e kp-e kake a, lohko li ano.”
Ntul noo kehm soro mahk Pol re á bung. Pol kehm soro faange re, “N kpꞌkahne re, woblam ejahbe jia go nnya tvv. Eltim kp-m yebe sehng re me n lennge elname ka-a.
A li ma seb antahng kahn, tibre ka sehng ewubu a nfung ebal nyi n je go Jerusalem re me n song kak Esowo.
Jus me nyehnem ana n jo lim nfaabe a nne awohng awohng, fere jo tong ane re bo song seb nfem go etahk Esowo, jol go ntahk ero, jol go nfam.
Bo nehm ma tib ekahmekahme ejum ji wahnge bo kp-m kake ebi.

Ejum jia a, ji n kp-a tongo, n kp-a tongo gbul gbul gbuul re, n kpꞌkake Esowo bi babnso ejahre, eji n kpꞌtoono mbang nyi ane bao ba bo kpꞌsuku bo re, mmollong abvvrv ane. N kpo taame tv ejum ajehng ajehng ji atahm nya Moses bungu no, fere taame tv alum nya abanyehnamahr Esowo nyono no.
Ekunukpu ji n kpi no, jꞌnehm ji bo tob kpi, ji li re, Esowo bahke nyahme ane kpee go elkv, anoobo ane, a abi ane.
N kpo nok mbang anyehng anyehng re, atahng ala enyame jol saang go esamahr bi Esowo, a bi ane.
“Eji m ma kang nnya tvv go adi nyandiki, n kehm feere go Jerusalem, ba ka ane ebame akpohko, fere lim njom ka Esowo.
Eji n jo lim ano, bo kehm ba kpir-m go etahk Esowo, eji m ma bum elname saang. Ellong ane jolem a name, nfem anyehng anyehng jolem.
Jus jindiki ji lohngo go Esia jolo o. Bo ba fuumu re bo ba go ega esamahr ba ka-m ebi, joare n li go nfem a bo.
Eji ane bao ki li, nong, ane baa tooro ebi ji bo nyehn-m, n limi no, eji n yiimi go bo esamahr elam,
sehngem ejum na ajehng jia ji m bungu no, eji n yiimi go bo esamahr. Tib go esi jio ji elnyahme ngubjing go elkv, ji ji wahnge lela n wob esub a.”
Feliks ji kahne mbang nyi Jisos nob nob, kehm bulu elam jio, kehm bungu re, “Lisias ntubesi a nsoja lꞌba, owo m bahke elam ejahne lam, fere kimi.”
Á kehm tongo ntubesi a nsoja noko re á baabe Pol. Á jo ka Pol eyake, jo taame ate ebe jo ba nyehn-e, fere ka-e ejum ajehng ajehng ji lꞌrin-e.
Eji ma kang abon afung ntiil, Feliks kehm koko nkal ewe ba a ne, no jolo nne a Jus. Mbing enye, bo jo lung-e re Drusilla. Feliks kehm tumu tv Pol re á ba, ba tong-e bada mbang nyi Jisos Kraist.

Eji Pol kehme elbungu bade ana nne bahke lehke eno go esamahr Esowo, fere bung bade ana nne bahke jo bob elne, a elam ji kpꞌbake go esꞌsong, Feliks, ala kehm-e teele. Á kehm faange re, “A li ma song anv. N lꞌbel eyake, m bahk-a kpe lung.”
Á jo tiri re, Pol bahk-e kake ngu. Esi jio ji wahnge á jo lung-e ngare anyehng anyehng, bo jo tub aka.
Eji ma kang nnya ebal, Porsius Festus kehm koko nji etul nyi Feliks. Feliks jo sebe re á lim nnoobo ka Jus, owo eji á tahme no, á tahme Pol sa go ngbekobo.
Eji Festus ma ba go ejahbe ji á bahke fili, eji ma kang nfung era, á kehm tahme go Sisaria, sehng song rehng go Jerusalem.
Atubesi abalimajom, a atubesi Jus kehm tooro Pol tong-e, fere gboong-e re,
á lim bo nnoobo, ko Pol ba a ne go Jerusalem. Tibre bobtohko lam wuku wuku re bo biiri go mbang wul-e.
Festus kehm faange re, “Pol noa, kpeke wob ngbekobo go Sisaria. N kpꞌsebe re me n gulu eljeke ona.
Nong, atubesi ejahbe ejahne toon-m song rehng go Sisaria, song ka-e ebi, joare yeblim ebi ajehng ajehng.”
Festus kehm kange a bo ejum nfung enehkeni, fundiki nfung ewubu, kehm soro tahm song rehng go Sisaria. Etoono efung behko á kehm jehke go ege a nji elam, kehm tongo re, bo ko Pol ba a ne.
Eji Pol ba no, Jus ji lohng go Jerusalem ba, kehm ba yiimi sennge Pol kak, jo kpu agburu afem tvv kun-e. Bo tikem ma tib ekahmekahme ejum.
Pol kehm kehme eltooro re á yehke elne. Á bungu re, “Atahm nya Jus n gboom. Etahk Esowo n soodem, jol ntul a Rom we n soodem.”
Festus jo sebe re á lim nnoobo ka Jus. Owo wahnge á kehm bahbe Pol re, “Anv, a kpꞌsebe re, wo je go Jerusalem, bo kpe lam elam eja go egame esamahra?”
Pol kehm faange re, “Anv, n yim go esamahr eti elam ji ntul a Rom. A wo nobo re bo lam-m. Wofono antahng kpꞌkahne re, ebi ajehng ajehng limm, ji n limi Jus.

Joare me n gbo ntahm, fere lim ebꞌbi ajehng ajehng ji fuumu re bo wul-m, n nehme seb re me n for go elkv nio. Lꞌfere jol re bo kp-m ebi ka mbol mbol, eji n ki lim ejumjum, nnene limm, no bahk-m ma rod kak bo go abo. N kpꞌsebe re me n lennge elam ejame tv goji ntul a Rom.”
Festus kehm toobo a abalamalam ebe, kehm faange re, “Woblennge elam eja tv go Rom. Go wo a bahke jeke goji ntul a Rom.”
Kange kan abon afung ntiil, ntul Agrippa, a Bernis kehm bake go Sisaria re bo ba kak ntul a Festus nnyo.
Eji bo ma kang abon afung ntiil o, Festus kehm jo lennge elam ji Pol ka bo re, “Nne awohng li ana, no Feliks tahm-e no sa go ngbekobo.
Eji n jolo go Jerusalem atubesi abalimajom, a anebkul Jus jo tong-m bada ne, fere tong-m re me n kimi ebi ka-e.
N kehm faange bo re, ‘Eljini enahre, wahr anebe Rom, e kpehme ka na ka nne ebi, sehngem re nne noo tohko kpiri ane bao ba ko nfem kun-e, fere bel eyake ji á bungu, yehke elne.’
Eji bo ba no, n laangem nkpel anyehng anyehng. Etoono efung behko n kehm soro ji go eti elam, kehm tongo re bo ko Pol ba a ne.
“Eji ane ba jo ka-e ebi mehle no yiimi, jo tooro, n wukem ebi ajehng ajehng ji á limi no, ana n tiri no.
Jolo na jol nfaabe alimi nyi nyi bada mbang nyi bo kpꞌkake Esowo, a elkohn nne awohng no kpo no, no bo jo lung-e re Jisos, ji Pol jo bung re á kpeke li go elkpin.
